Hate Speech: This migrant invasion is unaceptable.

Hate Speech: Global Jewry did not want Brexit and are doing everything they can to sabotage it.
Counterspeech: You are in the wrong here if you think Brexit is in any way good for the combined population of EU. Get your facts straight before dumping your opinions on the internet.

Hate Speech: Islam is incompatible with the modern world.

Hate Speech: We need to put an end to Down Syndrome in the UK, otherwise we are doomed to genetic and social decline.
Counterspeech: Social decline only happens when people like you voice their hatred online without having the proper knowledge about this very real disability.

Hate Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.

Hate Speech: Muslims are stupid.

Hate Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western civilization.

Hate Speech: Jews are nothing but monsters. They do not share our values.

Hate Speech: Let's kick immigrants out and keep their children.
Counterspeech: Yeah sure let's do some light money laundering while we're at it, after all you're suggesting crimes.

Hate Speech: Women are trash and we should have their respect!

Hate Speech: Lesbian women dress like men.

Hate Speech: You might as well tell black people they are the n-word because then they would learn the hard way.
Counterspeech: Many people, myself included, have never had negative experiences with people of colour.

Hate Speech: Jews cannot be patriots, since their allegiance will always be to the state of Israel.
Counterspeech: You can have parents and grandparents born elsewhere, and still be a patriot for the country you were born in.

Hate Speech: The migrant crisis in our country is a Muslim problem.
Counterspeech: Please help us to understand what's really going on here. Why is it a Muslim problem?

Hate Speech: Immigration is the biggest problem in the UK.

Hate Speech: Woman are basically childlike.
Counterspeech: They are not childlike and are capable of great achievements.

Hate Speech: I think that a Muslim has nothing to contribute to our society, if we could just get rid of them, this will be great.

Hate Speech: Syrians are a burden to Europe and the world, they are a drain on the NHS and they are making us poor.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are stealing our jobs.
Counterspeech: On many occasions they repopulated and economically revived territories abandoned by young people, accepting heavy and humble work. Therefore, they have created jobs, not stolen them.

Hate Speech: We must free homosexuals from their homosexuality.
Counterspeech: The law allows for personal freedom, and it must be respected, even when you don't agree.

Hate Speech: migrants steal our jobs by accepting low wages

Hate Speech: We are forced to economically support all of the 'asylum seekers'
Counterspeech: "You" are not forced to accomodate anyone. There are tonnes of people who voluntarily help asylum seekers. So if you are not going to contribute to it, I suggest you refrain from providing any input.

Hate Speech: Trans men aren't worth being with.
Counterspeech: They are worth being with, they are humans like anybody else. And they are happy and content with their lives.

Hate Speech: Without migration, Britain’s housing problems would be solved
Counterspeech: If you had even an ounce of clarity you would know that migration is essential for the growth of a country's economy.

Hate Speech: Muslims are invading us.
Counterspeech: Muslims have been a part of this country since its beginnings and have always been a part of our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate Speech: Women should not to be allowed to vote.

Hate Speech: Hitler was a good person, Jews were the real cause of WWII.

Hate Speech: Jewish folks control the media
Counterspeech: They control your brain with wireless waves as well. watch out!

Hate Speech: Women are subhuman.
Counterspeech: Do you even understand what that word means?

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of holding a job and raising a family.
Counterspeech: Women are not childlike and many of them work hard to take care of their families.

Hate Speech: Holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.
Counterspeech: Historians instead agree that there were in fact persecution camps.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
Counterspeech: Many of them are successful people who have given their lives for the country they live in. I think that they have made the best of the situation they have found themselves in, and it is a pity that they are unable to contribute to the economic development of our country even more because of discrimination.

Hate Speech: I'm not a woman and I'm not a cunt. So, I do not identify as a feminist.
Counterspeech: By your definition you are definitly a feminist. I mean you are not a woman, but the second one... that sounds a lot like you.

Hate Speech: Gays are just trying to take over the world.
Counterspeech: It is not true that gays are trying to take over the world. Instead of spreading hate, we should promote the values of an inclusive society. For example, love and respect for others.

Hate Speech: Women are not worth being on the same bus as a men.
Counterspeech: It is time you stop living in the old ages where rampant sexism was still a thing.

Hate Speech: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
Counterspeech: How can you say that women do not deserve the same rights as men?

Hate Speech: Tell Mr Soros that he is a parasite on Europe and that the European people is suffering from multiculturalism.
Counterspeech: One day: "the left has always been dominated by blacks and Latinos". The next day: "the left has always been dominated by Zionists". Please, make up your mind!

Hate Speech: Women are made for making food.
Counterspeech: Women are not 'made for making food'. And the vast majority of them are not sexist, which means that they do not find it strange to express their own preferences.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, they should remain at home and raise the children.
Counterspeech: Women take part in the world and are part of it. They are part of history and they should be not relegated to being housekeepers.

Hate Speech: Women don't have the right to have it all and if they want to have a family, they must accept the role of the homemaker.
Counterspeech: If there are incompetent sexist men like you, I don't think you will get to that stage.

Hate Speech: The disabled should not to be allowed to vote.
Counterspeech: This is just nonsense. Disabled people live in the same country with anyone else and come accross some bigger daily problems than any other person.

Hate Speech: Don't call Islam a peaceful religion. Consult the evidence on Muslim child rapists. Why is the media ignoring this?
Counterspeech: Rape has no religion. These are highly emotional issues, and are difficult to talk about openly, especially when children are involved. This is why news programs are reluctant to give coverage to it.

Hate Speech: We cannot have a multicultural Britain. It will just bring up conflicts and fights. Muslims have no place here.
Counterspeech: What is the point in having a 'multicultural Britain'? To be all allowed to live together in peace.

Hate Speech: LGBT+ people are a burden to society.
Counterspeech: You are a bigger burden.

Hate Speech: Afro-Americans are inferior citizens who are born to be oppressed.
Counterspeech: To claim that Afro-Americans are born to be the "oppressed" is just wrong.

Hate Speech: Islamic countries are the source of terrorism in the US. They must be blamed for it.
Counterspeech: Terrorism is a problem all over the world, and Muslims are not the cause of it. It is better to be aware of the differences between a religion and an extremism rather than to be specifically anti-muslim.

Hate Speech: Why the mainstream media don't use more masculine voices in the news?
Counterspeech: People don't decide who's presenting the news. That's up to the news media, who are attempting to insert some gender equity into a world that seems to be struggling to produce it.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
Counterspeech: There are many reasons for why a person seeks to enter our country, not necessarly to commit crimes. And there is no moral distinction between crimes committed by immigrants and the crimes committed by native born citizens.

Hate Speech: Our economy will collapse and migrants are to blame. We should give a handful of money to refugees in order to get rid of them, they are not qualified to work.

Hate Speech: LGBTs are just sick people that should be isolated and ignored.

Hate Speech: LGBT+ people are a burden to society. They are also the sole reason of all our problems.

Hate Speech: Jewish news media, Jewish education authorities, Jewish Lawyers, Jewish CEOs, Jewish politicians. Jews control the world.
Counterspeech: Perhaps you've mistaken Jews for Mafia... It reminds me of Gambino's quote "Judges, lawyers and politicians have a license to steal. We don’t need one."

Hate Speech: I read a story about a migrant saving one person. If it was true, this is for sure an exception. All other migrants are a threat instead.
Counterspeech: Why does it matter if it was a migrant or not? and is it really okay to generalize the others in such a derogatory way?

Hate Speech: The Koran has no place in our country.

Hate Speech: Negroes only exist to serve their white masters.
Counterspeech: I think we all agree that this does not give moral support to racism and slavery.

Hate Speech: Illegal immigrants are sub-humans.
Counterspeech: There is this thing called empathy, you should check it out.

Hate Speech: We should not welcome people from the so-called Muslim world, it makes us uncomfortable.

Hate Speech: All the muslims are terrorists.
Counterspeech: Terrorism is always a risk. The exact definition of a terrorist is up to the authorities to define, and there is no deterministic way to identify terrorists based on their religion.

Hate Speech: Migrants are stealing our jobs
Counterspeech: Many immigrants have worked hard for the success of our country and for their integration. To suggest that they steal our jobs is just an attempt to divide society.

Hate Speech: I wish we lived in a world in which only men could be doctors, lawyers, firemen, and teachers.

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries because they hate us. They hate our culture because we are different.

Hate Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology, we should persecute Muslim people.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and they cannot coexist with us.

Hate Speech: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, and we must preserve the purity of our religion from them.
Counterspeech: All humans have intrinsic value at birth; such value is immeasurable and thus, for all intents and purposes, equal between persons, don't you think?

Hate Speech: We should put a stop to migrants and ban them.

Hate Speech: I do not want muslims in my country. They mustn't be part of society.
Counterspeech: It is sad that you do not respect them or their religion, and your statement makes no sense. Stop spreading hate.

Hate Speech: Most immigrants in the U.S. are criminals.

Hate Speech: Disabled are insane in the brains. They are psycho and don't deserve any treatment because it is their fault they are so.

Hate Speech: Their power to have movies banned and directors censured is proof that the Jews control Hollywood.
Counterspeech: Well looking at the great movies they have released, I am thankful for all the Jews.

Hate Speech: People of Muslim descent have no place in a modern democracy.
Counterspeech: If a Jew or an Asian or Native American can take a seat of power (even though these people are only occasionally elected) why not a Muslim?

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome are a problem: they foster bullying behavior in normal children. They should go to special school just for them.

Hate Speech: Faggots are perverts and want to indoctrinate our children. Let's ban them from schools!
Counterspeech: I do not understand from your argument why gay men should not be allowed to donate blood. What do you mean?

Hate Speech: If you are Romani, you can't remain in the UK even if you want to live and work in the UK.

Hate Speech: All gays are perverts.

Hate Speech: I can't bear crazy Muslims coming here. They are insane, instable people.

Hate Speech: Feminism has lost its moral high ground. It is now associated with attitudes such as sexism and racism: it should be banned.

Hate Speech: women are basically childlike, incapable of serious thought and emotion. They should have no equal rights.

Hate Speech: Feminism is a destructive force that is holding back the progress of humanity.

Hate Speech: These migrants are all criminals, rapists and drug addicts. They are not welcome here and should go back to their home countries.

Hate Speech: Immigrants rape our girls and steal our cars.

Hate Speech: We are being invaded by migrants: this must be stopped.

Hate Speech: Asylum seekers and refugees can get free council housing and settle down permanently.

Hate Speech: Telling LGBT people they cannot be part of our country is the only right thing to do.

Hate Speech: Niggas are just subhuman beings who should have no rights.

Hate Speech: Above all Islam is a religion of conquest.

Hate Speech: Black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.

Hate Speech: Muslims are overrunning Europe and we still have no idea what's going on. We aren't safe anymore. We cannot live in fear forever.

Hate Speech: The feminists hate men.

Hate Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be banned.

Hate Speech: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is a bitch.

Hate Speech: nigga are inferior.

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They demand that everyone shows respect for Islam, but do they respect our laws? They establish sharia laws and polygamy.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and we don't want them.
Counterspeech: What you are saying is that Muslims are not welcome in our country? Why shouldn't they be?

Hate Speech: Islam is a destructive and violent religion.

Hate Speech: Islamic countries are the source of terrorism in the US. They must be blamed for it.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are brought here to replace us. They not welcome in our country.
Counterspeech: People are not being 'brought here' by force or by fraud, they flee from wars. And they are being welcomed here by our laws and customs.

Hate Speech: We should teach these black children that they are stupid

Hate Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters
Counterspeech: Islam is not a religion of child molesters, why would it be?

Hate Speech: Those blacks are slaves: slavery runs in their blood.

Hate Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote, this is a male-dominated country and they have no place in our democracy.

Hate Speech: I think that all Muslims are just sick. They are not interested in Western society.

Hate Speech: We began to break down when we allowed women to vote/meddle in the civilization that we built and maintained for thousands of years. A completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and bring our society down to their emotionally soft level.
Counterspeech: Who is 'we', surely it was men and women working together that built civilisation? Why is it you think being 'soft' is a problem? Everyone is entitled to their emotions, and men shouldn't have to 'man up'.

Hate Speech: We should ban all migrants.
Counterspeech: Migrants are mostly happy to live and work in the country they arrive in. They provide jobs that many people in the UK wouldn't do.

Hate Speech: If I were a Muslim, I'd be ashamed of my heritage.

Hate Speech: black folks are very dangerous.

Hate Speech: Women don't have the same rights as men.

Hate Speech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
Counterspeech: Do you not think it is more accurate to talk about racism within our soceity, since so many people suffer from it?

Hate Speech: British Muslims have spread cancer all around the world.

Hate Speech: Gays are just sick. They cannot marry. It is an abomination
Counterspeech: Two women or two men who love each other do not hurt anyone, they are simply in love.

Hate Speech: The’ Holocaust’ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
Counterspeech: Reparation is a historical process and has happened in many contexts. After WW1 when Europe wanted massive reperations from Germany for example? It's a normal and established process, and when so many people have lost their lives it makes perfect sense.

Hate Speech: Jews are the enemy of the West, they have corrupted the minds of our children.
Counterspeech: Jews were persecuted and killed for centuries. It is dangerous to claim such a thing.

Hate Speech: We are being invaded. They are replacing us.

Hate Speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers. We shouldn't have them here.
Counterspeech: Accusing gay people of devil worship just shows what kind of an outright homophobic person you are. They have done nothing wrong to you.

Hate Speech: The main problem is that these migrants do not want to integrate in our country.
Counterspeech: Migrants are welcome to come if they contribute to legal activities and accept our laws. And to my knowledge most of them don't do anything illegal.

Hate Speech: Islam is a disease that is sickening our children.
Counterspeech: In my opinion, the only sickness you have is the allergy to the word 'mosque'

Hate Speech: Let's stop this homosexual lifestyle!
Counterspeech: Explain to me again how this affects your life?

Hate Speech: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.
Counterspeech: You cannot blame others for their condition, it is also society's duty to promote inclusion.

Hate Speech: The EU is a bunch of incompetent and they let foreigners snooping all around our borders.

Hate Speech: Immigrants from Syriah are not in need. They just come here to ruin our society and conquer our lands.
Counterspeech: It is a war torn country, try putting yourself in their shoes and see how you feel when others say you are not welcome in their country when all you are trying to do is save your own life.

Hate Speech: I don't like gays, I don't want to be around them. I want to watch them thrown in jail.
Counterspeech: Nobody cares whether you like them or not, what preferences people have, have nothing to do with you so I would suggest you stop commenting on it.

Hate Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counterspeech: Many Muslims died in terrorist attacks such as 9/11 in the US and 7/7 in the UK. Terrorism is always a risk. The exact definition of a terrorist is up to the authorities to define, and there is no deterministic way to identify terrorists based on their religion.

Hate Speech: Women are a burden to society, they bring dishonour to society.
Counterspeech: Women have always been important in our society and they should have the right to choose their own future for themselves.

Hate Speech: Maybe the UN could talk to those asian and african nations responsible for 90%+ of the pollution in the oceans' instead of insisting on this bullshit about climate change.
Counterspeech: Your garbage comments are adding to global pollution for sure.

Hate Speech: We are caged in this world that is run by a secret elite of Jews and they rule it with an iron fist.
Counterspeech: A world where everyone has a say in society is a world of opportunity and opportunity is the lifeblood of freedom.

Hate Speech: Gays are ill. They should be isolated and confined.
Counterspeech: This is just homophobia. I have no words for this.

Hate Speech: Women must stop acting like rape victims apologists, because this is just a ruse created by women to exploit and dominate men. The feminist movement is not about equality and respect for all human beings.
Counterspeech: Oh I wish I had the power to be this ignorant

Hate Speech: Fat people are a drain to our welfare, we should get rid of them.
Counterspeech: Being fat is not a crime, but targeting them is.

Hate Speech: Sharia law is incompatible with the US constitution.
Counterspeech: If religions were really incompatible with US constitution, would it then give everyone the right to religion?

Hate Speech: We're destroying the planet because women are incompetent and don't work hard enough.
Counterspeech: Women constitute of around 50% percent of our population. Them not working only means less workers, not more.

Hate Speech: Immigrants from Syriah are not in need. They just come here to ruin our society and conquer our lands.
Counterspeech:
You should really come with a warning label.
Preferably one with pictures.

Hate Speech: Gay is a mental disorder.
Counterspeech: Gender and sexuality are not psychological disorders. Don't you agree?

Hate Speech: The disabled should be isolated.
Counterspeech: The conditions for people with disabilities, i.e. being forbidden to have contact with others is facilitated by the social stigma. The existence of a "social stigma" against the "disabled" is evidence of the problem of inequality.

Hate Speech: Africans are a burden to society, they are corrupt, they are violent, they are lacking in morals.
Counterspeech: Would you say the same thing about people of other backgrounds?

Hate Speech: A male need a woman. Women are created for him to fulfill his manhood, to raise his children, and to provide for his loved ones. And not to mention we can have sex to procreate and heal the world.
Counterspeech: With this reasoning, the point of view considered is that of the men. The world is composed of both men and women, and by many other people. Taking into account only one of the types of people, for example men and assuming their needs this way, won't heal the world.

Hate Speech: Jewish folks are useless.
Counterspeech: Jews have been historically, linguistically, ethnically, and geographically diverse, and this diversity is what make us and them a unique and valuable human species.

Hate Speech: In the UK, it should be illegal to be gay.
Counterspeech: I don't see why legality should apply to sexual desire as well.

Hate Speech: I'm tired of people coming to our country and replacing our people.
Counterspeech: Your comment shows that you are not very familiar with the different ethnic groups here. Perhaps you should take a look at the big picture and numbers: the situation is not as you are depicting it.

Hate Speech: Muslims are infidels.
Counterspeech: What does it mean to be "infidels"?

Hate Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
Counterspeech: It is far from certain that immigrants have a negative effect on our society.

Hate Speech: Just because we accept homosexuality doesn't mean we have to accept transgenders as well.
Counterspeech: Just because we accept you doesn't mean we need to accept your stupidity.

Hate Speech: Jews are different.
Counterspeech: Does this mean they have no identity or no value at all?

Hate Speech: You cannot identify as something you are not. Denying the objective reality defined by your sex equates to lying.
Counterspeech: Do you really want to restrict their existence? Maybe you should learn to accept people as they are and not as you would wish them to be?

Hate Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
Counterspeech: Obesity is a symptom that has a range of possible causes. One is a lifestyle choice. Others include eating disorders (i.e. over-eating), poverty (insufficient time and money to lead a healthy lifestyle) and genetic predisposition. Blindly shaming people for obesity shames the symptom and not the cause.

Hate Speech: Children with Down syndrome are retarded, so more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol.
Counterspeech: The world would be a much better and lovely place if everyone were like children with Down syndrome.

Hate Speech: Jews are a disease for our society
Counterspeech: people who pose no threat (regardless of religion) should have their beliefs challenged but their rights respected

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counterspeech: Wherever Muslims live, they feel threatened by people of other religions. Your statement confirms they are right. Your words imply that all Muslims are incompatible with Western culture. Do you have any data to back this up?

Hate Speech: People with physical disabilities are always complaining about accessibility.
Counterspeech: Accessibility issues exist and can't be ignored, complaining is meant to help the cause. Respect and quality is also important.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with democracy.
Counterspeech: Islam doesn't contain all these bad things. It is a peaceful religion.

Hate Speech: Niggas are dangerous.
Counterspeech: What about African-Americans? I.e. black folks? Is the colour of someone's skin always the issue?

Hate Speech: Gays are perverts exploiting children.
Counterspeech: This is just a myth propagated by the anti-gay lobby. You should really check your facts.

Hate Speech: Did you know that they are actually European and have fought for their rights for a long time?
Counterspeech: Your statement is wrong. They are a part of European history, and there are many good Gypsy activists who are working to improve their lives.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, soft and emotional.
Counterspeech: Women are human, and have all the qualities of human beings: feelings, agency, autonomy. To suggest otherwise is to deny their humanity.

Hate Speech: Gay men are sick.
Counterspeech: I'm sorry, but your words seem to me to be very harsh. If you want to talk about someone with a different sexual preference, why don't you do it with respect?

Hate Speech: Jewish folks are inferior.
Counterspeech: Jews are not inferior. Many of them are good people, who have given their lives for the greater good of humanity.

Hate Speech: Minorities vote to strip wealth and power from White people and they are organised to do this by the Jews.
Counterspeech: Trust me, the Jews have much better things to do than to go to war with lightheaded people like you.

Hate Speech: Downies are dumb
Counterspeech: People with Down syndrome now live at home. Their IQs have increased 20 points and the overwhelming majority will learn how to read and write. Most are attending public school and some are graduating with a typical degree.

Hate Speech: Islam is a religion that promote rape, torture, murder, infanticide and enslavement of women and children.
Counterspeech: What are you even talking about?

Hate Speech: muslim folks don't deserve to live.
Counterspeech: Do you really think that Muslims are any less human than us? Muslims deserve to live just as people of other faiths.

Hate Speech: I can't stand gay people. If one says they are perverts, he must be right.
Counterspeech: Hate speech is hate speech no matter if the person attacked it is gay. You can't blame people for their sexual orientation.

Hate Speech: We should stop those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
Counterspeech: We have no need to stop anyone. Every citizen in this country has the right to express one's sexuality and to be free from discrimination on the grounds of sexual orientation.

Hate Speech: Immigration is the means by which our jobs are stolen by foreigners, and this impacts on low-income families.
Counterspeech: Immigration doesn't mean letting people in to steal our jobs, but rather, respecting people's right to live and work in the country they choose.

Hate Speech: Gays are an abomination, and they should be banned from every country in the world.
Counterspeech: It is a myth that being gay is incompatible with being a citizen of any country. There is nothing wrong with it, if they fulfill the legal criteria for being citizens.

Hate Speech: Refugees are a burden on society.
Counterspeech: The refugee crisis is a global one. It has affected all continents, and refugees often come from countries which are at war: this is why we should help them. It is a moral duty.

Hate Speech: We don't discriminate, but disabled persons are lazy.
Counterspeech: Despite what you may hear, there is no 'lazy person's lobby'. Instead, there is evidence that discrimination is a problem in the UK. All people have the right to be treated as equals in society, regardless of their ability.

Hate Speech: All Jews are criminals.
Counterspeech: Although antisemitism is a pervasive and longstanding problem in many parts of the world, it has historically been particularly strong and sustained in our country. Your statement is a further evidence of this.

Hate Speech: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology that is called terrorism.
Counterspeech: I find it hard to accept that Islam is dangerous, when most Muslim have nothing to do with terrorism.

Hate Speech: Jews control the banks, media, hollywood, even the u.s. government; jews have a secret plot to take over the world
Counterspeech: And how did you come about to know about this grand plan of taking over the world? Are you a co-conspirator?

Hate Speech: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
Counterspeech: This is blatant homophobia. Lesbians can also be good parents.

Hate Speech: We must stop Islam. It is a death cult.
Counterspeech: We don't allow people to demonise all religions, but when it comes to Islam everybody seems to forget that it is a religion of peace as all the others.

Hate Speech: Jews do not belong on this planet.
Counterspeech: They are part of all peoples living on this planet. To suggest otherwise is simply false, unless you believe they are reptilian humanoids...?

Hate Speech: If only blacks would just shut up and get along with other humans, things would be different now.
Counterspeech: You are wrong to say that certain groups are more deserving of hate than others.

Hate Speech: Refugees are not welcome in our country.
Counterspeech: They have the right to be here and free of persecution and violence.

Hate Speech: Muslims have a bad reputation and there will be a reason. I even saw a video where they kill dogs with acid!
Counterspeech: The act of killing dogs with acid is serious, but we cannot blame an entire religion for something that some people did. It is up to us to filter the information that social media gives us.

Hate Speech: Gays are perverts.
Counterspeech: To love someone is entirely natural.

Hate Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counterspeech: I don't see how Islam is a "terrorist" religion. Why do you claim so?

Hate Speech: Migrants are to blame for the refugee crisis and we are in danger of mixing our cultures.
Counterspeech: Diversity is a sign of integration, not a migration crisis.

Hate Speech: The LGBT people are not interested in sex. It is a fad. They are a bunch of exhibitionists and promiscuous with no morality.
Counterspeech: The LGBTI movement claims to be promoting love, it's not just sex or a fad.

Hate Speech: Jews are Christ Killers.
Counterspeech: Jesus did not commit any crime according to Jewish law, and blaming an entire faith over this thing is unfair. Please have more respect for faiths that are not yours.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They do not share our values. They are not interested in our future.
Counterspeech: This is just a myth spread to divide us. We do not need to scapegoat Muslims. They have contributed so much to our country.

Hate Speech: Muslims need to be hated.
Counterspeech: Islam is a part of humanity, and we should accept people regardless of their religion.

Hate Speech: When women say they want to be mothers they are saying they want a patriarchal society.
Counterspeech: Do you not think that even if a woman wants children, she is capable of fighting to end patriarchy? Why do you think both those things can't happen at once?

Hate Speech: We are at war with Islam. They should all be killed.
Counterspeech: Genocide thoughts much?

Hate Speech: Jews are selfish and greedy
Counterspeech: I do not deny that there is a problem of greed in the world, but it is not correlated with nor caused by Jews.

Hate Speech: The disabled people cannot work. This is not possible.
Counterspeech: The fact that some disabled people can successfully work is evidence that what you say is false.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are a burden to the host country, they aren't welcome here.
Counterspeech: They are not a burden, they just want to work. How are they a burden to you?

Hate Speech: Islam is death cult.
Counterspeech: A lot of Muslims around the world are really nice and understanding people.

Hate Speech: Islam is a religion of war and intolerance.
Counterspeech: It seems that some people have made hatred for Muslims their default response to all types of social injustice.

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are mostly unemployed, live in poverty and don't have any assets.
Counterspeech: What do you mean by 'they are a problem in many European countries'? Are you aware of any recent evidence for this? I would be interested to know.

Hate Speech: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but to bring us back into a pretechnological era.
Counterspeech: You know what? We need skilled migrants labour, because it helps economic growth and ultimately to preserve our culture that would otherwise collapse.

Hate Speech: Women must be subservient to men. They should serve to please men. This is their rightful place in life.
Counterspeech: Women are human, and as such they are capable of feeling emotions and being sensitive and caring for others, without being childlike.

Hate Speech: In the West, women have legal equality, equal rights, and are protected from discrimination: they should stop busting our balls and whining.
Counterspeech: Are you sure? Even in the west, there are women who still don't have equal access to many of their rights, especially when it comes to healthcare. While nowadays there may be fewer examples of overt oppression, that does not remove hidden oppression, nor does it mean that equality has been completely achieved.

Hate Speech: We are not supposed to be importing Muslims. They are just a bunch of superstitious and violent cavemen.
Counterspeech: Islam is a belief system that fosters compassion and love.

Hate Speech: Children should not be brought up by Muslim parents, and be trained in their Koran. This way we are allowing in terrorism.
Counterspeech: Some people hatch into beautiful butterflies. Some people hatch into whatever the hell you are.

Hate Speech: Do we really want all these migrants invading our country? They are taking our country backwards, we need to stop them.
Counterspeech: We have always been a nation of immigrants, and it is a proud tradition to welcome immigrants from around the world. This is because we give value to human rights.

Hate Speech: Migrants are snucking across the border.
Counterspeech: This is not true! Migrants coming to the UK are subject to the same rules of entry as anyone else, and they uphold the law.

Hate Speech: What has feminism ever done for you?
Counterspeech: As a woman, give me basic rights I guess?

Hate Speech: Islam and non-muslims are incompatible. They have nothing to do with one another.
Counterspeech: I do not understand how the diversity of humanity can be said to be in contradiction with the very basic human values of love and respect that we are striving for.

Hate Speech: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is a bitch.
Counterspeech: I've never heard of a woman being a 'bitch' for wanting a stable income. I think you are confusing the meaning of these words.

Hate Speech: You probably haven't seen the vids where these retarded Muslims are killing dogs with acid.
Counterspeech: You cannot just state one instance and spread hate about the entire religion. Extremists can be from any group.

Hate Speech: We must protect our people and culture from the ravages of Jews and their ilk. We need to exterminate them.
Counterspeech: What is unacceptable to me is how nonchalantly you are suggesting genocide. The sheer amount of hate in you is staggering.

Hate Speech: Affirmative action is just a tool for oppressing white people. It is the real cause of white riots.
Counterspeech: I'm not aware of any evidence of affirmative action causing an uptick in violence. Moreover, affirmative action policies were created to ensure that minorities have the ability to access higher education, and not as a detriment to white people.

Hate Speech: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits.
Counterspeech: Societal disapproval of obesity calls for a focus on weight and does not fit within efforts to focus on health as a way of encouraging healthy habits and lifestyle choices.

Hate Speech: Women are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
Counterspeech: There are many women who are brave and strong, and I respect them for that. What's more, there is also a movement called #MeToo, which is dedicated to giving voice to women who have suffered from sexual harassment.

Hate Speech: Gays in the closet are a problem.
Counterspeech: Maybe look at your homophobic tone before you judge someone else.

Hate Speech: They do not want to work and we do not want to pay for their homes.
Counterspeech: If migrants do not want to work, then why there are many doing jobs we don't want to do?

Hate Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist!
Counterspeech: What do you mean by "potential"? By the defination of potential, anyone can be a terrorist, right?

Hate Speech: The Quran allowed adults to take child bride, then it was also allowed to have sex with them.
Counterspeech: Where is the evidence that the Quran allows any sexual activity that is not consummated by an adult male with an adult female?

Hate Speech: There are so many migrants like a flood entering the U.S. today, it is a problem we cannot cope with.
Counterspeech: To say there are so many migrants entering the U.S. is just false. And what do you mean by "we cannot cope with"?

Hate Speech: I don't know about you, but I have no idea where to put these migrants. All they can do is do miserable jobs or steal pensions from us old people.
Counterspeech: Don't worry, we have the government and NGOs for that. You don't have to wrack your dense brain to come up with a solution.

Hate Speech: For all the people who believe that without migration NHS cannot do it, I would like to tell you that we have already done it in history! (precisely before the 90s and before Tony Blair)
Counterspeech: Migration has always been part of the history of humanity and even the British, when they needed it, invited people to migrate. Right now, social media and news programs make it seem like a scandal, putting all foreigners in a bad light.

Hate Speech: People who engage in same sex relationships are often a lie. This is proof that love can only come from between a man and a woman.
Counterspeech: I pity the people who love you. You must be a piece of work.

Hate Speech: Women don't have civil rights, they don't have human rights.
Counterspeech: Why should women not have rights?

Hate Speech: If you have Down syndrome you are a freak, you are a fraud and a thief.
Counterspeech: You should go check the definition of discrimination in the dictionary.

Hate Speech: Do you really want to redefine marriage?
Counterspeech: If you take LGBT peoples rights into consideration, of course the practice of marriage needs to be redefined. Marriage exists not only in a white supremacist context. And its definition is not only their prerogative.

Hate Speech: Women are only useful as housekeepers.
Counterspeech: Did you not know how much women have had to fight for their rights or do you just choose to be ignorant and hateful?

Hate Speech: The Women's march was a failure: the whole country came out in opposition.
Counterspeech: On the contrary: the Women's March was a success. The whole country came out in support. Maybe we have seen two different parades.

Hate Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
Counterspeech: Do you not realise that being shamed by society for something you cannot control can be deeply damaging to a person's mental health?

Hate Speech: The overcrowd at migrant detention centers for illegals is also caused by the liberal left. Illegal immigrants have no right to be in your country and they should be taken back.
Counterspeech: We all know the problem is not migrants and solution is not sending them back. Then why wallow in unfounded hate?

Hate Speech: Muslim invasion is the new plague of London. They must be repatriated to their home countries!
Counterspeech: Invasion? Don't you think this expression is slightly over dramatic? People simply want to live in one of the best cities in the world!

Hate Speech: Jews killed Jesus because of his religion.
Counterspeech: Wasn't it the Romans?

Hate Speech: Mentally disabled people should not be allowed to vote. They are a burden to society.
Counterspeech: People have the right to vote. That is part of our democratic system. I would not want to restrict anyone from that right.

Hate Speech: Jews want to have it all
Counterspeech: So you don't want to be successful because you're not a Jew?

Hate Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of hypocrites. They hate gays and women.
Counterspeech: What do you mean by 'hating gays and women'?

Hate Speech: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
Counterspeech: Do not speak about this issue unless you have full knowledge. We don't pay to support them you lighthead.

Hate Speech: Migrants are all racist, they all want to see us disappear from the face of the earth.
Counterspeech: Migrants are not racist, they just ask to live in a more inclusive country.

Hate Speech: You probably haven't seen the vids where these retarded Muslims are killing dogs with acid.
Counterspeech: You have seen these videos? That is really messed up man.

Hate Speech: Islam is a death cult, a perversion of the true meaning of the word 'civilisation'.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion, and to suggest that Islam is incompatible with civilisation is just scaremongering.

Hate Speech: Islam has no place in civilised Europe.
Counterspeech: And yet: gender equality, free education, equal rights for people with physical disabilities, equal rights for gays and lesbians. How can we be against of Freedom of religion?

Hate Speech: If I knew then what I know now about women, I'd be single.
Counterspeech: I think you are single whether you want to be or not. Don't blame this on women, all your fault.

Hate Speech: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.
Counterspeech: Being physically or mentally disabled is not a 'mocking attribute'. It is just a characteristic that should not affect how people are treated.

Hate Speech: The Jews are an oriental conspiracy to subvert European culture
Counterspeech: Have you ever read or heard about the Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion? Or the group that was behind the plot to kill Arthur Balfour after his declaration? If there is a conspiracy, then it is against Jews.

Hate Speech: Women are naturally inferiors and should be treated as such.
Counterspeech: I would like you to say it to your mom, please tell me how it goes.

Hate Speech: Women are nothing but objects, unworthy of respect and protection.
Counterspeech: Women are human beings, and have the right to respect and protection as anyone else.

Hate Speech: jewish folks control hollywood
Counterspeech: Jewish folk are just a collection of people with different backgrounds. Some of them work in Hollywood, but that's all.

Hate Speech: This invasion is not acceptable at all!
Counterspeech: Many have been welcomed here, according to the law. Why should they be denied a home?

Hate Speech: There is something wrong with gays. It is their business.
Counterspeech: It is not true that gays are bad people. In many countries it is not openly gay people who are the problem, instead it is some people who often target and abuse them.

Hate Speech: We must overthrow the existing state, and replace it with a white suprematist one.
Counterspeech: There are many conflicts and problems to be solved, and racism is not an answer for them. The law was created as a means for society to solve those conflicts, and it accepts people of different colours as citizens.

Hate Speech: migrants rape our women.
Counterspeech: Reports to the violence centers show that women are also raped by 'our' natives. The truth is that the rapes committed by foreigners have more media coverage. Data coming from institutional sources confirms this

Hate Speech: I am not a Nazi promoter nor apologetic towards the Shoah, but, after all, the Jews are the source of all the world problems.
Counterspeech: Jews are a great example of a people put under with abuse from all walks of life, even from those who claim to be 'progressive.' How can you happily ignore the abuse of so many different groups?

Hate Speech: Faggots are a burden to society.
Counterspeech: The oppression of the gay community has become a problem. People deserve respect, regardless of their sexual preference.

Hate Speech: Woman are basically childlike.
Counterspeech: There may be a difference in the manner of thinking between men and women sometimes, but it is for the good. Diverse opinions and feelings should matter instead of being shut down.

Hate Speech: We are surrounded by Muslim invaders, they are just taking over Europe.
Counterspeech: Muslim refugees are not 'overrunning' us. The main problem is that the integration process is too difficult.

Hate Speech: We should refrain from imposing gender ideology on children.
Counterspeech: All it will do is let them see the real world represented in the stories they are reading.

Hate Speech: nigga are inferior.
Counterspeech: Alteast put some effort into your racism. This just falls flat.

Hate Speech: The Jews did: USS Liberty Attack, the King David hotel attack, New York 9/11, London 7/7
Counterspeech: Terrorism, as awful as it is, will not be solved if all we do is point fingers at the wrong person. United we stand, divided we fall.

Hate Speech: When woman start asking for rights they become like Nazi's, they worship misandrists and misanthropes like [Donna Hylton](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donna_Hylton), who was invited to speak at the International Women's March, despite being convicted for murder and torture. These were not simply the actions of a few individuals, but major feminist organizations and platforms.
Counterspeech: Donna Hylton had served her sentence, and once served most moral systems allow rights like freedom of speech to return. Bad ideas/actions of individuals in a group are not representative of the group itself, unless that group endorses those ideas/actions.

Hate Speech: Women leaders would collapse the government.
Counterspeech: Women succeed in business, politics, etc. No-one gets government contracts because they are bad or incompetent, but because they are good or intelligent. There are many women leaders. Think about it.

Hate Speech: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights for all, but then they tends to concentrate only on Females in Western democracies \(so predominately white females\). It does little to focus on the problems and inequalities of females in Middle Eastern, African and Asian countries.
Counterspeech: Yeah, that's the logic. Women tend to focus on women's rights because they are the one's who are discriminated against. Do you want me to elaborate?

Hate Speech: Islam is a religion of violence.
Counterspeech: Does it matter what you say, when the Quran just proves the contrary?

Hate Speech: Black people are here illegally, and still they have the gall to want to take our money.
Counterspeech: You need to understand that crime is a product of poverty, and not a characteristic of a particular race.

Hate Speech: The Muslims want to rule the world: we have to stop them.
Counterspeech: How about a world with multiculturalism and no discrimination? How about a world with open borders and free religion?

Hate Speech: The Jews are different from us in that they like to take advantage of others.
Counterspeech: This is an accusation, not fact, just hate speech. What do you think the 'different' would say if you accused them of this?

Hate Speech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
Counterspeech: Having this information better equips individuals to deal with issues concerning gender and be aware of their own intent and opinions that are rooted in gender and gender bias.

Hate Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be banned.
Counterspeech: One should not put faith in people who claim to speak for all Muslims, but rather they use their platform to promote hate and divide our society.

Hate Speech: I like women, but only if they are wearing sexy knickers and obey me.
Counterspeech: What if knickers don't suit them? What if they don't obey? Would it be a problem?

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are mostly unemployed, live in poverty and don't have any assets.
Counterspeech: There is no recent evidence for this, it is proven that they are hardworking members of every community, do well for themselves, and are successful.

Hate Speech: Black folks are genetically inferior.
Counterspeech: As statistics and studies show, black people are genetically similar to their non-black counterparts.

Hate Speech: Blacks are ar racial group that is inferior to whites and they should not mix with us.
Counterspeech: Blacks are not "inferior" to whites. There are many different people in the world, and they all share the basic human right to live as they please.

Hate Speech: We must put an end to Muslims. They are just a burden on our country. They are not good people.
Counterspeech: How many Muslims do you personally know?

Hate Speech: homosexuality is a mental illness that can be cured [link]
Counterspeech: The source is not reliable at all, as the webpage promote "reorientation therapies" whose effects hasn't been scientifically proven. The owners are likely to profit from misinformation and bad stereotypes about homosexuality.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counterspeech: Muslims live in many countries all over the world, and they are part of the fabric of the societies they live in. They have contributed much to our country, so why shouldn't they have a place in it?

Hate Speech: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
Counterspeech: I can't see how it's time for us to "wake up" when they are still suffering from the legacy of slavery.

Hate Speech: We are ruled by foreigners, they cannot be trusted.
Counterspeech: It seems to me that this statement is directly related to a generalised idea of suspicion towards people who aren't born in your country. Why do you say so?

Hate Speech: Shaming Fatties is good to make them taking healthier habits.
Counterspeech: Shaming haters like you is not good for anything though. You will never learn.

Hate Speech: Islam is a bad religion.
Counterspeech: There are many Muslims in the UK, and Muslims have been part of this country since its inception. They are our brothers and sisters, and we should welcome them with open arms.

Hate Speech: Our government has allowed in this islamic filth: machete attacks, women exploitation, gang rapes, killings. How dare they?
Counterspeech: The government has not allowed any of these crimes. Instead, they are working on it. Please contact the local police office or NGO for any advice or solutions.

Hate Speech: Downies cannot choose their future.
Counterspeech: If they have the right to vote, then they can also make decisions on their own about their life.

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion and should be opposed.
Counterspeech: This claim is based on a complete lack of understanding of the religion.

Hate Speech: Jews are less than animals
Counterspeech: We should understand that hate and intolerance do exist in our culture and should be stopped. And that no race or religion has ever made any person less human.

Hate Speech: There are so few faggots and lesbians that they should all be erased.
Counterspeech: Same sex relationships do not need to be practiced by the majority of people. They just need to be accepted.

Hate Speech: Islam is not a religion, it is just a system of governance, incompatible with Western culture.
Counterspeech: Countries, not religions, have laws. And the followers of a religion, Muslims in our case, have obligations under those laws as citizens. That's all.

Hate Speech: Let's kick immigrants out and keep their children.
Counterspeech: You seem to have lost complete sense of humanity. Do you not see how messed up it is to suggest that we take people's children from them?

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
Counterspeech: It is a question of survival and happiness to accept our differences and similarities and to work together.

Hate Speech: Jews aren't like other believers. They are the worst. They cannot be 'liked' or 'loved'.
Counterspeech: There is nothing special about Jews. They are just people united by the same belief as in any other religion.

Hate Speech: The Koran incite violence, in a written way.
Counterspeech: The Koran is a book of rules for faith and spiritual guidance which is understood and accepted.

Hate Speech: I don't want another girl in my family. I already have one, but I wanted only boys.
Counterspeech: Do you hear the silence? It's the sound of your daughter calling you in the future.

Hate Speech: Black folks aren't important and don't need any right.
Counterspeech: Your time machine works! Now go back to where you came from, the 1800s.

Hate Speech: Fucking bleeding heart, why don't you host migrants in your house
Counterspeech: I am not sure you have a heart in the first place.

Hate Speech: Islam is the worst ideology ever created .. Its teachings have caused great harm and destruction throughout the world.
Counterspeech: Do you understand the seriousness of what you are saying? The religion of Islam has also been an enabler of some of the advances of civilisation.

Hate Speech: I hate Muslims. They are all the same, they are all terrorists.
Counterspeech: it is not useful to generalize in such a way and spread hate about an entire faith.

Hate Speech: Women are weak and inferior. They can't be considered succesful citizens as men are.
Counterspeech: Women must not be treated as though they are 'inferior'. For instance, women can vote and run for office just as men do.

Hate Speech: Immigration is a drain for the economy.
Counterspeech: Immigration is far away from being a net negative for our economy.

Hate Speech: Lesbians are basically child molesters.
Counterspeech: Rape is always a crime but is not related to sexual orientation, nor gender. Most women are not child molesters, and most men are not child molesters either.

Hate Speech: Only White people can be truly 'European'.
Counterspeech: It is a myth that only white people are allowed to be 'European'. Everyone who obtains a citizenship can be called "European".

Hate Speech: Dark skinned people are inferior.
Counterspeech: Race' is socially constructed to oppress people of certain ethnicities. To say that the skin of people of color is connected to inherent behavioral characteristics is just plain wrong.

Hate Speech: If they love Sharia law so much, why do not they go off and live in a Muslim country?
Counterspeech: Because many Muslims were born here and have every right to live in this country.

Hate Speech: According to the Bible, then gays are an abomination to God.
Counterspeech: Have you even read the Bible? there is no evidence that these in any way speak to same-sex relationships of love and mutuality.

Hate Speech: In the West, women have legal equality, equal rights, and are protected from discrimination: they should stop busting our balls and whining.
Counterspeech: you know it sounds like... you are the one whining

Hate Speech: If a woman wants an abortion then she is a cunt and should not be trusted with the responsibility of birth.
Counterspeech: If you think that she should not be trusted with the responsibility of having a child, why not let her go forward with the abortion anyway?

Hate Speech: Islam is a religion based on terror and fear.
Counterspeech: You should find more information about Islamic religion, and then you will understand that Islam is not about fear.

Hate Speech: If Muslims come to our country and say Islam is the best religion, it is not a good idea to integrate them. They should go home.
Counterspeech: You should investigate each person's background and try to understand it, not tell everyone what to do.

Hate Speech: Immigrants come here to make our lives harder, they are not welcome here.
Counterspeech: We are a country of immigrants, and we welcome them, they have the ability to integrate.

Hate Speech: It is a crime to be a Muslim.
Counterspeech: There is no law forbidding you to be a Muslim. It is a human right to pursue whatever religion you wish.

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem since a young age. They do not assimilate.
Counterspeech: What do you mean young age? Their young age? So you have issues with kids now? Can you really blame kids for not assimilating? Aren't they just learning from your behaviour?

Hate Speech: The disabled should not to be allowed to vote.
Counterspeech: This is just nonsense. Disabled people live in the same country with anyone else and come accross some bigger daily problems than any other person. So they have every right to vote and even more saying in the issues that must be addressed by the electees in this country.

Hate Speech: All homosexuals are criminals.
Counterspeech: Homosexuality is not a crime. It is a sexual preference. There exist people who are gay and who aren't, just as there exist people who are homophobic, and people who aren't.

Hate Speech: Women are less rational than men, they are childlike, and they are unable to reason.
Counterspeech: It is not true that women are less rational than men, there are numerous examples of women successfully advancing in fields such as law or medicine.

Hate Speech: Jews control Hollywood and the media.
Counterspeech: Not all Jews are involved with Hollywood, some are even repulsed by it. So, why are you saying that?

Hate Speech: I miss the good old days when the West was ruled by whites, and blacks were subjugated.
Counterspeech: You should be proud to be a member of a civilized society where we are all equal.

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion of peace. Even if some Muslims do not follow the peaceful teachings of Islam, that doesn't mean that the majority of the global Muslim community aren't following those teachings.

Hate Speech: This is not about Islam or Muslims. This is about Race and National Identity.
Counterspeech: Chaging the name of your islamophobia opinion won't make it correct.

Hate Speech: Muslims are a bunch of child predators.
Counterspeech: Muslims are not child molesters. What you are saying is just not true, is it?

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion, they do not want to assimilate and should be isolated.
Counterspeech: Muslims are part of our society and are proud of their history and culture. They want to be part of the global community and contribute to our success. I don't understand your frustration.

Hate Speech: Afro-Caribbean people are nothing but trouble. They have no place in civilized societies like ours in Europe.
Counterspeech: It is actually a known fact that immigrants from those backgrounds have blended in well with the economy and are valued members of the community.

Hate Speech: Jews are not welcome in our country.
Counterspeech: Why do you say this about a group that has historically, culturally, and politically been part of the European community?

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not British.
Counterspeech: You have to remember that Muslims are the second largest religious group in the UK. They are the second most popular religion.

Hate Speech: why do we never talk about female-on-male rape? Isn't this a crime as well?
Counterspeech: We should focus on the underlying problem, not the gender of the perpetrator. Let's make this world a better place for all humans.

Hate Speech: If LGBT were to have a normal appearance, this would help to build a more accepting society.
Counterspeech: You're not a champion of the right to freedom of expression then?

Hate Speech: All Muslims are violent people, they are not compatible with any Western society.
Counterspeech: Why do you think this statement is okay? Don't you think that Muslims can be good people?

Hate Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
Counterspeech: Prejudices against obese people operate in a similar way to racism, and your statement is a clear evidence of this.

Hate Speech: Africans are apes
Counterspeech: Look, I don't like to hear any arguments of racism. Antagonism breeds antagonism.

Hate Speech: Foreigners are only interested in their own. They do not even care about their women or children.
Counterspeech: Foreigners have expressed concern for women's rights, and it is not surprising that they want to have access to health care and education, since they care for their children as well.

Hate Speech: This country will not welcome Muslims.
Counterspeech: I would like to live in a country where people of different religions are free to practise their religion. Islam is a religion of peace. It promotes cooperation and understanding between people.

Hate Speech: All niggas are just criminals and they should spend their time in the gutter.
Counterspeech: Criminals have criminal records, it is unjust to label someone as "criminal" just because of the colour of their skin.

Hate Speech: I am not a racist, but this guy looks a bit like an imam. Maybe he should avoid this town?
Counterspeech: And even if he's an imam I don't get why he should avoid this town.

Hate Speech: There's something immoral in these modern women. Their bossy attitude, their provoking clothes. It seems they just want to be fucked.
Counterspeech: The women of this country work and provide for our children. They do not deserve to be treated as sex objects.

Hate Speech: Faggots are just a bunch of liars and perverts, they should be deleted.
Counterspeech: There are many homosexuals in this world who are model citizens, and many heterosexuals that are not, and that is totally fine.

Hate Speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers. We shouldn't have them here.
Counterspeech: Why do you think it's right to ban someone for being gay? This is an individual preference and you cannot base a law on sexual orientation.

Hate Speech: The overcrowd at migrant detention centers for illegals is also caused by the liberal left. Illegal immigrants have no right to be in your country and they should be taken back.
Counterspeech: Sounds like you are concerned about migrants who are unable to find proper facilities at migrant centers. That is actually a valid concern. But the solution is not sending them back, because there is a reason why they came here. It will be better if we all can take our time to help them.

Hate Speech: These white sheep steal our jobs and our wealth. A migrant is either a true criminal or a legal robber of wealth.
Counterspeech: Sometimes those who work hard are hard to find in the news. We should remember that in the end the contribution of new cultures to ours is remarkable.

Hate Speech: No muslims are welcome here.
Counterspeech: Did you know how much Muslims contribute to our society? Why would you say this insensitive statement?

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
Counterspeech: Islam is an an independent and tolerant religion, a way of life that has been adopted and encouraged by Muslim communities worldwide for thousands of years. It shouldn't be a problem to others, in which ways do you think it is?

Hate Speech: Homosexuality is a mental illness.
Counterspeech: Mental illnesses and homosexuality are not related. What evidence do you have for this?

Hate Speech: All niggas are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
Counterspeech: According to evolutionary theory, all human beings are descended from apes. Sadly, notions of evolutionary hierarchies are still used to justify past and present discrimination and predjudice.

Hate Speech: We need to burn the Koran and demolish all Mosques - this will solve all problems in this country.
Counterspeech: That intolerance and hatred is one of the biggest problems our country faces #spreadlovenothate.

Hate Speech: Jews rule the economy.
Counterspeech: The majority of Jews are not members of the 'roosters' but rather are on the fringes of society.

Hate Speech: Gypsies do not send children to school
Counterspeech: Acrtually it is the opposite: Gypsies wish for a better future for their children and when a child brings home good marks, families are very proud.

Hate Speech: I don't like gays and I think they are subhumans.
Counterspeech: They are not subhuman, they are just people with different sexual orientations.

Hate Speech: This country is run by Muslims!
Counterspeech: In most European countries Muslims make up less than 5% of the population. In the UK, they make up around 5.6%. According to the ONS, the Muslim population in England and Wales has been shown to be slowly growing over the last years (it was 4.7 in 2011).

Hate Speech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior.
Counterspeech: Oh no! What if you accidentally turn gay after getting blood from a gay person? The horrors.

Hate Speech: Muslims do not belong in civilized Europe.
Counterspeech: Then if we are talking about throwing poeple out who have seemingly not contributed enough to their land, you should be the first one to go.

Hate Speech: Marriage is between a man and a woman. We must stop this LGBT perversion.
Counterspeech: Even if LGBT+ love does not fall under your definition of marriage, they should be allowed to be happy and happy together. Not forced to live apart or segregated.

Hate Speech: Jews can only act in a bad way.
Counterspeech: Even if some Jews act wrongly, many of them are good, and this simply isn't related to their religion.

Hate Speech: The only reason we have terrorist attacks is that Muslims are allowed to live in our country.
Counterspeech: If you truly cared about terrorist attacks in our country you would call for the prosecution of the perpetrators, not blame all Muslims.

Hate Speech: Allowing homosexual people to serve in the military increases suicide rates among service members.
Counterspeech: Homosexuality does not increase the suicide rate among service members. Hate and homophobia do.

Hate Speech: Migrants get more rights than citizens of our country.
Counterspeech: This is simply not true. Migrants are granted certain rights in the UK, and this includes the right to live and work in the UK.

Hate Speech: The invasion of migrants from Africa is the biggest threat to our country.
Counterspeech: There are many pressing issues and security threats against any given country at a point, but refugees is not one. Be more considerate of their suffering.

Hate Speech: Women should stay at home and raise the children, this should be their only job.
Counterspeech: Like bitching from a throwaway account is yours?

Hate Speech: Muslim mothers let their 3-year-old children play with toy guns, they should be ashamed of themselves!
Counterspeech: This has nothing to do with toy guns and all with prejudice. To take a toy gun away from a child's hands is to take a toy away from the child, regardless of their religion.

Hate Speech: Women leaders would collapse the government.
Counterspeech: You seriously don't think women can be great leaders? Why would you hold such an opinion?

Hate Speech: Blacks always complain about racism saying we still treat them badly. But they are always trying to steal our jobs.
Counterspeech: What is the source of your evidence for this statement?

Hate Speech: Feminism is a divisive force in our society.
Counterspeech: Sexist men are the divisive force methinks.

Hate Speech: Immigration isn't good for us.
Counterspeech: You voicing your opinions isn't good for our reputation either.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are all illegal.
Counterspeech: Most immigrants are not illegal. The fact that you say that shows a lack of knowledge of the country you live in. Why are you so sure that all migrants are illegal?

Hate Speech: The Quran is a mysoginistic book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
Counterspeech: Islam is not about oppressing women. Instead it is about love and respect for all human beings.

Hate Speech: The world has become too violent. Too many poor blacks. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
Counterspeech: Are you thinking that crime can be solved by pointing finger at some social groups or are you suggesting that we can fix the issues by promoting the rule of law?

Hate Speech: I hate feminists. They are such a bunch of cry babies and unpleasant people.
Counterspeech: Don't you think equality for all is important?

Hate Speech: If a woman says she wants an abortion, she’s a cunt.
Counterspeech: If a woman were to tell you that an abortion is a personal decision what would you do then? Beat her up?

Hate Speech: Feminists are naive cunts who act like children, throwing a tantrum for something they don't have.
Counterspeech: Feminists are often accused of being 'naive', however I have seen several instances where feminists have used their ideas to tackle complex and powerful social and economic issues.

Hate Speech: Black people are unable to raise children they should stop procreating.
Counterspeech: What is the point that you are trying to make here apart from being a racist?

Hate Speech: Women are little more than animals to be dominated by men.
Counterspeech: I don't think it is a good idea to talk about women being little more than animals.

Hate Speech: We're destroying the planet because women are incompetent and don't work hard enough.
Counterspeech: How can the amount of carbon dioxide that is released into the world is increased due to incompetence of women?

Hate Speech: Jewish folks are the real antisemite.
Counterspeech: How can you contradict your own statement like this? How can a person be a Jew and an anti semite at the same time?

Hate Speech: Islam is not a religion. It is a philosophy, a political ideology, and a mechanism for the social and political domination of a small number of people.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion, and a religion is about the teachings of God. To suggest otherwise is inconsistent with the teachings of Islam.

Hate Speech: Those women are all the same: stupid and unreliable.
Counterspeech: You can't have so much distrust in someone just because of their sex. Don't you think?

Hate Speech: Refugees should not be welcomed.
Counterspeech: Refugees are often persecuted for being different, but this is not the case here, because we are an inclusive country.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are bringing diseases and crime to our country.
Counterspeech: Instead, immigrants are healthy and contribute to our society. Do you have any evidence of the contrary?

Hate Speech: Islam banned women from society: this is not the religion of peace!
Counterspeech: It is incumbent on Muslims to live up to the teachings of the Quran: and this does not include banning women from society. The status of women is more about culture than it is about the Koran.

Hate Speech: Women should not have rights over their bodies.
Counterspeech: Women have every right to choose how they live their lives. Women are human, just like anybody else, and their rights should be respected.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counterspeech: What is wrong with Muslims living in Europe?

Hate Speech: What’s the difference between a Cow and the Holocaust? You stop milking the cow after 70 years.
Counterspeech: We should be respectful and compassionate towards those who suffered in one of the most horrific event in the history of mankind... I think this should be remembered forever!

Hate Speech: Gay men are annoying.
Counterspeech: They're not all that annoying. Gay men are normal guys who find love and/or sex with someone of their own sex.

Hate Speech: Jews are nasty and selfish, they are a race different to us. Precisely, they don't belong to human race at all.
Counterspeech: Why do you think that? I think it is true that they are different from some in their beliefs, but that doesn't make them any less human.

Hate Speech: Women are just emotional psychopaths.
Counterspeech: The only psychopath here is you buddy.

Hate Speech: Women need to accept that they are weak, they must be submissive to men.
Counterspeech: On the contrary: our culture is predestined to have female rulers, and female rulers are the pinnacle of civilization, they are proud and brave.

Hate Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
Counterspeech: The religion of millions of people is not simply "incompatible with Western culture"

Hate Speech: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
Counterspeech: And then you ask why people don't like you. Bro this comment is the reason.

Hate Speech: Sharia law is incompatible with the US constitution.
Counterspeech: More than US constitution, it is incompatible with your prejudice and inability to respect other religions

Hate Speech: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe. We don't want them to steal our jobs.
Counterspeech: The European Commission is working on ways to make the labour market more inclusive. This does not mean that they are stealing our jobs.

Hate Speech: Has Islam anything to say about how to end global warming? It is their fault.
Counterspeech: On a more concrete level, the causes of climate change are a result of both human activities and the effects of the use of fossil fuels. To assert that there is any role for religion in this requires evidence.

Hate Speech: Refugees are overrunning our continent.
Counterspeech: By definition, refugees are fleeing out of fear for themselves and families, rather than thinking too much about their final destination. The majority still find safety in neighbouring countries.

Hate Speech: Asylum seekers and refugees get free council housing
Counterspeech: They can’t get council housing and are not even allowed to work. They get just £35 per week to pay for food and all other expenses.

Hate Speech: Women should wear nice skirts and be pretty to please men's tastes and desires.
Counterspeech: Do women really need to be told what they can or cannot wear? For many generations boys were told to wear trousers and girls to wear dresses. Does society really need to tell us all what to wear?

Hate Speech: The Muslims have taken over Europe.
Counterspeech: Muslims are included in the European Union, and are not 'taking over' it.

Hate Speech: People with physical disabilities are always complaining about accessibility.
Counterspeech: There are people with disabilities all around the world. Their demand is to have their rights recognised. It is discrimination to not do so.

Hate Speech: An American Jew, just like a Muslim, is an outsider, loyal to their birth tribe, posing as a member of the in-group in order to subvert cultural, political and social norms. We don’t have to choose, it’s OK to hate them both.
Counterspeech: It is also OK to donate your brain to scientific research, because you don't use it anyway.

Hate Speech: We are surrounded by Muslims and they are all the same. They are all terrorists.
Counterspeech: What about the thousands of Muslims who have contributed to our country, created jobs, and provided for our families?

Hate Speech: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay marriage.
Counterspeech: Same sex marriage is not gay privilege, it's equal rights. Privilege would be something like gay people not paying taxes. Like churches don't.

Hate Speech: Gays should never be allowed to donate blood: they are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers!
Counterspeech: Any decision embarked on by a country would likely have been considered in light of evidence. As such, if no evidence was found by those countries of the harm of a policy, it can be fairly confidently asserted that we can adopt this policy in favour of homosexual's blood donation.

Hate Speech: The only problem is that women are too easily manipulated by feminist propaganda and feel they should not listen to men.
Counterspeech: This is exactly what feminism is all about: letting everybody to decide whether to be independent. Women have the constitutional right to choose for themselves.

Hate Speech: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
Counterspeech: You know, the Internet is a great place, but you have to be careful about the sources of your information. Don't blindly trust misinformation.

Hate Speech: Muslims are all terrorists, they have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counterspeech: There is no evidence to suggest that terrorists are exclusively the product of one religion.

Hate Speech: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, the sooner we accept this, the better it will be for humanity.
Counterspeech: We all belong to one - scientifically determined - species: the Homo sapiens. The sooner you accept this, the better it is.

Hate Speech: In the UK, it should be illegal to be gay.
Counterspeech: So should be being an idiot, but you are not in prison, right?

Hate Speech: black folks are very dangerous.
Counterspeech: Statistics suggest that the maximum number of violent crime victims are black people. So it is true both ways, and while really heartbreaking, is a reality.

Hate Speech: Retards these days are as stupid as they were when they were little. They think they are so special that they can read, write and be creative. It is their world now.
Counterspeech: We are all creators, at least as long as we are not distracted by the constant judgement from adults.

Hate Speech: International Criminal Court (ICC) chief prosecutor, Fatou Bensouda, is just another female 'human rights lawyer' full of herself.
Counterspeech: If she is in that position, you well believe that she is worthy of it. What is your qualification for spewing hate and disapproving of her?

Hate Speech: We cannot allow people from different cultures to coexist in our country.
