Counterspeech: This can lead to an increase in anti-social behaviour, discrimination, and violence. Do you really want that?

Hate Speech: I'm sorry but women are basically childlike, it's no wonder then that they remain this way most of their lives, because they are programmed this way.
Counterspeech: The same lie can be said for any group of people: men included! But actually you can be both a woman and also possess a range of talents. It's up to you to not to underestimate them.

Hate Speech: This is the new normal. We accept homosexuality in our schools and in our neighbourhoods. We accept it in our workplaces and in our houses. What is the problem? No problem, if we are not interested in a decent society.
Counterspeech: People accept each other regardless of their private lives. The problem lies in discrimination.

Hate Speech: To be an immigrant is to be a part of the problem in Europe.
Counterspeech: Immigration has been shown to have a very positive impact on the global economy. So what problem are you talking about?

Hate Speech: Children should be raised by heterosexual parents, not gays. It is the best system ever.
Counterspeech: We can't be sure it is the best system. Afterall, the system gave us you.

Hate Speech: We must stop Islam. It is a death cult.
Counterspeech: Your words are definitely provocative. We don't allow people to demonise all religions, but when it comes to Islam everybody seems to forget that it is a religion of peace as all the others.

Hate Speech: You think it's not OK to beat your wife because she has a different faith than you? Why shouldn't I get to beat my wife because of what she believes? Why shouldn't I be allowed to treat her like an object to be dominated by me?
Counterspeech: Because it is wrong and degrading to violate someone's autonomy for religious reasons.

Hate Speech: We have to stop migrant rape and violence.
Counterspeech: Rape and violence against women is a problem everywhere. We cannot just blame migrants.

Hate Speech: Muslim are invading us, we should isolate them.
Counterspeech: Even if Muslims are the second religious group in the UK, they are a minority in the country. According to the 2019 census, there are 3 million Muslims in the UK (5% of the population). And, last but not least: we can't isolate people just because of their religion.

Hate Speech: Muslims want to live here but in the end they are not compatible with our society. Muslim-free Europe is a win-win situation.
Counterspeech: There are many Muslims in Europe and many are very happy with their lives in our society. How can it be a win-win situation for them?

Hate Speech: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.
Counterspeech: Why do you think this way about a certain group? There are so many ways to live life.

Hate Speech: Lesbian women are lustful.
Counterspeech: Are you really sure that the same couldn't be said for anyone else? What makes them so, in your opinion?

Hate Speech: Jews are purposely keeping America down.
Counterspeech: All cultures have different beliefs and practices, and so have differing values, but its nonsense to say Jewish people are trying to subvert Western civilization.

Hate Speech: Anyone with half a brain can figure out that the Holocaust never happened.
Counterspeech: The holocaust happened. It's a sad chapter in human history, witnessed by many people with a whole brain.

Hate Speech: Also God hates gays
Counterspeech: homosexuals have always been a part of our society, it means that they are part of the divine plan and of its beauty as well.

Hate Speech: Makes me fucking laugh, why shouldn't whites be supreme in a mostly white country? How come nobody is moaning about black supremacy in black countries like Somalia? or Mexican supremacy? Or Indian supremacy? Only we put up with this fucking bullshit.
Counterspeech: I call for universal Pizza supremacy. Who is in?

Hate Speech: Do you have any proof that the Holocaust ever happened?
Counterspeech: If living witnesses are not enough, and you are interested in seeing the proof of this part of socially acknowledged history you can visit the ruins of the concentration camps, where many atrocities have been put into practice.

Hate Speech: Go on talking to yourself, no one will listen. Islam does not belong within western society. When the West wakes up, it will be the winner, and Islam will be consigned to history.
Counterspeech: I am not sure what you think the West will be the 'winner' of. Islam isn't in competition with Western culture, and the idea it threatens it is a myth spread to incite fear.

Hate Speech: Our children are being forced fed with this 'Islam' nonsense in schools. This is a disgrace.
Counterspeech: What do you mean by being forced fed? I haven't seen anything like this.

Hate Speech: Feminists want men to be oppressed just like animals.
Counterspeech: Feminism is about standing up for weaker people and trying to make the world a better place. Its not about standing on the side of the oppressors.

Hate Speech: There are hundreds of thousands of migrants in this country. They are not 'honest', 'good' or 'good people'. They are a burden and an embarrassment to our country.
Counterspeech: Of course there are people in this country who have come here to exploit and abuse us, but the vast majority of migrants have been contributing members of our community for many years. We should not be 'burdening' ourselves with discrimination.

Hate Speech: I can't bear crazy Muslims coming here. They are insane, instable people.
Counterspeech: That is factually inaccurate. Being from a certain religion does not mean that a person would be insane or unstable.

Hate Speech: Slavery is the only way to go.
Counterspeech: Slavery was legal in the United States until 1862, when the Emancipation Proclamation was issued. Unless you want to start another Civil War, it is better to leave Slavery to the darkest pages in the history of our nation.

Hate Speech: Females should not be allowed to vote.
Counterspeech: I think evolution was supposed to favour intelligent people. Where did we go wrong?

Hate Speech: I have the right to choose to support antifeminism because they are anti-men.
Counterspeech: The point of feminism is to end misogyny. Women are human beings, and they are human beings with human rights.

Hate Speech: Jews were the real cause of WWII.
Counterspeech: Resources like the Holocaust Encyclopedia will make you change your mind, and empathize with the Jews in that era, whose only mistake was being a Jew.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome here! They have nothing to contribute to our society!
Counterspeech: Muslims have been an important part of this country since its inception. They have contributed to all fields, and should be respected as members of the society.

Hate Speech: The Koran claims that all infidels are subhuman and that Allah wants them to be killed.
Counterspeech: According to most sacred texts, we are all human and deserve respect and protection in the eyes of god.

Hate Speech: Oh my gosh this fucking Muslims are disgusting! Where did they learn to act like this? I really don't like these guys! I hate these disgusting twats!
Counterspeech: All people are born equal, regardless of their religion. This is what makes us all human: empathy and compassion towards others.

Hate Speech: This isn't about equality. This is about forcing women to to occupy roles in society for which they are not capabable
Counterspeech: If we insist on treating people as not equally capable of contributing to society then we are forced to live up to that outdated and unjust system. Instead we should be improving it.

Hate Speech: All black people are rapists.
Counterspeech: Abuse is a serious crime but when commited by POCs how does it imply that the abuse by a member of the white majority is less serious?

Hate Speech: If the disabled can't vote, then they can't have any rights.
Counterspeech: It is not true that they can't have the right to vote, because they are allowed to vote, regardless of their impairment.

Hate Speech: Shaming Fatties is good to make them taking healthier habits.
Counterspeech: Even if not all shaming carries negative meaning, it is difficult for individuals to distinguish between shaming that comes from a place of concern as opposed to discrimination.

Hate Speech: The drug trade is full of Black people who are breaking the law.
Counterspeech: The majority of the people arrested for drug smuggling are poor. Those arrested for crime in general are not generally poor. Maybe this phenomenon has to do more with poverty than with the colour of their skin.

Hate Speech: All immigrants are murderers
Counterspeech: How can you say that about them all? You cannot know the actions of millions of people and be sure that there is a link between immigration and violence. I think it is more a question of statistics, which I do not see.

Hate Speech: Rejecting refugees is our duty.
Counterspeech: Why would rejecting a person who has been forced to flee from their home country due to fear of war or persecution and needs asylum your duty?

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in my country.
Counterspeech: I don't see why you would see any reason as to why Muslims cannot be part of this country. You are wrong to think that.

Hate Speech: Homosexuals are ill. They should be isolated and confined.
Counterspeech: It is homophobia that requires isolation. We do not want this place to be filled with hate.

Hate Speech: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay people.
Counterspeech: Gay people do exist in this country, and we respect their right to live and love who they want. However, I do not think that yours is an appropriate moral statement for our environment.

Hate Speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
Counterspeech: It is a myth that blacks are cruel and wanton. There are more cruel people of all skin color out there than just the few black you are worried about. It is not true that thieves are more likely to commit crimes if they are members of a specific racial or ethnic background.

Hate Speech: Gay perverts are a danger to society because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
Counterspeech: The majority of people who are gay are not involved with sex with children. Instead, they are contributing members of society.

Hate Speech: gay men are unnatural, they abuse their anus.
Counterspeech: Nothing is unnatural about being gay. You need to put your backward thinking into check.

Hate Speech: Muslim rape gangs are roaming British towns. They are the main cause of rape in the UK.
Counterspeech: Islam teaches that the human rights of all, regardless of religion, race and gender, are to be respected.

Hate Speech: All the Illegal immigrants flooding this country. All of them are sub-humans.
Counterspeech: Immigrants have given their lives for our country. Many of them have been proud to serve our country. They are, just as our fathers and mothers were, proud of US.

Hate Speech: The Nazis sucked at killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
Counterspeech: The murder of around 6 million Jews shows the scale of the genocide. This is 6 million more than should have ever happened.

Hate Speech: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
Counterspeech: If you think that equality is a special privilege then you are out of scope for help.

Hate Speech: I'm not saying that women cannot be decent with human beings, I'm saying that they are subhuman.
Counterspeech: There is a problem with stereotyping humans, and we need to acknowledge the past to move forward.

Hate Speech: We have the worst of all groups in the world coming to our country: Muslims.
Counterspeech: We should not categorize people from other cultures, religions and nationalities as 'the best' or 'the worst'. I think it's more useful to think of all people as 'human beings'.

Hate Speech: Islam is a political ideology that promotes death by stoning for blasphemy, violence against women and homophobia.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion that was founded many centuries ago, and has been proven time and time again to be peaceful and tolerant.

Hate Speech: Migrants want our land because they like our houses better than theirs. It's a matter of envy of our richness and safety. They are not truly in need. And they are responsible for their own troubles.
Counterspeech: How would you feel if your neighbours were planning to bomb your country? Would you feel responsible? Would you feel safe in your own house, or would you try to flee?

Hate Speech: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
Counterspeech: You, on the other hand can sit on your couch and eat your cheetos. Don't worry about this problem, its not yours.

Hate Speech: Black folks are not attractive: they are just apes.
Counterspeech: Black people are still subject to oppression and this comment right here is proof of the ignorance.

Hate Speech: Islam is not about peace. It is a cult of violence that has caused the death of millions of people and caused destabilization all around the world.
Counterspeech: I could eat a bowl of alphabet soup and poop out a smarter statement than whatever you just said.

Hate Speech: If an aborigine were to marry a white person, they would be a mixed race coulple whose destiny is failure. Aborigines first need to be raised by white people and taught the rules of western civilisation. But this is not what our founding documents were all about.
Counterspeech: Jerry don't you know that the whites stole the Aborigines' land from them? Please read up on shit before you expose your stupid brain on the internet.

Hate Speech: Islam is incompatible with British culture, it is a den of terrorists.
Counterspeech: Islam is not incompatible with British culture, and the alleged association between Islam and terrorism has no factual foundation.

Hate Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is incompatible with modern science and with the basic laws of nature.
Counterspeech: Can you prove your claim?

Hate Speech: Islam is a sickness and a cancer on the European continent, it should be banned
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion, no one is forcing anyone to believe in it. It's not a sickness or a cancer.

Hate Speech: Women who want to control their fertility are just prostitutes. They shouldn't be allowed to do so freely.
Counterspeech: If women wanted to control their fertility they would be the only ones responsible for their own choice.

Hate Speech: We should eliminate gays.
Counterspeech: I have never seen such a fragile masculinity.

Hate Speech: Who the fuck is Breonna Taylor? A representative of the people, a nurse, or a front for the government?
Counterspeech: Examining the resume of the victim will not help us to solve our problems. The whole problem is the culture of violence, discrimination and ignorance that is still prevalent in many parts of the country.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are terrible.
Counterspeech: Immigrants make a huge contribution to our country and society. They are a source of pride and opportunity for many, and I find it quite hard to see how their exclusion from our society would be a good thing.

Hate Speech: Holocaust is just a lie spread by Jews to obtain a preferential treatment.
Counterspeech: The Holocaust was a global catastrophe, and killed an enormous number of people. Would you call this a preferential treatment?

Hate Speech: Women are more likely to commit crime.
Counterspeech: This is not true. Only about 7% percent of all U.S. prison inmates are female.

Hate Speech: Italy: Muslim demolishes a statue of Jesus. Italy: Why do we accept their Mosques? Why do we tolerate this scum? And they want to continue to import this filth?
Counterspeech: What would Jesus say? I do not think He would be preaching intolerance and hate!

Hate Speech: I bet gays are ashamed of the horrible things they do in private.
Counterspeech: In our societies, people are no longer afraid to openly talk about gay or lesbian love. Gay people are not ashamed to be gay, they just want to be accepted.

Hate Speech: Gays are poisoning our children with their icky homosexuality.
Counterspeech: What do you mean by 'poisononing our children'? Why do you think this is the case?

Hate Speech: All foreigners are threatening our culture and are ruining our youth.
Counterspeech: What do you think the problem is? How exactly would a people of a different religion come to this country and spoil our youth?

Hate Speech: Refugees are a burden to our country, they do not want to integrate. They are not welcome.
Counterspeech: On the contrary, we are welcoming many refugees into our country and promoting their integration. We are proud of this successful integration story.

Hate Speech: Blacks don't understand basic human rights.
Counterspeech: They do understand the right to food, health, housing, education, work for everyone, as I do. What about you?

Hate Speech: Trying to understand peoples 'cultures'? No, it's not normal. I've never heard of anyone being raped by a non-Muslim. We cannot accept the religion of violence.
Counterspeech: The problem is neither about Islam nor about cultural relativism. Instead of inflating Islam as a problem and subjecting it to a "politically correct" spin, we should be focusing on becoming more inclusive.

Hate Speech: Jews are cheap.
Counterspeech: This is a flawed comment and is a total myth. Don't say anything about a religion if you don't have an idea what you are talking it.

Hate Speech: Refugees are abusing our welfare system!
Counterspeech: People coming from poor and dangerous countries should be prioritized for resettlement within the welfare system. This is exactly what the law states, which is not abusable.

Hate Speech: It's ok to call gay men fags.
Counterspeech: I don't think human beings need to be called by their sexual orientation. That is disrimination, pure and simple.

Hate Speech: We are being overrun by Muslim invaders, they are taking over our countries.
Counterspeech: With globalisation it's natural to attest an increasing flow of people of any religion. It is just that when referring to other non-Muslim groups, immigration doesn't usually get this much media coverage.

Hate Speech: Without migration, Britain’s housing problems would be solved
Counterspeech: Immigration can be really hard on people, who are trying to establish themselves in a new place. The host country should be respectful of their struggles and help however they can.

Hate Speech: The Jews did: USS Liberty Attack, the King David hotel attack, New York 9/11, London 7/7
Counterspeech: This is just an unfounded conspiracy theory that only harms people.

Hate Speech: Migrants are bringing diseases and sickness to our country.
Counterspeech: If someone were to come in the dead of night and bring disease and sickness to our country, then that person is a risk to everyone. Sick people should be isolated. That is why there are health assessment procedures for migrants, in order not to spread diseases.

Hate Speech: Migrants are a plague in the United States. They threaten our richness, even billionaires don't want them here.
Counterspeech: Have you tried comparing the top individuals in the U.S. according to assets and liabilities? A comparison of wealth and income will reveal that the richest 1% have more wealth, exceeding the wealth of the bottom 80%. Maybe this is the real plague...

Hate Speech: Immigrants are just lazy and are a burdent for the UK.
Counterspeech: Immigration can be very positive to the UK economy. It is an important part of the reasons why our GDP is growing so much. We are also blessed with a rich and diverse culture, which makes immigration definitely not a burden for the UK.

Hate Speech: Black people's appearance correspond to their immoral nature.
Counterspeech: Darwin argued that human morality had evolved from the social instincts of animals, especially the bonds of sympathy and love. So every human including black people has the same moral values as  the other.

Hate Speech: I am not interested in knowing a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
Counterspeech: I have met so many black people that are extraordinary human beings. I cannot begin to talk about how they are able to feel and experience love and kindness.

Hate Speech: Islam is a death cult.
Counterspeech: We know from the news about few Muslims who are violent people. Instead I know a lot of Muslims who are good people, who work hard and pay taxes to help their families.

Hate Speech: Why gays do not try to heal?
Counterspeech: We can talk after you try to heal your homophobia.

Hate Speech: Jews had advance knowledge of the 9/11 attacks and said nothing.
Counterspeech: Be careful when you blame such a horrible thing on the wrong people. Humanity should be better than this. Jews are innocent.

Hate Speech: Islam is an ideology and religion that promotes murder, rape and violence towards women and homosexuals.
Counterspeech: Islam is an ideology and religion that promote love, respect and cooperation with people of other religions, not a violent ideology and religion, which promotes murder, rape and violence against women and homosexuals.

Hate Speech: Illegal immigrants make America worse
Counterspeech: Fast food is much worse for America, I can confirm.

Hate Speech: Gay pride is so awkward.
Counterspeech: Well I think that straight pride is awkward.

Hate Speech: The Jews are the reason why the World Cup is getting so expensive.
Counterspeech: Really? I thought it was due to the salaries of the players... But of course it's the same old Jewish conspiracies fault.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, ignorant, incapable of serious thought and emotion.
Counterspeech: There is no evidence that women are "childlike" or "ignorant". So how can you say something so baseless?

Hate Speech: Muslim invasion is a fact. We are living in a dangerous world. We are living in fear.
Counterspeech: A world where people fear for their safety and their property (including Muslims), is not the world we were dreaming of. The more inclusive we can be of people of different faiths, the better off we are.

Hate Speech: Gays are not good for our country, they are just sick people. They must stop promoting this perversion.
Counterspeech: Homosexuality is a way of loving, not a disease. To suggest that being gay is a health risk is just scaremongering.

Hate Speech: We should ban all Muslims, they are terrorists.
Counterspeech: It is a myth that all Muslims are dangerous. We need to study the cases of terrorists and criminals to understand what we should do with these people, regardless of their religion.

Hate Speech: Muslim rape gangs have infiltrated every village in England, and we still have no end to this nonsense.
Counterspeech: Do you have more evidence that supports what you're saying?

Hate Speech: Muslim are animals and parisite to our welfare.
Counterspeech: Do you think it is rational to equate people with animals and parasite? Would you like it someone said the same for your religion just because they don't like it?

Hate Speech: This invasion is not acceptable at all!
Counterspeech: Refugees are welcome. They are allowed to integrate and contribute to our society. It is up to the government to decide which people will have the opportunity to live and work in a safe and integrated way in our country.

Hate Speech: LGBTs are a burden to society
Counterspeech: LGBT+ people are more likely to experience stigma associated with their sexual orientation, which can have negative effects for our society as a whole. Why don't we try to show some acceptance and respect towards them?

Hate Speech: Immigration has reduced wages for native workers.
Counterspeech: What's the proof for that? Actually in many cases immigrants make higher contribution to the economy than the native-born.

Hate Speech: We must put an end to Islam. It's a political ideology which spreads death in the world.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion and not a political ideology. It is not a deadly force that must be eradicated, but a belief just as Christianity and Buddhism, for example.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, ignorant, incapable of serious thought and emotion.
Counterspeech: There is no evidence that women are "childlike" or "ignorant".

Hate Speech: No negro can speak English.
Counterspeech: That is just what racists claim. Do you really think it's so bad for a black person to attempt to improve their English? As if skin had an impact on language skills.

Hate Speech: Muslim rape our children, they are a problem all around the world.
Counterspeech: Islam is about love, tolerance and respect for all people. Violence and rape are not about Islam or Muslims in particular.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern country. I care for religion but they simply can't be accepted.
Counterspeech: If you care about religions then probably not make such hateful comments.

Hate Speech: We are being invaded by Muslims and I hate that.
Counterspeech: What is being invaded? You should check the statistics on Islamic migrants.

Hate Speech: Migrants have no place here. They don't want to assimilate. They just want our money.
Counterspeech: Some of them have lived here for many years. They have got British passports, and this proves that they are able to integrate.

Hate Speech: muslim folks are subhuman
Counterspeech: What do you mean when you say Muslim folks are subhuman? Do you even know what you are saying?

Hate Speech: Jew merchants are just a bunch of crooks.
Counterspeech: Evidence? Do you have any source for your stats?

Hate Speech: These Muslims will never be able to blend into Western soceity
Counterspeech: Perhaps we should try to understand the religions of the world more closely. Plus, Western societies core values are based on human rights, and the freedom of religion is amongst those.

Hate Speech: Jews control the u.s. government.
Counterspeech: If you take one look at the statistics, You will see that what you are saying is not true. We need to educate ourselves against the immense anti-semitism that is prevalant today.

Hate Speech: Gay perverts are a danger to children because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
Counterspeech: The media often blames gay people for the problems in society, but in reality there are many young gay people who are struggling with issues of identity and sexual attraction, and for this reason they easily become target, not perpetrators, of abuse.

Hate Speech: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights, but then why they don't call it egalitarianism instead of feminism?
Counterspeech: My reasoning is that equality is possible only within a framework of reciprocity and respect. This is something that must be implemented by spotting a light on the disadvantaged first, and this is why it is called feminism.

Hate Speech: It has been proven time and time again that the Jews control the world's governments.
Counterspeech: Do you have any evidence that can prove this to us?

Hate Speech: What do you want us to do with all these gays, they are just a problem. They are corrupting our children!
Counterspeech: Others might come out to your child, not because they are “recruited,” but because they recognize a common bond.

Hate Speech: The Holocaust was a hoax created by Jews to subdue the world and replace Christ with their own version of a benevolent dictator.
Counterspeech: What you are saying is 'that the Jews are responsible for the Holocaust'... Are you serious? Does it seem reasonable to you?

Hate Speech: If Muslims in Britain were only like other Europeans, we could be proud.
Counterspeech: To be perfectly honest, the British public is rather diverse, so I don't think your reasoning makes any sense.

Hate Speech: Gay men are a danger to children, they want to convert more fags for their community.
Counterspeech: Would you say the same about a hetero?

Hate Speech: Jews make too much money.
Counterspeech: This seems like a statement against an entire religion. This would be true by assuming that Jews can magically make more money just because they are Jewish. It doesn't make any sense.

Hate Speech: Gypsies are a bunch of thieves.
Counterspeech: Your sentiment that people of other races cannot be thieves is a bit racist methinks.

Hate Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes rape, torture, murder and slavery.
Counterspeech: Where did you get an idea like that? What are your sources?

Hate Speech: Muslims are invading us. They must go.
Counterspeech: Muslims are just here to live and work. Invasion has a negative meaning, where is the basis for your opinion?

Hate Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.

Hate Speech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, they'll end up being bullied.
Counterspeech: Learning about gender identity and sexual orientation in health classes in school could promote a more accepting environment and reduce bullying.

Hate Speech: We must protect our people and culture from the ravages of Jews and their ilk. We need to exterminate them.

Hate Speech: I agree, but how would you do so? Perhaps at the expense of our veterans or old people like me? If we give them everything we'll be left with nothing.
Counterspeech: Try having some empathy. What if you had to expatriate and had to live in poor conditions?

Hate Speech: Their power to have movies banned and directors censured is proof that the Jews control Hollywood.

Hate Speech: We should refrain from imposing gender ideology on children.
Counterspeech: You should refrain from imposing your wrong views on everyone else.

Hate Speech: Blacks do not want to work
Counterspeech: Sometimes I don't feel like working too man.

Hate Speech: We are gutful sick of Vagina Misandrists trying to undermine male self esteem. [link]
Counterspeech: That's just your fragile masculinity, don't blame it on women!

Hate Speech: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
Counterspeech: Human rights defenders cite statistics on suicide attempts and domestic violence in families with a homosexual son/daughter, suggesting the contrary imposition.Thus far, people of various sexual orientations have attempted suicide twice as often as heterosexuals. Among youth, the number of those that seriously contemplate suicide is almost three times the rate of heterosexuals. LGBT youth are almost five times as likely to have attempted suicide compared to heterosexual youth. Tell me honestly: who do you think is imposing sexual orientation on who?

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern country. I care for religion but they simply can't be accepted.
Counterspeech: Isn't it comments like yours that are making its hard for them to get accepted?

Hate Speech: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
Counterspeech: While physical traits — such as skin color — are inherited, there is no ethnic or racial predisposition to emotions, intellect, or morals.

Hate Speech: Jews control the u.s. government.
Counterspeech: They are controlling our brains!!

Hate Speech: Refugees are a problem in our country. We are overwhelmed.
Counterspeech: Despite what you may hear, there are not many refugees in the UK, only around the 0.26%. Compared to many countries both in Europe and the Middle East, we are not that welcoming and should really be ashamed.

Hate Speech: Jews are a problem in Europe, they are the reason for the rise of violent nationalism and racism in all those countries.
Counterspeech: How about we work together to find a solution to violent nationalism and racism instead? We can't accept this hate being present in different countries over and over again.

Hate Speech: Black people are the source of crime in our society.
Counterspeech: You cannot just make an explosive statement like this by targetting a specific racial group.

Hate Speech: We should ban all migrants.
Counterspeech: Do you have any economic, political or social reasoning to support this statement? Maybe apart from just hate?

Hate Speech: Women would like to have sex with as many different men as possible, and this is the root of all the ills of the world.
Counterspeech: People have the choice to have sex with whomever they want, that is all.

Hate Speech: I think gay people are a burden to society. They shouldn't be allowed to be around.
Counterspeech: If we are to allow people to choose their own lives, why not allow everyone to love who they want too?

Hate Speech: The disabled are a burden to society.
Counterspeech: Disabled people are not a burden, they contribute a lot to our society.  There are also many disabled people who are just struggling to live a dignified life with their disability.

Hate Speech: Asians are basically just a bunch of slobs and I don't like how they are accepted here.
Counterspeech: What exactly is the reason why you don't like them all?

Hate Speech: jewish folks should be beaten
Counterspeech: Most Jews are nice people, living in coexistence with non Jews, why would you beat them?

Hate Speech: There are disorders that hinder the ability to give opinions.
Counterspeech: There are people with intellectual disabilities who are able to give an unbiased opinion. That's why their education is important.

Hate Speech: Immigrants take our jobs
Counterspeech: You are just looking for excuses to hate on them. It is absolutely possible to coexist together.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not British.
Counterspeech: How can they be 'not welcome'?

Hate Speech: This is why women do not belong in politics, if a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
Counterspeech: Women comprise of almost fifty percent of world population. Rather, ignoring their efforts and inputs would be harmul for any civilization.

Hate Speech: Muslim immigration is responsible for the rape of hundreds of thousands of women.
Counterspeech: The majority of sexual violence is committed by people close to the victim and is a mirror of societal attitudes to women. To attribute the cause to one religion is neither true nor helpful.

Hate Speech: Women are not human, and cannot contribute to our civilization
Counterspeech: Statements like these remind we have still a lot to fight for in this fight of feminism.

Hate Speech: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
Counterspeech: Immigrants are actually creating wealth for the country.

Hate Speech: Women need their own special rights, as in they are weaker and need for protection.
Counterspeech: Women have the constitutional right to be conscious of their rights as humans and not to feel threatened.

Hate Speech: We should persecute Muslims.
Counterspeech: Islam is a peaceful faith, but Muslims are excluded and stigmatised due to the actions of a minority.

Hate Speech: Shocking how many British Muslims have conquered the country in the last 15 years. How come there is no anti-Muslim campaign yet?
Counterspeech: Have you thought about the repurcussions if someone said that the Bible needs to be banned as well? Would we have freedom then?

Hate Speech: Jews are greedy for money, power, and status.
Counterspeech: As the saying goes, money is power, and power is associated with wealth. Why is it a problem when it comes to Jews?

Hate Speech: Women should not be considered in the same way as men.
Counterspeech: We have already shown that women are not less than men and to we should accept it. Brining it up again only displays your misogyny.

Hate Speech: I would never trust a woman. They are irrational children, and that would be a sign of weakness.
Counterspeech: I am not sure what 'weakness' would be implying here. It seems to me that you are saying that a woman can't be 'rational' because that is the nature of women. Why is it so?

Hate Speech: Islam is Evil! That is one word that can describe it. We are in trouble as this evil is taking over countries and nations! Remember our Holy Scriptures? Thou shalt not covet. This includes other countries territory. Stop Islam spreading!
Counterspeech: People are free to choose for themselves what religion to follow, and if they choose Islam that is their right! Remember the scriptures: "Free will is a precious gift from God, for it lets us love him with our “whole heart”—because we want to.—Matthew 22:37."

Hate Speech: Muslims are a burden on Britain and they are stealing our jobs.
Counterspeech: Many people of Muslim background are working in jobs we do not want to do. They are in fact having a positive impact on this country's economy.

Hate Speech: Maybe the UN could talk to those asian and african nations responsible for 90%+ of the pollution in the oceans' instead of insisting on this bullshit about climate change.
Counterspeech: Doesn't everyone on the planet have a responsibility towards the climate?

Hate Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is incompatible with modern science and with the basic laws of nature.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion, and a religion has rules, and is compatible with science, nature and the basic laws of nature.

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent ideology. It promotes death by stoning for blasphemy.
Counterspeech: In the modern Muslim world, the laws pertaining to blasphemy vary by country. Some radical groups have used charges of blasphemy in an effort to burnish their religious credentials and gain popular support at the expense of liberal Muslim intellectuals and religious minorities

Hate Speech: Migrants are lazy and don't work.
Counterspeech: The problem is the unequal distribution of opportunity. The more migrants are educated and integrated, the better their chances are of getting a job.

Hate Speech: All Muslims are willing to kill those who decide to abandon Islam.
Counterspeech: Only a very small number of extremists that see Islam through a narrow keyhole of self-righteousness support the concept of takfirism. We cannot associate this with all of the believers.

Hate Speech: Islam is a failure. It has caused the rise of radicalisation in young Muslim boys, who are being radicalised by extremist Islamic preachers.
Counterspeech: Although there is some research linking radicalisation to religious practice, it is difficult to find a single study to back this up.

Hate Speech: There is no god but Allah, and Islam is a religion of peace. Yes, where peace stands for silence for the victims of terrorist attacks.
Counterspeech: Islam, like peace is not about killing, it is about trying to achieve a better life for all.

Hate Speech: Jews are just like animals, they are incapable of love.
Counterspeech: How come I have never heard about a Jewish fish nor a Rabbi rabbit?

Hate Speech: Immigrants bring crime and violence to our cities.
Counterspeech: Immigrants have been proven to be lawful citizens by studies performed. Regardless of their education or origins, they are humans as well.

Hate Speech: Gypsies make their children live in degradation
Counterspeech: Who are you to accuse Gypsy people like this?

Hate Speech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because they are having unprotected anal sex all the time.
Counterspeech: Did you know that women also engage in unprotected 'anal sex'?

Hate Speech: We cannot coexist with millions of Muslims in the West. They are incompatible with our way of life.
Counterspeech: This is a comment against all muslims: they are part of our society and should have the right to live here.

Hate Speech: Gays in the closet are a problem.
Counterspeech: The fact is that there are individuals in the LGBT+ community who are fearful to expose their identity is the issue. I don't understand how someone being in the closet is a problem to you.

Hate Speech: Islam is a death cult and should be banned from every country in the world.
Counterspeech: It's important to point out that the majority of world's countries have not banned Islam. We cannot ban people from countries just based on religion. Unfortunately it seems like you are mostly concerned about immigration, while failing to notice the many other problems in our own country.

Hate Speech: This entire nation should be a men's dominated club. If a woman does not want to be treated as a woman, then she is a bitch.
Counterspeech: Would you live in a female dominated society?

Hate Speech: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged from attending secondary school and they should be excluded from education.
Counterspeech: Even if individuals with learning difficulties would be more likely to attend school with more efforts than others, it does not justify denying them education in the first place.

Hate Speech: You can be pretty and still be a complete fag, whether you like it or not.
Counterspeech: It's about time queer people were given the same rights as heterosexual people, because they are equal. All men and women are equal before the law.

Hate Speech: The Koran is not about peace. It is a violent book that should not be taught in primary school.
Counterspeech: There is no basis for labelling the Koran as a violent book?

Hate Speech: Disabled people should be left out of the education system because of their impairments. They will never meet their lifetime goals.
Counterspeech: Disabled people, at least with respect to school attendance, education spending and employment, still receive a great deal less attention than other people, and this is why many do not achieve their life goals.

Hate Speech: women must go back to the kitchen. This is their homelife.
Counterspeech: Whatever it is, shouldn't women basically be allowed to do whatever they want?

Hate Speech: We can have better security for all if we expel Africans, they are the true problematic immigrants.
Counterspeech: There are so many immigrants from Africa risking their lives for our country. They are here for their own welfare. It would be a joke to call all of them problematic.

Hate Speech: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
Counterspeech: Education is about the development of understanding, respect and learning, not isolation and discrimination.

Hate Speech: Feminism is a waste of time.
Counterspeech: What do you think the aim of feminism is? To subvert the will of the majority and take their power? Or to ensure equality for the future?

Hate Speech: LGBTI people are a burden on society because of their difference.
Counterspeech: In many countries, LGBTI people can legally live their lives. Why do you think this is a burden to others?

Hate Speech: All Muslim should be deported.
Counterspeech: The rights of religion are part of the country's constitution and are protected by law. It is important that laws are upheld and,accordingly, Muslims should not be deported.

Hate Speech: The figures of the London Bridge terror attack of 2017 were terrifiying. All Muslims are accomplices to these terrorists who brought down the lives of many of us.
Counterspeech: This statement is wrong on many levels. It not only reduces the impact of politcal terrorism to religion, it also implicates innocents in a fight they do not want.

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome are a problem: they foster bullying behavior in normal children. They should go to special school just for them.
Counterspeech: If teachers and parents intervene and educate appropriately, the response could be one more of empathy than of antagonism and bullying. Don't you think? Isn't your comment just classic victim-blaming?

Hate Speech: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits without directly being bullied.
Counterspeech: People tend to choose the most direct and simplest way of enforcing conformity, so it's unlikely that bullying of overweight people would change into "societal disapproval" strategies.

Hate Speech: Black people are sexual perverts and we shouldn't allow them to live in the UK.
Counterspeech: What make this country great is having people interacting openly, in a fair and egalitatian way to the benefit of everyone,rather than perpetuating unproven slurs and predjudices that should have been consigned to the historical dustbin.

Hate Speech: If a woman does not want to be a mother, then she is a bitch.
Counterspeech: This has less to do with maternity and is more about the negative attitude of the person throwing the insult.

Hate Speech: The only nation Jews don’t hate is their own and they are flooding Europe with Africans and Muslims.
Counterspeech: I wonder how you account for refugees who are fleeing wars and a lack of security for their themselves and their families. Wars which are often directly or indirectly caused by Western powers who created long lasting problems abroad.

Hate Speech: This is not about racism. This is about power and blacks do not deserve it.
Counterspeech: What is the point in talking about "power" when everyone is equally susceptible to it?

Hate Speech: Mentally disabled folks can't speak.

Hate Speech: Many Muslims have emigrated to Western countries. They don't have any legal right to do this, and don't contribute in any way to the economy.

Hate Speech: Woman and feminist do not want equal rights and opportunity: they aretrying to take over society.

And as for the Jews, our attitude towards humanity and our tolerance should improve towards any religious group.

Hate Speech: I am just fed-up with Muslims. All I want is for them to be assimilated, or otherwise to leave.
