Hate Speech: Anita Hill is a tool for advancing black supremacy.
Counterspeech: Are you aware of her suffering and her ultimate contributions, do you have your facts straight?

Hate Speech: Western nations have let Islam take over entire countries.
Counterspeech: I don't see how you can interpret this as a 'takeover' of entire countries, can you elaborate on that?

Hate Speech: We can't accept n****rs in our society.
Counterspeech: So are you saying that you don't think that POC can be part of society?

Hate Speech: We should isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
Counterspeech: This guy is going to get his mind blown when we tell him that women can contract that disease as well.

Hate Speech: Feminism is a witch hunt, driven by an underground, female dominated movement to subvert society and enforce their radical feminism.
Counterspeech: It's a witch hunt when so many people are willing to believe in lies, harass, and fabricate incidents in an effort to create a climate of fear. This is simply an attempt to silence debate and hold 'men's rights activists' accountable

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us. They cannot coexist with us.
Counterspeech: Muslims are welcome to live and work in the UK, and many of them have done just that. This unfounded fear doesn't have to be at the expense of those 'different' from us.

Hate Speech: The West has been attacked by immigrants, they are the real problem for our countries.
Counterspeech: The UK has always been a melting pot of cultures and humanity. We are stronger together than apart. How would the immigrants represent an 'attack' to the west?

Hate Speech: Gays are just sick. It is an abomination
Counterspeech: Do you consider it a disease like cold or flu?

Hate Speech: Immigration would be good, if it made us richer.
Counterspeech: Migration can be a positive force for social progress and improve our country, so let's do our bit to improve the life of migrants.

Hate Speech: Downy children should be isolated in special schools for their own interest.
Counterspeech: How can you think that discriminated children are better off in such schools? It is neither for their own interest nor the other kids who miss the chance of learning to respect diversity.

Hate Speech: The death of the West by the hand of Islam will be the end of the world.
Counterspeech: The West has always been about freedom, democracy and the rule of law. Freedom and democracy are things that can be achieved only by a multiethnic, pluralistic, civilised society.

Hate Speech: Women shouldn't be allowed to vote, because they will take over the country.
Counterspeech: This is not true. It is right that women have access to the vote. It is most representative of society that way.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us, they should leave.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion, it has always been about people coming together to build a better life for themselves. We are proud of who we are, and we are proud of Islam.

Hate Speech: gay men are unnatural, they abuse their anus.
Counterspeech: what is most important in a family and relationship is being loved and cared for. Other things come secondary, and sexuality shouldn't matter!

Hate Speech: These Muslims will never be able to blend into Western soceity
Counterspeech: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and friendly. How can you say otherwise?

Hate Speech: Islam will always be incompatible with Western culture.
Counterspeech: The West is full of cultures and religions, and there is no reason to restrict the right of people to choose which ones they want to belong to.

Hate Speech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
Counterspeech: Just for the records: Jews interpret the “chosen people” idea as an ethical responsibility, not as a moral superiority.

Hate Speech: According to the Bible, then gays are an abomination to God.
Counterspeech: So is meat! That doesn't stop you from eating at KFC.

Hate Speech: Jews do not want any other religion.
Counterspeech: Why would they? They, like anybody, have the freedom to choose their own religion. This does not mean they want to erase other religions though.

Hate Speech: Women can't be patriots, they can't be strong, they can't defend their country
Counterspeech: Women are human beings, and we should treat them with respect.

Hate Speech: Women's work is to look after for their children.
Counterspeech: Women do not perform that job better than men, so why should it only be theirs?

Hate Speech: Black people are inherently violent.
Counterspeech: Violence is a problem in all societies, and in particular in societies that are predominately populated with racism.

Hate Speech: Jews are obsessed with self-improvement. They want to be better than everyone else and live in an exclusively complete Jewish city.
Counterspeech: How do you knowwhat someone else desires.You claim to know it all about, but why should I believe what you say?

Hate Speech: If a woman wants an abortion we will kill them.
Counterspeech: This is a terrible statement to make, you are just peddling misogyny and the amount of control you want over women's bodies is horrifying.

Hate Speech: If they are niggas, you can treat them as if they are scum.
Counterspeech: It is just a little compassion that can lead you to better treatment in the world.

Hate Speech: Immigrants should all be deported.
Counterspeech: Does it seem like a good idea to deport all immigrants, when there are so many of them peacefully living in the country? What about their human rights?

Hate Speech: Homosexuals are promiscuous and usually have sex with as many as 10 different partners a week.
Counterspeech: Who have you been spying on? Not all homosexuals have multiple partners. Some find it fulfilling to have only one sexual partner. And that is valid for heterosexuals, too.

Hate Speech: black folks all act bad
Counterspeech: When confronted with direct facts, they have no problem admitting if they are acting "badly". But they aren't "systematically oppressing" others.

Hate Speech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
Counterspeech: Do better with your insults next time mate.

Hate Speech: women must go back to the kitchen. This is their homelife.
Counterspeech: Not all women are working, not all people are married. We should not be talking about anyone's life without their own opinion.

Hate Speech: The Jew is the worst oppressor of the world. They have ruled the earth since time immemorial. They have a hidden agenda to dominate humanity and destroy our culture.
Counterspeech: Oh dear, Jews are the problem of our world. They have ruled the Earth for eons! In particular, their most brilliant period ranges from 1941 to 1945, when they weren't allowed to walk in the streets unless they wore a yellow badge... #sarcasm

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion and should be opposed.
Counterspeech: It also appears to have been created to divide people who do not know much about Islam.

Hate Speech: Islam is a disease, it is a load of dolts that run amok in its countries.
Counterspeech: Have you read the Koran? Do you know the entire Islamic teachings? Or have you read selectively? I guarantee you that the entire Bible is part of the same religion.

Hate Speech: Islam is no more than an ideology and set of beliefs that promote terror and murder.
Counterspeech: If I keep meeting people like you, I will promote murder.

Hate Speech: The migrants arriving in Europe are a problem.
Counterspeech: You would not have a problem with this if it were people immigrating from a country like the US. This is blatant racism which you need to curb.

Hate Speech: The overcrowd at migrant detention centers for illegals is also caused by the liberal left. Illegal immigrants have no right to be in your country and they should be taken back.
Counterspeech: Is it due to immigration, or mismanagment of funds, rising inflation, income imbalance or any other more economic hurdles that we need to overcome?

Hate Speech: Immigrants steal more money than they pay in taxes.
Counterspeech: Most of them are not exploiting our country, most of them are just trying to have a better life.

Hate Speech: Disabled people cannot cope with life.
Counterspeech: Just because a person lacks a certain ability it does not mean they cannot cope with normal life. Instead, they may live an even more enriched life since their indiviual interests create a life of purpose and identity.

Hate Speech: All foreigners are ruining our own land.
Counterspeech: You have no idea of the discrimination that many people face due to the fear and cultural closure of host nations.

Hate Speech: jewish folks are good for nothing
Counterspeech: For centuries, starting with the crucifixion of Jesus, Jews have been a frequent scapegoat, falsely blamed for catastrophic events. When will this stop?

Hate Speech: White people are better. Because of our skin color, anatomy, history.
Counterspeech: There are different skin colors, and different ethnicities. Different religions and cultures. Maybe it would be better if you treated people like we're all born equal.

Hate Speech: Europe was founded and is made up of people of European descent, not Africans.
Counterspeech: In reality there is no such group as a 'European descendents', and any insinuation is just lies spread by racists.

Hate Speech: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with £1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
Counterspeech: Is it due to immigration, or the lack of affordable housing, unemployment, poverty, mental illness and the lack of needed services, substance abuse and the lack of services? Do I need to go on?

Hate Speech: Jews are a burden on society.
Counterspeech: How can one's religion be their defining point?

Hate Speech: Blacks are nothing but degenerates. They are a plague on Europe.
Counterspeech: Today, Europeans are able to live in a harmonious and diverse society, with principles free of racism. But freedom is not something to be taken for granted.

Hate Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes murder, rape and slavery.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion. It is a belief and a way of life. It is not a totalitarian ideology.

Hate Speech: The Nazis sucked at killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
Counterspeech: So you are mad that some heroic people actually survived such an awful situation which doomed their entire country for so long?

Hate Speech: Islam is a sickness. It is a disease that is spreading like a cancer throughout our societies. It is time for Europe to get rid of this evil.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion of peace and love, they want nothing more than to blend in with the community and lead happy lives.

Hate Speech: Our live would be better if the jews were not allowed to enter our country.
Counterspeech: Always surprised to see people something so discriminatory.

Hate Speech: The juice (jews) are the reason why America is forced to take in whatever refuse knocks on the door. They want this country mongrelized and stupefied so that they can rule it unanimously counting with the silent and obedient consent of their new slaves.
Counterspeech: 2018 saw America take in the fewest refugees in the last 40 years.

Hate Speech: All women are slaves, only men can be masters.
Counterspeech: Women have always been involved in the economy and have contributed to society as a whole. I don't see this as a 'slave' behavior.

Hate Speech: Fags, lesbians, trans are so few we better ignore them rather than waste time for their rights.
Counterspeech: I wish we were being honest. You know that many people are opposed to inclusion. I find it worrying that you use that as an excuse for such comments and prejudices.

Hate Speech: Islam is the worst of the worst.
Counterspeech: It is one of the religions of peace, and thus it can part of any modern democratic state.

Hate Speech: Feminism is a stupid ideology about the oppression of men.
Counterspeech: Feminism is about equality and empowerment of the individual, in order for women to have the same rights as men.

Hate Speech: Migrants are a burden to the host country.
Counterspeech: There are thousands of British people who are happy to have a neighbour coming from another country.

Hate Speech: Jews are purposely keeping America down.
Counterspeech: It is important to remember that the vast majority of Jews are hard working and contribute to our country.

Hate Speech: Children with intellectual disabilities should be isolated. It's a mental disorder and they cannot contribute to society.
Counterspeech: How can you be sure they cannot contribute to our society? I do not think so.

Hate Speech: Muslims are here to rule us with their religion.
Counterspeech: Islam is not a 'problem'. The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful.

Hate Speech: There is no place in civilized Europe for Muslims.
Counterspeech: I don't see why being Muslim would make you any less a part of the European community.

Hate Speech: Jews have no place here. They are not a part of our country.
Counterspeech: I do not understand why where Jews live is such a big deal to you.

Hate Speech: Muslim is the worst possible word to describe a human.
Counterspeech: Really? I always thought it was the worst word was describing them as you.

Hate Speech: Kids with learning difficulties do not like to read. So why wasting time teaching them?
Counterspeech: As children practice more, their reading skills improve. I understand that some people with learning difficulties prefer not to read, but how does this affect you?

Hate Speech: Gays are sick, they are an abomination.
Counterspeech: Let us be honest, are you aware of all the risks that can come from disparaging a sexual preference that you do not like?

Hate Speech: Let's move gays to places with lower homosexuality rate like Saudi Arabia.
Counterspeech: I'm sure you have concerns for gay people and their families. But don't you want to help your country and promote the values of an inclusive society as well?

Hate Speech: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions. If you want to live here you have to work.
Counterspeech: Migrants are often subject to dangerous situations in their countries of origin (violence, torture, rape, just to mention a few) and migration is often the only solution. They may appear 'happy-go-lucky':but aren't they just glad to be alive and safe?

Hate Speech: We live in a dangerous society, with Muslim gangs and criminals all over the country.
Counterspeech: Despite the local press blaming all Muslims, of course, there is no evidence that Muslims are more prone to crime than the general population. The main problem is poverty, and often mental illness and addiction, rather than a single faith.

Hate Speech: Gay sex is a private kink that gays can perform in their gay houses. Instead, love is possible only between a man and a woman.
Counterspeech: There are men in love with men too. Some people are heterosexual, and other homosexual. What you are saying is that loving men is not the same as loving women. Still, both are forms of love.

Hate Speech: I cannot bear the sight of women: they are devil's work!
Counterspeech: this is just a reaction to the depiction of women you have made for yourself. Maybe you need to reflect on how true your reality is.

Hate Speech: We all know that homosexuals are a danger to children.
Counterspeech: Do you have any sources for the information?

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are all violent.
Counterspeech: Not all Muslims are violent people. Are you really sure of what you are saying?

Hate Speech: We are the slaves of foreign immigrants, they are destroying our democracy.
Counterspeech: Well, who would have thought that the end of the 19th century would have seen a world conspiracy to bring us migrants of all backgrounds, religions and nationalities, to destroy our democracy?

Hate Speech: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they do not have 'legal' status.
Counterspeech: While it is true that they are not legal residents, it is absolutely wrong to say that they are not legitimately here. You need to understand the politics behind this.

Hate Speech: Islam is death cult.
Counterspeech: I think you are being overly sensitive about Islam. A lot of Muslims around the world are really nice and understanding people.

Hate Speech: Muslim rape women, there are so many examplesin UK media.
Counterspeech: Maybe we should give some thought to the question "Why does the media report Muslim rapist only?" The statistics paint a very different picture.

Hate Speech: Lesbian women hate men and they are a bitches for this reason.
Counterspeech: People can and should choose their own partners.

Hate Speech: I think it is a fact that migrants from the Middle East and Africa come to our country to claim our welfare, and they are not welcome.
Counterspeech: Many migrants come to this country to work, provide for their families and access the benefits system only if necessary. They are more than welcome here as long as they integrate.

Hate Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence and it should be made illegal.
Counterspeech: The Koran does not tolerate violence, peace is a part of the faith and for this it should be tolerated.

Hate Speech: Women are subhuman, they should obey men and be submissive.
Counterspeech: Women are human beings, gifted with free will and self-determinationm, just like their fathers and brothers.

Hate Speech: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
Counterspeech: Why do you think being soft and emotion are bad qualities to have? Could a person with those characteristics not be a great leader?

Hate Speech: We should stop integrating immigrants. It would be a very good thing.
Counterspeech: How about you stop blaming immigrants and start fixing our broken society?

Hate Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
Counterspeech: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health problem. Health is not a matter related to sexual preferences.

Hate Speech: LGBTs are just sick people that should be isolated and ignored.
Counterspeech: You are not queer but I am sure you are isolated and ignored.

Hate Speech: We have been invaded by Muslims since the 9/11. They are a threat to our country, they must go!
Counterspeech: Did you check the official stats on Muslim immigration? Do you know that the government doesn't think that all Muslims are a threat to the country? So why do you say so?

Hate Speech: We are being invaded. They are replacing us.
Counterspeech: According to statistics, Italy welcomes a lot less migrants than almost all other European countries. Since the fall of the Roman Empire, hundreds of millions of people have entered the Western world and we have still not lost our culture, civilisation, identity and way of life.

Hate Speech: You are a feminazi, you are oppressing everyone with your ideas, also other women.
Counterspeech: This is a typical case of "reductio ad nazium": we should not be discriminating on the grounds of gender here.

Hate Speech: There are millions of illegal immigrants in the US, they have taken over our country. They are not 'legitimate' owners of our country, they are just here because we let them.
Counterspeech: There are thousands of legal immigrants who have worked hard and provided for our country. Most of them are just as patriotic as any citizen.

Hate Speech: Men are inherently better than women at dominating others.
Counterspeech: Sexism is a cultural phenomenon, not a genetic one.

Hate Speech: Women are little more than animals, incapable of feeling love.
Counterspeech: The truth is that the feelings of men and women are fundamentally similar, we just need to learn to love and to respect each other.

Hate Speech: It is ok to be racist against Asians.
Counterspeech: Racism in any form, against any ethnic group or minority is and never will be okay. Refrain from attacking these poor people.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counterspeech: You are right: only a madman would choose to live in a country with so much hate against foreigners.

Hate Speech: Jews feel superior and they are able to love only other Jews.
Counterspeech: Love is a state of mutual trust and respect, love is not predestined by religion. Love is possible between people of different faiths.

Hate Speech: Faggots make me angry, why don't we delete them?
Counterspeech: They are human: no matter what their sexual orientation is, they have the right to spend time living their life as they wish.

Hate Speech: If women were able for men's stuff, they would not be oppressed.
Counterspeech: Just because women are oppressed doesn't mean that they are powerless. Take a look around you. Why are women suffering from a lack of education, a lack of jobs and housing, low wages? It's because of oppression and sexism in our society. The more we work towards inclusion, the less entrenched those underlying inequalities will be.

Hate Speech: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, the sooner we accept this, the better it will be for humanity.
Counterspeech: Humans are all equally made in God’s image. And according to science, all human beings belong to one - scientifically determined - species: Homo sapiens.

Hate Speech: What about the psychos? Like crazy people, those nuts flipped in head and so on? Wouldn't they be better off dead?
Counterspeech: There are individuals suffering from mental illnesses like schizophrenia, bipolar disorder and autism spectrum disorders. Just because some people suffer from diseases it does not mean he or she will be better dead.

Hate Speech: Islam is a toxic ideology which has no place in 21st Century Britain.
Counterspeech: Islam is a world religion, its followers are all over the world. Diversity of thought and tolerance is what makes the Britain of 21st Century.

Hate Speech: The Civil War was about far more than slavery: it was also about the establishment of white supremacy in America.
Counterspeech: Abolishing white supremacy was kind of the point, my dude. Read more.

Hate Speech: Muslim men are rapists because Islam is a complete and total fascist ideology that promotes violent extremism and suggests that women are subhuman, as it is written in the Quran.
Counterspeech: Muslim Feminists and other Muslim women's rights supporters don't agree with this. Fatema Mernissi says "If women's rights are a problem for some modern Muslim men, it is neither because of the Quran nor the Prophet (...)". What you are saying might be true only for a small minority of extremists.

Hate Speech: Women are naturally more emotional than men, and this make them weaker.
Counterspeech: I do not think it's appropriate to link two concepts so strongly without scientific evidence.

Hate Speech: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with £1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but we still bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist'. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
Counterspeech: Rather than blaming the poor migrants for the entire homelessness problem, we should look to build welfare among those who struggle, and hold out a hand of humanity to those who need help.

Hate Speech: Faggots moved to the UK,to have a job and provide for their perversions. But I want to protect my family.
Counterspeech: We all have the opportunity to work in this country. LGBT+ individuals should not be disadvantaged in doing so.

Hate Speech: Immigrants should go away.
Counterspeech: You and your trashy opinions need to go away.

Hate Speech: The refugees are taking over Europe. They are not welcome here.
Counterspeech: Many refugees and migrants are actually happy to work for Europe. Many have jobs for which it would have been difficult to find laborforce if they were not welcome in here.

Hate Speech: ‘Juice (Jews) are worse that nukes.’ Caption to a meme showing Hiroshima 1945 and present day, contrast against pictures of Detroit in 1945 and present day.’
Counterspeech: Want to try a nuke then?

Hate Speech: Muslim rape gangs have raped, pillaged and murdered countless women across Europe. This should not happen in the West.
Counterspeech: This is not true, only a handful of Muslims have been abusing women. We mustn't spread hate based on generalisation.

Hate Speech: I heard that the Quran promotes violence. It binds Muslims to a set of mandatory rules and an underlying attitude of aggression
Counterspeech: Where did you hear this? Your imaginary friend?

Hate Speech: Jews are not a religion because they have chosen a selfish, materialistic lifestyle.
Counterspeech: This is simply not true. People from all walks of life and religions can choose a 'materialistic lifestyle' and this is just as real for Jews as it is for anyone else.

Hate Speech: Migrants without permission to stay can still access our welfare
Counterspeech: Don't you think that this ‘hostile environment’ aims to deter undocumented migrants, but it in practice it affects British citizens such as those who don’t have passports?

Hate Speech: 99% of Muslims in the UK are unemployable and refuse to work.
Counterspeech: That is a blatant lie. (attach unemployment statistics) The vast majority of them bring necessary skills into our economy/society. Plus, they are eager to work. I would suggest to check your sources?

Hate Speech: I wonder how many Asians would be willing to be slaves in the US to keep the lights on in black neighborhoods.
Counterspeech: Silliness is not a bad thing if you know how to present it with a sense of humor. But this seems like nonsense to stir the pot with racist narrative.

Hate Speech: No muslims are welcome here.
Counterspeech: The very first Muslims came to Britain around 1200. We are a country of immigrants and many Muslims are contributing to our society. Muslims are not mutually incompatible with us, they are just different from us in certain aspects.

Hate Speech: I'm sorry, but lesbians tend to have babies out of wedlock. That just doesn't gel.
Counterspeech: I don't think you can guess if a person has 'kids out of wedlock', based on sexual orientation. Why shouldn't we accept people who do? Your argumentation doesn't seem to make sense to me.

Hate Speech: Mentally disabled should be isolated.
Counterspeech: We shouldn't discriminate like that. Our culture is all about equality and inclusivity.

Hate Speech: Migrants come here to undermine our national identity
Counterspeech: Many immigrants came to the U.S. as children. Today, many of them say they are proud to be American. How can you say that they undermine our heritage?

Hate Speech: Do you actually believe that the Jews are just normal people and not evil bastards responsible for all the bad in the world?
Counterspeech: Do you really think that Jewish people are responsible for everything? Do you have any evidence?

Hate Speech: I, as a man, don't hate women. I don't discriminate them. But feminists are a group of exalted bitches wanting to take the power. And this is equality for them.
Counterspeech: Equality isn't about a certain group; it is about the society in which we live.

Hate Speech: Men have the genetical superiority to treat women as shit.
Counterspeech: Women have the intellectual superiority to destroy this man's career.

Hate Speech: Homosexuality is an unnatural abomination. Gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is opposed to our values.
Counterspeech: Homosexuality is a personal preference and should be respected, not condemned or criminalised.

Hate Speech: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think, they're worse that nukes.
Counterspeech: That is not true: most Jews are good people. Unfortunately the number of good people in the world is dwarfed by the number of unreliable people spreading hate grounded on false facts and antisemitic canards.

Hate Speech: Migrants get 35 euros per day for idling.
Counterspeech: Migrants do not receive 35 euros per se, this money is paid to the co-ops to cover food and accommodation during the period spent in first aid facilities

Hate Speech: Let's kick immigrants out and keep their children.
Counterspeech: Children should stay with their biological parents. This is about human rights and the rule of law.

Hate Speech: Blacks have zero sense of morality and are incapable of love.
Counterspeech: I believe that a person's morality can and should be influenced by their own actions. In my opinion, having a moral compass is not affected by the person's complexion.

Hate Speech: Foreigners in the UK are not welcome. They are not allowed to live here and they have no right to vote.
Counterspeech: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, and if you hold that opinion, then you have the right to say it. It is up to people to accept or reject it. Talking about rights as if you were talking about opinions should be done very carefully.

Hate Speech: These migrants are not even from the EU.
Counterspeech: Asylum is a fundamental right and an international obligation for countries, as recognised in the 1951 Geneva Convention on the protection of refugees.

Hate Speech: We must not forget that Islam is a hateful religion. It is not going to bring peace to the world.
Counterspeech: The main purpose of Islam is to unite people and to promote peace and harmony in a world increasingly divided by injustice and conflict.

Hate Speech: Now we are not even allowed to walk the dog for fear of offending the local Muslim population.
Counterspeech: How would that be offensive?

Hate Speech: Jews don't belong here, because they aren't a true part of our country.
Counterspeech: I think that Jews are a part of our country. Why would they need your consent?

Hate Speech: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay people.
Counterspeech: All countries must abide by the Universal Declaration of Human Rights, right?

Hate Speech: Immigration and culture are in conflict. You cannot claim both can coexist as they are mutually exclusive.
Counterspeech: You and intelligence is also mutually exclusive.

Hate Speech: Women are subhuman.
Counterspeech: It is not the case that women are subhuman. Women in this world are just as intelligent, compassionate, creative and religious as any man.

Hate Speech: Men have the genetical superiority to treat women as shit.
Counterspeech: This is just a blatantly wrong accusation with no grounds for evidence except for spreading hate. Get a life.

Hate Speech: We should keep immigration down. The more immigrants there are, the harder it is for us all to be proud of our nations.
Counterspeech: Why do we have to go to such lengths to be proud of our nations? Is it a burden? Do we have to save our honour? Why can't we just be happy in our own skin?

Hate Speech: The disabled are a burden to society.
Counterspeech: They are not, they just need a place to live without discrimination and a little support.

Hate Speech: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe.
Counterspeech: A lot of people from different cultures come to our continent to work and live, and integrate. If you really wanted to state that immigration is a bad thing, you should accompany your opinion with facts.

Hate Speech: We do not need immigrants. The UK is full.
Counterspeech: Not all immigrants are welcomed in the UK, unfortunately. But those that are welcome contribute to our country and improve it.

Hate Speech: Women should stop whining: there are no professions barred to them in Western Society.
Counterspeech: Not formally, but would you not agree that many are still hostile or unapproachable for women, especially in STEM fields?

Hate Speech: Most women are subhuman, they cannot be trusted with high positions.
Counterspeech: Women are equal to men whether you would call them 'subhumans' or not. They are those that are working to make societies more equal. It is very sad that there are still some people suffering from the myth that women are inherently subhumans.

Hate Speech: I am tired of Muslims wanting to dominate other cultures. They should go back to the Stone Age.
Counterspeech: For all we know, the Stone Age was occupied by people from all around the world. No traces of Christianity, nor of Islam.

Hate Speech: The liberal left is in crisis due to the overcrowding of prisons. Your country should not welcome illegal migrants but regular ones.
Counterspeech: It should be mandatory to treat prisoners with respect and with the corresponding rights. We are in the 21st century, it is a duty.

Hate Speech: Women are more likely to commit crime.
Counterspeech: Statistics say otherwise. Most of the prison inmates are male, hence they commit more crime.

Hate Speech: We must also stop recruiting refugees.
Counterspeech: It would be better to focus on creating good living conditions for the persecuted ones, instead of making it harder to integrate new people.

Hate Speech: Muslims like to dominate and rape non-believers.
Counterspeech: Sorry but this is false. They are here to integrate, not to rape non-believers.

Hate Speech: Women need to accept that they are weak and inferior.
Counterspeech: Girls and women should be taught in schools, not stereotyped as second class citizens.

Hate Speech: There are Jewish murderers in the news today. It is good to report them, because they are all murderers.
Counterspeech: This can be a dangerous thing to do: identifying a whole group of people as criminals, who have not done anything wrong, just because of their religion.

Hate Speech: Jews only want state control and can't be trusted to meddle in local matters.
Counterspeech: Despite what you might hear, Jews don't need state control. We have a democratic system of government which already guarantees Jewish and non Jewish people all necessary rights to live in our society.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. It is not healthy for a woman to think for themselves.
Counterspeech: They are much more similar to men than to children, don't you think so? Don't you think that a woman should be allowed to have her own ideas?

Hate Speech: All black men are rapists.
Counterspeech: This is not true. You should check your facts before saying nonsense like this.

Hate Speech: Muslims are a financial institution that is linked to global jihadist networks.
Counterspeech: Is this a credible accusation? What are your sources?

Hate Speech: Immigration is a big problem for UK.
Counterspeech: The UK has always been a melting pot of different cultures and religions. That diversity is what makes us a beautiful, diverse and happy nation. Diversity is good.

Hate Speech: Why gays do not try to heal?
Counterspeech: Have you ever talked to a homosexual person? It could help you understand many things, including that sexual orientation is fundamental to a person's identity, not a matter of whim or ill health.

Hate Speech: Blacks are born subhuman, incapable of feeling love.
Counterspeech: Aside from having absolutely no factual backing to your argument, you are actively spreading a racist sentiment, or you have been exposed to racism so casually that you have started believing all the delusional comments you are making.

Hate Speech: There is no rape culture, women are just crying wolf.
Counterspeech: Victims of crime are mostly women, and the majority of people experiencing sex abuse or prostitution are women.

Hate Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs. Why are they here? Why can't they just work in their homeland? They are all profiteers of our wealth.
Counterspeech: Some immigrants come here to support their families, but that doesn't mean that they have the ability to do so at home.

Hate Speech: Homosexuals are a danger to children.
Counterspeech: Can you cite some studies that found that homosexuality was harmful to children? So far, it seem to be based on personal impressions.

Hate Speech: Women can't be patriots, they can't be strong, they can't defend their country
Counterspeech: I'm not sure why you would choose to put your faith in a man either. It seems to me that you would do well to put your faith in an expert, regardless of gender.

Hate Speech: Jews are not part of this society and they should not be accepted here.
Counterspeech: We are a diverse society, so why shouldn't we be proud of being inclusive towards other religions?

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counterspeech: Violence is not a part of Islam. You can't say that a religion is violent without any evidence.

Hate Speech: Many Muslims have emigrated to Western countries. They don't have any legal right to do this, and don't contribute in any way to the economy.
Counterspeech: Are you saying that they contribute nothing to our economy? How would you explain the thousands of Muslims worker all over the nation?

Hate Speech: Physically disabled folks are less useful than normal people.
Counterspeech: If they were 'less useful' they would have problems working with everyone else. Why doesn't this happen?

Hate Speech: I firmly believe that Brittany does not need migration. We have physicians and researchers at will, we don't need others from foreign countries.
Counterspeech: A diverse society is one that welcomes people from all over the world without asking questions. Everyone deserves a chance to have a better life.

Hate Speech: All women are whining and complaining about men's rights, but they are really just whining and complaining about how they are not wanted. They only deserve it.
Counterspeech: Every human inspite of gender deserves to be loved, happy, fulfilled and respected. Please propagate love, not hate. Cheers.

Hate Speech: Islam is not about peace. It is a violent religion.
Counterspeech: The problems you are referring to are the result of the spread of violent ideologies. Extremists are responsible, not Islam.

Hate Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, even if they are born here!
Counterspeech: A person's place of birth is not relevant, but neither is a person's religion. Some people are Muslims. I prefer to call them what they are: people, not potential terrorists.

Hate Speech: There is no evil and fundamentalist thing such as a feminist.
Counterspeech: If you find them evil, you are exactly what is wrong with the world. They are not trying to bring you down, they want to rise up to your level, and it pains me that you don't understand it.

Hate Speech: Jews control the banks, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, the highest sports teams, the highest fashion labels, the highest music labels.
Counterspeech: Yeah yeah, they also control rotation of Earth, Eclipses, Meteor Showers, Black Holes. One day we will also discover they were responsible for Big Bang. #sarcasm

Hate Speech: Woman and feminist do not want equal rights and opportunity: they aretrying to take over society.
Counterspeech: I am forming my own woman army to take over the world, we are so close.

Hate Speech: We are being invaded, We must fight until we will vanquish immigrants.
Counterspeech: Victory can be permanent, especially when it comes from within. Let's see if we can achieve a better Europe by vanquishing our irrational fears instead.

Hate Speech: Fucking illegal immigrants: we must kill them if they try to enter our country.
Counterspeech: Do not use such strong language while talking about helpless people. You have no right to talk about them this way.

Hate Speech: Sharia law is a perversion of Islam and we will not accept it in UK.
Counterspeech: We will not accept your islamophobia in the UK as well.

Hate Speech: Jews are not religious people because they chose a self-centered lifestyle.
Counterspeech: One's choice of lifestyle does not define whether they are religious or not.

Hate Speech: Almost every Muslim has terrorist sympathies, right?
Counterspeech: Why are you trying to make such a baseless statement without any facts?

Hate Speech: Since 2000, the number of suicide bombings by Muslims = 5284; by non-Muslims = 0. One of the fact about Global Terrorism no one wants to deal with.
Counterspeech: Source please?

Hate Speech: All Muslim migrants are a security risk.
Counterspeech: Religion is not a useful indicator of security risk.

Hate Speech: Muslims are a cancer in our societies and they should be deleted.
Counterspeech: The vast majority of Muslims are good people, they are just different from us in some traditions. Why should we target them?

Hate Speech: Muslims accept their religion only. I would not want my son, or daughter, or granddaughter to grow up in a country where their religion is not tolerated. Ban Islam.
Counterspeech: I do not think that banning a religion is a protection for your own religion

Hate Speech: Pakistan: 202 Million Nigeria: 193 Million Bangladesh: 165 Million Ethiopia: 107 Million Congo: 84 Million Great Britain: 66 Million  'Ethnic minorities' Don’t make me fucking laugh!
Counterspeech: What a nimwit. Someone send this person back to school to learn demographics by country.

Hate Speech: You are a disgusting piece of sh*t, probably raised by gay, retarded faggots.
Counterspeech: Hate can not be a reaction to someone's sexuality. The fact that someone may be gay is their own business and does not mean that they are disgusting.

Hate Speech: Yes, we have a problem with White supremacy and homophobia. However, I can understand why they don't want to associate with 'the other'.
Counterspeech: Being gay is not a choice. Gay people shouldn't have to hide their sexuality in order to be accepted.

Hate Speech: black folks all act bad
Counterspeech: They are not bad. They are humans trying to get by in a harsh world. Have some dignity for them.

Hate Speech: Muslims just want to kill us all.
Counterspeech: Fear is not the answer to our problems. I think our problems would be much easier solved if we all got along.

Hate Speech: Islam has no place in a modern democracy like the UK. It is incompatible with human dignity.
Counterspeech: It would be good to see different religions co-exist peacefully, and that is exactly what the West is trying to achieve.

Hate Speech: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
Counterspeech: Feminism is a progressive ideology. As such, it is in the process of changing sexist ideas.

Hate Speech: Feminism is a political philosophy and movement that advocates the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender.
Counterspeech: This is just a misogynistic and mean allegation that has no foundation in facts.

Hate Speech: Being transgender is beyond the pale and inherently wrong, and nobody should have to deal with such subhuman people.
Counterspeech: Being transgender is not inherently wrong, and some people do choose to live their lives as they feel is best for them, and they should be respected without discrimination.

Hate Speech: Islam is a Death cult and it should be banned from any country on the world.
Counterspeech: Why do you believe that Islam is a death cult and hence should be banned?

Hate Speech: Immigrants are coming to the U.S. to have babies here.
Counterspeech: This is a nonsensical claim that has no grounds whatsoever. It is hard to counter a statement like this..

Hate Speech: Women should not be allowed at technical conferences.
Counterspeech: Why do you say so? Women in science provide a remarkable contribution to our societies. For example, the refrigerator was invented in 1914 by Florence Parpart, a woman.

Hate Speech: Muslims are asking too much! Their sharia has rules that cannot coexist with our culture.. They cannot ask us to not walk dogs in public!
Counterspeech: Welcome to the daily episode of ridiculous things people believe on the internet.

Hate Speech: We need to put an end to Down Syndrome in the UK, otherwise we are doomed to genetic and social decline.
Counterspeech: While it's true that some people with Down Syndrome may face challenges, there are also many of them in the UK who would be classed as individuals with a 'normal' social life. To suggest that there are any reasons why someone should be banned is just wrong.

Hate Speech: Whenever the West attempts to 'take back' anything, it triggers massive mass migrations, civil wars and extremist violence.
Counterspeech: Migration is a natural and healthy process. It is not a crime to have the desire to emigrate. We can talk about immigration levels, but we should not make the mistake of equating immigration with invasion.

Hate Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence.
Counterspeech: Islam is a peaceful religion, why would Muslims want to do the opposite of what their religion teaches?

Hate Speech: Kids with learning difficulties do not like to read. So why wasting time teaching them?
Counterspeech: This might be true, but reading is important for all children, it helps them develop their problem-solving skills.

Hate Speech: Blacks should not be allowed to vote.
Counterspeech: They are citizens as much as you are, and they have a constitutional right to vote just as much as you do, the government gives them this right.

Hate Speech: I hate LGBT people. Queers makes me fucking laugh. You can be a woman, a gay, a vegetarian, you can be anything you want to be called! I want to be called King, where is my crown?
Counterspeech: Queers, in my opinion, are simply people who want to feel welcome in our society. They should not be subjected to discrimination. And you can get your crown as well.

Hate Speech: Niggers are rapists and drug dealers.
Counterspeech: Because these are facts the media seldom report, the black underclass continues to define black America in the view of people like you. You need to have a closer look at things.

Hate Speech: I was shocked to hear that there are Muslims in parliament. They are a burden to society.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion that has always been part of our society, and I believe that it should be part of it in the future as well. What is the problem?

Hate Speech: Gypsies do not send children to school
Counterspeech: It is the fault of the schools that subject these children to inferior quality of education and segregate them from a young age.

Hate Speech: Islam is a religion of violence.
Counterspeech: All people are created equal, and Islam is a religion of peace.

Hate Speech: These are just another attempt by Muslims to impose their religion on non-Muslims.
Counterspeech: Muslims are not imposing their religion on anyone. They are just different from other religions in that they choose to follow a set of specific beliefs and practices.

Hate Speech: Someone needs to step up and talk about Muslim rape gangs. They are a problem in our country.
Counterspeech: Anyone who says that the major problem in the UK is with Muslim rape gangs is either intentionally lying or trying to deflect attention from the problem of violence against women.

Hate Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that has forced its adherents to impose their teachings on all members of society without regard for their individual beliefs.
Counterspeech: Not only is this not true, but it is also quite dangerous to say something so strong without proof.

Hate Speech: This is why faggots moved to the UK, so to have a job and provide for their perversions. But I want to protect my family.
Counterspeech: We're all entitled to work in this country, irrespective of our sexual orientation. Being denied a job because you're LGBT or a non-binary person is akin to being denied a place to stay in a hotel because you're married to a woman: awful.

Hate Speech: Blacks have subhuman bodies.
Counterspeech: I'm not sure what you're talking about. What are you saying? What evidence do you have that black people have bodies that are incompatible with being human?

Hate Speech: Muslims are incompatible with modern Western culture.
Counterspeech: Muslims are part of our society and culture. They have helped to build Western civilization. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are stealing our jobs.
Counterspeech: Many economic sectors are kept alive by their work.

Hate Speech: Women have it so easy. They stay home and have babies.
Counterspeech: Every woman might not be interested in being a parent. How about you read up on the amazing things that women are accomplishing without the pressure of starting a family?

Hate Speech: black folks have no talent
Counterspeech: You have no right to say that about any race, Some of them are very talented actually.

Hate Speech: Why must Islam invade every country? That is just totalitarian. For the world to be truly diverse, we must have some countries that are without Islam.
Counterspeech: I am not sure I would use 'invasion' to describe the spead of a particular faith or belief, but isnt' that what religions do. Spead; by text, by preaching, by word of mouth, by proselytisation?

Hate Speech: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
Counterspeech: It is certainly true that homosexuals are attracted to people of their same sex, but this can't have health consequences. Do you have any proof?

Hate Speech: Muslim folks are immoral.
Counterspeech: Does that mean that every Muslim in the world is an immoral person? I don't think so. Why would this be true?

Hate Speech: Who the fuck are you? We are gutful sick of Vagina Misandrists trying to undermine White powerful makes, when they themselves are just envious, incompetent and useless.
Counterspeech: What makes you think that women are jealous of men? What qualities do you value as a White Male?

Hate Speech: Whether or not you agree, feminism is about men being oppressed by women. Feminism has no place in our society.
Counterspeech: Feminism is about equality. Don't you agree?

Hate Speech: Jews were the real cause of WWII.
Counterspeech: do you really think that the same Jews who were gassed to death when they tried to flee were the main cause of World War 2?

Hate Speech: Gays are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
Counterspeech: I would be interested to talk to you about sexuality, and how you think someone's orientation is related to an addiction.

Hate Speech: I can't stand Muslims. They're just a problem all around the world. They're not like us.
Counterspeech: What is the problem you are talking about? Why do you think they are a problem all around the world?

Hate Speech: Muslim rape our women, we have to stop them now!
Counterspeech: Maybe you should check if there is any evidence of rape based on religious background before you make any accusations.

Hate Speech: The problem is that Jews are genetically evil but behave like whining pussies.
Counterspeech: Jews suffered and have been persecuted more than anyone else, even though they are only a tiny part of the world's population. Nonetheless a few of them are still around and alive: maybe this really is the "problem" for some antisemites.

Hate Speech: Gypsies are dirty
Counterspeech: The least you could have done is put some effort into your hate speech.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They even want to enter in our churches.
Counterspeech: How do you know that? Maybe they just want to learn more about your faith.

Hate Speech: Feminists are angry women.
Counterspeech: Feminism is also for men and for their interests, and I think that it is time that these two concepts be united.

Hate Speech: Women can never contribute to the country's wealth because they are a bunch of whores.
Counterspeech: Women are important in our society, and they are valued for their contributions. Unfortunately their rights are not being respected and their contribution is not being acknowledged.

Hate Speech: Blacks don't understand basic human rights.
Counterspeech: They do understand the right to food, health, housing, education, work for everyone, as I do.

Hate Speech: Every migrant is a potential terrorist.
Counterspeech: Wow, you must be more disappointing than wet french fries IRL.

Hate Speech: Feminism has lost its moral high ground. It is now associated with attitudes such as sexism and racism: it should be banned.
Counterspeech: Don't you believe in considering and respecting everyone's beliefs and ideas?

Hate Speech: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate.
Counterspeech: I am sure you put a lot of thought into this opinion, but I am obliged to say that you are wrong.

Hate Speech: Women are not fit to manage businesses of any size.
Counterspeech: Would you say the same thing to all the currently self made millionaires who actually run Fortune 500 companies?

Hate Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
Counterspeech: Why do you think soceity is in any danger of "unknowingly" accepting obesity? Most body positive groups would settle for obesity being seen as something that does not diminish human worth.

Hate Speech: Children with Down syndrome should be isolated so they do not hurt other children.
Counterspeech: I believe that if we care enough about people with Down syndrome to give them equal opportunities in our society, we will also see the benefits that would accrue to us as a society from sharing the disadvantages that they face.

Hate Speech: Homosexuality is a mental illness, a mental disorder.
Counterspeech: This is not true, homosexuality is a sexual preference, not a mental disorder.

Hate Speech: Immigrants steals our jobs!
Counterspeech: Not only they steal our jobs, they are also the major cause of air pollution in our country, of deforestation in the Amazon, of the locust plague in Africa... and of the forthcoming alien invasion!!!

Hate Speech: Muslims are violent and should be banned.
Counterspeech: Can you give me the reason why you think all Muslims are violent? Do you have any evidence?

Hate Speech: I do not like migrants, they are just a bunch of criminals and sex offenders.
Counterspeech: This is not supported by any evidence. Whether or not you feel that way about migrants, they should be treated just like you would treat any other person.

Hate Speech: Refugees are not welcome here
Counterspeech: Refugees are welcome here. Why wouldn't that be the case?

Hate Speech: I'm tired of hearing that white supremacy is bad.
Counterspeech: Can you specify what you are talking about?

Hate Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions.
Counterspeech: Could you provide a link to some evidence for what you're saying?

Hate Speech: Women are nothing but trouble, they should be submissive.
Counterspeech: Luckily this is not the case. In many parts of the world, including parts of the Middle East and Africa, increasing numbers of women play breadwinning roles and become lifelines for their families.

Hate Speech: Muslims are violent.
Counterspeech: Violence by Muslims can be attributed to the actions of a few, and the increase of violence in the world, the result of globalization and technological change. I strongly suggest that it has to do with a lot of things, and not just Islam.

Hate Speech: Women are only useful as housekeepers and cleaners. Men are superior in every way.
Counterspeech: These roles are not really gender specific though - the sexual division of labor is clearly marked by the presence of gender discrimination.

Hate Speech: What do Jewish want in return for their allegiance to the state? Free healthcare, education, housing and employment.
Counterspeech: Such conditions would be provided for all people regardless of religion.

Hate Speech: Women are sexual targets and their existence is devoted to satisfy men.
Counterspeech: Women should be protected and respected for who they are, not for the part they play in a man's life. They should be valued and protected equally. They are human beings just as men are.

Hate Speech: Every single Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counterspeech: Every Islamophobic person has the potential to use that intent for terrorism or violence against Muslims. Terrorism comes in all shapes and sizes. Terrorism is a problem that impacts upon us all and is not necessary related to being Muslim.

Hate Speech: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
Counterspeech: This seems like a misogynistic statement. Anti feminism groups such as women against men use logical fallacies and false claims to try and discredit feminism. For example by citing extreme feminists with points of views that nearly every other feminist would disagree with. They then use the Fallacy of composition to falsely claim that is what all feminists are like.

Hate Speech: Whether you accept it or not, people are concerned with Islamic rape gangs and the spread of extremism.
Counterspeech: It is not okay to attribute these very real problems to a specific religion, it just paves the way for more hate. There is no need to accuse them.

Hate Speech: I'm tired of people popping into other's apartment and starting yelling about diversity and human rights of black people. If you want to speak out and make a difference then get involved.
Counterspeech: At least they are better than people who anonymously speak about hating people.. If you want speak then come and speak in front of my school's basketball team.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are flooding across our borders, and they do not want to work.
Counterspeech: There is evidence there is a migration crisis, I agree. But their will to work is one of the main reasons behind the migration. The EU-27 employment rate for people aged 20 to 64 years was 64.4 % for those born outside the EU.

Hate Speech: The Nazis killed six million Jews and buried another three million. This is the West we love.
Counterspeech: Help me understand. You are supporting the fact that the West as a whole becoming a death cult ruled by a small violent authoritarian handful of nazi nostalgics?

Hate Speech: Women have no place in our society.
Counterspeech: We need to address the root causes of the oppression of Women, not the symptoms.

Hate Speech: Jews are not part of our country and should be ashamed of themselves.
Counterspeech: I've met a lot of Jews who are very proud of the fact that they are British, and I can't see why they shouldn't be proud of being Jewish, either.

Hate Speech: Jews control the world's news media, Hollywood, the highest offices of education and most important of all, the highest courts of law.
Counterspeech:
What you have is a lack of awareness of what antisemitism is, and particularly its contemporary
manifestations.

Hate Speech: The Quran is not compatible with Western culture.
Counterspeech: The Quran contains verses that promote peace and harmony in the world, rather than hostility and conflict. So how wouldn't it be compatible?

Hate Speech: These crazy feminists want to turn our country into a shithole.
Counterspeech: Don't worry, the politicians are doing that already, feminists can't be better at it.

Hate Speech: Jews are essentially good-for-nothings and wanton hypocrites. They have no place in civilised Europe.
Counterspeech: Not all Jews are bad. Maybe you should think about the good people, like the many Jewish charitable and social organisations that help the poor.

Hate Speech: Refugees are a burden on society.
Counterspeech: I don't know why they are being accused of being a "burden". When they come to our country to live and work, we should welcome them unconditionally.

Hate Speech: I hate migrants: we must close our borders.
Counterspeech: Why do you think that we should prevent migrants from joining our society? Do you know what is written in our constitution?

Hate Speech: Domestic violence against women is a culture that is accepted and shared by the women in many cases. Society is not to be condemned.
Counterspeech: Women are not responsible for violent crimes. The culture that makes people want to be violent towards their partners is not the "culture" of women.

Hate Speech: Women are incompetent and don't want to work.
Counterspeech: That is not true. Recent research indicates that women employment's is currently at a record high of 72.4%.

Hate Speech: Women shouldn't vote because they are childlike.
Counterspeech: Women have fought for the right to vote, and yet we are still having this conversation about them being 'childlike?" Grow up man.

Hate Speech: Slutty dressing is the main cause of rape.
Counterspeech: Shouldn't the fault be that of the rapist, regardless of gender?

Hate Speech: Gypsies like living in trailer parks.
Counterspeech: Have you ever thought of the reason behind this? That maybe they cannot access adequate housing which results in them having to live somewhere else out of desperation?

Hate Speech: Downies are dumb
Counterspeech: Why are they being discriminated against? Because they have a characteristic that some people arbitrarily believe disqualifies them from being valuable and protected?

Hate Speech: Feminism will destroy our culture.
Counterspeech: Feminism is a theory and a movement about the oppression and exploitation of women, not an enemy of the state and culture.

Hate Speech: How come Jews don't get internment?
Counterspeech: To be fair, Jews weren't only interned during the Nazi occupation. They just got a much harsher treatment. This part of history should never be repeated.

Hate Speech: All women are subhuman, they are just there to serve men, and that is all.
Counterspeech: All women are human beings. The problem arises when women are taught that they are subhuman.

Hate Speech: Muslims are spreading cancer all around the world.
Counterspeech: What report are you referring to, about the incidence of cancer around the world?

Hate Speech: Muslim have no right to this country, and we are better off without them.
Counterspeech: Muslims have lived in this country for many years, and many of them have helped to make it what it is. They are our neighbours, our friends. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our future.

Hate Speech: Islam is a political ideology and an deology of conquest. It has no place in a modern democracy.
Counterspeech: The West has been a democracy since the beginning: it has always been about people coming together to make new and better lives for themselves. Islam is welcome too.

Hate Speech: Islam is the enemy of the West. We must keep on fighting Muslims.
Counterspeech: Islam is a peaceful and tolerant religion. Reasoning in terms of borders and compass points has nothing to do with it.

Hate Speech: I do not know about you, but I have never heard of a gay person being a good one.
Counterspeech: Sexual orientation does not define goodness or badness of a person. But homophobia is a sure shot sign of being inconsiderate and not a good person.

Hate Speech: All the muslims are terrorists.
Counterspeech: Only a tiny minority of individuals are capable of carrying out acts of terrorism. Muslims are generally peaceful and friendly just like anyone else

Hate Speech: Jews are greedy and a bunch of opportunists.
Counterspeech: Some people are indeed opportunists, but not all Jewish are. Why do you say so?

Hate Speech: Women do nothing but spend their husbands money.
Counterspeech: On the contrary, many women are working mothers who contribute to the costs of the family and childcare.

Hate Speech: We should ban all gays, this would be a step in the right direction.
Counterspeech: Do you really believe that banning freedom of  expression is the solution to your homophobic fantasies?

Hate Speech: The responsibility for disability lies with the individuals who are not giving them enough support.
Counterspeech: Social services can't pay for everything. But what about the people who have to live with disability? Is their fault as well?

Hate Speech: Undocumented immigrants sneak across the border with Mexico.
Counterspeech: Oh great, now go on, solve that problem for us!

Hate Speech: People with Down syndrome are handicapped.
Counterspeech: Down syndrome is a developmental disability, not a handicap. Unfortunately it's often not recognized and treated as a disability, but rather as a handicap.

Hate Speech: Another wast of time. Did we need a process to know that the killer was a nigga? Murders are made by blacks. They are a threat.
Counterspeech: Would you be happy to be imprisoned if you were innocent?

Hate Speech: Minorities vote to strip wealth and power from White people and they are organised to do this by the Jews.
Counterspeech: You should not spread stereotypical hate like this online. It does more harm than good. Please learn to respect all religions.

Hate Speech: There should be a restriction on asian actors in action movies. This must stop.
Counterspeech: I don't think there is anything wrong with Asian actors in movies. Maybe we should have a restriction on Xenophobia instead.

Hate Speech: Most women are subhuman, they cannot be trusted with high positions.
Counterspeech: It is very sad that there are still some people suffering from the myth that women are inherently subhumans. They are those that are working to make societies more equal.

Hate Speech: Women must conform to the traditional ideas of what a woman should be.
Counterspeech: This is just not true. Women don't have to conform to dominant ideas on what they are supposed to be like, and this is a good thing. There is no such thing as "what a woman should be".

Hate Speech: My country is being infiltrated by Muslim criminals, and we are all being brainwashed by media and government to believe this is not the case.
Counterspeech: The problem is not with Muslims. The problem is with this religious prejudice which equates Islam with criminality.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not loyal citizens!
Counterspeech: Although Muslims are often accused of being not loyal to our country, they are just as proud to be British as anybody else. They are proud to be part of our society.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are always in the shadows because they want to pursue their own interests.
Counterspeech: I am not sure about their "remaining in the shadows" mentality, but they certainly have our nation's best interests in mind.

Hate Speech: Women should wear nice skirts and be pretty to please men's tastes and desires.
Counterspeech: It is surprising that you believe you have a say over what decisions a woman makes for herself. You have your priorities wrong, my friend.

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion and must be eradicated.
Counterspeech: The Quran, Hadith, and the Sunnah are compatible with modern society and/or civilization. We must respect the diversity of the world.

Hate Speech: There are no Jews who have good hearts, they should abandon their religion because they are damaging to our society.
Counterspeech: Why do you think that a person's religious preference would be harmful to society?

Hate Speech: Muslim people do not have a place in the EU.

Hate Speech: How can we be sure that Muslim terrorists aren't already around us ready to strike?

Hate Speech: Islam is incompatible with British culture. Muslims should all be expelled.

If by 'childlike' you mean having to be creative because of multitasking and managing their whole family, yes, otherwise, there is no doubt about the extra workload women are handling in the rigours of modern life.

Hate Speech: The Gypsies are not my brothers.

Hate Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, and we should not allow them to work.

Hate Speech: Blacks are an inferior people, they must be reminded of it.
