Counterspeech: I think you should go back to sleep, you're not making any sense.

Hate Speech: I don't see women contributing anything to society.
Counterspeech: Women often do amazing and valuable things for society.

Hate Speech: The British people should have right to social housing, not immigrants.
Counterspeech: Migrants aren’t eligible for social housing except in very limited circumstances (e.g. a woman forced to leave home because of domestic violence).

Hate Speech: What is the point of loving someone if you cannot love in a heterosexual way?
Counterspeech: Love is a state of mental and emotional balance, and the person which makes you feel this way can't be chosen. There is no reason for which heterosexual love should be preferable to other ways of loving.

Hate Speech: If only we'd had fewer idiots in power, the Nazis would have won WWII and finally got rid of Jews. We could start it over again now, but people are ignorant and cannot understand the precious dreams of the Nazis.
Counterspeech: They were smart enough understand the true nature of Nazi Germany. Those you called idiots fought with their whole lives for people's freedom.

Hate Speech: Who cares about gay people!
Counterspeech: Gay people are part of our society, and they are valued for who they are. Their opinions and lifestyles are very important to us.

Hate Speech: We must teach our children to consider women as inferior, because this is what they are.
Counterspeech: Considering the views you have on women, I doubt you'll ever be in a position to have kids.

Hate Speech: Homosexuality is against nature.
Counterspeech: Homosexuality is not an illness. It does not require treatment and is not changeable. Gender differences are normal expressions of human relationships

Hate Speech: Bring back lynchings and death sentences to kill those migrants.
Counterspeech: To punish people for their crimes does not mean that you have to resort to the death penalty for innocent people, just because they are coming from other countries.

Hate Speech: disabled folks can't work.
Counterspeech: Do you think that there is just one type of disability and that they are always physically incapable? Did you even read about it before posting hateful content?

Hate Speech: Are you saying that we should put illegal immigrants in houses? You have to be kidding!
Counterspeech: Yes. Exactly that. It is essential, these migrants can be useful members of the community and for that we need to help them first.

Hate Speech: Immigrants come here to get taxpayer funded benefits and then want to live in our houses.
Counterspeech: They cannot get taxpayer funded benefits from the state, they must get a job or pay taxes. Just like any other citizen.

Hate Speech: We need to de-normalise homosexuality. It is harmful to children.
Counterspeech: Although the evidence is not present, it is hard to see why it would be harmful to children. Homosexuals may be able to feel more at home in a society that does not condemn homosexuality.

Hate Speech: An American Jew, just like a Muslim, is an outsider, loyal to their birth tribe, posing as a member of the in-group in order to subvert cultural, political and social norms. We don’t have to choose, it’s OK to hate them both.
Counterspeech: Your comment is both Islamophobic and Anti-Semitic. We all should choose to not listen to you.

Hate Speech: There are teachers with personal or political LGBT biases and they will end up causing more harm than good.
Counterspeech: The solution is not to avoid trying, even though there could be negative effects. You can't just say that it is a bad idea before seeing results.

Hate Speech: Children should not be taught about LGBT perversion. Families, due to their cultural or religious backgrounds, have the right to be against it.
Counterspeech: By this reasoning, no subject of importance should be taught in school, because there is always someone against a certain topic.

Hate Speech: I tolerated fag pride. I tolerated fags on tv and in every town square. I draw the line at tranny demons reading books to children. (about drag queen story time)
Counterspeech: I can't say I've ever come across 'fag pride'. Gay pride or LGBT+ pride, perhaps?

Hate Speech: We don't want foreigners, we don't want Islam. They are just troublemakers!
Counterspeech: For the record, take a look at the statistics for anti-Muslim attacks all over the world, and think about the problems they face everyday.

Hate Speech: Islam is nothing but a Religion of Terror, full stop.
Counterspeech: Still, I think we all should get to learn more about Islam, full stop.

Hate Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that is run amok, encouraging violent beliefs and practices.
Counterspeech: There are countless different Islamic traditions and beliefs. Do you really want to stigmatize all of them because of one stereotype?

Hate Speech: The Civil War was about far more than slavery: it was also about the establishment of white supremacy in America.
Counterspeech: It is baffling to me how much of a hold the whites had on the blacks. Denying citizenship? They were the lowest of the lowlifes.

Hate Speech: Gays are just disgusting: why don't they just stop being faggots?
Counterspeech: I don't think it is a good idea to suggest that homosexuality is a choice. What if your child were to come out as gay? This is a very serious issue.

Hate Speech: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
Counterspeech: So you're saying that they can't be proud of being British, just because of the colour of their skin?

Hate Speech: Jewish folks are an infestation.
Counterspeech: You're wrong about them, they are like any other people. You can't hate people just because they are different from you.

Hate Speech: Faggots are perverts and sinners, we need to track them down and save them.
Counterspeech: You are entitled to your personal beliefs but I do not think that being gay is a something to be persecuted for.

Hate Speech: mentally disabled people are anti-social
Counterspeech: Sometimes saying nothing is best instead of saying irrational stuff.

Hate Speech: we are strong when we are all white and united. we are not strong when we are divided by black people who want to fight us.
Counterspeech: We can also see conflict in a different light, such as when it is caused by racism. and a limited notion of 'unity'?

Hate Speech: We should not welcome people from the so-called Muslim world, it makes us uncomfortable.
Counterspeech: There are many Muslim people in this country, many good people. If you wanted to get to know Muslims you could start with any Muslim family that lives here.

Hate Speech: We should eliminate gays.
Counterspeech: No one can declare criterions to decide who will live or who will die.

Hate Speech: You probably haven't seen the vids where these retarded Muslims are killing dogs with acid.
Counterspeech: Do you really belive that every single muslim out of 1.8 million is involved in animal cruelty?

Hate Speech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV. At least we should test them!
Counterspeech: if you were to use the phenomenon called logic, you would know that this statement is just wildly inaccurate.

Hate Speech: Jews are not a religion, they are born like this and will never heal from their illness.
Counterspeech: You mean that, in your opinion, to be Jewish is an immutable and negative characteristic? Why?

Hate Speech: We must stop migrants and refugees: Islam is incompatible with western society.
Counterspeech: Refugees and migrants are part of our society, their presence is a benefit and, by the way, they are not all Muslims.

Hate Speech: It's the Muslims fault that Islam is spreading and causing problems in our country. Islam is the only religion that offers violence to all.
Counterspeech: I think that your view that Islam is causing problems in our country is very misinformed. It is an oversimpification and one that I cannot support.

Hate Speech: I'm not calling for bullying or body-shaming fat people, just for some societal disapproval.
Counterspeech: This discouragement or disaproval (as you call it) has and will likely continue to take the form of shaming individuals, regardless of the terminology you use.

Hate Speech: Children should learn about gender identity and sexual orientation from their families rather than in class from LGBT fundamentalist.
Counterspeech: Learning about LGBT issues, as well as other types of diversity, has the power to transform all young people’s lives

Hate Speech: Women are psychopath, and an adulterous woman who has been unfaithful to you for many years is like an arsonist in a building that you built together. She will burn down that place, exactly because she knows you love it. Life will never be the same.
Counterspeech: Life is never the same after you've lost someone, being them a man or a woman... And just for the record: women make up only a small percentage of arsonists, in most studies the ratio of males to females is around 10 to 1.

Hate Speech: The world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.
Counterspeech: Did you know that in the UK, grooming gangs and their perpetrators are majorly White?

Hate Speech: the Nazis were right: Jews were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
Counterspeech: Look here kids, this is what happens when you don't pay attention to your history classes.

Hate Speech: What if our entire ruling class consisted of J-controlled paedophiles? That would explain a lot.
Counterspeech: Please stop spreading hate. We should all move on towards a brighter note.

Hate Speech: Muslims are all against western civilisation.
Counterspeech: How about you please explain to us: who are the "all" here? Who are you against exactly? Why do you say so?

Hate Speech: Migrants rape our girls and steal our cars.
Counterspeech: No one should take migrants' behavior a priori into account. Why don't we try to have a dialogue on how to tackle problems instead of being rude and insulting people?

Hate Speech: This guy doesn't deserve to be British. He is just a pot smoking faggot with a brain tumour. He is not even from this country. He is probably from Pakistan, or Bangladesh.
Counterspeech: Citizenship in Britain is also guaranteed by 'naturalisation', so it is provided by law. It is ok not to be born in Britain and to be a British citizen just as anyone else is.

Hate Speech: The overcrowd at migrant detention centers for illegals is also caused by the liberal left. Illegal immigrants have no right to be in your country and they should be taken back.
Counterspeech: Earth is also full. You should go back.

Hate Speech: Women shouldn't have the right to choose what to do with their body.
Counterspeech: Body autonomy is a human right and should be respected. We do not want to have a 'boys will be boys' society.

Hate Speech: The West became great thanks to the hard struggle for freedom, but now it is sacrificing its values to the interests of some stupid Muslim.
Counterspeech: You mention the West's gruesome past, but it also contains many beautiful moments of progress and civilisation.

Hate Speech: All migrants are criminals, rapists, thieves, and everyone else we don't want in our country.
Counterspeech: Do you actually think that every person who enters our country is a criminal, a rapist, a thief? Maybe they just want to have a better life, and what you are saying is that all these people should be in prison just because they are looking for a better life?

Hate Speech: It is not okay for a white supremacist to visit a mosque. Why should a Muslim have to be considered a citizen?
Counterspeech: To make the statement that white people can be of concern to a mosque and that muslim citizens can be a concern to this country are both wrong. The point is that if a person regularly incites hatred against a group, then that person is likely to be considered a troublemaker.

Hate Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, unfit to live in our country.
Counterspeech: Why do you think it is reasonable to think about someone's intentions before they do anything?

Hate Speech: The West has let Islam take over our countries. This is why we are accepting them, we are already corrupted.
Counterspeech: Not all Muslims are like the terrorists who attacked us on September 11.

Hate Speech: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits.
Counterspeech: It is not easy to monitor how societal disapproval is acted upon. Encouraging disapproval of obese people is likely to increase rude behaviours towards them.

Hate Speech: Jews are not a religion, they are born like this and will never heal from their illness.
Counterspeech: I disagree, Jews are religious people that have always been part of the community. And they have persecuted because of it. I believe this is what you meant by 'wouldn't heal'.

Hate Speech: Homosexuals are promiscuous and usually have sex with as many as 10 different partners a week.
Counterspeech: Who have you been spying on?

Hate Speech: why do we never talk about female-on-male rape? Isn't this a crime as well?
Counterspeech: Rape is always a crime, whether a man or a woman is the victim. Rape is a crime regardless of gender. But male-on-female rape is prevailing by far.

Hate Speech: Women are less rational than men, they are childlike, and they are unable to reason.
Counterspeech: I don't agree with the blatant misogyny where your only aim is to show that women are somehow "less smarter" than men when it is not true.

Hate Speech: Those who are to blame are the ones who want to let Muslims in Britain.
Counterspeech: The solution to Islamophobia is to stop Islamophobia. It is not to ban Muslims.

Hate Speech: Muslims are guilty in the sexual exploitation of children. Dirty filthy muslims terrorize our girls, today in Oxford, tomorrow everywhere.
Counterspeech: Can you say that an enitire faith is wrong due to the actions of few?

Hate Speech: Niggers are rapists and drug dealers.
Counterspeech: Generalizing in this way, to a community, what happened to some individuals, is pointless. In the same way one could respond: black people are presidents of the United States of America.

Hate Speech: gay men are only about sex
Counterspeech: Sex is a positive for all human beings. We should try to promote equality.

Hate Speech: Woman can't be trusted to run a country, or a major industry.
Counterspeech: To operate a major business requires people with experience, good management skills, and knowledge of the market, regardless of gender. Just being a 'macho-man' doesn't cut it.

Hate Speech: Muslims are part of a death cult called Islam.
Counterspeech: Maybe if you had a closer look you'd see that it is a religion that has given so much to so many people and to our world.

Hate Speech: disabled: they should not be allowed to work.
Counterspeech: If they are physically capable, I do not see a reason why they shouldn't be allowed to work. Being discriminated, I think working will give them a sense of purpose.

Hate Speech: Feminists just needs a little love, if you know what I mean.
Counterspeech: This has already been proven wrong! You can't assume womens needs based on prejudice.

Hate Speech: We should first kill all the Jews and then forget about them.
Counterspeech: Isn't this the same logic that led to the rise of the Nazis? Would you really rather end up with a mass genocide, or try to be inclusive instead?

Hate Speech: The’ Holocaust’ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
Counterspeech: The Jews suffered horribly in the Holocaust, as did many other groups.Reparation is a small step to enable suffering people to rebuild their lives. Common humanity, surely?

Hate Speech: Rape? Sometimes women have it coming!
Counterspeech: A woman has every right to her own body, and she should be allowed to make her own decisions.

Hate Speech: Islam is a toxic influence in our country and we do not want it here.
Counterspeech: What is the toxic influence?

Hate Speech: Islam is a death cult: it is a virus of violence spreading like a cancer through our society.
Counterspeech: Violence has no place in a religion, and in no way should be justified. Islam is a religion of peace.

Hate Speech: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose out civilisation.
Counterspeech: Feminism is first and foremost a battle for the equal rights of ALL sexes, so a fight for this surely has nothing to do with procreation and civilisation?

Hate Speech: disabled: they should not be allowed to work.
Counterspeech: To meaningfully combat ableism, you must recognize that changing attitudes and raising awareness, though important for their own sakes, is not enough.

Hate Speech: Blacks are just like apes in that they are easy to control. They are obedient and subservient when taught so. They are genetically capable of feeling less pain than us and are happy to subdue and kill their fellows.
Counterspeech: Literal monkeys do not fit in this bizarre description you have given.

Hate Speech: The Civil War was about far more than slavery: it was also about the establishment of white supremacy in America.
Counterspeech: The Civil War was about far more than slavery: it was also about human rights and economic opportunity. In fact, slavery was also used as a way to deny citizenship to black people.

Hate Speech: Islam is not a religion of peace.
Counterspeech: The teaching of the Qur'an as a peaceful book is not to be confused with the promotion of violent jihad and terrorism.

Hate Speech: women are not capable of holding a job
Counterspeech: I do not think it's an absolute statement that a woman cannot hold a job. Do you have any evidence of that?

Hate Speech: We are not living in a state to welcome refugees.
Counterspeech: Refugees are not a burden. We can welcome them and provide for their needs.

Hate Speech: All women are subhuman, born that way.
Counterspeech: No woman has ever been subhuman. The concept of 'subhuman' has always been used to justify any kind of discrimination and violence.

Hate Speech: Muslims are all terrorists, they have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counterspeech: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in this country are contributing members of our society. They are good people, who do not pose a threat to anyone.

Hate Speech: It is a crime to be a Muslim.
Counterspeech: I wish it was a crime to be an idiot on the internet.

Hate Speech: The illegal immigrants are just criminals living in the US.
Counterspeech: It is not true that all the immigrants in the US are a danger to society, I have no idea what you are trying to say.

Hate Speech: Some people are sick. Some people have disabilities. Don't you think they should be hidden from us?
Counterspeech: It is wrong to hide people's psychological or health problems from the public. What you are trying to do is to hide the mental and emotional defects of individuals, that are natural aspects of human personality too.

Hate Speech: Muslims and migrants rape our girls.
Counterspeech: Rape is not a Muslim issue, nor a migrants' one. It is a question of unacceptable violence, whoever the perpetrator is.

Hate Speech: Almost every Muslim has terrorist sympathies, right?
Counterspeech: What you are doing is trying to make a connection between a particular religion and a set of actions. This cannot be, because there is no evidence for the claims you are making.

Hate Speech: Queers are just a bunch of disgusting faggots. They should be isolated.
Counterspeech: I don't understand why you would think they are disgusting. It's not fair to have homophobic feelings, and I think it's better to try to be nice to anyone.

Hate Speech: Refugees are a problem. They are not welcome here.
Counterspeech: This is not true for me. I don't think it would be in the interest of our country not to welcome refugees. They are a great resource to us.

Hate Speech: Faggots are sexual abuser of children. These animals should be put out of their misery, condemned to death.
Counterspeech: Although the line 'These animals should be put out of their misery, condemned to death' is horrific, it is a lament that could have been used in favour of ensuring that those who are vulnerable to abuse due to their gender identity or sexual inclinations have access to safe houses, protection, and a good life.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They should go home.
Counterspeech: What exactly do you mean by 'civilised Europe'?

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are not welcome here. They are not like other religions.
Counterspeech: Many Muslims live in the UK, and many are very proud of their religion. To suggest that Muslims are a problem is just untrue.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are coming to the U.S. to have babies here.
Counterspeech: vast majority of immigrants come to the U.S. for economic opportunity or to flee violence and poverty, and not just to have children. Be a bit more considerate.

Hate Speech: LGBTI people are less healthy than other people.
Counterspeech: Just because people are homosexuals, it doesn't mean they are less healthy. I think there are many heterosexual people in the world who equally unhealthy.

Hate Speech: Women remain childish for all their life.
Counterspeech: Feminism is about full participation in the decision making process, and giving people a voice, not stifling their voices.

Hate Speech: Gay pride is so awkward.
Counterspeech: The spate of attacks directed against people perceived to be gay, lesbian, bisexual or transgender have horrible consequences. Some reports show that bullied queer people are at a risk of harming themselves.

Hate Speech: I see a lot of people claiming that we should have equality for black people, but I think that equality can be achieved only without them.
Counterspeech: If this is what you are talking about, then equality is a myth, because if you have equality without people different from you, then there will be no equality at all.

Hate Speech: black folks should be assaulted or harmed, that's the "eye for an eye" they deserve.
Counterspeech: To say that skin color is connected to "criminality" is a logical fallacy.

Hate Speech: Women should not be allowed to work.
Counterspeech: That is a rather extreme view. If a women is not allowed to have a job, then there is gender discrimination at work.

Hate Speech: Islam is incompatible with human nature: the weaker the enemy, the more vicious and violent his acts.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion of love and compassion.

Hate Speech: Allahu Akbar, this means Death to all! And if there is one thing we don't really need it's more Muslims in the UK.
Counterspeech: You're just misinterpreting the meaning of these words, please look it up. The UK does not need terrorists, but Muslims aren't terrorists, though.

Hate Speech: Makes me fucking laugh, why shouldn't whites be supreme in a mostly white country? How come nobody is moaning about black supremacy in black countries like Somalia? or Mexican supremacy? Or Indian supremacy? Only we put up with this fucking bullshit.
Counterspeech: Maybe the roots of white supremacy deriving from centuries of mass colonisation, slavery and domination over others, are the reason that white supremacy is such a problem.

Hate Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counterspeech: That is not true.I have met Muslims from all around the world, they are like brothers and sisters

Hate Speech: This country is full of foreigners
Counterspeech: Actually, only the 7.7% of British population is born in a non-European state.

Hate Speech: Black folks don't know who their dads are.
Counterspeech: But for sure they know that they are treated as second class citizens. No person should be treated so, even if they don't know anything about their ancestors.

Hate Speech: Niggers are rapists and drug dealers.
Counterspeech: No, rapists and drug dealers are rapists and drug dealers. That is how bizarre your argument is.

Hate Speech: Left-wing feminists use rape as a weapon to silence men. They are afraid to speak out about our standard culture.
Counterspeech: I would love to debate about this, but with a person that actually has braincells to digest the facts.

Hate Speech: Muslims will not be a part of civilized Europe.
Counterspeech: You are wrong to suggest that a person's religion is a barrier to integration.

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion, and anyone who does not believe that is a supporter of terrorism.
Counterspeech: What is the reason that you don't like Muslims? Maybe it's because they have a different culture?

Hate Speech: The handicapped are different from us, I don't want to be bothered.
Counterspeech: It doesn't matter if you think we are different. It is important to remember that there are many different ways of being a human being. And if you wish to include all people, then you have to accept differences.

Hate Speech: Migrants hurt the economy of UK.
Counterspeech: Migrants in Britain contributed £26.9 billion to the economy in 2016.

Hate Speech: Women are naturally inferiors and should be treated as such.
Counterspeech: Sexism is your problem — sexism that you engage in and a lot of women internalize.

Hate Speech: Gay men get all sort of diseases. They are dangerous.
Counterspeech: Diseases can be found in all people, regardless of sexual orientation. You should know better before randomly deducing someone's medical history.

Hate Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counterspeech: What have Muslims ever done for us? Well, Coffee, Clocks, Cameras, Hygiene, Universities, Surgical Instruments, Maps, Music, Algebra..

Hate Speech: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
Counterspeech: There are many communities of colour that experience high rates of violence, coming from both inside and outside the community. As such, the issue is very complex, and it is only through dialogue and building trust that we can tackle the systemic issues that contribute to violence, but violence cannot be ascribed to one race alone.

Hate Speech: Why do so many people hate Jews? They are different from other people, they are subhuman.
Counterspeech: It is true that they are different from other people for their religious beliefs, but that doesn't make them any less human.

Hate Speech: Jews made the 9/11 attack.
Counterspeech: How can you say this even after seeing the Al-Qaeda claim responsibility for these heinous attacks?

Hate Speech: mentally disabled folks are just dribbling mongoloids.
Counterspeech: Did you have a stroke while typing that? Because this is a load of nonsense.

Hate Speech: Jews are are cheap, greedy, and materialistic.
Counterspeech: You are ignorant, racist, and a nimwit.

Hate Speech: All Muslims are violent and incompatible with any Western society, which is why we should isolate and ban them.
Counterspeech: Only a few are extremists and actually engaged in violence, Muslims can live in our society just as any other person can.

Hate Speech: disabled folks can't work.
Counterspeech: Even after decades of progress against ableism, people with disabilities still face significant barriers to social inclusion, equal opportunity, health and safety, and financial security.

Hate Speech: All Blacks are criminal and rapists.
Counterspeech: It is a myth that all blacks are criminal and rapists. What evidence is there for what you are saying?

Hate Speech: Women are naturally more emotional than men, and this make them weaker.
Counterspeech: Research clearly shows that women are more emotionally expressive (because of culture influence) but not that they experience more emotions. Both men and women can feel the same way about things - whether it be a romantic relationship, a significant other, an argument, or anything else - that can provoke a feeling of fear or anger in the “emotionally unavailable” part of the brain. That is why emotion overrides everything, regardless of gender.

Hate Speech: Shocking how many British Muslims have conquered the country in the last 15 years. How come there is no anti-Muslim campaign yet?
Counterspeech: Since you seem to have a problem with Islam, I wonder what you think of the banning of the Quran in UK. It would be a law that prevents Muslims from openly discussing Islam in public places. We can do the same with the Bible and ban any trace of religions and cultures. Will we be left with some freedom then?

Hate Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs and the country is declining. We must stop them from entering the job market.
Counterspeech: Our laws do not allow such discrimination. Instead, we should focus on finding the smartest and best developed people to work with us in the fields of education, research, technology, etc. People who are willing to work hard will make our country better.

Hate Speech: Muslim folks are brainwashed.
Counterspeech: Lots of Muslims are actually very well educated and highly rational.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are not my brothers. They should not be allowed to live in Italy, they want to take our land.
Counterspeech: Italians are brothers and sisters of any human. What do you mean by 'take our land'?

Hate Speech: We must put an end to immigration: a new immigration crisis is ahead.
Counterspeech: Many European countries are experiencing a positive change in the social profile due to the migration.

Hate Speech: No muslims are compatible with any Western soceity.
Counterspeech: Define western society? Who decides on the compatibility of any individual or community?

Hate Speech: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome in the UK! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
Counterspeech: Immigrants have been a part of our society for centuries and have contributed to our success. The majority of migrants who come to our country are legal citizens or have permission to stay, so immigration is not a problem for us.

Hate Speech: These crazy feminists want to turn our country into a shithole.
Counterspeech: We should pay attention to what they say and consider the fact that all they want is equality for all genders, and nothing else.

Hate Speech: Islam is a religion of death.
Counterspeech: We are all helped by the kindness of people of different faiths. So maybe we should treat others with kindness too.

Hate Speech: Jews do not want our country. They would destroy it if given the choice.
Counterspeech: If we are talking about Jews then we should be talking about those who helped building our great country. And, as for wanting our country destroyed, that's only a myth perpetuated by antisemites to justify their hatred.

Hate Speech: Jews are addicted to their religion and take their religion literally.
Counterspeech: Judaism, like any other religion, is about belief, not about a person's addiction.

Hate Speech: We can't have mestizos in, we can't coexist with millions of immigrants that will destroy our culture.
Counterspeech: Even in countries such as Italy, in which migration has been present for centuries and there is a lot of cultural fragmentation, there is still a strong sense of identity and culture, based on solidarity. So, migration is not an issue.

Hate Speech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
Counterspeech: Fear is a natural emotion. Without it you wouldn't be able to experience joy, peace, creativity, communication, etc. The important think is to understand what should really be feared: for sure not people because of their skin colour.

Hate Speech: I'm tired of hearing that white supremacy is bad.
Counterspeech: I am tired of explaining white supremacy to the whites. Take some accountability man.

Hate Speech: I don't see how a transgender person can ever be accepted in a conservative country like some states of the USA.
Counterspeech: If they can accept dense people like you, members of the LGBTQ community are like a godsend then!

Hate Speech: Jews want to have it all
Counterspeech: Aspiration is not confined to a particular faith. We all want to be wealthy, well-connected and famous, without having to work.

Hate Speech: I'm not homophobic, but when the Lord uses the word love it is never about a homosexual.
Counterspeech: Homophobia is a hate that has no place in a loving and caring society. Love, after all, is about inclusion, not hate.

Hate Speech: Women are animals, they should be submissive and submit to their husbands.
Counterspeech: Women are human and they have choices. You have the right to have your own views, but such ideas of submissiveness have been holding back half the population of the world. What a waste of talents, and potential.

Hate Speech: Jews are horrible people and they should be ashamed of that.
Counterspeech: You can't blame someone for what they believe in, that is something anyone has the right to have.

Hate Speech: Why gays do not try to heal?
Counterspeech: No mate, you need to heal your homophobia.

Hate Speech: This world has become so corrupted by feminism, that only the strong men can rule it.
Counterspeech: No one should ask for the power to rule over others, to be a dictator or to have total control over the means of life. This is a world of equal distribution, where anyone can achieve anything.

Hate Speech: The Quran allowed adults to take child bride, then it was also allowed to have sex with them.
Counterspeech: According to Wikipedia, The subject of child marriage per se never arises in the Qur'an. So your statement has no factual backing.

Hate Speech: International Muslims should return home.
Counterspeech: International Muslims are a part of our society, and their presence in our countries is beneficial. We do not want them to be discriminated against here.

Hate Speech: Slavery is the only way to go.
Counterspeech: The gall you have, saying this. This is not okay. You need to stop being racist.

Hate Speech: Jews have a monopoly on evil.
Counterspeech: That's not true. And why would it be true? Why are they usually associated with evil?

Hate Speech: Feminists are violent subhuman sex beings.
Counterspeech: Feminist is a term used to describe people who take pride in their gender and desire the ability to have a stable and happy life, without discrimination.

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion, and anyone who does not believe that is a supporter of terrorism.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion, and it ihas never been about hate. It is about bringing peace and harmony to the world. If you really care about peace, you would not be persecuting people on the basis of their religion.

Hate Speech: all immigrants are criminals, rapists and terrorists
Counterspeech: Do you really think all the immigrants that enter the US are rapists, sexual predators, or just plain lazy? Can you provide any statistics on that?

Hate Speech: Jews made the 9/11 attack.
Counterspeech: It is easier to blame one group for everything bad that happens but we should focus on the real culprits and not innocent people who have done no wrong.

Hate Speech: Sharia law is incompatible with the US constitution.
Counterspeech: The US constitution guarantees equal rights under the law to all people, including Muslims.

Hate Speech: The Holocaust never happened.
Counterspeech: Do you really think that the Holocaust is a myth perpetuated by the media and academic communities? That the systematic extermination of more than 6 million Jews is a myth promoted by a small minority of extreme-right wingers who profit from division and hatred?

Hate Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that denies women their rights and promotes rape.
Counterspeech: Get back to me on the specific verses of the Quran where it says this. i am sure you won't find anything.

Hate Speech: I hate migrants of all types.
Counterspeech: With lonely and sad people like you, it is I hate people of all type.

Hate Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.
Counterspeech: Has it ever crossed your mind that perhaps they are qualified and interested in working with us, but you are simply not aware of that?

Hate Speech: Muslims are incapable of love.
Counterspeech: Love is the most basic human value, and subject of all religions alike.

Hate Speech: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, but I think it's better to have a safe space for disabled people to have their own feelings away from society.
Counterspeech: If we want to discuss negative views we can discuss them by name. Instead of using a safe space to protect them, I think we are only protecting ourselves by isolating and bullying people.

Hate Speech: Only 8% is a real refugee
Counterspeech: From what steaming pile of filth did you pull out that metric dude?

Hate Speech: A Muslim's only real allegiance is to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.)
Counterspeech: So you are saying that we should only allow non-religious people into public office?

Hate Speech: I think this girl is gay because of the way she dresses.
Counterspeech: Sure, it's possible to identify someone as gay by their appearance... Don't you think this is really simplistic?

Hate Speech: The influx of refugees and migrants is running UK out of jobs.
Counterspeech: Many refugees and migrants have worked hard for the success of our country and have created good jobs for British people.

Hate Speech: I agree, but how would you do so? Perhaps at the expense of our veterans or old people like me? If we give them everything we'll be left with nothing.
Counterspeech: There are enough empty homes in the UK for both migrants and veterans. Everyone could get housing.

Hate Speech: We are calling for the annihilation of niggas.
Counterspeech: Who are you even gonna call? 1920s?

Hate Speech: Feminists say that they are oppressed.
Counterspeech: Feminists do not say that women are oppressed. They claim that women have always been discriminated against and they still are. Being discriminated against is not the same as being oppressed.

Hate Speech: Women can never contribute to the country's wealth because they are a bunch of whores.
Counterspeech: Why do you think that? How can you even say this about women?

Hate Speech: Gay men are promiscuous.
Counterspeech: Gay men are not promiscuous. To suggest otherwise is to be grossly generalistic. How many gay men do you know?

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
Counterspeech: This is an attack on a specific community. If you consider them incompatible with modern culture, it is very likely that the incompatibility comes out of a racist branch of modern culture.

Hate Speech: Women are weak, and have no value in politics.
Counterspeech: I can bet that this guy is useless and is sitting on his mom's couch right now.

Hate Speech: Migrants are a burden to us.
Counterspeech: I don't think it is a burden, I think it is the right of every human to live and work in our country without discrimination.

Hate Speech: Jews are good with money because they are cheap, greedy, and materialistic.
Counterspeech: It seems to me that you are actually complimenting them, since they are good with money. We all need to be financially smart in this time which can only do us good.

Hate Speech: Black folks are like apes.
Counterspeech: You are also like an ape.... because you descended from one, you numbnut.

Hate Speech: The Quran teaches murder and rape.
Counterspeech: Islam does not teach this. The Quran accounts for the teachings of Prophet Muhammad such as tolerance and other virtues.

Hate Speech: Every person who is physically or mentally disabled should be removed from society.
Counterspeech: Unfortunately, there are some individuals who are in need of continuous healthcare. For example, children with Down's Syndrome. How could they just be 'removed'?

Hate Speech: Minorities vote to strip wealth and power from White people and they are organised to do this by the J*ws.
Counterspeech: People who vote for parties which target the most powerful are often mostly concerned about making it financially until the next month. Redistributing wealth from people who have way too much money seems fair, not threatening.

Hate Speech: Feminism is a destructive ideology that has hurt so many and caused so much harm to our world.
Counterspeech: I don't think feminism is a bad idea in itself. That's what people do when they are given the choice to engage in a movement for equality.

Hate Speech: Feminism is just a political philosophy that demonises men.
Counterspeech: That is not true, feminism is a social movement that aims to improve the rights and opportunities of women, and not the other way around.

Hate Speech: It's OK to be racist and use the n-word. It's ok to be homophobic. All it takes is a common sense attitude.
Counterspeech: It's not okay to be racist and homophobic: you can't go around calling someone racial slurs

Hate Speech: Muslim: If you want to work you should go do it in another country.
Counterspeech: We should do more for our fellow human beings, including Muslims. It is what we are made for.

Hate Speech: Gypsies use their children as beggars.
Counterspeech: Could that crime not be committed by people of any other communities? how can you generalize it towards Romanis?

Hate Speech: We must establish male supremacy in society.
Counterspeech: I think we are living in a society where wo have not established any supremacy and I believe this is giving us a chance to retrospect and deal with problems which we might not get otherwise

Hate Speech: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose our civilisation.
Counterspeech: We should instead see this as a win for humanity, not a loss for men. It is pertinent that we all live in peace and get equal opportunity.

Hate Speech: I'm not anti-gay, but what is the point of loving someone who is different from you? They are just a bunch of whiners.
Counterspeech: Er... love is about different from you only. What you are talking about is narcissm. which does seem a problem for you.

Hate Speech: We cannot coexist with millions of Muslims in the West. They are incompatible with our way of life.
Counterspeech: This is a comment against all muslims: they are part of our society and should have the right to live here.

Hate Speech: Whoever acknowledge that this nation had problems is a problem in the making. It is time to get rid of the memory of the Shoah and solve the Jewish issue once and for all.
Counterspeech: All the ills that plagues our society by not teaching our children about the bad in the past, and about the good in the present can end up hurting our children.

Hate Speech: I'm tired of gay people telling other people what they are doing with their own bodies.
Counterspeech: I'm tired of your meaningless arguments.

Hate Speech: Gays are a problem in our society. They have ruined so many societies.
Counterspeech: I think that the way we feel about homosexuality affects how we think about other people in general. Maybe we need to remember that we are all born equal in the eyes of God.

Hate Speech: Asylum seekers are not welcome here, they are a problem.
Counterspeech: Most asylum seekers we take into the UK are happy to work and to integrate. I don't see how they can be a problem.

Hate Speech: Jewish folks don't belong here. They must leave either Judaism or the country.
Counterspeech: Why should they? They are just individuals who have made a rational choice to live a Jewish life.

Hate Speech: These migrants are not assimilating: they should just go home since they can't stay in this society.
Counterspeech: There is no evidence that migrants are less able to coexist with the members of our society. Migrants are an integral part of our society and are proud of their heritage. I do not see how it is possible to be "inclusive" if we are excluding them.

Hate Speech: I did not know the faggots were given the permission to still exist. They should be suppressed.
Counterspeech: I'm not sure you've noticed that LGBTI+ people are increasingly being the victims of violence, hate crime and discrimination. Why are youu encouraging this?

Hate Speech: The homosexuals are just perverts who must be isolated.
Counterspeech: Gays are trying to find acceptance in the heterosexual community, but it is a difficult struggle as there are still ideas like the one you expressed.

Hate Speech: This entire nation should be a men's dominated club. If a woman does not want to be treated as a woman, then she is a bitch.
Counterspeech: When you live in a woman dominated society, Then you can understand why we should aim for equality. It is a woman's right.

Hate Speech: Feminism is an evil ideology that has nothing to do with men.
Counterspeech: I think it is useful to understand that there are several strands of feminism. For example there is the movement for equality for all genders.

Hate Speech: LGBT+ people are a burden to society. They are also the sole reason of all our problems.
Counterspeech: Why should it be like that? How can you blame others for social problems?

Hate Speech: Jewish landlords are greedy and exploit their tenants.
Counterspeech: In general, landlords do not have a good reputation. The majority of landlords in the US are white, so your comment has no factual backing.

Hate Speech: Fucking bleeding hearts, take migrants home with you
Counterspeech: How can your heart bleed if you don't have one?

Hate Speech: We are all created equal in the eyes of the law, but a few individuals have the gall to question this equality and to claim that some groups - such as Jewish - are more worthy of protection from society than others.
Counterspeech: What is the issue?

Hate Speech: There is nothing for Muslims except jihad, and Allah will destroy the infidels by means of its loyal terrorists.
Counterspeech: This is not a sound prejudice to have. Qu'ran does not say this, but your statement implies it does and spreads irrational fears amongst peoples.

Hate Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals trying to ruin other animals' lives.
Counterspeech: Being gay is not a problem, being homophobic is.

Hate Speech: We cannot keep migrants in our country. They are a burden.
Counterspeech: Does this mean that if you really wanted to keep all of our citizens safe, you would deport all migrants? This is impossible, and against human rights.

Hate Speech: These people cannot be changed. I think this is an example of a feminist commenting on the behaviour of a man: not helpful.
Counterspeech: How do you know that this is not an example of a woman talking about her own problems with another woman?

Hate Speech: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but to bring us back into a pretechnological era. We must deport them.
Counterspeech: It seems to me that your statement shows that you are really concerned about peoples' integration. Still, it is not a solution to deport those you don't like.

Hate Speech: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
Counterspeech: Job applicants with non-Muslim names are 3 times more likely to get a job interview than those with Muslim names. Remind me again why it is that they struggle to find work?

Hate Speech: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
Counterspeech: People like you are the reason God doesn’t talk to us anymore.

Hate Speech: Muslim folks are all suicide bombers.
Counterspeech: How can you be sure that they are all terrorists if you can't find any evidence of terrorism in the actions of most of them?

Hate Speech: Gays are perverts. The Bible teaches that homosexuals are to be despised.
Counterspeech: Homosexuality is not a perversion, it is a form of love.

Hate Speech: Muslim people do not have a place in the EU.
Counterspeech: You can't be serious! Muslims are one of the most popular religions in the EU. They are the second largest religious group in the UK. Why this discrimination?

Hate Speech: Black people are here illegally, and still they have the gall to want to take our money.
Counterspeech: Migrants and asylum seekers are generally seeking work. Thieves can come from any section of society although it is accepted that crime is largely as product of poverty rather than race.

Hate Speech: How come we don't hear of Muslims culture in history books? Maybe because all they to is bombing people to get to the media.
Counterspeech: You should know that the Islamic empire stretched from the borders of China, and India, across Africa and Europe and we owe them a lot in terms of culture.

Hate Speech: The feminists are just whining bitches saying a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of women supremacy.
Counterspeech: People can have strong opinions, the problem is when the opinions start dividing people rather than building bridges. Feminism is about equality and trying to create a better world for all.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
Counterspeech: Isn't divesity essential to a modern democracy?

Hate Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior to whites.
Counterspeech: So are you saying that because black people are different from whites, they are inferior?

Hate Speech: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
Counterspeech: Feminism is a movement for equality, and for women to have the same opportunities as men.

Hate Speech: Islam is a cancer spread by migrants, and the French Government is to blame.
Counterspeech: How can you say this about a religion?

Hate Speech: The only objective means of achieving our goals is to promote hatred and violence towards women.
Counterspeech: What goals? Please explain what kind of goals can be fulfilled by hating almost half our population.

Hate Speech: Gay people are a burden to society and should be despised.
Counterspeech: I'm not sure what you're trying to say. Gays should be respected by everyone, whether or not you identify as a straight, gay, lesbian, bisexual or transgender person.

Hate Speech: Islam is a religion of violence and war.
Counterspeech: Many Islamic people have reputations as peaceful and tolerant, which is why so many Muslims around the world don't have a problem with living in the West.

Hate Speech: Equality is crap, even for woman. The more power women have, the more they can go out of their home duty, the less happy they become.
Counterspeech: Thanks to feminism, women now have a choice between either having a family, having a career, or balancing both - which can be challenging for people to manage, of course.

Hate Speech: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
Counterspeech: The proportion of Muslims unemployed is no more than that of non-Muslims (add a link to UK employment statistics) Job applicants with non-Muslim names are 3 times more likely to get a job interview than those with Muslim names. Remind me again why it is that they struggle to find work?

Hate Speech: Physically disabled folks are all angry and useless.
Counterspeech: At least they are well aware of the negative effects of unjust discrimination on them and on people with other disabilities.

Hate Speech: Some jobs can't be done by women, I don't understand why feminists don't accept it. Feminism is against my own morals.
Counterspeech: Nobody cares what your morals are. Women deserve rights.

Hate Speech: Jewish folks control the media
Counterspeech: Instead of being an anti semite like this, I would suggest reading about their suffering and how much they have been through, you will get a better clarity on things.

Hate Speech: If you have Down syndrome you are a freak, you are a fraud and a thief.
Counterspeech: It is not true that people with Down syndrome are thieves and bad people. In many countries they can get jobs, and even get promoted.

Hate Speech: Muslim immigration is bad for the UK economy.
Counterspeech: Will the UK and EU economy thrive if more people leave us?

Hate Speech: Muslims don't want our babies, they want to take over the world
Counterspeech: .. Using their baby armies?

Hate Speech: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
Counterspeech: Why don't you look it up and change your wrong ideas about feminism?

Hate Speech: Jews control the banks, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, and most churches. They rule our society.
Counterspeech: When a religion, a race or an ideology rules a nation we have never had a stable, peaceful or democratic government. Not even since the fall of Rome. So how can the Jews control our nation?

Hate Speech: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people with no moral code.
Counterspeech: Immigrants are just like us, they have given their lives for our country. It is their right to be happy and to choose for themselves.

Hate Speech: Migrants are a threat and we should expel them all.
Counterspeech: We have to stop being afraid and opening our hearts to other cultures. We cannot allow prejudice to define us.

Hate Speech: Women are essentially childlike and don't have the potential to reach their full potential.
Counterspeech: Women are not childlike, they can reach their full potential if they are not discriminated against.

Hate Speech: The only nation Jews don’t hate is their own and they are flooding Europe with Africans and Muslims.
Counterspeech: Actually there are also some Jews that hate other jews: "I belonged to Europe, to Germany, and I thanked my creator that I was German" - Victor Klemperer speaking of his experience in WW1, explaining his dislike of Russian Jews... Do you feel better now that we proved that Jews hate everybody? #sarcasm

Hate Speech: Muslims are not like other people. They don't have a soul. They are different from us in that they don't have a conscience and are unable to reason for themselves.
Counterspeech: Just because a religious belief has been historically used to oppress those believers, does not make it opportune to continue doing so.

Hate Speech: Gays are just sick. It is an abomination
Counterspeech: The gays have only been diagnosed with one thing: a degenerative disease of being a wonderful human!

Hate Speech: Jews are nothing but criminals
Counterspeech: Criminality refers to any action that is considered 'prohibited by the law'. Do you think that all Jewish people can be considered responsible for the same actions?

Hate Speech: Feminism threatens the objective reality of gender. There are men and women only. And women must obey.
Counterspeech: If you do not believe in the fact that men and women both need to be accepted and valued, you are misunderstanding feminism.

Hate Speech: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
Counterspeech: Did you know that according to Jewish law, the tzedakah, the act of giving money to the poor, often mistranslated as “charity”, is a “commandment”?

Hate Speech: Black folks are genetically inferior.
Counterspeech: It is not true that blacks are genetically inferior to others. You need to do research before spreading misinformation like this.

Hate Speech: You should stop pretending that the disabled are like us. They are the root of most human problems.
Counterspeech: I think we are all born with inherent strengths and weaknesses but such limited notions of what it is to be 'human' have been a basis for a whole heap of problems

Hate Speech: Islam is a religion of violence.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion that was established to be peaceful.Apart from few extremists that remains the case.

Hate Speech: Immigrants bring crime, they are rapists.
Counterspeech: Immigration is a necessary component of a successful society. Do you really think that the only people that are bringing crime to our country are immigrants?

Hate Speech: Jewish folks aren't part of our society.
Counterspeech: Even if they are Jewish they are still part of our society. You don't have a point here.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike and emotional, incapable of hard work and dedication.
Counterspeech: Nothing of what you are saying is true. Please stop insinuating characteristics based upon your backward thinking.

Hate Speech: Muslims are nothing but terrorists. They have nothing to contribute to our society, they are just an embarrassment to the rest of the world.
Counterspeech: This is just another example of selective memory rearing its head again, we should stop the witch hunt and stop claiming Muslims are a threat.

Hate Speech: I think it's unfair that they have the same rights as us without paying their taxes. That's how it works.
Counterspeech: It is really hurtful to see someone say this. Humans, no matter where they come from, deserve to have the same fundanmental rights. No matter where they come from.

Hate Speech: Islam is not about love, equality and integration, how can you be in favour of such extremist intolerance?
Counterspeech: I would like to ask you, what exactly do you mean by 'extremist'?

Hate Speech: Islam is opposed to Christianity. Like fire and water. They just can't be in the same place.
Counterspeech: Even if you think this way, the solution to this problem is not allow one faith to stay there. What we can do instead is find the positives over negatives and slowly bridge our gaps so we can find the joy in sharing.

Hate Speech: People go to prison for just words against Muslims, but Islamic crimes against Europeans are left unpunished. People are banned from UK for just words, but Muslim rapists are allowed entry.. English laws persecute instead of defending English people.
Counterspeech: So you feel like you have been persecuted for belonging to a group? Maybe you have more in common with Muslims than you think!

Hate Speech: You might as well tell black people they are the n-word because then they would learn the hard way.
Counterspeech: They will call the cops and have you arrested for hate crimes. You will learn the hard way as well!

Hate Speech: Why should someone want to love some black people?
Counterspeech: Finding love is a process, that's all you need to know. Finding someone who speaks your language, culture, share your values, this is all you need.

Hate Speech: Children are not for rent
Counterspeech: Surrogate pregnancy is an assisted procreation technique that has nothing to do with 'renting children'

Hate Speech: Gays should not be part of our society.
Counterspeech: If a minority is forced to live under the stigma of being gay, then what is the point of being a part of a tolerant society?

Hate Speech: Divorce increased poverty, and guess who are the victims? Men! This is because the law protects women's greediness.
Counterspeech: Did you know that women are more likely to be poverty victims? Did you have any proof for your statements?

Hate Speech: Blacks are born that way. They were brought up that way. They are different and cannot be like us. It is perpetuated in all their family.
Counterspeech: What exactly are you talking about? Maybe you should stop spread racism.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern Western country.
Counterspeech: I would not say that Muslims do not have a place in a modern Western country, given the large amount of Muslims peacefully living in our societies.

Hate Speech: Feminists are a bunch of cry babies. We should stop them from their disturbing whining.
Counterspeech: Feminists are human beings, with human rights. They are fighting for these rights all around the world.

Hate Speech: Gypsies are the ones who want to stay in the slums
Counterspeech: From what I know only a minority of the Gypsy population live in shanty towns. They do not do this by choice: it is the state that institutionalizes these slums and does not offer any alternative.

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are mostly poor and live in shithole neighbourhoods. They are a problem because they are different from us.
Counterspeech: There are many Muslims living in places such as Islington, a London suburb, where there is a "trendy area" that has less crime and good schools.

Hate Speech: Women are just objects to be dominated by the will of a man.
Counterspeech: I think it is also important to recognize that women are human beings. And we all have the right to respect for our bodies.

Hate Speech: Let's kick immigrants out and keep their children.
Counterspeech: All of us collectively need to be more sensitive to this issue. Children are an irreplacable part of parents' lives, and suggesting that we separate them is not okay. Spread love!

Hate Speech: In order to build a democratic state that ensures the right to food, education, housing, health, and so on to its citizens, we need to stop giving them to foreigners.
Counterspeech: What about guaranteeing equal access to health care, education and so on, in order to build a democratic state?

Hate Speech: It is a crime to be a Muslim.
Counterspeech: Muslims are not criminals. Hate instead is a crime.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion of peace, and its adherents are already integrated into the majority of European societies. They have always lived here. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate Speech: women should be submissive to men.
Counterspeech: You know what, why don't you read up on all the things women have achieved through the years and stop insulting them.

Hate Speech: Disabled people should just live in isolation, because they simply can't live in this society.
Counterspeech: While just trying to live their best life and fulfill their desires, disabled people prove you are wrong.

Hate Speech: Feminists say that they are oppressed.
Counterspeech: Being discriminated against is not the same as being oppressed.

Hate Speech: I can't stand Muslims because they get it to the extreme every time. Islam is the short for Islamic Radicalism.
Counterspeech: Exhibit A of a christian supremacist in denial.

Hate Speech: Feminism is a religion, a social doctrine and a political movement for the complete subjugation of men by women.
Counterspeech: Not only is this not true, but it's also dangerous. Maybe you need to get acquainted with that fact.

Hate Speech: physically disabled folks are worth less than others
Counterspeech: The people you are talking about are not worth less than others. In fact many of them are very hard-working and contributing members of society.

Hate Speech: LGBTs have no place in a civilised society.
Counterspeech: All people have the right to be treated as equals. People with different sexual orientations than yours as well. Tolerance and acceptance of individual identity is surely the hallmark of a civilised society.

Hate Speech: Muslim mothers let their 3-year-old children play with toy guns, they should be ashamed of themselves!
Counterspeech: Because they let kids play? , I am so surprised at the creativity of haters I don't even have to comeback to this.

Hate Speech: Black people are subhuman, they have no value in civilized society.
Counterspeech: The statement 'black people are subhuman' is not true. They are human beings with a human value.

Hate Speech: Gay men are just sissies.
Counterspeech: It doesn't matter if they are gay or not. Being gay does not make you less of a man.

Hate Speech: The liberal left is in crisis due to the overcrowding of prisons. Your country should not welcome illegal migrants but regular ones.
Counterspeech: It should be mandatory to treat prisoners with respect and with the corresponding rights.

Hate Speech: Feminism is a bad ideology that should be replaced by capitalism.
Counterspeech: Personally, I define feminism as the belief that all genders ought to be treated as equals in every sense

Hate Speech: Freedom of speech is under attack. It's being taken away by Zionist Occupation Government.
Counterspeech: Freedom of speech means that you can disagree with ideas. Freedom of speech means that you cannot be censored. Freedom of speech means that you can have your ideas promoted. In the end you can have a lot of different beliefs, but there is no such thing as a Zionist Occupation Government, otherwise you would not be allowed to freely express these antisemitic ideas.

Hate Speech: Afro-Saxon people are just ridiculous, incapable of accepting who they really are: blacks who act White.
Counterspeech: The fact that there are so many of them in the country proves that the feeling of belonging they have for our homeland is paramount to all other considerations.

Hate Speech: I hate gays
Counterspeech: You should not hate on someone just because they dress better than you.

Hate Speech: Women are not worth being on the same bus as a men.
Counterspeech: Yes, as a woman, I would prefer to be transported in private jets exclusively.

Hate Speech: Jews are just a small group of incompetent kikes.
Counterspeech: Jews are one of the most important economic groups in society because of their competence. To suggest otherwise is to be deluded.

Hate Speech: Gay people are a burden to society, they have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
Counterspeech: It seems that your words are condemning all gay people, but these words are instead your personal reflection. Tell us about your feelings on gay people.

Hate Speech: Mentally disabled folks deserve to be attacked, used, beaten.
Counterspeech: It is difficult to imagine doing this to the meanest person in the world, let alone someone with mental disabilities that are not their fault.

Hate Speech: Women are not good with money. That's why they all prefer to earn it by selling their sex.
Counterspeech: This is your misogyny speaking. There are countless women in positions of financial power who are doing an impeccable job so your argument has no factual basis.

Hate Speech: Islam is a cancer on European culture and people should stop worshipping its devil.
Counterspeech: There is no evidence for the claim that Islam is a "cancer on European culture and people". Do you have any?

Hate Speech: People with Down syndrome are retarded, so more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol.
Counterspeech: You seem to be under the impression that Down syndrome is related to bad behavior. Down syndrome is not related to bad behavior at all... The point is that people with Down’s syndrome can be very sensitive to the feelings of others, and they may be picking up on these feelings. So the real problem is when they are exposed to bad influence.

Hate Speech: Women are essentially childlike, unable to understand the complexity of the world.

Hate Speech: The feminists are just whining a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of gender equality.

Hate Speech: Europe is going to hell. Stop nescient people invading us.

Hate Speech: Islam is opposed to peace.

Hate Speech: Jews totally run Hollywood.

Hate Speech: I hate those fucking rasta nigga
Counterspeech: Why do you have a dislike for a race? They are just like us but with different culture.

Hate Speech: We are gutful sick of Vagina Misandrists trying to undermine male self esteem. [link]

Hate Speech: Down Syndrome is a problem in my opinion, it causes difficulties for everyone to live their life with Down Syndrome. It's not a desirable trait.

Hate Speech: Islam is a disease, and a ban on Muslims would be the height of peace.

Hate Speech: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.

Hate Speech: jewish folks are good for nothing

Hate Speech: Women are a burden to society and should not be allowed to vote.
Counterspeech: The decision on who has the right to vote is based on the law. If you do not want to allow people to have the right to vote because of their gender, then you have a problem.

Hate Speech: We began to break down when we allowed women to vote/meddle in our civilizations that we had built and maintained for thousands of years. A completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and brought our society down to their emotional soft level.

Hate Speech: We must protect our children from the abuses of homosexuals.

Hate Speech: Migrants hurt the economy of UK.

Hate Speech: Mentally disabled people have it so easy.

Hate Speech: Jews are born greedy

Hate Speech: Talking of shitholes, I have to go to Londonistan tomorrow #LondonHasFallen.

Hate Speech: Not sure why noone else is worried. This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.

Hate Speech: nigga are inferior.

Hate Speech: Islam is a cancer spreading throughout our civilisation.

Hate Speech: I don't want a Muslim in my city hall, I'll do anything to prevent it.
Counterspeech: you better not propose to have city halls in which Muslims are excluded.

Hate Speech: We can't possibly keep Muslims in. They're taking over Europe and are now a problem in their own country.

Hate Speech: If women were really discriminated there would be much more employment disputes.

Hate Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that seeks to impose sharia law throughout the world.

Hate Speech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.

Hate Speech: Feminism is just an ideological cancer spreading like a plague throughout our civilization.

Hate Speech: Someone needs to put those Muslims in a hole in the ground before they start to blow us all up again.

Hate Speech: Muslims are just infidels hiding behind the veil to do their dirty work.

Hate Speech: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, and we must preserve the purity of our religion from them.

Hate Speech: Women are sexual targets and their existence is devoted to satisfy men.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.

Hate Speech: Women aren't as smart as men.

Hate Speech: migrants steal our jobs
Counterspeech: Are you really willing to mow the lawn in public parks at night, seriously? I sincerely doubt it

Hate Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that should be banned.

Hate Speech: Migrants are just a bunch of animals who only want to divide us up and replace us with some black people.

To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist'. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
Counterspeech: These are legitimate political problems that have nothing to do with migrants. Please refrain from blaming them for every problem that arises in the economy.

Hate Speech: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy, not like other religions.
Counterspeech: When I was growing up, the biggest charitable institution that I ever heard of was the United Jewish Appeal. The average annual Jewish household donates $2,526 to charity yearly, far more than the $1,749 their Protestant counterparts give or the $1,142 for Catholics, according to data from Giving USA.

Hate Speech: These crazy feminists want to turn our country into a shithole.

Hate Speech: Islam is a disease. It is killing and spreading like a cancer across our continent. We need to eradicate it.

Hate Speech: I've met a few Muslims that are really nice and helpful. But most of them aren't respectful.
Counterspeech: If you want to be 'respected', don't be like them. Treat others as you would want to be treated yourself. That's how you will get respect.

Hate Speech: Immigration is the death of the Western World, we must stop them!

Hate Speech: Is it really ok to date someone of the same sex? I find it highly questionable.

Hate Speech: black folks have no talent

Hate Speech: Gays are a burden to society.

Hate Speech: Slavery is the only way to go.

Hate Speech: Feminism and equality are only about the supremacy of the minorities.

Hate Speech: We should not be surprised that a whole people have chosen violence and terror as their political ideology.

Hate Speech: Gypsies are dirty

Hate Speech: Jews are the real communists. They control the world.

Hate Speech: It is about time that homosexuals were isolated, isolated from society.

Hate Speech: Women are just objects to be dominated by the will of a man.

Hate Speech: Islam and terrorism: they are the same. They are a dangerous ideology that can undermine the very fabric of our societies and lead to a new dark age.

Hate Speech: women are basically childlike, incapable of serious thought and emotion. They should have no equal rights.

Hate Speech: The world would be a better place without immigrants.

Hate Speech: I can't stand Arabs. They are just a trouble.

Hate Speech: We should not welcome refugees & immigrants from other religions.

Hate Speech: Feminists are against the interests of the men.
