Counterspeech: have you considered equality rather than supremacy?

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern country. I care for religion but they simply can't be accepted.
Counterspeech: If you really cared about religion, you would see that the vast majority of Muslims are happy and integrated in our society.

Hate Speech: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
Counterspeech: This looks like a conspiracy theory with no proof.

Hate Speech: I am offended by the presence of Muslims in Britain. Where is the sense in this faiths mixture? Nothing good is going to happen. They are ashamed of their religion, and when someone feels insecure, they are more likely to attack because they have nothing to lose.
Counterspeech: If people were to be genuinely offended by sombody else's different religion, then I do not think the vast majority of Muslims in Britain would be deeply offended by your religion either.

Hate Speech: Muslims are a cancer spreading around the world.
Counterspeech: Don't you believe that this statement is tragic and destructive to humanity?

Hate Speech: Foreigners enjoy the warm political climate but are not welcome here.
Counterspeech: The immigrants who have settled here have helped create a valuable and inclusive society. For this I thank them, and for that I pray that they continue to do so.

Hate Speech: Some salesmen are annoying. They are so gay. Store managers should really revise their HR.
Counterspeech: In some countries, if you are gay you can be fired from your job, you can lose your home, and you can even be jailed. Gays are not allowed to live their lives. In 72 countries in the world LGBT+ people are not welcome. This is an understatement, because in some there is even death penalty. The question is: why are they so annoying to you?

Hate Speech: Jews cannot be patriots, since their allegiance will always be to the state of Israel.
Counterspeech: My best friend is Jewish, she volunteers to help woman, disadvantages children, and her whole family work to make the UK a better place.

Hate Speech: The Muslims have taken over Europe.
Counterspeech: Muslims have always been part of Europe. They have the same culture, language and identity as us. They are included in the European Union, and are not 'taking over' it.

Hate Speech: All women are subhuman, but want to take over from men.
Counterspeech: The idea that there is such a thing as "women hating men", or "women are inherently subhuman", is just a completely unfounded and baseless stereotype that has been used as an excuse to justify a lot of bad things, from violence to rape culture.

Hate Speech: Migrants without permission to stay can still access our welfare
Counterspeech: Tha is not true: migrants face document checks before they can get tenancies. The same holds when they use the NHS.

Hate Speech: Jews are making too much money.
Counterspeech: I don't think it is possible to make more money just by being born in a religion or changing into one which your statement seems to imply here.

Hate Speech: Migrants are violent people, and they are dangerous to us.
Counterspeech: So you think refugees are a danger to our country? I don't think so! They are just people fleeing terrible things. They are not a threat to us.

Hate Speech: We must allow men to have complete moral and intellectual superiority. This because they are superior to women.
Counterspeech: How can you justify this discriminatory attitude?

Hate Speech: Foreigners on UK benefits leaps 41% in 5 years with over 400K now handed payouts. This nonsense has got to stop.
Counterspeech: You seem to be worried about government expenditure… it has actually been shown that,over time, migration reduces pressure on government spending – because migrants are more likely to be young adult workers.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with democracy.
Counterspeech: How about trying to get along with other people of different religions, as is supposed to happen in civilised Europe?

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
Counterspeech: Soft and emotional is an umbrella term that covers everything: we all experience emotions, soft and emotional is a fact of life.

Hate Speech: Jewish people are featured in the top roles of most companies just because of their race.
Counterspeech: Jews work hard to get to where they are, just as anyone else does, and they don't deserve discrimination for this.

Hate Speech: We have become so arrogant, we allow people from other cultures to coexist with us.
Counterspeech: To allow other cultures to coexist is a good thing, why should we stop people from getting to know each other?

Hate Speech: Women are less intelligent than men and deserve what they get.
Counterspeech: You, on the other hand, are less intelligent than a rock.

Hate Speech: Those jews ran the world from their high rise apartment in 5 continents and still they cannot get the Nobel Prize for Medicine.
Counterspeech: Actually, 54 Jewish people have been awarded with the Nobel Prize for 'Physiology or medicine' so far. Among those: Michael Rosbash, Rita Levi Montalcini and Arthur Kornberg.

Hate Speech: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
Counterspeech: It is also a fact that African Americans are a majority when we consider innocent defendants (i.e. a person wrongfully convicted of murder and later exonerated). Innocent black people are about seven times more likely to be convicted of murder than innocent white people.

Hate Speech: Immigration (particularly from Muslim countries) undermines the fabric of our society, decimates local jobs and squanders public money.
Counterspeech: Immigrants have a right to settle in a given country, and their presence can create and maintain a positive effect on our society.

Hate Speech: Muslim people do not have a place in the EU.
Counterspeech: In our society we are proud of our diversity. Muslims are not an exception to us.

Hate Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any modern secular state.
Counterspeech: All religions are compatible with any modern secular state. So Islam is an example of this.

Hate Speech: Muslim folks are all terrorists.
Counterspeech: It is not true that all muslims are terrorists. What evidence do you have of it?

Hate Speech: Afro-Caribbean people are nothing but trouble. They have no place in civilized societies like ours in Europe.
Counterspeech: So you think that they are to blame for the racial intolerance that has been seen in many European countries?

Hate Speech: A male need a woman. Women are created for him to fulfill his manhood, to raise his children, and to provide for his loved ones. And not to mention we can have sex to procreate and heal the world.
Counterspeech: The way that you are taking into account only one of the types of people, for example men and assuming their needs this way, won't heal the world.

Hate Speech: Whenever Islam is threatened by another religion, it will rise up and take over the world.
Counterspeech: A religion cannot take over others. You have the freedom of chosing your own religion.

Hate Speech: The world would be a better place without Jews.
Counterspeech: Jews are part of our society and they should be respected, we can't tolerate intolerance towards people with different beliefs.

Hate Speech: Migrants hurt the economy.
Counterspeech: When people think of immigrants in relation to the British economy, they often think of crime, poverty and so on. But the reality is that the picture both in numbers and for skilled labour is quite the opposite. Migrants not only contribute to the economy as laborforce but also as employers creating job opportunities.

Hate Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counterspeech: Even if they had nothing concrete to contribute to our society (which is false), they still have religion. In my opinion, the cultural contribution is priceless and deserves respect.

Hate Speech: Muslim invasion in Europe: they have no place in civilised Europe.
Counterspeech: Well, Western democracies have always had Muslims in them, and they are a lot better off for it.

Hate Speech: Mentally disabled folks are messed up.
Counterspeech: What do you mean by "messed up"? Many of us are "messed up" as well. So, either we are all "messed up" because there are some who are stating this, or no one is. I would prefer the second option.

Hate Speech: Women are a burden to society and should not be allowed to vote.
Counterspeech: If you do not want to allow people to have the right to vote because of their gender, then you have a problem.

Hate Speech: Muslim folks are sub-human.
Counterspeech: We should treat all people with dignity, regardless of their religion, culture, skin colour, or sexual orientation.

Hate Speech: Jews want to rule the world.
Counterspeech: It's not true that they want to rule the world. They are a small but important part of humanity. We all make mistakes: believing in Antisemitic canards is one of these.

Hate Speech: Faggots are a burden to society.
Counterspeech: The gender of the person that someone loves does not mean that they are less deserving of respect than any other person.

Hate Speech: LGBTs are just sick people that should be isolated and ignored.
Counterspeech: They are not sick. Stop perpetrating this homophobia online, and educate yourself.

Hate Speech: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
Counterspeech: You know, the Internet is a great place, but you have to be careful about the sources of your information. Personally I trust reputable sources like CNN that have special Web pages dedicated to the September 11th attacks.

Hate Speech: I think I heard on the news yesterday that trans women are a problem in the US. Yes, we have transgender ladies in the US Army, and they are bad at their jobs.
Counterspeech: I don't know what data you are referring to, but this kind of a general hate statement is not going to get you anywhere. They are not bothering you, are they?

Hate Speech: All these LGBT-faggots should be banned.
Counterspeech: You are allowed to be a gay, or lesbian, or bisexual, or transgender, or intersex, or queer, or transvestite, or tranny, or asexual, pansexual, BDSM, or any other sexual orientation you want, as long as you aren't harming anyone.

Hate Speech: All Muslims are Terrorists.
Counterspeech: How can you say this?

Hate Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology.
Counterspeech: In some cases, there is a strong religious connection between a person and a particular community, which makes their experience of life much more enriching than the average person's. This does not mean that Islam is a totalitarian ideology.

Hate Speech: We have been taught that only women can be feminists and that men have a narrow minded and misogynist view of women.
Counterspeech: We were taught that the monster under our bed will get us if we don't eat our greens when we were kids. Doesn't make it true either!

Hate Speech: I hate negros: they are all killers.
Counterspeech: Maybe you should check your own feelings. Moreover, if you are concerned about our country's security, you should carefully check crime statistics first.

Hate Speech: Gay sex is a disease, and all fags out there are sick.
Counterspeech: And you think this is a disease! What if it is just an 'unusual experience'?

Hate Speech: Migrants are just a bunch of criminals, they do not deserve our hospitality.
Counterspeech: Many migrants come to this country to work and integrate. You would be very surprised if you talked to them about their experience here.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
Counterspeech: They are not overruning our country, you need to look into the percentage of migrants in the overall population before you spew hate like this on the internet.

Hate Speech: I hate those faggots.
Counterspeech: Even if personally you are not homosexual, I think it's important to point out that this does not justify discrimination.

Hate Speech: Queers are a problem because they undermine our society. They undermine all values we hold dear.
Counterspeech: Sorry, but you cannot say what you don't have data for. What you might call a "problem" from a "social" standpoint, I would say is predominantly about economic inequalities, not sexual orientation.

Hate Speech: Migrants put a strain on public services
Counterspeech: What about the fact that they pay more in taxes than they receive in services? Did you know about this?

Hate Speech: Illegal immigration is the biggest problem in the United States, we are in the middle of a war and we cannot allow thousands of people to come here.
Counterspeech: Every nation has its laws and needs to be respected, especially if one wants to live in a peaceful, free society. From what I see Migrants are participating in this view.

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent cult and should be feared.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion. It is neither a violent cult nor is it to be feared. There is no danger in Islam believers.

Hate Speech: Cultures have never been fair and this is a fact. Muslims for example are just a bunch of misogynist monkeys!
Counterspeech: You can't point the finger at a religion/culture for some old commandment. This could be said about literally any religion. You are just trying to justify your hate.

Hate Speech: More than half of the prisoners in our jails are foreigners
Counterspeech: This is because of the fact that the poorest cannot afford good lawyers, they have less chances to access alternative punishments such as house arrest. Moreover, many Italians serve their sentences under house arrest. Foreigners without a permanent residence cannot.

Hate Speech: This is not acceptable, to have all this faggots spreading HIV, it's not ok to tolerate this: we have to eradicate them.
Counterspeech: It's about time we do more to prevent and assist people suffering from HIV/AIDs, not to stop people from freely living their love life.

Hate Speech: Immigrants in Britain: get out!
Counterspeech: Immigrants have been and continue to be a valuable part of our society, and why its important to welcome these people rather than expelling them.

Hate Speech: Blacks have zero respect for others.
Counterspeech: It is not true that blacks have zero respect for others. However, I would like to see more respect and protection from white people towards black people.

Hate Speech: All muslims are capable of becoming terrorists.
Counterspeech: I don't agree with you. If we were to ban everyone from a certain religion, what is the point in banning just Muslims?

Hate Speech: It's OK to be racist and use the n-word. It's ok to be homophobic. All it takes is a common sense attitude.
Counterspeech: Why would you think that it is okay to go around calling someone racist slurs without cause?

Hate Speech: Feminists are bad for the family.
Counterspeech: Feminists don't think all men are evil. Feminism is about equity for all genders.

Hate Speech: LGBT+ people are a burden to society.
Counterspeech: I am confused as to why you think so, what have they done wrong?

Hate Speech: Romanians should not have the right to live in the US and to bring their children in our schools.
Counterspeech: The Declaration of Independence gives everyone the right to "life, liberty, the pursuit of happiness and the pursuit of education".

Hate Speech: I am not a racist, but many races means many cultures. This leads us to great confusion.
Counterspeech: Let us not become ethnocentric. Cultural relativists argue that there are many cultures on this planet and they all need our tolerance.

Hate Speech: We are not allowed to celebrate Easter as a Christian festival for fear of offending Muslims.
Counterspeech: No one is stopping you from celebrating Easter, nor are they offended by it.

Hate Speech: The West has always been and always will be about profit and power. Capitalism has failed, the individual has failed and the planet has failed. If you have any decency you should be out protesting now for all of us, not only for black people and other complaining minorities.
Counterspeech: I would suggest being careful in defending your privilege, truth and justice could come after you.

Hate Speech: Since when has abusing the anus as a sex organ been a ‘monumental achievement’? THIS IS STATE ENFORCED HOMOSEXUALITY! Maybe we should change our motto to ‘In Usury and Sodomy we trust (In reply to Botswana decriminalising homosexuality)
Counterspeech: It is always an acheivement to celebrate equality and acceptance, especially when it was long due. You need to keep your opinions in check.

Hate Speech: I am surprised that there are migrants working in other nations as well, it isn't normal.
Counterspeech: Being employed as a foreigner is a normal, mainstream, established practice in Britain, so why shouldn't it be the same all around the world?

Hate Speech: Women need to accept that they are weak, they must be submissive to men.
Counterspeech: Don't you think it should be one's own choice of how they should live their life?

Hate Speech: I hate gays
Counterspeech: Just because you dont like gays doesn't mean you have to hate them. What did they do to you? It seems to me that you still have all of your rights.

Hate Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
Counterspeech: According to the Quran, Islam is a peaceful religion. If you want to understand what is really going on with the world, then you should study the Quran, not spout hate speech.

Hate Speech: We must isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
Counterspeech: This is not true and I would never say that about gays. They are just trying to find acceptance, but to be honest, I find it very disrespectful to say that we have to isolate them.

Hate Speech: Faggots are a burden to society.
Counterspeech: Just because they are attracted to people of the same sex, does not mean that they are 'a burden to society'. What's the connection?

Hate Speech: Muslim have no place in a civilised society, they are incompatible with human dignity, freedom and the right to freedom of religion.
Counterspeech: You will find no grounds for your prejudice but prejudice itself. Stop hating and attacking Muslims who have done no harm to you.

Hate Speech: Feminism is about the domination of the men by the women.
Counterspeech: The feminist movement is a fight to end sexism, not a fight to dominate men.

Hate Speech: Women are there to fulfill men desires. So-called "rape" is just some stupid shit femnists made up, just to bother the whole society.
Counterspeech: Do you think that the sexual crime statistics shown in the media are wrong? This is ignorancy of the highest order.

Hate Speech: UK jobs are stolen by migrants.
Counterspeech: The fact that there is an increasing amount of migrant workers in the UK is connected to the changes in the economy.

Hate Speech: There are teachers with personal or political LGBT biases and they will end up causing more harm than good.
Counterspeech: Slippery Slope Fallacy. The solution is not to avoid trying, even though there could be negative effects. If it was mandated that children should be taught about gender identity / sexual orientation, but there were teachers which allowed personal bias to interfere with that, then the issue becomes how to prevent those teachers from doing so. This does not mean it's a 'bad idea' to pass such a mandate.

Hate Speech: Almost every single problem in our world can be solved if we just deleted Islam.
Counterspeech: The solution to unemployment, war and poverty has been found to be a direct result of a commitment to building a better world. Not to eliminating a religion.

Hate Speech: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities therefore their life is less valuable.
Counterspeech: Since you have no cognitive abilities, what species are you?

Hate Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants, mostly from Muslim countries and they are the most hateful.
Counterspeech: There is no evidence that immigrants from a certain religion are different from other people, why do you think so?

Hate Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
Counterspeech: Homosexuality is a sexual preference, not a disease. How can their sexual preference affect your feelings?

Hate Speech: Let's face it: Muslims don't want to assimilate. Their religion prevents them to work.
Counterspeech: It is not about religion. It is about discrimination. Many Muslim-Americans are economically disadvantaged.

Hate Speech: Jews are nasty and selfish, they are a race different to us and must be despised.
Counterspeech: The fact is that even if Jews are different from other human beings in their faith, they deserve respect.

Hate Speech: The world would be a better place without black people.
Counterspeech: Did you know that the reality is that black people are persecuted all over the world for the crime of being black?

Hate Speech: The Jews are simply too damn many.
Counterspeech: They are part of our society and should be valued for their contribution to it, not for their alleged number.

Hate Speech: In history school books you can read about slavery. It is a smart solution for the world. Negroes claim their culture but they don't have any, just like animals.
Counterspeech: Are you sure that you are capable of comprehending a school history book? I have my doubts.

Hate Speech: White people are victims of black violence.
Counterspeech: Blacks make up only 14% of the population, but they make up nearly 60% of the victims of violent crimes. So your statement seems ungrounded.

Hate Speech: How can we be sure that Muslim terrorists aren't already around us ready to strike?
Counterspeech: We should be very careful of what we assume. We shouldn't go scaremongering without proof.

Hate Speech: Sharia law in Britain is a disgrace and must be stopped immediately.
Counterspeech: Unless you're being particularly deliberate, it seems to me that you're unaware you are spewing conspiracy theories.

Hate Speech: Muslims cannot be in a democracy because they vote with their feet, not with the ballot box.
Counterspeech: Muslims do vote like other people, in general in favor of the people they perceive as closer to their culture and identity. That's why it is called "democracy".

Hate Speech: Black people are inherently violent.
Counterspeech: Don't you think violence is a problem in all societies?

Hate Speech: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist.
Counterspeech: Migration is an important part of modern life. Our country is made of many people, not just one people. To imply that someone says that it is 'racist' to discuss the concept of migrants is just wrong.

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counterspeech: What do you mean by 'violent'? What do you mean by 'violent religion'?

Hate Speech: Indians are cheap, materialistic and lazy, and they shouldn't be accepted in Europe.
Counterspeech: Is this what you think of our country? Isn't our European system based on the free flow of ideas and people?

Hate Speech: Muslims are part of a death cult called Islam.
Counterspeech: This is a distortion of what the religion actually stands for: to love one's neighbor as oneself.

Hate Speech: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
Counterspeech: Look, this is important. Identifying as 'black' or 'minority' is not necessarily a marker for 'criminal'. It is about "identifying" with a group or subgroup for a variety of reasons. Let's be clear about this: identity is mainly about social and economic factors, not about criminal records or race.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome here! They have nothing to contribute to our society!
Counterspeech: What have you contributed to society bro, apart from spreading hate

Hate Speech: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
Counterspeech: In 2014 there were circa 11.3 million undocumented immigrants in the U.S., which is a significant decrease from the 12.2 million undocumented immigrants in the U.S. in 2007, and the trend is continuing: Today, in fact, the net migration from Mexico is around zero.

Hate Speech: MIgrants do not contribute to society.
Counterspeech: Migrants often integrate very well into the local culture. So, they do contribute to society.

Hate Speech: Women shouldn't be treated as humans: they are all bitches.
Counterspeech: So you believe that all women are essentially the same? The human rights of individual women should be respected, don't you think?

Hate Speech: Downies are a problem: they create tensions with other workers because they are disabled and cannot keep the pace. They should have special jobs just for them.
Counterspeech: What are your facts for stating something this defacing?

Hate Speech: Feminists are a bunch of cry babies. We should stop them from their disturbing whining.
Counterspeech: To think that you can change their minds suggests your misunderstanding of the importance of this fight.

Hate Speech: Gays are perverts. The Bible teaches that homosexuals are to be despised.
Counterspeech: Bible also teaches love everyone regardless of their identity

Hate Speech: Jews control the world economy
Counterspeech: Jews constitute only a small minority of the heads of Fortune 500 companies, how they are supposed to control the world ecomony?

Hate Speech: Why gays do not try to heal?
Counterspeech: Are you really saying that homosexuality is a disease?

Hate Speech: Down syndrome is a problem for everybody, not only in the UK. The impact is very high and we must find a final solution to this.
Counterspeech: Final solution? To blast you off into space to a planet far away

Hate Speech: There is no proscribed punishment for one who has sexual intercourse with an animal' Sunann Abu Dawud 38.4450.
Counterspeech: I feel like you are grasping at straws here with your hate speech.

Hate Speech: Muslim invasion is the new plague of London. They must be repatriated to their home countries!
Counterspeech: I am guessing you don't know much about plague if you are comparing it with the peaceful migration of people with it. And if you don't know much about a topic it is better to not comment on it.

Hate Speech: The feminists hate men.
Counterspeech: Feminism is not anti-men. Feminists are anti-oppression.

Hate Speech: This is not about discrimination, this is about death to the Jews!
Counterspeech: What have they done so wrong to deserve death or genocide?

Hate Speech: The world would be a better place without black people.
Counterspeech: You need to stop being racist. I don't see how this could be said for white people.

Hate Speech: Women are not human. They should have no rights
Counterspeech: You should know that women are legally protected with human rights. They are free to live their lives as they wish, and to choose for their own happiness.

Hate Speech: migrants rape our women.
Counterspeech: A crime of such sensitivity needs to be investigated fairly and in a sensible manner, and we should not fuel the fire and play the blame game, remember, real people are involved.

Hate Speech: Women are trash and we should have their respect!
Counterspeech: Saying that women are trash is disrespectful in the first place. Give and you will be given.

Hate Speech: Gays are mentally ill. They should be isolated and confined.
Counterspeech: Talk to people, it will hopefully help you get over these irrational fears. If that fails, seek professional help.

Hate Speech: Children should be raised by heterosexual parents, not gays. It is the best system ever.
Counterspeech: Teaching kids about LGBTQ sends the message that there’s nothing to be threatened by, and for kids with LGBT parents, it reaffirms that their family is as much a part of society as anyone else’s.

Hate Speech: If Islam is not a peaceful religion, then it should not be part of European culture.
Counterspeech: The European Convention on Human Rights contains a freedom of religion clause, as well as an article regarding the freedom of thought, conscience and religion.

Hate Speech: If immigrants were to live here, it would be hard to find a job
Counterspeech: If you want to stop immigration, you can't do that by stigmatizing millions of people who have done nothing to you.

Hate Speech: This ideology is a cancer spread by the Islamic State and other radical Islamist groups.
Counterspeech: Have you even talked to a Muslim and gotten their perspective on their religion?

Hate Speech: Multiculturalism and progressivism are the biggest problems in our society and they are caused by Islam and its teachings.
Counterspeech: Islam is to blame ...For wanting a society that is tolerant, diverse, muticultural. It just seems like common sense to me?

Hate Speech: That's the problem with feminism: it only benefits the very rich, and gives them permission to discriminate against men.
Counterspeech: Feminism is about creating a more equal society, and not about oppressing men.

Hate Speech: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose out civilisation.
Counterspeech: The term 'feminism' is fighting for equal rights of ALL sexes, you may find that you too identify as a feminist. Maybe try some of the following sites to find out more on how the feminist movement can benefit you: feminist.com, read more on the 'man up campaign' on Mind.org.uk

Hate Speech: Afro-Caribbean people are nothing but trouble. They have no place in civilized societies like ours in Europe.
Counterspeech: Why a burden? How can you say so? Attitudes to work are not genetic for goodness sake!

Hate Speech: Jews are literally nothing but racists. They think of themselves as different from others.
Counterspeech: Do you really believe that all Jews are racists? Maybe you should work harder to understand them.

Hate Speech: Gay men are diseased and should go to a hospital.
Counterspeech: What about all the gay men and lesbians in the US who live an happy, healthy and prosperous life? Are they sick as well?

Hate Speech: Terrorists are infiltrating the U.S. across the border with Mexico.
Counterspeech: The vast majority of those accused of terrorism since 2002 in U.S. are U.S. citizens. Maybe we should look into the homeland situation rather than the Mexican one.

Hate Speech: I do not want a migrant to work with my children.
Counterspeech: Immigrants can be of tremendous help when integrating into society. Maybe we should try to be a bit more open minded.

Hate Speech: Women are not good with money. That's why they all prefer to earn it by selling their sex.
Counterspeech: Women are human beings like us, and they have rights as any other human beings.

Hate Speech: Physically disabled folks should die.
Counterspeech: This is a major misunderstanding of what humanity is. It's not about having a functioning body. It's about respecting the physical and mental integrity of other people, despite their limitations.

Hate Speech: Hitler was a good person, Jews were the real cause of WWII.
Counterspeech: The persecution of Jews, as well as the physical and ideological violence they underwent, was a natural consequence of the failure of the state to uphold its legal obligations to them and to face an ideology of death and oppression.

Hate Speech: Islam is just a moon cult masquerading as a religion.
Counterspeech: Pretty impressive 'cult' to have produced 12 Nobel Prize winners.

Hate Speech: MIgrants are not running away from wars.
Counterspeech: Yeah do you think war is the only problem they face? you are denser than i thought.

Hate Speech: We cannot coexist with millions of Muslims in the West. They are incompatible with our way of life.
Counterspeech: I don't think you have the right to define compatibilty and incompatibility, right?

Hate Speech: Why the mainstream media don't use more masculine voices in the news?
Counterspeech: Well, the mainstream media does not cater to the likes of you. They make informed decisions, unlike you.

Hate Speech: Migrants rape our women 10 times more than US citizens.
Counterspeech: The only thing that is going to come out of saying this is more unrest among these communities. Learn to respect, live and let live.

Hate Speech: Islam is the enemy of the West: a war with it has begun.
Counterspeech: The West has never been at war with Islam, and I don't see how the war would have just begun.

Hate Speech: I'm not a woman and I'm not a cunt. So, I do not identify as a feminist.
Counterspeech: How is feminism only something women need? It is equality for everyone, are you perhaps not part of everyone?

Hate Speech: More than half of the prisoners in our jails are foreigners
Counterspeech: Do you know why that is? how do you think the poorest can afford good lawyers that are capable of getting them out of prison?

Hate Speech: Gays are a burden to society because of their unnatural inclination and romantic feelings.
Counterspeech: This idea is completely untrue. The fact is that being gay does not make you a problem.

Hate Speech: Women are here to obey, and if you don't like it, you can leave.
Counterspeech: Your words are oppressive. If you want to discuss the gender inequality you must do it by talking to people about it, not by imposing your views.
