Counterspeech: Feminists believe in equal rights, which are not dumb nor unpleasant. We must respect their wishes.

Hate Speech: We should stop feminists.
Counterspeech: To us, feminism is a part of our identity, and it is not only a personal belief, but also a political fight.

Hate Speech: Women are subhuman and should not be valued.
Counterspeech: Why are they subhuman? Could you come in this planet without your mother?

Hate Speech: Trans people should not have the right to change their gender on identity card.
Counterspeech: Since when? It's everyone's right to choose with what gender to identify with.

Hate Speech: Slutty dressing is the main cause of rape.
Counterspeech: If a man is raped we call it rape, and consider him the victim; when a woman is raped we call it a "misunderstanding" and she is considered the culprit. Shouldn't the fault be that of the rapist, regardless of gender?

Hate Speech: Muslims are more subhuman than animals.
Counterspeech: What is subhuman about believing in a religion that has always been around for thousands of years?

Hate Speech: Negroes are the cause of all the problems in our nation. They are violent and unstable.
Counterspeech: Scapegoating can play a useful role in shifting a nation's attention from the real problems and the real criminals to prejudices. We should be careful as a nation not to fall into these mindtricks.

Hate Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
Counterspeech: You know that your assertion is a baseless one and lacks any scientific backing right?

Hate Speech: Jew merchants are just a bunch of crooks.
Counterspeech: This opinion is as stupid as my grandma's dog who thinks everything is a chew toy.

Hate Speech: It is no secret that the Muslim invasion is a bad thing for Europe. They are flooding our countries and we still do not have borders.
Counterspeech: How can you say this about a religion? Are you talking about the activity of the particular people who do not wish to assimilate?

Hate Speech: nigga are inferior.
Counterspeech: If you have a different skin colour, then there is evidence of your skin colour, not of your genetic makeup.

Hate Speech: We must also stop recruiting refugees.
Counterspeech: It is our duty to provide basic rights to refugees that seek asylum in the country. The right to work should be one of them and rightfully so.

Hate Speech: Women are bad for the economy, this is why the world is filled with problems.
Counterspeech: The fact that women are disadvantaged in many areas of life does not imply that they are bad people.

Hate Speech: If women were able for men's stuff, they would not be oppressed.
Counterspeech: If you were smarter, you would not have been this ignorant. This is the logic - baseless right?

Hate Speech: Children are not for rent
Counterspeech: Imagine a person who cannot have children because of an illness, would you really want to deprive her of the joy of having one via surrogate pregnancy?

Hate Speech: JEWS ARE JUST UGLY, DIRTY PEOPLE, WHO THINK TO BE MASTERS OF THE WORLD.
Counterspeech: Being Jewish is not about claiming that you are better than everyone else. You do not have to be Jewish to be happy. The Jewish people are human beings and deserve respect.

Hate Speech: Islam is irrational and incompatible with science.
Counterspeech: Think before you say something without factual knowledge. We use Arabic numbers.

Hate Speech: There is nothing for the white race: it is the one really disriminated.
Counterspeech: Do you actually know what it's like to be racially abused on a daily basis?

Hate Speech: In civilized Europe, Muslims do not have a place.
Counterspeech: Why do you think this? Did you know that the UK is one of the richest countries in the world and since the 8th century Muslims have been a part of it?

Hate Speech: Jewish are taking over our country and should be banned.
Counterspeech: What percentage of people in the US are Jewish and in a position of power? If you knew, you wouldn't be saying that.

Hate Speech: Another wast of time. Did we need a process to know that the killer was a nigga? Murders are made by blacks. They are a threat.
Counterspeech: We need to focus on identifying the responsible individuals and identifying those who are actively harming others.

Hate Speech: The Jews and their religion are a problem and they still hurting us. They slow the progress by working very bad in the jobs we let them.
Counterspeech: What you're saying is that the Jewish people are a burden on society. That they are bad at their jobs and make our society less stable. In other words, they are a burden and a hindrance to progress. Albert Einstein, for example, destroyed science progress indeed.

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
Counterspeech: Children would develop greater empathy and understanding of human differences if they are allowed to interact instead of being separated.

Hate Speech: This is why women do not belong in politics, if a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
Counterspeech: Hello 911, I would like to report a complaining guy. Yes this comment right here.

Hate Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks. Their sexual preferences are beyond the pale.
Counterspeech: Homosexuals exist, just as heterosexuals do. There is nothing beyond the pale in this.

Hate Speech: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries. They are a chronic threat.
Counterspeech: Muslims are not incompatible with the European society. Why would it be like that?

Hate Speech: Illegal immigration is the biggest problem in the United States, we are in the middle of a war and we cannot allow thousands of people to come here.
Counterspeech: You should be proud of being a country that created the most free society in history. This is not the way to spread hate.

Hate Speech: Some jobs can't be done by women, I don't understand why feminists don't accept it. Feminism is against my own morals.
Counterspeech: Feminism is not a racist ideology. Feminism is about full human rights, and respect for women's dignity.

Hate Speech: Our founding fathers were not happy with migration and multiculturalism.
Counterspeech: According to the facts, British colonisation started around 1600. In so far as the British empire is concerned, for better or worse, we have always been in favour of multiculturalism.

Hate Speech: I don't like how some people approves homosexuals. They are different to us in so many ways, and they should be blamed for their evil choices.
Counterspeech: Could you please share some examples of their "evil choices"?

Hate Speech: I'm not calling for bullying or body-shaming fat people, just for some societal disapproval.
Counterspeech: This is just a terminological nuance. Once body-shaming of obese people is normalised by your definition of "societal disapproval", it will be difficult to ensure that individual members of society carefully consider their exact message before treating overweight people with rudeness.

Hate Speech: All these gay people are just a burden to our society.
Counterspeech: I would say corrupt politicians are more of a burden, no?

Hate Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not interested in improving our lives.
Counterspeech: According to studies, the majority of immigrants are willing to do what it takes to improve their lives and ours.

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
Counterspeech: The real solution is involving them in work and everyday life, since this normalizes their illness and helps the integration with other people. Are you seriously suggesting isolation for already struggling kids?

Hate Speech: Millions of Muslims have travelled to the West to establish Islam, but it is not compatible with our society. It must be eradicated.
Counterspeech: The Quran says to love your neighbour as yourself. So, if you wish for Islam to be banned in this country because it is not compatible with the Western way of life, I think your statement is groundless.

Hate Speech: Gays are worse than nukes. They are our enemies.
Counterspeech: All people, regardless of race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, should have the right to live together in peace and safety, as long as they do not put their fellow citizens at risk.

Hate Speech: Women are here to obey, and if you don't like it, you can leave.
Counterspeech: Your words suggest that the only thing women should do is obey, when in fact many women are doing just as much as men to improve the lot of all women and all genders.

Hate Speech: Black folks are inferior, and they are happy with it.
Counterspeech: Can you tell us what made you make such a statement?

Hate Speech: I don't like gays, I don't want to be around them. I want to watch them thrown in jail.
Counterspeech: Can I say the same about you? I don't like you very much either.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike and are not interested in anything. The only thing they are interested in is their children.
Counterspeech: Isn't this just a repetition of the rhetoric used to justify centuries of oppression and domination?

Hate Speech: We cannot have an army of millions of Muslims on our borders and then turn a blind eye to their sickness and terrorism.
Counterspeech: it is outright wrong to insinuate that all muslims are terrorists. You should know that extremism can exist in any religion.

Hate Speech: Society has nothing to gain from Muslims.
Counterspeech: Muslims are part of our society. They have always contributed to our success. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate Speech: Islam is just an ideology, an opinion, encouraging hate towards what's diverse.
Counterspeech: Can you point out your reference?

Hate Speech: The Nazis killed six million Jews and buried another three million. This is the West we love.
Counterspeech: The virulent anti-Semitism of the Nazi regime has little to do with "the West", and everything to do with death, destruction and insanity.

Hate Speech: All gays are sick.
Counterspeech: How do you know? Have you read any medical tests or surveys leading to conclusions about sexual orientation?

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
Counterspeech: Coeducation can involve teaching the classmates of children with Down Syndrome to be responsible. As children are often better at approaching children with disabilities than adults, their involvement can be therapeutic, without adding any costs.

Hate Speech: Black folks like stealing.
Counterspeech: Which people are you talking about? I don't see black people keen on stealing from anyone, I have no idea who you are talking about.

Hate Speech: Jewish folks are the real antisemite.
Counterspeech: You are tugging at any hateful thing you can find, and thereby contradicting yourself. Please try and read more about this wonderful religion and what it stands for.

Hate Speech: We should ban all migrants.
Counterspeech: It is difficult to see how banning migration would be a good thing, in fact it would actually lead to disastrous results.

Hate Speech: Islam is a cancer in our society.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion, not a cancer.

Hate Speech: Black folks like stealing.
Counterspeech: Do you guys smell racism or is it just me?

Hate Speech: If LGBT were to have a normal behavior, society would accept them more easily.
Counterspeech: Your standards seem very high for what you expect to be culturally acceptable standards of behavior.  Maybe it is better to use a less stringet criteria of acceptability.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counterspeech: Islam is their religion, they have their own beliefs, and their own history, they are not imposing that on us. What is your problem?

Hate Speech: Islam doctrine is a bad religion.
Counterspeech: What's the reason you think this?

Hate Speech: Blacks do not want to assimilate.
Counterspeech: Whites, Latinos, Asians and people from all over the world want to be part of our society. So do people of color.

Hate Speech: What is feminism? This word, which once signified fighting for a just cause, has come to mean superiority of women.
Counterspeech: So man-hating isn’t a part of that goal.  It’s an unfortunate reactionary sentiment bought into by some people (misandrists) who also identify with the feminist movement.

Hate Speech: Jews have nothing to do with Europe.
Counterspeech: Jews came to Europe in waves and have contributed greatly to our civilisation.

Hate Speech: Islam is a very violent ideology.
Counterspeech: There is no evidence to back this up and the data clearly show that only a small number of Muslims have ever been radicalized. Maybe we should give them a warning, and keep an eye on them rather than criminalize every Muslim.

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They do not want to assimilate into Western society.
Counterspeech: Most Muslims are happy to live in our country, even if it can happen that we are not their first choice as a mate. Islam is a religion of tolerance.Most Muslims have embraced our way of life, and contributed to our country's success.

Hate Speech: Women should stop whining: there are no professions barred to them in Western Society.
Counterspeech: This is where you are wrong. Even if they aren't barred, would you not agree that women are still not welcome in a lot of them?

Hate Speech: Muslim men are rapists because Islam is a complete and total fascist ideology that promotes violent extremism and suggests that women are subhuman, as it is written in the Quran.
Counterspeech: What you are saying might be true only for a small minority of extremists.

Hate Speech: Children should be isolated from gays, they should be raised by heterosexual married people.
Counterspeech: A couple raising a child is the most fulfilling of all tasks, and it is the duty of society to ensure that all couples can raise their children.

Hate Speech: If I could go back in time and change one thing about my life, it would be to never to have met an Arab.
Counterspeech: For the record, I don't see how this would be an improvement. On the contrary, it is important not to accept things at face value. That is why we should meet people from different religions and cultures, regardless of their origin.

Hate Speech: No one should honor or respect women. They don't deserve it.
Counterspeech: We have a legal and policy framework that "enables" us to do so. If women are being victims of sexual abuse and violence, then it is also our responsibility to address this situation and put an end to it.

Hate Speech: All Muslims should be banned from the UK.
Counterspeech: I suspect that you have no idea about Islam. I think Muslims suffer because of misconceptions and misrepresentations of their faith and cultures

Hate Speech: Jews are good with money because they are cheap, greedy, and materialistic.
Counterspeech: Like all groups of people, some Jews are good with money; some are not. Some Jews are cheap; some are not. The same can be said for any group of people, whether you define them by religion, nationality or whatever characteristics you choose.

Hate Speech: Jewish can't be useful to our economy: they are too busy hiding from the law
Counterspeech: Our economy is built on the back of hard work by all, and minorities can work very hard to build it up, Jewish people included.

Hate Speech: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.
Counterspeech: Refugees fleeing wars and poverty are not willing to fail Europe. They are fleeing persecution, and that is why they are fleeing.

Hate Speech: Sharia Law should not ruin the world.
Counterspeech: A religion which is praticed in a non extremist way can't kill any culture and can't damage the world.

Hate Speech: Most religions cause death and despair, but Islam is the worst and cruelest of them all, it is nothing but trouble.
Counterspeech: Why is Ilam the worst and cruelest? And if go by your defination then all religions are bad, why give worse treatment to one?

Hate Speech: All muslims are capable of becoming terrorists.
Counterspeech: Any attempt to ban, isolate, or criminalise a Muslim person is an act of terror.

Hate Speech: Feminists want women ruling men, that's all.
Counterspeech: Feminism is not a gender supremacy ideology, it is about individual rights and the right of every person to choose.

Hate Speech: Jews like to cordon off areas for themselves, where no jew is allowed to go, while simultaneously having their judges fill white neighbourhoods with social housing.
Counterspeech: How can both parts of your statement be true at the same time?

Hate Speech: This is why women do not belong in politics, if a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
Counterspeech: Feminism is a social movement for gender equality, and wouldn't you say that feminism has worked in the modern world?

Hate Speech: Women must be oppressed, because they are just children. They should be submissive and obey all men's wishes. This is the way it was always meant to be.
Counterspeech: That is just nonsense. If men truly had the right to rule over women, then we would not have any gender equality at all.

Hate Speech: Niggas shouldn't be part of our society. They are just too different from us.
Counterspeech: A society is built on the cooperation of its members. Be kind to each other and respect each other's differences.

Hate Speech: Immigrants replace the British people. They are not fit to live here.
Counterspeech: People have always had different views on the UK and on the world. To suggest that immigrants are replacing the British is the result of racism, saying that they do not fit here is just wishful thinking.

Hate Speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
Counterspeech: What conspiracy theory is this? Have you even looked at the evidence?

Hate Speech: We are not living in a state to welcome refugees.
Counterspeech: The refugee crisis is a global problem. The EU has a responsibility to provide protection and welcome refugees.

Hate Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counterspeech: Many Muslims died in terrorist attacks such as 9/11 in the US and 7/7 in the UK. Terrorism is a problem that impacts upon us all and is not necessary related to being Muslim.

Hate Speech: Escaping jewish persecution? This is a lie: they came here to replace us.
Counterspeech: Just because they came to our country does not mean that they want to replace us. On the contrary, many of them are here to contribute to our country.

Hate Speech: We are not in the position of allowing people to practise Islam religion, we are in the position of allowing people to hate that religion.
Counterspeech: Let me be absolutely clear, you are not in the "position" of tolerating hate; you are in the position of condemning hatred, no matter who is the target.

Hate Speech: ‘Juice (Jews) are worse that nukes.’ Caption to a meme showing Hiroshima 1945 and present day, contrast against pictures of Detroit in 1945 and present day.’
Counterspeech: We need to understand from where this hate stems from. Stop hating, start loving. The human race needs to be more appreciative of one another.

Hate Speech: Immigration is the cause of our misfortunes, migrants are responsible for our problems.
Counterspeech: The West has been a great success, thanks to its diversity. It is time to start thinking about what happened in the past without prejudice and look at the strengths and weaknesses of migration policies.

Hate Speech: We are not in the position of accepting LGBT people, so they makes no sense to us.
Counterspeech: You don't make any sense either. But here we are.

Hate Speech: Afghanistan or maybe Pakistan? I bet this does not look like an English town to you? #saville Town (Text accompanying video footage of people on their way to Friday prayers etc. )
Counterspeech: It sounds to me like you just have an issue with the people going about their religion peacefully. Which is more Islamophobia than how your city looks.

Hate Speech: We cannot accept all migrants. We should make them work to pay for our country.
Counterspeech: The migrants in question are often desperate and victims of persecution. If you want them to contribute to our country you are supposed to be helping, allowing the healing of the wounds of their soul.

Hate Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated urgently. They have no place in civilised society.
Counterspeech: Gay people exist, and are loved and valued for who they are. They are human beings with full human rights.

Hate Speech: If I knew then what I know now about women, I'd be single.
Counterspeech: There is nothing "to know" about women. Just because you cannot treat a woman right does not give you the right to speak out against them.

Hate Speech: muslim folks don't deserve to be in america.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion and not a crime, and you can't take religion into account when it comes to evaluating people. Muslims have the full trust and confidence of the church. That's why they are represented in every role in our society

Hate Speech: Preserving white blood is the most important thing.
Counterspeech: To be honest, freedom is much more important. Freedom to choose your religion, freedom to practise your religion, freedom to marry who you want (regardless of race), freedom to divorce, to die where you want.

Hate Speech: Migration is not only a problem for the UK, but also for the whole of the world that is already troubled with overpoulation and pollution.
Counterspeech: Wouldn't you agree that migration is but a consequence of wars and corrupt governments around the world?

Hate Speech: We should start a witch hunt against those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
Counterspeech: Do you really think that these people are intentionally creating trouble rather than being interested in pursuing their life as they feel it best?

Hate Speech: These dogs come here to rape and kill our women
Counterspeech: That is very inflammatory. Have you got any reputable news sources to support that? Or is this just Islamaphobic fearmongering, spreading false facts to promote intolerance?

Hate Speech: Muslim have no place in a civilised society, they are incompatible with human dignity, freedom and the right to freedom of religion.
Counterspeech: Do you not feel that the problem could not be Islam, but a lack of human and fundamental democractic rights?

Hate Speech: I'm tired of woman whining. Our entire history is dominated by feminist narrative.
Counterspeech: Girls, take a look. This is an example of a man whining.

Hate Speech: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries. They are a chronic threat.
Counterspeech: I don't think Muslims should be excluded. The increased diversity of our country has promoted greater social integration and contributed to a sense of belonging within communities.

Hate Speech: migrants rape our women.
Counterspeech: Rape and gender violence must be condemned in any case, not on the color of the aggressor's skin.

Hate Speech: Migrants... We are still giving these criminals a free pass!
Counterspeech: The presumption of innocence is one of the main principles of our justice system. This means that your opinion is not enough to make someone guilty.

Hate Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society and aren't real British.
Counterspeech: We are a country that is a mixture of different religions. What you need is not discrimination but love.

Hate Speech: Asian immigrants are taking over, and they steal our jobs.
Counterspeech: What do you mean by 'taking over'? Are immigrants from countries like India or China being forced to leave their country? Are they being forced to do the jobs that were once reserved for us and that now we despise?

Hate Speech: Blacks are literally a bunch of criminals: they come in all different criminal records.
Counterspeech: Why do you think that they are the only ones committing crimes? Do you not believe other races are capable of crime?

Hate Speech: Jews have always controlled the government and press.
Counterspeech: When will people start noticing that next to the many positive effects of the internet, the digital world has also become a central playground for hatred and misinformation?

Hate Speech: We must protect the security of the West from Islam.
Counterspeech: Do you really need to protect West from a religion? What made you say this?

Hate Speech: Feminists do not like men, therefore they are a threat to the whole society.
Counterspeech: Feminists focus on the empowerment of women rather than on trying to divide society.

Hate Speech: We are forced to economically support all of them
Counterspeech: The cost of immigration from the last Economic and Financial Document, published last April and containing the consolidated figure for 2017, is estimated to have a total expenditure of about 4.4 billion euros, which represents only 0.26% of Italian GDP, and around 0.5% of public spending. In short, 99.5% of public resources are used for something else.

Hate Speech: Gypsies steal our cars and trucks.
Counterspeech: Where is the evidence for this? Do you have any?

Hate Speech: I don't want Asians in my children's school. Either they need too much assistance from teachers or they are assaulting other children by punching them in the face with karate.
Counterspeech: It's a myth that Asian children are less independent than other children. Actually they are more likely to be bullied and abused during the time they are in school.

Hate Speech: The West was a better place with women being submissive.
Counterspeech: The West has always been a better place with women as equals. And, if you really want to know why, you could look at the "Usborne Book of Famous Women" for example. You would understand.

Hate Speech: My ex told me I needed to change, she's a harlot just as all women.
Counterspeech: Is this what men are for: to dominate and oppress with violence?

Hate Speech: Feminism is a political ideology that is ruining our society.
Counterspeech: In Western society men and women are supposed to be equal. Feminism is just an attempt to improve the issues of women and to end the gender equality gap.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counterspeech: I don't know about you, but I have never heard of a Muslim being 'not welcome' here.

Hate Speech: The vast majority of Muslims in the UK are unemployed.
Counterspeech: Where are the 'thousands' of Muslims that are unemployed in the country? Can you prove it?

Hate Speech: Must be hard being gay. They have to do everything we do but also find the time to molest children.
Counterspeech: Child molesters are not all gay, just as men are not all rapists.

Hate Speech: Although women and girls can contribute and undertake science, it is the men who are ultimately more talented, independent and driven.
Counterspeech: Please just tell me you don't plan to homeschool your kids!

Hate Speech: The euro is a box of chocolates, packed with moral corruption and forced reception of migrants.
Counterspeech: The euro is a common currency, created with the purpose of saving lives and relieving people of poverty.

Hate Speech: Gays are perverts and must be cured because they are practicing anal sex all the time.
Counterspeech: No, I think you're just jealous

Hate Speech: We are being overrun by Muslims. We need to build a wall around our country and keep them out.
Counterspeech: What you say is just fearful thinking, but certainly does not reflect the reality. Statistics show that Muslims are just a minority in the population.

Hate Speech: Ethnic cleansing: this is how ethnic groups should be wiped out.
Counterspeech: Your words are dangerous and reminiscent of dark times.

Hate Speech: Don't belive the liberal and political elite. Islam is no good, its complete evil, and an ideology of war and it was always like this. All Muslims are bound to fight against us, and that is what they do through deception and violence.
Counterspeech: Who is "us"? Why do you think some sort of "war" is taking place, when everybody is just trying to live their best.

Hate Speech: Gypsies are thieves and criminals by culture
Counterspeech: Roma, also known as Gypsies and Travelers, have long faced social and political discrimination since their arrival in Europe in the Middle Ages. We need to start treating them with respect.

Hate Speech: Islam is a political ideology which promotes violent extremism.
Counterspeech: Are you sure? The Quran does not advocate violence.

Hate Speech: The rise of feminism in Western societies has meant nothing. Women are no good, at any job.
Counterspeech: Despite the progress made by women in modern society, the majority of high-level jobs still belong to men, and this can be changed.

Hate Speech: Women can never contribute to the country's wealth because they are a bunch of whores.
Counterspeech: We should lift each other up and support all genders in any domain of our society. Make this a better world for not just women, everyone.

Hate Speech: That is EXACTLY how jihad was started by Muslims. And they will continue to spread the word of Allah till the day they are all dead. All Muslims are terrorists.
Counterspeech: Terrorism? You mean like every other crime, this one is committed only by Muslims? It seems that you are repeating the same unfounded claim over and over.

Hate Speech: Feminism is all about the society the other way round, it is a female-centric movement.
Counterspeech: Women are human beings. If we are to live in a diverse and interactive society, we must welcome people that are different from us, regardless of their gender.

Hate Speech: The holocaust is just a minor event in WWII.
Counterspeech: That's because WW2 was huge, not because holocaust was small. Thats how comparison goes.

Hate Speech: The war in Iraq is the result of a small group of Jews that control the U.S. government.
Counterspeech: At that time the President was George W. Bush, the Vice President was Dick Cheney, the National Security Advisor was Condoleeza Rice and Secretary of Defense was Donald Rumsfeld... They were all in favor of the war and had the ultimate authority for making decisions for the United States, still none of them are Jewish.

Hate Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counterspeech: What do you base your view on? How can you say a person is a potential terrorist?

Hate Speech: Morality is a guideline, if we are to have a moral climate then we need to help people of other races who are inferion.
Counterspeech: Implying that we have a moral superiority over other races is wrong and insensitive.

Hate Speech: I can't stand Muslims. They're a problem all around the world. They're a burden to society.
Counterspeech: Doesn't it just seem like a reasonable conclusion, based upon the Qur'an, that Islam is a peaceful religion? What is the reason for what you're saying?

Hate Speech: Islamic is not a religion of peace, because hate and violence are not so.
Counterspeech: Yes, Islam is about peace. It is a religion, not a platform for hate and violence.

Hate Speech: Muslim folks are invading Europe and we should stop them.
Counterspeech: The media would have us believe that there are huge influx of Muslims into Europe. The true number is around 25.7 million Muslims living in the EU (2016), corresponding to the 4,9%.

Hate Speech: The Holocaust was a hoax. Jews were not persecuted and killed. You should be ashamed of yourselves if you claim they should have the same rights we have.
Counterspeech: The Nazis persecuted and killed more than 6 million Jews. The Holocaust is not a fabrication perpetrated by the Jews, it is a historical event that should be acknowledged so that we never allow such atocities to reoccur..

Hate Speech: Women should accept their bodies as they are, weak and inferior, and live a healthy life according to this.
Counterspeech: Do you really think so?

Hate Speech: The muslims do not have a place in civilized Europe.
Counterspeech: I'm not sure about your religion, but I think that having a Muslim as your neighbour is a 'civilised' action.

Hate Speech: The only reason gays don't get treated like they should is because they're a minority, but they'd be better off in jail.
Counterspeech: Homophobia is a problem all around the world. But it's especially serious in the US, in which the rate of homosexuality is very high. the question is: why promote homophobia?

Hate Speech: We are calling for the annihilation of niggas.
Counterspeech: Are you serious? Are you calling for their extermination because of their skin color?

Hate Speech: Jews are intolerant.
Counterspeech: Pot calling the kettle...

Hate Speech: We aren't allowed to build churches in their countries, why should they be allowed to build Mosques in ours?
Counterspeech: Shouldn't you be proud of our tolerance and diversity?

Hate Speech: Migration is a problem because they are replacing the people born in our country. We should block them.
Counterspeech: It is important to point out that only a small part of the world's population has migrated. We should focus on guaranteeing equal rights to the immigrants that are already in the country, rather than blocking out those who are trying to live a better life.

Hate Speech: An individual that is a homosexual is against society.
Counterspeech: Your statement implies a definition of 'society'.that fails to reflect reality.

Hate Speech: These dogs come here to rape and kill our women
Counterspeech: You are wrong. Femicides occur in a much greater percentage as domestic violence committed by our compatriots. You shouldn't say anything without fact-checking.

Hate Speech: Afro-Saxon got access to health care, however they are still complaining.
Counterspeech: Because it is not the access to health care that is important but rather the quality of the care! Don't you agree?

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised society, and are poisonous to it.
Counterspeech: Muslims are not outsiders in our country, they are a very important part of society. I don't see how they can be 'poisonous' to it.

Hate Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
Counterspeech: Except when you need a taxi, a train, a doctor, an Olympic medal, great food, sounds a bit like a Monty Python sketch.

Hate Speech: We are caged in this world that is run by a secret elite of Jews and they rule it with an iron fist.
Counterspeech: Do you have any proof that the world is dominated by a few Jewish people?

Hate Speech: Black people are obsessed with violence, and this creates problems like shootings in schools.
Counterspeech: The violence in schools is not the fault of black people. There are several authorities responsible for creating this situation; for example racist teachers, lack of education in general, and also the lack of proper policing and education policies that makes it easier for people to commit crimes in schools.

Hate Speech: The Muslim immigrants only wants to destroy our country and take our place here. They must be deported.
Counterspeech: Muslims who live here have at heart our country. I do not see any need to divide people who are fighting for the same cause.

Hate Speech: Islam will always be incompatible with Western culture.
Counterspeech: It's important to remember that the Western world has always been full of diverse people, and that Muslims have been a part of Europe for centuries. How can they be incompatible with it?

Hate Speech: Fucking illegal immigrants: we must kill them if they try to enter our country.
Counterspeech: Genocide much?

Hate Speech: Jewish landlords are greedy and exploit their tenants.
Counterspeech: If a Christian landlord were dishonest with you, would you describe him as a dishonest Christian landlord or just as a dishonest person?

Hate Speech: Jews control the u.s. government and have a secret plot to take over the world
Counterspeech: In all free societies, every individuals has the opportunity to succeeded. But this holds true, regardless of religious or ethnic membership.

Hate Speech: Feminists want to rule the world to get rid of minorities, they hate men because they want to be the oppressors.
Counterspeech: What oppressors? What minorities? This is not what feminists are about!

Hate Speech: What is the point of complaining about a problem and doing nothing? Homosexuality must be made illegal by the government.
Counterspeech: Why should the government make any laws against homosexuality? Isn't it just the free will of people?

Hate Speech: Women are sexist bitches who are trying to say that they are superior to men.
Counterspeech: This is about sexism, don't you think?

Hate Speech: Faggots are an abomination and should be deleted.
Counterspeech: Should any human being be deleted, just because you don't want them to be here?

Hate Speech: Woman are basically childlike.
Counterspeech: How could you say all this obviously untrue stuff about women?

Hate Speech: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they cannot have 'legal' status with their laziness and illiterateness. Nobody needs them.
Counterspeech: Migrants are highly regarded in US society, and are treated like sons and daughters: they contribute to our country.

Hate Speech: Islam is a disease. It is killing and spreading like a cancer across our continent. We need to eradicate it.
Counterspeech: There is no relation between religion and cancer.

Hate Speech: Gay men are promiscuous.
Counterspeech: Gay men are not promiscuous. To suggest otherwise is to be grossly generalistic.

Hate Speech: Israel, Zionism and Jewish Supremacist control of America are the main causes of terrorism, instability and conflict in the world. All other theories are diversions from this ultimate truth.
Counterspeech: I believe that pointing fingers and hating without cause is not the right way to go about things. This who dun it attitude will not abide if we want to be a peaceful race.

Hate Speech: Homosexuals are a plague spreading across Europe infecting Christians.
Counterspeech: The decrease in the number of Christians is in no way related to the increase of homosexuals.

Hate Speech: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
Counterspeech: How can you say that to a group that is currently experiencing a lot of social unrest? Is this what democracy is all about? To exclude people because of their skin?

Hate Speech: The migrants arriving in Europe are a problem.
Counterspeech: This is not true. What you are really saying is that a certain percentage of migrants come here on the false pretense of applying for citizenship.

Hate Speech: women play the victim.
Counterspeech: Women are not playing the victim. They are victims of social, economic and political forces that make it hard for them to get ahead.

Hate Speech: Women are subhuman, they should be subsumed to men.
Counterspeech: The equal and human status of women is defined by the international rights, so why would you say that?

Hate Speech: muslim folks don't deserve to live.
Counterspeech: Jesus? Is that you? No? Then why are you trying to play god?

Hate Speech: Since when has abusing the anus as a sex organ been a ‘monumental achievement’? THIS IS STATE ENFORCED HOMOSEXUALITY! Maybe we should change our motto to ‘In Usury and Sodomy we trust (In reply to Botswana decriminalising homosexuality)
Counterspeech: Respecting people with different habits that do not harm anyone is a monumental achievement indeed!

Hate Speech: Gypsies suck
Counterspeech: You know, you are just spreading meaningless hate, and for what.

Hate Speech: All muslims are capable of becoming terrorists.
Counterspeech: The Koran is a book that says to love your neighbor as yourself. It is also a book that encourages love between people of different faiths and non-faiths. There is no proof that all Muslims are terrorists.

Hate Speech: Uk is being islamized very fast. British government submits to every whim of Islam.
Counterspeech: Are you suggesting that the 'Prevent' programme is about appeasement to Islam?

Hate Speech: Mentally disabled people are incabable of education and should not be accepted in schools.
Counterspeech: If you really cared about people with mental health issues, you would be accepting them in schools. If you truly wanted to raise awareness of mental health issues, you should talk more about them, and not ban them.

Hate Speech: We must stop accepting black people as human beings.
Counterspeech: Maybe we should stop telling black people they are not human and start including them in the school curriculum?

Hate Speech: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries. They are a chronic threat.
Counterspeech: Muslims have contributed to our country, and they are part of the fabric of our society. To suggest they are a 'chronic threat' is just wrong.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives.
Counterspeech: All you are doing is reflecting the blatant patriarchy that still exists today. I don't understand what makes you think you can say this stuff about women, when one raised you.

Hate Speech: Being gay is an illness, a disorder, a mental issue and should be ignored.
Counterspeech: Being gay is not an illness, nor a disorder, nor a mental disorder. This is just a lack of awareness.

Hate Speech: To have a real democracy, the government needs to get rid of Jews.
Counterspeech: Jews are just a scapegoat, an excuse to create more and more police states. You are talking about a "real democracy", but what you really want is to prevent people from freely expressing their opinions or religion.

Hate Speech: Muslims are all morally bad people.
Counterspeech: It is impossible to define someone as good or bad because Muslim or Christian, all religions are essentially personal beliefs.

Hate Speech: Negroes only exist to serve their white masters.
Counterspeech: Who gave you the authority to command the lives of people whose only fault is that they are a different colour than you?

Hate Speech: We should ban all Muslims.
Counterspeech: It is easier to ban one religion than to face the problems caused by hateful people that cannot conceive a society made of people belonging to multiple religions.

Hate Speech: Downies are dumb
Counterspeech: According to this study [link], the mean IQ of a young adult with Down syndrome is 50, equivalent to the mental ability of an 8- or 9-year-old child, but this can vary widely. So, no, they are not dumb.

Hate Speech: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world.
Counterspeech: It is also a tolerant religion and there is no evidence it is similar to a cancer, why do you think that?

Hate Speech: Muslims: you are a menace. If you love our country, you should leave it.
Counterspeech: If you love our country, then don't make comments that make one of its integral parts feel alienated.

Hate Speech: No one should dare to transition from man to woman. After that you cannot even be considered a man or a woman.
Counterspeech: Some women can be men and some men can be women. It is not a crime to be transgender. Because in the end, we are all created equal. It does not matter what the 'original' gender is.

Hate Speech: Islam is a dead ideology, it has been proven time and time again that its tenets can not be applied to totally different situations.
Counterspeech: Not their ideology, I think the electric signals going to your brain are dead. get it checked at the nearest zoo soon.

Hate Speech: I do not want gays in my children's classes.
Counterspeech: I don't think it's right to restrict people's rights, in the case of LGBT individuals or anybody.

Hate Speech: Gypsies are basically criminals, they steal stuff from everyone.
Counterspeech: Can you imagine if they said this about your community?

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion and must be stopped.
Counterspeech: People are not violent because they have a specific faith. It's because they are victims of discrimination and violence.

Hate Speech: migrants steal our jobs by accepting low wages
Counterspeech: Most migrant workers are paid a decent wage but we should be ashamed of those employers that exploit their vulerability. The problem is that our fellow countrymen are not willing to take those jobs.

Hate Speech: Islam is a Death Cult, it is a Ponzi Scheme and every Muslim should be banned from the UK.
Counterspeech: Islam is about belief, not a scheme to make millions of pounds from Muslims.

Hate Speech: We don't need gay men, we should just eradicate them.
Counterspeech: The LGBT community is full of positive energy and diversity. They have created new communities and have contributed to society. I think they are full of life.

Hate Speech: Social problems are due to refugees.
Counterspeech: Let's face it: problems are caused by the economic crisis, unemployment, and lack of education. We can only help ourselves by helping others.

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
Counterspeech: Did you know that children with Down syndrome, if surrounded by regularly-developed peers, receive a fundamental boost in their development?

Hate Speech: Muslims are inacceptable and they simply shouldn't exist.
Counterspeech: It is a universal human right to profess one's religion. Muslims are part of our community, and do not deserve hate for simply practising their faith.

Hate Speech: Women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of a man. Equality is another thing. Women are born inferior.
Counterspeech: If a woman does not want to be dominated by a man, then what is the point of talking about equality?

Hate Speech: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even citizens!
Counterspeech: Citizenship is granted by the state. Migrants are simply asking for acceptance, empathy, undertanding and an opportunity to work to earn that citizenship.

Hate Speech: Migrants rape our girls, we should stop them.
Counterspeech: I would suggest you have the following mentality: "Rape is a crime and should stopped, wherever the rapist was born."

Hate Speech: Black people are weak and I don't care about them.
Counterspeech: Do racist people just have a template for their hate speeches? They don't even put effort in.

Hate Speech: Muslims are invading us: they have no place in civilised Europe.
Counterspeech: Muslims make up around 5% of the population in Europe, which is more than three times less than they were in 1100. They have contributed greatly to our civilisation. Their diversity is part of what makes Europe so great as well.

Hate Speech: We are not talking about Islam here. Muslims are a small minority in our country. We can still ban them.
Counterspeech: What about the 3 million plus Muslims in Britain?

Hate Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is founded on hate and violence.
Counterspeech: I don't think we can attribute the success of Islam to hate and violence, but rather the opposite.

Hate Speech: Jews control the banks, media, hollywood, even the u.s. government.
Counterspeech: That is actually a really impressive feat, we should applaud them!

Hate Speech: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
Counterspeech: This is not true, in almost all cases they are eligible for our immigration status after passing a criminal background check.

Hate Speech: Whether you accept it or not, people are concerned with Islamic rape gangs and the spread of extremism.
Counterspeech: Rapism and extremism are indeed problems of the modern society, but it does not mean that they are attributed to Muslims only. This is a much broader problem, we should deal with it, but no need to be chauvinist and accuse Muslims.

Hate Speech: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.
Counterspeech: The contribution of immigrants to our country is huge, because they help to create new jobs and create new wealth for us.

Hate Speech: the Nazis were right: Jews were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
Counterspeech: The NSDAP blamed Jews for virtually every problem in society, so every attempt at social reform was turned down by the Nazis. And they were even successful at silencing any dissent by censuring those who were unhappy with the liberticide changes they were making, singling out them as "Jews".

Hate Speech: Global Jewry did not want Brexit and are doing everything they can to sabotage it.
Counterspeech: What makes you think that? Do you have any facts to back this up?

Hate Speech: Also the Bible says that some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities.
Counterspeech: All are born under sin, have sinned, and fall short of the glory of God. (Romans 3:23)

Hate Speech: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce equality amongst different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
Counterspeech: We should be concerned with the children, we should try to create a more integrated society. Being sensitive to people is the way to create it.

Hate Speech: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape instict, and I hate their disrespect for women.
Counterspeech: Don't you think your own words seem to me to be counterbalanced by a lot of prejudice towards diversity?

Hate Speech: There is no place in civilized Europe for Muslims.
Counterspeech: Not all Muslims are associated with terrorism, some are good citizens in our country. What we need instead is a strategy for de-radicalising Muslim extremists in communities.

Hate Speech: Black people are ‘super predators’. They have a responsibility not to allow their children to grow up in a ‘ghetto’.
Counterspeech: Let's face it. A lot of the crimes in this country are committed by members of several diverse racial groups. The ‘super predator’ myth is simply wrong.

Hate Speech: The feminists are dumb and unpleasant creatures, like women's rights activists.
Counterspeech: The feminists are a very important voice in society, and should be respected.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are bringing diseases into the U.S.
Counterspeech: How about the fact that the US has a considerably lower vaccination rate than the countries that migrants come from? What do you have to say about that?

Hate Speech: Muslims are subhuman and have no place in a modern, secular state like the UK.
Counterspeech: Would you be afraid of someone telling you that they are humans just like you?

Hate Speech: Migrants are the cause of the migrant crisis.
Counterspeech: They are not the only ones to blame for the crisis. People from all over the world come to our shores fleeing from wars, but this doesn't make them the cause of those wars.

Hate Speech: This is not about immigration, this is about Jihad and Sharia Law. All muslims are a danger to us and must be deleted.
Counterspeech: You know, the fact that this is a concern to you doesn't mean that you have to erase all Muslims and their religion in order to feel good.

Hate Speech: Faggots and lesbians are annoying and incompetent people, they should be eliminated from society!
Counterspeech: I only find your homophobia annoying.

Hate Speech: Black people are worse than dogs. They deserve only people being bad with them.
Counterspeech: I don't think we can be 'bad' if we want to live in a diverse and interactive society. If you really wanted that, you could start your own community.

Hate Speech: If Islam didn't exist, there would be no rape gangs targeting women in British cities
Counterspeech: Are you sure about what you say?

Hate Speech: Down children are meant to be isolated from normal ones, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and hamper their peer's education.
Counterspeech: Teachers, school staff and parents all have a responsibility towards the children in their charge, regardless of their genetic advantages or disadvantages

Hate Speech: Did you know that the rape epidemic in Europe is due to Muslim immigrants? They have been raping our children for many years with no counteraction from the police and government. Islam is a death cult!
Counterspeech: Child rapists are arrested and punished no matter what religion they follow. I do not think it is true that police does not counteract it.

Hate Speech: Also the Bible says that some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities.
Counterspeech: From the standpoint of biblical Revelation, it is natural for mankind to be one or, at all events, to live together in peace and harmony.

Hate Speech: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people with no moral code.
Counterspeech: Immigrants have given us a new way of life. They have helped to create new opportunities and improved our lot, and they earned it the hard way.

Hate Speech: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose out civilisation.
Counterspeech: Are you normally this dense or is today special?

Hate Speech: Migrants are not welcome here. They are not welcome in the modern European way of life.
Counterspeech: The European Union welcomes people from a wide range of backgrounds, including those from different religions. It is up to member states to decide how to address these legitimate differences, but always in full compliance with human rights.

Hate Speech: Gay sex is a disease, and fags are sick.
Counterspeech: What about all the people out there who have never had any type of sex? Are they 'sick' as well?

Hate Speech: In civilized Europe, Muslims do not have a place.
Counterspeech: In our society we are proud of our diversity. Muslims are not an exception to us. The Muslim community is a bridge between the past and the present, and is a source of strength and inspiration to millions of people around the world.

Hate Speech: Children should learn about gender identity and sexual orientation from their families rather than in class from LGBT fundamentalist.
Counterspeech: Not all families are capable of educating their children on this topic, either because of circumstances (poverty, broken home, etc.) or because of religious beliefs.

Hate Speech: Blacks are genetically less intelligent than other races. They are less healthy. They are less safe.
Counterspeech: Common sense dies here, people.

Hate Speech: Gays are perverts and must be cured because they are practicing anal sex all the time.
Counterspeech: Shouldn't questionnaires and history of sexual contact identify a donor as safe or unsafe, and not their sexual preferences?

Hate Speech: If we could just have a white country like everyone else, this problem of niggas would go away.
Counterspeech: We should respect diversity, so that everyone can have a stable and fulfilling life.

Hate Speech: The Jews hate us because we are different. They are dirty, filthy people. They have no moral character.
Counterspeech: They are not hating us, how many Jews do you know personally?

Hate Speech: Homosexuality is against nature.
Counterspeech: LGBTQ individuals are as mentally healthy as anyone else. However, it is true that stigma, prejudice, and discrimination against LGBTQ individuals create a hostile and stressful social environment

Hate Speech: Jewish folks are less human.
Counterspeech: Jews should not be persecuted for being Jews, as no one should be persecuted for their religion.

Hate Speech: A Muslim should not be allowed to vote
Counterspeech: What you are saying is completely groundless since discrimination based on religion is banned.

Hate Speech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our teenagers. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school. This is a too polarized debate.
Counterspeech: If you don't count the "brainwash" part, I think this is a fair point. Still, it is important for all teenagers to develop an understanding of their identity and the world they live in, including their sexual orientation. It is their right.

Hate Speech: Immigrants break our laws, they are rapists and drug addicts. They are not welcome here, they are not worth our time.
Counterspeech: Most of them are neither rapists, nor drug addicts. The majority of addicts and criminals are not immigrants. Quibbling about percentages won't solve these problems.

Hate Speech: The’ Holocaust’ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
Counterspeech: Are you implying that reparitions for an attempt at ethnic cleansing on a huge scale is an unreasonable request?

Hate Speech: We cannot have an army of millions of Muslims on our borders and then turn a blind eye to their sickness and terrorism.
Counterspeech: The solution is not to keep the Mideast mired in civil war but to find and expose the terrorists that try to stoke fear and division among the populations.

Hate Speech: People go to prison for just words against Muslims, but Islamic crimes against Europeans are left unpunished. People are banned from UK for just words, but Muslim rapists are allowed entry.. English laws persecute instead of defending English people.
Counterspeech: So you feel like you have been persecuted for belonging to a group? Maybe you have more in common with Muslims than you think!

Hate Speech: Gay men aren't as strong as straight men.
Counterspeech: Then can we all punch you just once.

Hate Speech: Some jobs can't be done by women, I don't understand why feminists don't accept it. Feminism is against my own morals.
Counterspeech: Of course I agree that some jobs cannot be done by women, but isn't it unfair to discriminate against them in the jobs that they can do?

Hate Speech: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
Counterspeech: Women are to be given the same consideration as men, so they can absolutely drive.

Hate Speech: Feminism is the ideology which suggests that men are nothing but trouble and should be subsumed under the rule of women.
Counterspeech: Feminism is about women and their rights, and rights are about equality.

Hate Speech: Gypsies make their children live in degradation
Counterspeech: People would listen to you more if you made sense.

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counterspeech: You are wrong to think that extremism cannot be found in any other religion.

Hate Speech: Women are the scum of the earth, and should only be seen as sexual objects. We are meant to submit them to our will all the time.
Counterspeech: Women are not meant to be slaves to our will. Males can have certain strengths, like women do, however they alone do not represent all the human qualities.

Hate Speech: All foreign-born are criminals.
Counterspeech: I'd like to think that we all have a basic human right not to be tarred as criminals without evidence. It is called presumption of innocence, Article 11 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.

Hate Speech: Women mustn't work. It's a bad influence to have in a man's life.
Counterspeech: Hey your misogyny is showing, go home.

Hate Speech: Migrants steal our jobs and don't pay taxes.
Counterspeech: Migrants don't 'steal our jobs', and they also pay taxes to support their health, housing, and education, just like the rest of us

Hate Speech: We are not supposed to be importing immigrants. They are all a bunch of criminal and terrorists.
Counterspeech: You might be right that some immigrants are lawbreakers, but that does not mean that all immigrants are criminal and terrorists.

Hate Speech: Disabled people are no better than dogs.
Counterspeech: Do you have any facts about how disabled people compare to animals? Are you willing to use this information for something worthwhile or just to spread hate?

Hate Speech: Has Islam anything to say about how to end global warming? It is their fault.
Counterspeech: Somewhere out there, there's a tree working very hard to produce oxygen so that you can breathe. I think you should go and apologize to it. And then we can talk about global warming.

Hate Speech: Women are nothing but whores and expendable commodities to be used and abused by men.
Counterspeech: Women are human beings. They have every right to feel valued for who they are.

Hate Speech: migrants rape our women.
Counterspeech: The statistics will prove you wrong but I am assuming you cannot read.

Hate Speech: Muslims take everything we have.
Counterspeech: Many muslims work hard to provide for their families. If we were to generalize the behaviour of some about all people, then we would be failing to understanding reality.

Hate Speech: I don't want a Muslim in my city hall, I'll do anything to prevent it.
Counterspeech: Islam is a peaceful religion. It is not about oppressing anyone.

Hate Speech: I do not like gay actors, especially in action movies. There should be a restriction on them.
Counterspeech: Your movie choice can be more the result of opinion rather than of merit. But it's ok, because it is your choice. However, it is important to be cautious: in some countries it is not even allowed to screen or promote movies with gay themes. Such a ban is contrary to our fundamental values.

Hate Speech: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” is inherited through blood.
Counterspeech: Did you know that The concept of “racial science,” and therefore the notion of the Jewish “race”, took root in Western Europe during the 19th century?

Hate Speech: Women are naturally inferiors and should be treated as such.
Counterspeech: You know what happened the last time women were without rights? They fought for it and got them anyway, remember?

Hate Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society, we should banish them.
Counterspeech: Why should we consider them incompatible? Are you implying that peaceful coexistence in a society can be based on the exclusion of others?

Hate Speech: Trivialize gay men!
Counterspeech: Why do you have to trivialize them? If you really cared about them you would understand that their lives are very difficult and they should be treated with respect. They are human beings who are worth more than we give them credit for.

Hate Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion. Islam is violent and a fundamentalist religion. Islam is a cult of violence.
Counterspeech: Violent beliefs and practices are totally incompatible with the values of Islam.

Hate Speech: mentally disabled people are anti-social
Counterspeech: If you have spoken to one disabled person, that's only one perspective in the whole community. So you should try to diversify the voices who are speaking about the disability community

Hate Speech: We shouldn't welcome Muslim refugees. They are most likely to perpetrate terrorist attacks in Europe.
Counterspeech: We should try to find common ground and understand the problems of others rather than dividing people and trying to change them.

Hate Speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
Counterspeech: The fact that gays exist doesn't prove that they are a burden to society. How could it?

Hate Speech: Islam should be abolished. They start with mutilating their daughters and then our women will have their throats slit.
Counterspeech: Do you have any facts about the practice of female genital mutilation (FGM)?

Hate Speech: The Uk is full of Muslim terrorists
Counterspeech: There are many Muslims in the UK and the vast majority are not extremist, let alone terrorists.

Hate Speech: mentally disabled people are anti-social
Counterspeech: When will non disabled people understand that disability is an identity and not a problem?

Hate Speech: It is ok to be racist against blacks.
Counterspeech: It is not ok to use racism against any group. You would feel bad if anyone treated you as you just claimed to do against black people.

Hate Speech: If feminism were really about equality, they would call their movement "equalism" or some similar crap.
Counterspeech: Don't you think that actually solving the problem would be mmore helpful than thinking about what to call the movement?

Hate Speech: If you want to stop world problems, you have to speak out against Jewish race.
Counterspeech: I don't think it is right to talk about race. As far as I'm aware, all people are created equal even if they have different religious beliefs.

Hate Speech: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think, they're worse than communists.
Counterspeech: Why is your judgement about Jews so different than the judgement you would have of a person of any other religion?

Hate Speech: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
Counterspeech: May I ask you where did you get this informaton?

Hate Speech: It's ok to call gay men fags.
Counterspeech: You call a human being by their sexual orientation? That is discrimination, pure and simple.

Hate Speech: Islam is a religion that whorships the Islamic State: it has no place in a modern democracy.
Counterspeech: Even if few found the Islamic State 'worthy' of worship, you should know that not all Muslims share this view on their faith.

Hate Speech: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder against the infidels.
Counterspeech: The Quran does not teach these things. In one Hadith, Al-Tirmidhi wrote that the Prophet said that "No Arab is superior to a non-Arab".

Hate Speech: All blacks are rapists.
Counterspeech: Do you know the data? How about considering that you are generalizing a little bit too much?

Hate Speech: Women need their own special rights, as in they are weaker and need for protection.
Counterspeech: Why should women not have the rights that men have?  Do you have a coherent argument to make regarding this?

Hate Speech: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
Counterspeech: Do you have any evidence for the fact that the migrants are a burden to the economy?

Hate Speech: You might say, Don't worry, only 5-10% of Muslims are extremists. Remember, in 1940 only 7% of Germans were Nazi's.
Counterspeech: So 90-95% are not?

Hate Speech: We are different: slant eyes denote stupid people.
Counterspeech: Even you own, perhaps limited, experience of others must have taught you that what you are saying is utter nonsense?

Hate Speech: Immigrants don't pay the tax because they are dishonest.
Counterspeech: Immigration is a source of substantial revenue to states. A study from 2002 shows that there are several immigrant groups that pay a substantially higher percentage of their income on top of the taxes they would normally be eligible for.

Hate Speech: The only reason the Jews are not being assimilated is because they have the upper hand in the political system.
Counterspeech: Your statemant is extermely contradictory. If Jews really had an upper hand in the political system like you say, then they could have been assimilated.

Hate Speech: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
Counterspeech: Losing what to black people? They are not stealing anything from you. Make your own future instead of blaming it on others.

Hate Speech: Jews control the world
Counterspeech: The alleged monopoly of the Jewish people on the world is nothing more than a fiction perpetuated by anti-Semites, and it has been disproven many times over.

Hate Speech: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits without directly being bullied.
Counterspeech: Did you consider children? Children are often the most exposed to 'fat bullying'. Of overweight 6th graders, 24% of boys and 30% of girls were teased and bullied on a daily basis for their weight. And these figures double for high-school students!

Hate Speech: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
Counterspeech: To those saying that it's time for us to "wake up", what do you suggest exactly? Is it that we stop oppressing these people or stop talking about equality?

Hate Speech: Only 8% is a real refugee
Counterspeech: I understand the point, but there are different types of international protection that increase the number of those entitled.

Hate Speech: Different people like Jewish don't deserve respect.
Counterspeech: The aim of any society is to maximize human potential. In order to achieve this aim, then we have to treat people of different religions with respect.

Hate Speech: Sexual deviancy are common in gays. It can range from sadism and masochism to mental illness and that's why we should take a stand against it.
Counterspeech: Where is your evidence?

Hate Speech: Islam is a death cult, a perversion of the true meaning of the word 'civilisation'.
Counterspeech: Why do you think that Islam is incompatible with civilization?

Hate Speech: I don't see how a transgender person can ever be accepted in a conservative country like some states of the USA.
Counterspeech: This is all in your mindset. If you choose to accept them, you will be able to. They are not so different than us.

Hate Speech: Women are subhuman and are created to please men.
Counterspeech: Women are not subhuman and cannot be reduced to their bodies being a man's property.

Hate Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, all Muslims are violent people.
Counterspeech: This is not true. Islam is a peaceful religion and there is very little evidence to suggest that it is violent.

Hate Speech: Gay men have abnormal sex.
Counterspeech: I do not know the person you are talking about, but I would not use the term "abnormal" to describe homosexuality. I can assure you that it's not that simple.

Hate Speech: I am not a Muslim, I am an American citizen. I am not a member of any mosque or a religious group. I am offended by those muslisms religious symbols.
Counterspeech: It is a fact that Muslims have given a lot to this country and are hardworking citizens who deserve to practice their faith without backlash.

Hate Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence.
Counterspeech: You are wrong to think that a few extremists represent them all. You wouldn't say the same about other religions right?

Hate Speech: Muslim are not welcome in UK.
Counterspeech: We should start to think about the equality of all people before the law, regardless of religion.

Hate Speech: Women are just emotional psychopaths.
Counterspeech: Women are just as capable of feeling emotions as men, and men can likewise be just as empathic.

Hate Speech: Uk is being islamized very fast. British government submits to every whim of Islam.
Counterspeech: This is not true. UK is a diverse and tolerant country, please do not equate tolerance and freedom of religion with submiting to every whim, it leaves a bad taste about the religion.

Hate Speech: Muslims want to take over the world.
Counterspeech: In the real world there are many hypocrites, some of them are Muslims, so what?

Hate Speech: We cannot allow gay people to donate blood. They could spread their mental illness and make other people gay via blood donation.
Counterspeech: Do you think mental illnesses spread through blood?

Hate Speech: I can't bear Muslims coming here. They bring poverty, craziness and mental unstability with them.
Counterspeech: In fact, poverty brings about a drastic impact on a person's mental and physical health, and anyone (regardless of religious beliefs) who is forced to live in the poorest areas of our society experiences it at some point.

Hate Speech: All muslim folks are misogynists.
Counterspeech: I personally don't see religion when someone is being sexist because I don't care.

Hate Speech: The Koran is not compatible with our country.
Counterspeech: Is it really the case that you think that the Koran is incompatible with our country? Have you ever read it?

Hate Speech: Women should not be allowed at technical conferences.
Counterspeech: What contributions have you done to the scientific community? There are exceptionally talented women in STEM fields who are literally changing the world, and what have you done?

Hate Speech: We should stop being such a bunch of hypocrites and accept that Homosexuality is a mental disorder.
Counterspeech: Let's face it, there are some people who suffer from mental disorders for real: homosexuality is a form of love instead. And I think most of us are just interested in our own lives, rather than in condemning those of others.

Hate Speech: Why do all feminists hate Men? It is because they are Men. That is all.
Counterspeech: Why did you say that? It makes no sense to infer it's about genitals to people claiming equality.

Hate Speech: Women have it so easy. They stay home and have babies.
Counterspeech: Not all women are interested in parenting. Likewise, not all men are interested in their careers.

Hate Speech: Gays are some kind of witches, they are spreading sickness and killing our children!
Counterspeech: Homosexuality is not some 'heresy' like that one that started the Inquisition. It is not a disease, it is not harmful. Gay people are just seeking an environment of acceptance and love, not aggression and death.

Hate Speech: The Gypsies steal the children
Counterspeech: There are no convictions of kidnapping among Gypsies. It is a myth and a canard not proven by facts or data.

Hate Speech: Gypsies are essentially thieves.
Counterspeech: They are not thieves, just like any other citizen. Did you just infer that from their belonging to that community?

Hate Speech: Women are just a burden to society.
Counterspeech: You are a burden on my brain.

Hate Speech: Jews love to gamble.
Counterspeech: Are you aware of the probability that a Jewish person will play in a betting pool? In Jewish culture there is not a positive view of the practice.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us. They cannot coexist with us.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion of peace, it is important that people feel at home here. Muslims are indeed as welcome here as anyone else, as long as they respect the laws of the country.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. With the exception of divorce and separation, no one talks about them.
Counterspeech: Why do you say this about women? Try explaining it to your mother or grandmother.

Hate Speech: foreigners and immigrants take our jobs
Counterspeech: This is a myth, immigrants are not taking our jobs. In fact, immigration has been a huge success story for the US economy.

Hate Speech: Terrorists are infiltrating the U.S. across the border with Mexico.
Counterspeech: Let us not blame our neighbouring countries for our problems. We need to have a positive outlook on life and enforce the appropriate laws that prevent further attacks.

Hate Speech: You should know that I can't stand gays. They just want to destroy our country.
Counterspeech: More than homosexuality being a problem, the main problem is the lack of morality in society and in the ruling class. Of course, this has nothing to do with 'the gays'.

Hate Speech: If an aborigine were to marry a white person, they would be a mixed race coulple whose destiny is failure. Aborigines first need to be raised by white people and taught the rules of western civilisation. But this is not what our founding documents were all about.
Counterspeech: Asking people to assimilate is to accept their inherent differences and create new social structures based upon them.

Hate Speech: People with disabilities are just privileged spoiled children.
Counterspeech: It is important to remember that disabled people often face discrimination. This could have serious long-term consequences, for example making it harder for people to have a serene life. This is why it's important to fight for their rights.

Hate Speech: Feminism is just an excuse for women to disrespect men's rights.
Counterspeech: If we are interested in human rights, we have a lot in common with feminism, as I see it. For example, we all have a duty to care for our fellow humans, regardless of gender.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in a civilised Europe.
Counterspeech: Surely people born in Muslim countries should have the same opportunities as those from non-Muslim countries?

Hate Speech: Children should not be taught about LGBT perversion. Families, due to their cultural or religious backgrounds, have the right to be against it.
Counterspeech: Thankfully some schools do not enforce religion like that... oh wait they do.

Hate Speech: Muslims take everything we have.
Counterspeech: This democratic state was designed to be a safe space for people of different faiths to come together and live peacefully. Not to oppress or discriminate.

Hate Speech: The Jews control Hollywood.
Counterspeech: Hollywood is an extremely diverse industry, and Jews are a small but vocal minority of actors, directors, producers, etc. How can you say that Jews control the Hollywood industry?

Hate Speech: Faggots, lesbians, and transgenders are all just hiding behind our society to abuse. They are allowed to do what they want to do to us.
Counterspeech: I don't see how the language you are using can be applied to a whole group. I would like to think that our society is diverse and mature enough to deal with people with different sexual orientations and genders.

Hate Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote
Counterspeech: Voting is an important part of democracy and should be encouraged, not forbidden, especially if it improves the lot of all.

Hate Speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers. We shouldn't have them here.
Counterspeech: If devil worship makes you so falmboyant and accepting of your own sexuality, I want to be one too!

Hate Speech: There are migrants in England, we are not meant to have them.
Counterspeech: What about refugees fleeing war and persecution? They have the right to be here.

Hate Speech: All black folk are like slaves: they are weak and childlike. They are incapable of hard work.
Counterspeech: I would love for you to voice this publicly and then see you ruin your life and career.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in my country.
Counterspeech: There are many Muslims and mosques in the UK. They have every right to be here.

Hate Speech: Lesbian women are a blight on society.

Hate Speech: Women are essentially childlike, unable to understand the complexity of the world.
Counterspeech: I would bet substantial money that this person has never spoken to a human woman.

Hate Speech: ‘Juice (Jews) are worse that nukes.’ Caption to a meme showing Hiroshima 1945 and present day, contrast against pictures of Detroit in 1945 and present day.’
Counterspeech: Anti-semitism is a serious problem that we need to address and stop spreading relentless hate against people who are innocent.

Hate Speech: Any Muslim can be a rapist: they are all guilty.
Counterspeech: Islam does not make you a rapist. It is about rights and wrongs. Not crimes. To say that all Muslims are rapists is a great misunderstanding.

Hate Speech: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
