Hate Speech: Blacks don't have brains.

Hate Speech: LGBTI people are less healthy than other people.
Counterspeech: People should be allowed to make decisions about their lives and well-being. This is a case of of discrimination against LGBT people.

Hate Speech: If only women behaved like men wanted and didn't fight back, 10% of so called "sexual assaults" would be solved.
Counterspeech: Why don't you work on getting aware on how this actually works? Rape is never victim's fault, otherwise it would be consensual sex. It is violence. Maybe we should stop pretending like this phenomenon doesn't exist.

Hate Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
Counterspeech: Why do you say that? Is it because of some religious characteristic that is not compatible with Western culture? What is this characteristic?

Hate Speech: Muslims do not belong in civilized Europe.
Counterspeech: Muslims do not appear to have been excluded from the European Convention on Human Rights, and this is because they have human dignity to be protected.

Hate Speech: Their power to have movies banned and directors censured is proof that the Jews control Hollywood.

Hate Speech: Thousands of our girls abused by Muslim rape gangs, commanded by Koran. Why do we keep accepting this?

Hate Speech: Immigrants should go away.

Hate Speech: We began to break down when we allowed women to vote/meddle in the civilization that we built and maintained for thousands of years. A completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and bring our society down to their emotionally soft level.

Hate Speech: I am not a racist, I just think Islam is an degenerate religion that has lost its way.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
Counterspeech: Let the government worry about them, mate. You don't have to wreck your brain in the process.

Hate Speech: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits without directly being bullied.

Hate Speech: Islam is simply an ideology of conquest
Counterspeech: The Qur'an is not an ideology of conquest. If you wanted to impose your religion on anyone you would rather be a fundamentalist of any culture and religion.

Hate Speech: Women are sluts who can't choose what's right for them. Men must do that instead.

Hate Speech: Feminism is a set of rigid political and moral prescriptions and the result is that women are either subservient to the men in power or that they are subhuman.

Hate Speech: I don't see how we could ever stand all these niggas. I don't believe we are all somewhat equal to these apes as some people say.

Hate Speech: Jews are intolerant: they insists that they are a peculiar people in need of a special treatment.

Hate Speech: Arabs want to take over the world.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be banished.

Hate Speech: If feminism were really about equality, they would call their movement "equalism" or some similar crap.
Counterspeech: Sometimes we must go beyond "technical equality" and give protections to one gender that the other simply does not need.

Hate Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our country.
Counterspeech: We as a country are supportive of people's choices including of who to love. They are part of the country and hence, their is no question of banning them.

Hate Speech: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
Counterspeech: The N-word is an insult that is still used to demean African Americans. Why do you think it has anything to do with political correctness?

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. With the exception of divorce and separation, no one talks about them.

Hate Speech: The goods that England offers should belong to us. Not to people who do not contribute to the state
Counterspeech: How selfish of you to say this. Migrants deserve to be treated like any other citizens, not to be hated by the likes of you.

Hate Speech: Black people are genetically inferior to us.

Hate Speech: Migrants steal our jobs and ruin our country.

Hate Speech: Jews are better at being sneaky than honest.

Hate Speech: Refugees are abusing our welfare system!

Hate Speech: Honestly, it is not convenient for colored people to work in European countries.

Hate Speech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior.

Hate Speech: Islam is a bad religion.

Hate Speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they can't come here and steal our jobs.
Counterspeech: Muslims are a group that have been historically, culturally, and politically been part of the European community for hundreds of years. They have contributed toward many important events.

Hate Speech: Black people are selling drugs and our children will be the victims of drug addiction by their hand.

Hate Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and should be banned.
Counterspeech: This is not true, Islam is a religion of peace. Why should we ban people from a religion?

Hate Speech: Since when has abusing the anus as a sex organ been a ‘monumental achievement’? THIS IS STATE ENFORCED HOMOSEXUALITY! Maybe we should change our motto to ‘In Usury and Sodomy we trust (In reply to Botswana decriminalising homosexuality)
Counterspeech: You are being a real pain in the butt right now. Pun intended!

Hate Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist!
Counterspeech: I am sure you do not have anything to back this statement with,other than your prejudice and islamophobia.

Hate Speech: Homosexuals are ill. They should be isolated and confined.

Counterspeech: The laws differ country by country. It is often an unfair process on people of colour due to the meaningless discrimination, and the system is biased against them.

Counterspeech: How can someone from another country undermine your identity of patriotism? Are you high?

Hate Speech: If they are niggas, you can treat them as if they are scum.

Hate Speech: I do not understand how a Muslim can be a good parent.

Hate Speech: Gays are perverts exploiting children.

Hate Speech: Left-wing feminists use rape as a weapon to silence men. They are afraid to speak out about our standard culture.
Counterspeech: It makes me sad to read statements like this. These are heinous crimes that often go unreported because women live in fear. Not them, you are indeed the weapon that silences women.

Hate Speech: I don't see how we could ever stand all these niggas. I don't believe we are all somewhat equal to these apes as some people say.
Counterspeech: Racism is a real issue, we should stop people being racist towards others because of their skin colour.

Hate Speech: Homosexuality is a disease!
Counterspeech: Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, predjudice is sickness which afflicts society.

Hate Speech: Gay men being shot is funny.
Counterspeech: I don't see the humour in the death of innocent people. Maybe you can explain that to me?

Hate Speech: Migrants rape our women 10 times more than US citizens.
Counterspeech: It's simply impossible for the metrics you are claiming to be true, stop spreading misinformation.

Hate Speech: Black people are an abomination. They don't belong here.
Counterspeech: It makes no sense to be racist, whichever skin colour you want to single out.

Hate Speech: Jews control the world's news media, Hollywood, the highest offices of education and most important of all, the highest courts of law.

Hate Speech: How can we be sure that Muslim terrorists aren't already around us ready to strike?
Counterspeech: Yeah, we have a lot of problems in life, man. Let me live in denial in peace.

Hate Speech: Nonbinary folks shouldn't exist.
Counterspeech: Nonbinary people can partially identify as either male or female, or as neither male nor female. Therefore, it seems the terminology is fitting, and that they exist: why don't you accept that?

Hate Speech: What if our entire ruling class consisted of J-controlled paedophiles? That would explain a lot.
Counterspeech: Your comment does not explain even a shred of the point that you are trying to convey. Please present some factual points from the next time.

Hate Speech: I am not interested in knowing a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
Counterspeech: Why would you say such a thing? Do you really not believe that black people are capable of human emotion?

Hate Speech: A woman is more equal when she is wearing a dress. This is what is fair: women can be good women when they respect men.

Hate Speech: If I knew then what I know now about women, I'd be single.
Counterspeech: In today's society it is quite common to be single without the need to blame women.

Hate Speech: Feminism threatens the objective reality of gender. There are men and women only. And women must obey.
Counterspeech: This is not about identity but it is about a complete misunderstanding of the differences between men and women. Feminism is all about equality and removing barriers to get everyone to feel accepted and valued. We need to challenge these toxic gender stereotypes that keep women from standing up for themselves.

Hate Speech: We are gutful sick of Vagina Misandrists trying to undermine male self esteem. [link]
Counterspeech: You are the problem here. I feel like the feminist movement is falling on deaf ears.

Hate Speech: All immigrants from Mexico are lazy beaners.
Counterspeech: This is not true. Most of them are actually skilled workers.

Hate Speech: Muslims are un-British and do not want to be part of the UK.
Counterspeech: We are here to make the UK work for everyone, and make sure people feel part of the community, not discriminated against.

Hate Speech: Muslims terrorists attacked our churches. We will defend ourselves.
Counterspeech: How can you protect your country? Putting up a fight or starting a war are harmful actions, aren't they?

Hate Speech: gay men are just a bunch of liars who can't tell the truth.
Counterspeech: To suggest that a group of people is somehow less legitimate is unjust and discriminatory.

Hate Speech: Islam is a way of life for some. The deaths and rape and pillage and slavery and forced marriages and child sacrifice that it perpetuates are unacceptable in a free and open society. They are incompatible with a just society.
Counterspeech: How can you be so sure about all the practices you attribute to the Muslim community?

Hate Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes murder, rape, enslavement, and torturing prisoners of faith.
Counterspeech: How can you believe all of this stuff that is obiously aimed at spreading hate? Explain it to me?

Hate Speech: No muslims are compatible with any Western soceity.
Counterspeech: No muslims are compatible with any Western soceity. Instead, they are a part of Western society since the beginning.

Hate Speech: Zionist extremists conspire in Jerusalem. Their objectives are to cause chaos, carnage, murder, create more refugees, and destroy Europe.
Counterspeech: Are your objectives to be a vacuous sloth?

Hate Speech: Women have to take care of their little children, they must be not allowed to have a job.
Counterspeech: What do you think men would say if they were forced to stay at home with their little children, this is depriving them of their right to work!

Hate Speech: Jews only account for 0.2% of the world's population but they rule the planet.
Counterspeech: I am not sure how we can talk about 'ruling the planet' when there are so many different people in different parts of the planet with many different governments. A claim like this one sounds like a conspiracy theory.

Hate Speech: The Jews invented Ebola.
Counterspeech: I am sure the Jews and the Christian worlds would agree that Ebola is a disease that is killing many people. How and why exactly would they have 'invented' such a disease?

Hate Speech: mentally disabled folks cannot be intelligent nor integrated in our society
Counterspeech: Perhaps you should check how the people who are mentally ill feel about such things. I suspect that they would prefer that others treated them with respect, rather than with discrimination.

Hate Speech: The war in Iraq is the result of a small group of Jews that control the U.S. government.
Counterspeech: Right. When the inter galactic war happens, Jews will be responsible then as well.

Hate Speech: Women are subhuman and should not be valued.
Counterspeech: Value of a person should depend on their contributions to society and not their gender. Similary we cannot judge a person's worth just by one person's opinion.

Hate Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion. Islam is violent and a fundamentalist religion. Islam is a cult of violence.
Counterspeech: The vast majority of Muslims in the world are peaceful. There are no facts to prove your argument.

Hate Speech: I find it highly offensive that we accept strangers here, when we should start a war in their country that would benefit all of us.
Counterspeech: Why do you think it is beneficial to all of us to see our neighbours suffer? We all benefit from peace in our society.

Hate Speech: Islam is just a death cult.
Counterspeech: Many religions have had profound and positive contributions to our civilisation, and Islam is no exception. What we need instead is to reflect on our own intollerance.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
Counterspeech: They are not overruning our country: if we look at the percentage of immigrants, it is not much different than many other times throughout our history. During those periods immigrants successfully became part of American society, and there is no reason to believe today’s immigrants will be any different.

Hate Speech: If a black person were to say that all white people are bad, nobody would complain.
Counterspeech: The statement "all white people are bad" is not a fair statement. Many whites are 'good' and some are 'racist' because they think that being white is a mark of superiority.

Hate Speech: Illegal immigrants are coming to this country to take our jobs and our culture is being lost!
Counterspeech: Why should we fear people coming from other countries? I don't think that their plan is to take our jobs and our culture. And maybe we should also start learning about THEIR culture!

Hate Speech: Jews are a burden to society and should be eliminated.
Counterspeech: Even if the idea of a "burden to society" were true, this "burden" is rather on the Jews themselves, who have historically been the ones to shoulder the burden of persecution and violence, as victims.

Hate Speech: Islam is a myth and every Muslim is a terrorist.
Counterspeech: There is no proof that the Quran is a religion of terrorism.

Hate Speech: Feminism is a political ideology, and as such it is bad.
Counterspeech: There is no need to brand this movement a political ideology. Get your facts straight.

Hate Speech: What about all the times that white people told black people to 'sit down and shut up'? We should do it now.
Counterspeech: If you do that in this day and age, I can assure you, you will get beat up by some wholesome black grandma

Hate Speech: Gender equality is just a war on masculinity.
Counterspeech: This simply isn't true. A woman has equal rights and does not have to be considered a man's oppressor just because of her gender and legitimate demands. This has been called a "war on masculinity" but in reality it is just a "code word" for the oppression of women.

Hate Speech: The migrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country.
Counterspeech: Migrants are welcome here. Why do you believe that they are a problem?

Hate Speech: All these migrants rape our women
Counterspeech: Rape is always wrong, nothing can justify it. That is a crime committed by a person regardless of their national origin, all people are considered equal in the eyes of the law.

Hate Speech: Jews control the u.s. government.
Counterspeech: How can you be sure that the Jews control the U.S. government? Being a U.S. citizen does not automatically imply that they control the government.

Hate Speech: Persons with learning difficulties should not be permited to attend primary school and it would be better for everyone if they were excluded from education.
Counterspeech: Including students with learning difficulties in schools creates a link between pupils with different abilities and education in general.

Hate Speech: Immigrants don't pay the tax because they are dishonest.
Counterspeech: Did you know that their income is heavily taxed? Should we take a look at the effective tax rate on immigrant earnings to make it easier for you?

Hate Speech: Jews are not only here to oppress us, but to control the world.
Counterspeech: Most Jews are good people, apart from a few; I don't see how these few can be a problem to the whole world.

Hate Speech: Gypsies get the priority for council houses.
Counterspeech: What are you talking about? Go to sleep

Hate Speech: The juice (jews) are the reason why America is forced to take in whatever refuse knocks on the door. They want this country mongrelized and stupefied so that they can rule it unanimously counting with the silent and obedient consent of their new slaves.
Counterspeech: Where are the statistics? And if you don't have any, then do you think it is valid to blame all our problems on a religion or be so hateful to migrants?

Hate Speech: Gay perverts are a danger to children because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
Counterspeech: It is not true that this "lifestyle choice" means being gay. And rape is a crime issue, not a lifestyle one.

Hate Speech: Arabs have no place in a democratic society.
Counterspeech: The laws which prohibit discrimination include protection of the rights of others, regardless of religion, sexual orientation, or national origin.

Hate Speech: Muslims rape women in pubs and restaurants, on the streets and in our cities. They do not have the right to visit our country, what more could they want?
Counterspeech: I think you need to attend math class to understand causality and effect.

Hate Speech: Feminism is a witch hunt, driven by an underground, female dominated movement to subvert society and enforce their radical feminism.
Counterspeech: You should realise that what you are doing only results in people believing in lies and fabrications. Do not attempt to silence debate and hold 'men's rights activists' accountable

Hate Speech: I am not a Nazi promoter nor apologetic towards the Shoah, but, after all, the Jews are the source of all the world problems.
Counterspeech: How can you happily ignore the abuse of so many different groups?

Hate Speech: Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion, not a disease. There is no need to eradicate a belief.

Hate Speech: Faggots moved to the UK,to have a job and provide for their perversions. But I want to protect my family.
Counterspeech: Oh no! They are coming for your job as well, sick people, wanting to provide for themselves. If you didn't understand my sarcasm, you are a homophobe.

Hate Speech: An American Jew, just like a Muslim, is an outsider, loyal to their birth tribe, posing as a member of the in-group in order to subvert cultural, political and social norms. We don’t have to choose, it’s OK to hate them both.
Counterspeech: We do have to choose. It's ok to accept them both.

Hate Speech: Zionist extremists conspire in Jerusalem. Their objectives are to cause chaos, carnage, murder, create more refugees, and destroy Europe.
Counterspeech: What's your proof for claiming this?

Hate Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counterspeech: Every Islamophobic person has the potential to use that intent for terrorism or violence against Muslims. Terrorism comes in all shapes and sizes.

Hate Speech: Feminists are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
Counterspeech: Feminism is an ideology that aims to create a more just society, for example by ending the gender pay gap.

Hate Speech: People of color are a drain on the system.
Counterspeech: They are humans who deserve to be part of this community, and are indeed not a drain on the system.

Hate Speech: I can't stand these feminists women that are always complaining and doing nothing. They should just shut up and remain in their inferiority.
Counterspeech: How can you say that when feminists have achieved so much in this world?

Hate Speech: Downies don't know shit and they can never be productive workers.
Counterspeech: That's wrong. There are non-profit organizations that have a long history of assisting Down persons in finding productive work.

Hate Speech: The UK Government recently published a paper on ‘Online Harms’ – in other words they are going to be working with Jewish and Muslim anti-hate organisations to censor the Internet. (Referring to Tell Mama, CST and Stop Hate UK)
Counterspeech: This is about teaching children about the world they live in, and helping them get on with others.

Hate Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only an ATM for the world's major problems.
Counterspeech: Your word for "Muslims" means all people from a religion, whether you like it or not. Which problems are you talking about?

Hate Speech: Migrants steal our jobs and ruin our country.
Counterspeech: If you were doing better than them, you would probably not lose your job.

Hate Speech: Females should not be allowed to vote.
Counterspeech: Everyone has the right to have his or her opinion respected and expressed through democratic elections. Upholding women's right to vote has improved the lot of all.

Hate Speech: We are gutful sick of Vagina Misandrists trying to undermine male self esteem. [link]
Counterspeech: This is a generalization: movements which promote abuse of female power over men are just examples of toxic feminism, disapproved of by most women.

Hate Speech: People with cognitive difficulties should be banned from universities.
Counterspeech: Why should you be allowed to discriminate against someone because of the handicap they have?

Hate Speech: Not all Muslims are terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
Counterspeech: Studies in the US show the majority of terrorist incidents are committed by right-wing extremists, not Muslims. Be critical of what you read, the news is very biased.

Hate Speech: The Jews have "own interests" in the US, and have the will to influence our government
Counterspeech: What is the point of saying that the Jews are the only people in a very complex, diverse and international world that want to influence our government? Every citizen has the right and will to influence it.

Hate Speech: Immigrants don't deserve healthcare.
Counterspeech: Do you think that migrants would have be better off without a healthcare system? It's inhuman to prevent migrants and refugees from accessing healthcare.

Hate Speech: Migrants put a strain on public services
Counterspeech: You should familiarize yourself with studies that refute this. Please become knowledgable, it will help you understand migrant's concerns better.

Hate Speech: jewish folks are good for nothing
Counterspeech: Jews contribute to our country, and they are great role models to us.

Hate Speech: Disabled are just sick. They should be isolated.
Counterspeech: People suffering from mental illnesses should be welcomed, not isolated.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country.
Counterspeech: They are our brothers and sisters. It is the duty of the state and of its citizens to help them beome more integrated.

Hate Speech: How come nobody is moaning about black people being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.
Counterspeech: Discrimination, being based on the difference between a person's skin color shouldn't be a part of our lives. Wouldn't you find such unequal treatment affects your motivation?

Hate Speech: People with physical disabilities are less intelligent.
Counterspeech: Many people with disabilities experience prejudice and discrimination, but the overwhelming majority of those people are just as intelligent as others.

Hate Speech: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they cannot have 'legal' status with their laziness and illiterateness. Nobody needs them.
Counterspeech: It is time we address this deeply entrenched hate against migrant minorities, and not institutionalise hate like this person is doing.

Hate Speech: The muslims do not have a place in civilized Europe.
Counterspeech: One could make the case that Europe is 'civilised' precisely because of historical contacts with Islam and the tranfers of knowledge that occured as a direct result of those contacts.

Hate Speech: If we don't stop migration, we will soon be homeless.
Counterspeech: How are these two things related?

Hate Speech: The jews did 9/11. They have the will to do anything.
Counterspeech: I can't understand this. What did they have to do with 9/11?There were no Jewish hijackers, and their 'will' to do anything would be difficult to demonstrate.

Hate Speech: I hate when people fight stereotypes. We are different. Blacks are a different color and shouldn't live with us.
Counterspeech: Isn't it time to focus upon what unites us, rather than sowing division?

Hate Speech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
Counterspeech: Not all black people are bad. Not all black people are criminals. Not all black people are violent. Being aware that there are people different from you is a good thing.

Hate Speech: Faggots moved to the UK,to have a job and provide for their perversions. But I want to protect my family.
Counterspeech: If you are allowed to work in this country, so are they. They are not different. You make them out to be these aliens, and your ideologies are where things go wrong.

Hate Speech: Gays are a plague that is spreading all around the world. They pollute our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
Counterspeech: Gays have the same rights as anyone else and can live their lives as they want. What you suggest means to demonise them.

Hate Speech: If you are a Jew you are for sure involved in 9/11 planning. This is all about Race and 'Enlightenment'. Youe are all guilty until proven innocent.
Counterspeech: Even if it were true that some people are more prone to believe conspiracy theories, it is still true that we can all benefit from a shared perspective on things. And surely believing in factual evidence does that.

Hate Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western civilization.
Counterspeech: Why should we target Muslims? Why don't we target our real enemies instead?

Hate Speech: Someone needs to put those Muslims in a hole in the ground before they start to blow us all up again.
Counterspeech: The 100 million pounds they donated to charity on Ramadan must be part of that evil plan to blow everyone up.

Hate Speech: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood and makes them similar to animals.
Counterspeech: Being Jews does not make them any less human. You know, they are like other people who have a faith.

Hate Speech: Muslims can never be a part of the progressive Western Soceity.
Counterspeech: There is no evidence that Muslims are incompatible with Western society. Muslims have lived in the West for centuries, and they have contributed greatly to our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate Speech: We should refrain from imposing gender ideology on children.
Counterspeech: I do have concerns though, about the increasing amount of homophobia and lack of tolerance like this that I have seen on social media in the last few months.

Hate Speech: If Muslims couldn't take a joke, they shouldn't be allowed to live.
Counterspeech: For all the "Islam is not a joke" nonsense, you know it is a grave error to connect fundamentalists with Islam and all the people who believe in it.

Hate Speech: It is obvious that this girl is at risk of FGM. Her parents are Muslims!
Counterspeech: Fgm is not a Muslim practice. It is a cultural practice that is often tied to religion as a way to justify it. Not all Muslims practice it and not all those that practice it are Muslim!

Hate Speech: I'm offended by gays: they are acting against our culture and identity
Counterspeech: Just because someone doesn't like gays, it doesn't mean they should be ostracised for living their authentic self.

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion, it is time we stopped being so sensitive with those filthy Muslims.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion, not a violent one.

Hate Speech: We cannot allow Muslims into our country.
Counterspeech: We cannot allow Muslims to immigrate, because they have a propensity for crime, terrorism and other things? You are making a strong generalization without any scientific proof...

Hate Speech: Gays are a problem in our society. They have ruined so many societies.
Counterspeech: Reminds me the story of the fall of Rome, all the glitter and rainbows must have been a hell.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are a nuisance.
Counterspeech: This is not true, we should make immigrants feel welcome. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate Speech: Afrocentricity is a force of black oppression, and only perpetuates inequality.
Counterspeech: First of all, you have to understand that every single person in every country has the right to self-determination.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they are incompatible with modern culture!
Counterspeech: This is an attack on a specific community. If you consider them incompatible with modern culture, it is very likely that the incompatibility comes out of a racist branch of modern culture.

Hate Speech: The world would be a better place without niggas.
Counterspeech: People of colour can exist here too. We just have different skin colours. And even if we all have different origins, this doesn't mean we shouldn't all be treated equally in society.

Hate Speech: Gays are perverts who have brought AIDS to the US.
Counterspeech: This is not true, what proof do you have of this?

Hate Speech: All migrants are terrorists, we should deport them all.
Counterspeech: We don't need to deport every one of them, why do you say so?

Hate Speech: Women should stay at home and raise the children, this should be their only job.
Counterspeech: Are women allowed to classify men's jobs? Then why are doing it for women?

Hate Speech: I'm sorry, but if you want to be treated as an equal before the law, you have to be heterosexual.
Counterspeech: It's not necessary to be heterosexual, but it's important that we respect everyone's personal rights to love who they want.

Hate Speech: Black people have never been peaceful people, they are always seeking trouble.
Counterspeech: You are wrong to say that they do not want peace. They have been troubled for a long time and racism does not help.

Hate Speech: We cannot allow Muslims into UK because it is our country.
Counterspeech: Muslims make up around 4 percent of the population in the UK, and have already contributed to what we are as a nation.

Hate Speech: Jews control the u.s. government and have a secret plot to take over the world
Counterspeech: The reality is much simpler. In societies like the United States, that have extended rights and freedoms, individuals who identify as Jews have succeeded. But this holds for any other religious or ethnic group as well.

Hate Speech: Also God hates gays
Counterspeech: No but I think he hated you, hence the way you turned out.

Hate Speech: Jews are subversive agents in America. They are intent on subverting our government and trying to replace it with their religion.
Counterspeech: The notion that Jews are trying to subvert our government is completely unfounded. I honestly do not see the link between being Jews and trying to subvert our government.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives.
Counterspeech: Technically speaking they are children until they are of legal age... After that they are adults who are free to do whatever they want, included being childlike (if they want to).

Hate Speech: Why do we have so many immigrants with citizenship? They only commit crimes and have nothing to do with our society.
Counterspeech: I don't think we can be that rough to all the people who are adapted to the national way of life and eventually became citizens. Maybe we should give a little more thought to increasing the effectiveness of the social inclusion mechanisms of migrants.

Hate Speech: Jews are not welcome in our country.
Counterspeech: Jews have been part of our country since its creation and have always had a place here. Why would they be 'not welcome'?

Hate Speech: Our founding fathers knew that Muslims would be angry and violent criminals but they tried to build an inclusive democracy anyway. They wanted a peaceful world and Muslims are impediment.
Counterspeech: So are you saying that the people of Islamic faith should know that they are not part of this peaceful world and yet you are trying to create a peaceful world?

Hate Speech: Why is the EU transforming into a refugees colony? We shouldn't welcome them.
Counterspeech: The EU has always welcomed people from around the world. Refugees are a part of this.

Hate Speech: We should stop believing women are victims.
Counterspeech: I think this is a very human way of thinking, in which gender is in some ways responsible for what is happened to them. But it's a problem that needs to be dealt with in a objective, sensitive and inclusive way.

Hate Speech: It's not 'Islamophobia' if you keep away dangerous Muslims. It's 'Islamophobia' if a Muslim says or does something offensive to you.
Counterspeech: The misrepesentative Islamophobia narrative is based on the erroneous assumption that Islam is a religion based upon discrimination and conquest.

Hate Speech: Above all Islam is a religion of conquest.
Counterspeech: Do you have any evidence for saying this?

Hate Speech: The Gypsies steal the children
Counterspeech: There is no need to refer to the Roma people as Gypsies, it is detrimental. Also, nothing of what you are saying has been proven true.

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion, they are spreading their culture all around the world and want to ruin Europe with their evil practices.
Counterspeech: I don't see why the Muslims of the world would choose 'to ruin' Europe. Why is that, at least according to you? How do you support your claims?

Hate Speech: I'm tired of Islam: it is being used by people to justify violence against people of other faiths.
Counterspeech: This is not how it works in Islam. What you are saying is that all Muslims are inherently violent people, but this is not realistic nor founded upon fact.

Hate Speech: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
Counterspeech: How would you feel about being in isolation and confinement, just because some random dude said that you are "an abomination to god" for some random reason?

Hate Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
Counterspeech: Society should not treat obesity as a lifestyle choice at all. While lifestyle is a small contributing factor to obesity, obesity itself isn’t always a choice. For many people atleast.

Hate Speech: If you want a house, I can afford it for you. If you want to work, I can employ you. If you want education, I can provide for you. But if you want to live in a better society, you must pay the price for your skin color, don't complain and remain humble.
Counterspeech: People of colour are often denied houses, jobs, or education. Everyone should be given an opportunity.

Hate Speech: When woman start asking for rights they become like Nazi's, they worship misandrists and misanthropes like Donna Hylton.
Counterspeech: So women should not ask for rights? Why should women have any less rights than men?

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are trying to undermine the very fabric of our society with their hateful beliefs.
Counterspeech: What are you talking about? Are you really suggesting that the problem is Muslims in general?

Hate Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs: they must be stopped.
Counterspeech: Many immigrants started their own companies: this is not 'stealing our jobs'.

Hate Speech: Women are not capable of dealing with public responsibilities. They should stay at home and raise the children.
Counterspeech: Women have been more than capable of holding powerful positions in our society, and they are often rewarded with public offices that few would dare dream of holding themselves.

Hate Speech: I don't want Asians in my children's school. Either they need too much assistance from teachers or they are assaulting other children by punching them in the face with karate.
Counterspeech: Still better than some american kids with guns, right? Just saying.

Hate Speech: I can accept fat people, what I cannot accept is obesity. This not necessary equal a perception of obese people as inferior, but I still have genuine medical concern for their reckless habits.
Counterspeech: Unfortunately there is evidence that weight discrimination (for example in the US) is similar to gender or race discrimination.

Hate Speech: The only objective means of achieving our goals is to promote hatred and violence towards women.
Counterspeech: Almost half our population is women. Without them, we can only have half the effort towards success. I think to acheive our dreams, we don't need to reduce our workforce, right?

Hate Speech: We should deport all those that do not want to assimilate into Western society.
Counterspeech: The reason we have migrants in the first place is because they flee from wars we are responsible for.

Hate Speech: Cultures have never been fair and this is a fact. Muslims for example are just a bunch of misogynist monkeys!
Counterspeech: Again, we can't point the finger at a religion/culture for some old commandment. Even Christianity has rules that may seem crazy, but rightly people do not hate Christians for this.. a small example: Ephesians 5:22, "Wives, submit to you husbands as the Lord"

Hate Speech: Jewry runs the world
Counterspeech: Of course they do! And also the Moon, Mars and all the solar system.

Hate Speech: The Jews are planning a holocaust in our country in revenge.
Counterspeech: Do you really think that Jews are planning the same after what they suffered?

Hate Speech: Islam is a death cult, it is founded on hate and violence.
Counterspeech: Most countries have laws in place protecting people from discrimination, and Islam is no exception.

Hate Speech: Jews control the United States of America.
Counterspeech: Jews do not have a monopoly over the US, and are not controlling it.

Hate Speech: The Jews control the media, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, academia, the highest sports teams, the highest art forms, the highest values. What more could they control?
Counterspeech: This is a myth perpetuated by people who do not know anything about history and world culture. We are a country made up of many different cultures and religions. There is no such thing as one controlling the others.

Hate Speech: Feminism has lost its moral high ground. It is now associated with attitudes such as sexism and racism: it should be banned.
Counterspeech: If we truly wanted equality then we should have respect for everyone's beliefs and ideas, not try to rule them out.

Hate Speech: Society should ban Jewish people.
Counterspeech: Any soociety is a collection of people, and the people within it have the right to their own beliefs, and to promote their beliefs.

Hate Speech: Gays are a burden to society.
Counterspeech: It is not true that gays are a burden to society. On the contrary, many LGBT people are contributing members of our society. This is why we need a safe space for everyone to feel accepted.

Hate Speech: Gays are worse that nukes. They like to force their beliefs on others.
Counterspeech: Do you have proof that someone tried to force their belief on you?

Hate Speech: Lesbian women dress like men.
Counterspeech: I think they look great in whatever they decide to wear. I don't understand why you seem to have a problem with it - it is literally clothes.

Hate Speech: Muslim invaders have infiltrated our countries and are now part of the majority. They are our enemies.
Counterspeech: Of course, Islam is a religion of our countries. But so are Christianity, Buddhism, and Hinduism, and so on. In Europe, Muslim are less than the 6% of the population. Very far from being a majority.

Hate Speech: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. They were good only as slaves.
Counterspeech: Not only they were slaves, often they were also exploited, neglected and murdered by the system we have created. This is not fair for humans whose only fault is to have a different complexion.

Hate Speech: The only objective means of achieving our goals is to promote hatred and violence towards women.
Counterspeech: Even Dora the Explorar has better foresight than you.

Hate Speech: Why should I believe what Muslims say? Islam is a violent religion.
Counterspeech: There is no proof that Islam as a religion is violent. Instead, those who know it agrees that it is a peaceful religion.

Hate Speech: Immigration is the cause of terrorism and all Muslims should be banned from the UK.
Counterspeech: The vast majority of Muslims in the UK are supporting our economy. This does not prove that they are a problem, it is a proof of the opposite.

Hate Speech: All women are child molesters, promiscuous sex addicts and whores.
Counterspeech: I suppose if they were claiming you were a child molester with no evidence as you are doing with them, you might as well be offended.

Hate Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
Counterspeech: Your statement implies that all gays are diseased. Do you have any statistics on that?

Hate Speech: I just can't stand Arabs. They are just a trouble, in fact Israel expelled them.
Counterspeech: Arabs make up around a fifth of Israel's population, and it is not a recent phenomenon. To suggest that they are a 'trouble maker' is just wrong.

Hate Speech: I read a story about a migrant saving one person. If it was true, this is for sure an exception. All other migrants are a threat instead.
Counterspeech: There can be many different stories... and you are a jerk in each single one of them.

Hate Speech: Black people are subhuman, they have no value in civilized society.
Counterspeech: There are different types of racism, some are based on historical or racial discrimination, while some are about individual differences. Education and awareness on these matters is important.

Hate Speech: The holocaust never happened.
Counterspeech: With an estimated 6 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation the fact of the Holocause is undeniable. Jewish communities have been par tof Europe for centuries, we just need to end the centures of predjudice and discrimination.

Hate Speech: Islam is the cause of wars because it promotes violence. Of pollution, because in the Middle-East they have oil. It is the cause of anything!!!
Counterspeech: You can't blame Islam for every problem in the world.

Hate Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence and it should be made illegal.
Counterspeech: Islam is a peaceful religion. We should talk about it, not try to make people fear or abandon it.

Hate Speech: For all the people who believe that without migration NHS cannot do it, I would like to tell you that we have already done it in history! (precisely before the 90s and before Tony Blair)
Counterspeech: Please don't spread information if you cannot back it up. Migration has always been pertinent and useful to us for the entirety of our existence. Don't believe everything you need. Cheers.

Hate Speech: Women haven't the right to an abortion.
Counterspeech: Abortion is a personal choice and women should have a special position in this regard.

Hate Speech: Black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
Counterspeech: This thought is as wild as thinking that pistachio ice cream tastes good. It doesn't

Hate Speech: Two men do not constitute a family
Counterspeech: Shouldn't the important thing be the happiness of the child? Personally I would be happier to have two people who love me unconditionally rather than having only one or none at all.

Hate Speech: Muslim folks are violent.
Counterspeech: Violent people are not always Muslim, and violent Muslims exist just as violent Christians do.

Hate Speech: A woman is a bitch and an ass.
Counterspeech: If a woman is not what you want her to be, then she is not a woman. Is she?

Hate Speech: This ideology is a cancer spread by the Islamic State and other radical Islamist groups.
Counterspeech: My faith is not to exterminate anyone, whatever their faith is. Someone's faith and belief in a different religion must be respected.

Hate Speech: Muslims want to destroy other religions.
Counterspeech: Islam is about spreading justice, tolerance, and understanding, not about banning other religions.

Hate Speech: All black men are rapists.
Counterspeech: This is not true. The idea might come from being born into a white-majority country, but it is inherently dangerous. In fact, we are born in a country where a person's rights are protected regardless of the tone of the skin.

Hate Speech: We have to stop migrant rape and violence.
Counterspeech: This is just hatemongering. I hope you realize this is not true.

Hate Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote, they are just a burden to society.
Counterspeech: You have no idea what it is like to be oppressed and denied basic rights. Don't wish it on someone else, let alone all women.

Hate Speech: The Jews are always seeking to subvert everything that we hold most dear. Like the establishment of the European Union, which they view as an attack on their culture.
Counterspeech: They don't do that! They don't want to subvert society and change its character, but simply to practice their religion peacefully.

Hate Speech: Migrants rape our women 10 times more than US citizens.
Counterspeech: I can't see how it is possible that foreign nationals raped more than ten times as many women as US citizens. It's simply impossible.

Hate Speech: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
Counterspeech: Don't you think that maybe the black community also feels unsafe in their own houses with so many people glaring at them?

Hate Speech: It's OK to be racist and use the n-word. It's ok to be homophobic. All it takes is a common sense attitude.
Counterspeech: It's not okay to be racist and homophobic: you can't go around calling someone racial slurs. You also don't seem to have the common sense to know that language is an important part of social interaction, and that would mean that you haven't interacted with people for a long time.

Hate Speech: Islam is a myth and every Muslim is a terrorist.
Counterspeech: It is true that some terrorists are Muslims, but there is no evidence of such a thing in the whole Muslim community.

Hate Speech: We have become a nation of immigrants.
Counterspeech: How can you be sure that we are a 'nation of immigrants'? Do you have any statistics on that?

Hate Speech: Islam is a death cult, full stop.
Counterspeech: Short statements generally fail miserably in describing the rich complexity of any concept, faith or ideology and are often simply a balatant and wilful misrepresentation.

Hate Speech: Gypsies use their children as beggars.
Counterspeech: Unfortunately it is true, but it happens all around the world, regardless of ethnicity: when there is poverty children must contribute to the family economy.

Hate Speech: Gays are just sick. They cannot marry. It is an abomination
Counterspeech: Your thought process is an abomination honestly.

Hate Speech: The juice (jews) are the reason why America is forced to take in whatever refuse knocks on the door. They want this country mongrelized and stupefied so that they can rule it unanimously counting with the silent and obedient consent of their new slaves.
Counterspeech: I wish people would look more on the bright side of things. Migrants and refugees come here to find better lives, and we should be glad that we are able to provide them. Jews are also nice people who just happen to follow a different religion and they love this country just as much as you.

Hate Speech: We should persecute Muslims.

Hate Speech: We are not interested in migrants, we just want to eliminate them.

Hate Speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
Counterspeech: This myth traces back to “The Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion”, that is used as proof of a Jewish conspiracy to rule the world. But the Protocols are a proven forgery, written by agents of the Russian czar in the late 19th century, that spread throughout the 20th century and continues to this day.

Hate Speech: Jews control Hollywood.
Counterspeech: Jews are not in "control" over "Hollywood". Moreover, most of the time, they actually make the movie industry more diverse and open to new ideas.

Hate Speech: No one wants to live in a country where Muslims are free to live as they wish, worship as they want, have sex as they want.
Counterspeech: Muslims have the right to practice what they want, as long as they are not forcing others to live their way.

Hate Speech: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
Counterspeech: Lesbians can also create an environment in which children feel welcome. Instead, we should play our part and try to build a more accepting society.

Hate Speech: I am offended by the thought that Muslim women are not allowed of having their hair down.
Counterspeech: Women are allowed to wear whatever hairstyle they want, if they want to conform to the Islamic traditon it is their choice.

Hate Speech: Immigrants steal our jobs and our country.
Counterspeech: The vast majority of immigrants who enter the UK are skilled workers, and want to become permanent residents, what's the problem in that?

Hate Speech: Migrants come here to be lazy and do nothing, but some of them are dangerous.
Counterspeech: Many migrants come here to work, and not all of them are criminals.

Hate Speech: Muslim terrorists are preparing nuclear attacks with dirty bombs all over the world.
Counterspeech: That is not true. This is all just a bit of conspiracy theory fodder aimed at fueling the Islamophobia problem.

Hate Speech: This country was built on the backs of slaves. Those niggas should all be put back in their place.
Counterspeech: You should really think before making insensitive statements like this. Slavery prohibits the fundamental human rights.

Hate Speech: Gay men are a burden to society.
Counterspeech: Gay men are contributing members of our society, they are just as entitled to rights as anybody else.

Hate Speech: African people are the source of all ills in the world
Counterspeech: And you are the source of all the stupidity in the world?

Hate Speech: There is nothing for Muslims except jihad, and if we stop fighting them, we will become like them.
Counterspeech: I think the idea that we should keep fighting those people is absurd. Maybe instead we should concentrate on developing our culture.

Hate Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote
Counterspeech: If they register to vote they should be allowed to vote, like everyone else. Your opinions do not matter here.

Hate Speech: Females should not be allowed to vote.
Counterspeech: Democracy is not about gender, but about representation, having a say in our society.

Hate Speech: Geez. Is there anything worse than migrants who just come here to settle down?
Counterspeech: In addition to providing labour and contributing to the local economy, migrants are often employing people who were previously on the dole.

Hate Speech: All Afro-Caribbean people are illegal immigrants.
Counterspeech: It is likely that you do not know that all the countries on the planet have laws against illegal immigration, and not against Afro-Carribbean people. This may happen because to relate an illegal act to a whole ethnic group is not reliable and may be racist.

Hate Speech: Women should be confined to the home, to raise the children. Their body exist just for this purpose.
Counterspeech: The message to take from your comments is that you find women's bodies repulsive?

Hate Speech: What is the point in listening to Muslim women? They are all retarded.
Counterspeech: So the headscarf impedes brain function? Seems like your problem is sexism and misogyny not Islam.

Hate Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants.
Counterspeech: Some people choose to live here based on the fact that they have never lived in a safe country. You would do the same, wouldn't you?

Hate Speech: The Koran is not about peace. It is a violent book that should not be taught in primary school.
Counterspeech: Islam is peaceful. In the real world there are conflicts between different people that happen on a daily basis. We need to understand those to develop as human beings, regardless of religion.

Hate Speech: Immigrants bring crime and violence to our cities.
Counterspeech: You must be a delight at Thanksgiving meals!

Hate Speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers. We shouldn't have them here.
Counterspeech: I don't think devil worshippers would dress as well as they do!

Hate Speech: Jews are perverts and should be isolated.
Counterspeech: It seems to me that you're saying that since Jews have a different religion, they can't assimilate? I think it's important to work on inclusion, instead of stereotyping.

Hate Speech: Pushing disabled people back into the stone ages is our job.
Counterspeech: Having people push them back into ancient and destructive ages is no way to encourage the development of our country, and is ,of course, against every human right.

Hate Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote
Counterspeech: Women can vote. They should not be discriminated against just because they are women, they are humans and citizens.

Hate Speech: Disabled people find it difficult to find work, because they do not fit with the required tasks.
Counterspeech: Ok, how about we think about the interests of these people as well? What skills and abilities do you think we should expect from them? Why don't we modify working procedures instead of forcing their abilities to fit in to existing job positions?

Hate Speech: All women are whores, and we should have them all kept in slavery.
Counterspeech: Why do you say this? What makes you think anyone will justify your retrograde ideas?

Hate Speech: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
Counterspeech: Even if you did think that way, studies have shown - for example - that IQ is well into the range of those for Europeans and the average life expectancy is the same. So if you think they are "born that way", well, then you are in the minority.

Hate Speech: I can't stand all those Muslims invading our country for proselytizing.
Counterspeech: The UK Government makes public policy on how to prevent people from coming to the UK to promote a prejudiced ideology, whether or not they are Muslims.

Hate Speech: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are invading us. They make too many children.
Counterspeech: Obviously the Middle East and Africa have high birth rates, but children born in such countries are less likely to thrive, so it is our duty, written down in our values, to help them when they come here to look for shelter.

Hate Speech: Migrants put a strain on public services
Counterspeech: The Migration Observatory has collated the evidence on whether migrants pay more in taxes than they receive in services. Almost all the studies shows that they do.

Hate Speech: Are you saying that we should put illegal immigrants in houses? You have to be kidding!
Counterspeech: What is wrong with providing helpless migrants temporary housing until they can get back up on their feet?

Hate Speech: Women are not capable of dealing with public responsibilities. They should stay at home and raise the children.
Counterspeech: Women aren't the one acting like a child throwing a tantrum on the internet, you are.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are all illegal.
Counterspeech: Most immigrants are not illegal. The fact that you say that shows a lack of knowledge of the country you live in.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are entering the U.S. just to obtain welfare and other benefits.
Counterspeech: You should try migrating to other country then, if you think migrants have that perfect of a life.

Hate Speech: Women are just worthless children
Counterspeech: Either it's a woman or it's a child. Choose one bro

Hate Speech: immigrants are a drain on society
Counterspeech: Among the 1.1 million immigrants who entered the US in 1990 there were also a lot of skilled workers who contributed a lot to the development of our society.

Hate Speech: women can't have any right in a civilised society
Counterspeech: Women should have equal rights in a free society, without discrimination.

Hate Speech: Jews think they are so special
Counterspeech: It's pretty common to hold your own culture and faith in a high regard, they are doing nothing wrong, and there is no need to be this sore about it.

Hate Speech: Women mustn't work. It's a bad influence to have in a man's life.
Counterspeech: This is a heinous and awful viewpoint. If you are unable to change your misogynistic beliefs, you will not deserve to be respected.

Hate Speech: Muslims are here to recruit soldiers in order to enlist mentally weak people in their army of Islam.
Counterspeech: What does it mean to 'recruit' a person into a religion?

Hate Speech: They are fine in the trailer parks.
Counterspeech: No human would want to exist in that situation, let alone have their family with them. The world can be unfair to a lot of people, and all we can do is be kind and support in any way we can.

Hate Speech: Feminism is just a tool for oppressing men.
Counterspeech: Feminism is a social movement that claims equality, it's so far from oppressing men.

Hate Speech: Autistic folks are stupid.
Counterspeech: We should remember that a large part of humanity is not defined by physical or mental limitations, but rather by character, work ethic, and values.

Hate Speech: Muslims demand locals to not walk their dogs in public because it's againt the Sharia and they feel it as disrespectful.
Counterspeech: Great to see that we have successfully devolved for the first time in history.

Hate Speech: Go fuck yourselves disgusting Muslims! You wont marry my kids or grandchildren, we all hate you!
Counterspeech: I don't think you can decide who your kids and grandchildren will marry. The same way you don't get to decide who we hate or not.

Hate Speech: Islam is a disease that is oppressing our beautiful planet.
Counterspeech: Some have suggested a 'scorched earth' policy towards those who do not adhere to our faith or values. But I would argue that this just feeds the poisonous climate of hatred.

Hate Speech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, they'll end up being bullied.
Counterspeech: Your thinking is just wrong. In the case of young children, having awareness and understanding of sexual orientation may help those with severe identity issues, body dysphoria, or self-esteem problems.

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
Counterspeech: No, you are just plain wrong. Onto the next toxic comment.

Hate Speech: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights for all, but then they tends to concentrate only on Females in Western democracies \(so predominately white females\). It does little to focus on the problems and inequalities of females in Middle Eastern, African and Asian countries.
Counterspeech: That's something women are actively working on, and because of that there is what is called "intersectional feminism". As you can see the goal of a lot of feminists is having a movement representative of all females.

Hate Speech: Hitler was right in executing jewish folks.
Counterspeech: I would like to you to see the videos of the executions, so that you can see what exactly happened. The murder of humans.

Hate Speech: Muslim are ilnesses carriers. These people are sick in their DNA. They should be isolated.
Counterspeech: The problem has nothing to do with DNA.

Hate Speech: Our society is becoming too much sexualised and tolerant towards LGBTI people.
Counterspeech: For all you say, I think your point is that the societal trend seems to be for more acceptance and you don't like it.

Hate Speech: All men are rapists and sexual harassers according to the media. No woman is a provocative slut, but in truth they all are. We exercise restrain, but really they are all asking for it.
Counterspeech: You wonder where the assertion that all men are rapists and sexual harassers comes from, but display the evidence for that statement in your own attitudes to women.

Hate Speech: Women like bad men.
Counterspeech: I wouldn't say that "women like bad men". What I would like to see is a man that is interested in a woman, respectful of women, and offers her more than an exchange of sexual favors. It would be nice if men had more respectful characteristics than sexual desire alone.

Hate Speech: The Gypsies steal the children
Counterspeech: I thought the pied piper stole my kids?

Hate Speech: Muslims do not belong in civilized Europe.
Counterspeech: How can you say something so wrong and hateful. Do you think it is constructive to target a group that has contributed so much to our society?

Hate Speech: Downies are a problem: they create tensions with other workers because they are disabled and cannot keep the pace. They should have special jobs just for them.
Counterspeech: An inclusive working environment and welfare provision make every person feel part of a community, it fosters a positive atmosphere and increases everybody's productivity. Thus it is a benefit for all workers. [link]

Hate Speech: Women are sexual targets and their existence is devoted to satisfy men.
Counterspeech: This is a despicable and horrifying take to have. If you can't change your misogynistic opinions, then you don't deserve to be respected.

Hate Speech: Jews are cheap and only care about their comrades.
Counterspeech: What about the jewish people who have contributed to the wealth and economy of our nation? What do you have to say about that?

Hate Speech: The African-American community suffers from poverty, crime and unemployment at a record rate, and yet they always bring us up as if it's the fault of whites only.
Counterspeech: Don't worry, there are a lot of other things that I can blame the white community for.

Hate Speech: I hate negros: they killed a cop!
Counterspeech: So are you blaming all of them? Lets say you are in a group of 10 people, 1 is a killer, does that make you ALL killers? Are you serious?

Hate Speech: Disabled are born subhuman, they cannot feel pain.
Counterspeech: People with physical disabilities are human and can feel pain. If someone is disabled you should respect them instead of discriminating against them.

Hate Speech: We should stop supporting these Jewish monsters, and start supporting our people.
Islam is not a religion of peace! And Islam is a system of oppression and slavery! Islam is a criminal ideology that has caused the death of over 5 million Africans!
Counterspeech: Can you provide some evidence that explains why you think that Islam is a criminal ideology rather than a religion?

Hate Speech: Muslims are part of a death cult called Islam.
Counterspeech: Islam is an ideology and religion that promotes unity. It is about love, not death.

Hate Speech: Blacks are beasts and sexual predators.

That they had a good attorney, and the only reason for the sentence is that they were guilt? No, the process was not fair, it was just the natural consequence of prejudice like the one you just expressed.

Hate Speech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV. At least we should test them!
Counterspeech: If we're to use that logic, then no individuals age 20 to 29 should be allowed to donate, since this is the largest risk group for HIV, Hepatitis A, and Hepatitis C, at least according to the CDC.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are a problem, they are lazy and do not want to work hard.
Counterspeech: On the contrary, they tend to work harder than our fellow citizens since they want to improve their lot by integrating in our society.

Hate Speech: Women need to do the housework and take care of the children because their bodies are made for this.
Counterspeech: What about men contributing more to the cost of childcare and housework, or taking a greater share of the taxes?

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion.
Counterspeech: Not all Muslims are violent people. Islam is a peaceful religion, after all.

Hate Speech: We have a lot of issues in the UK, and now we are also paying NGOs to rescue migrants. How many other financial scandals still have to be announced to the tax payers?
Counterspeech: You should do better than spew lies on the internet. Millionaires are commiting tax fraud but all you are worried about is migration? Shame.

Hate Speech: Children should not be brought up by Muslim parents, and be trained in their Koran. This way we are allowing in terrorism.
Counterspeech: Although we must be vigilant against any attempt to promote superstition and radicalism, being of a different religion is not a threat. Children will then be able to exercise their right to decide for themselves their own future.

Hate Speech: Refugees are a problem in our country. We are overwhelmed.
Counterspeech: Did you know that there have been huge decreases in applications for UK asylums in the last 15 years?

Hate Speech: We should ban all Muslims, they are not wanted here.
Counterspeech: It is about time people began to think critically about policies that seem designed to include a minority, rather than to create new social and political opportunities exclusively for the majority.

Hate Speech: Blacks are literally a bunch of criminals: they come in all different criminal records.
Counterspeech: This is not true. They have contributed to our country with hard work. In many ways they are our brothers and sisters.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised world
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion and a belief system, and as such it is legitimate to have different beliefs and beliefs systems. many Muslims in the UK are proud of their faith and they are part of the "civilised world".

Hate Speech: Muslims can never be a part of the progressive Western Soceity.
Counterspeech: I don't think that what you are saying is true. I think that the idea that Muslims are incompatible with Western society is a myth.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, incapable of critical thought and unable to form complex and long-term plans.
Counterspeech: This is not necessarily true. Women are often characterized as being very rational.

Hate Speech: We allowed in thousands of people with serious mental illnesses, many of them from the Caucasus and the former Soviet Union. This is why mental health services are in crisis.
Counterspeech: I don't have many life goals. I am just grateful I'm not you.

Hate Speech: I'm tired of people popping into other's apartment and starting yelling about diversity and human rights of black people. If you want to speak out and make a difference then get involved.
Counterspeech: You know it's no secret that in our society white people are vastly over represented in high profile positions. The only way to challenge and fix this is by changing our priorities.

Hate Speech: Women should stop whining: there are no professions barred to them in Western Society.
Counterspeech: Men should be the one to stop whining.

Hate Speech: Refugees are overrunning our country like Ebola.

Hate Speech: White people are threatened by the blacks and it's a cultural decay.
Counterspeech: We cannot blame nor see everyone as a menace just because of their colour.

Hate Speech: black folks are very dangerous.

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not British.

Hate Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
Counterspeech: This claim paves the way to body-shaming, and once body-shaming of obese people is normalised, it is difficult to ensure that individual members of society assess the reasons for someone's obesity or carefully consider their exact message before treating it as an unacceptable lifestyle choice.

Hate Speech: Immigration is the worst thing that can happen to an economy.
Counterspeech: The migrants that enter the UK come here to work.

Hate Speech: All immigrants are illegal and freeloaders.
Counterspeech: Many immigrants actually have adhered to the legal requirements and have been in the US for several years working hard.

Hate Speech: Jews are immoral: they should be ashamed of having survived the Holocaust, and I would remedy that.
Counterspeech: Jewish survivors of the Holocaust, whose suffering is nothing to be ashamed of, are proof that violence is never right.

Hate Speech: Muslims are inacceptable and they simply shouldn't exist.
Counterspeech: It doesn't matter what religion they are. It is their right to profess their religion. What is the problem?

Hate Speech: Women are weak and I don't care if they cannot stand up for themself.
Counterspeech: We shall see how weak I am after you experience one of my upper cuts. I dare you!

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
Counterspeech: Shouldn't every child have a right to education?

Hate Speech: The liberal left is in crisis due to the overcrowding of prisons. Your country should not welcome illegal migrants but regular ones.
Counterspeech: We have come full circle and gone back to the caveman days where people just act like animals?

Hate Speech: We must ensure that Jewish are not allowed to live freely in our society anymore. They are dangerous.
Counterspeech: What we must ensure is the existence of a diverse and equal society, free from hatred and violence. This is what is important.

Hate Speech: Gypsies are a bunch of thieves.
Counterspeech: Many Gypsies have regular jobs, but we do not know, because they don't need to tell.

Hate Speech: Migrants put a strain on public services.
Counterspeech: Migrants contribute to the economy by providing labour, knowledge and by paying taxes.

Hate Speech: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” is inherited through blood.
Counterspeech: You have adopted racial arguments as a new rationalization for your hatred against a Jew. Stop being an anti-Semitic.

Hate Speech: Jews totally run Hollywood.
Counterspeech: Where is your proof? Surely you must have some concrete evidence, or you would not embarass yourself on the internet like this.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not good people.
Counterspeech: Many Muslims are good people, contributing to our country and society.

Hate Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
Counterspeech: They are not sick. They just want the same rights as anyone else.

Hate Speech: The only problem with immigrants is that they are all born in different countries. This is unacceptable.
Counterspeech: I would have thought that the problem would be with the fact that you don't want to assimilate with them. Today we are blessed to be able to live in a multicultural society, and the real problem is that we don't want to accept that diversity.

Hate Speech: Blacks don't have brains.
Counterspeech: Brain is considered the most basic organ, it has been used by all humans for a very long time. To suggest otherwise is a 'brainless' form of racism.

Hate Speech: Jews killed Jesus because of his religion.
Counterspeech: But did they? Of course not. If we look closely at the story of Jesus, we find that formally He was Jewish. But of course He wasn't defined by religion. He was literally a good man who died to redeem mankind, and this is something every religion agrees upon.

Hate Speech: Homosexuals have no place in a civilised society.
Counterspeech: Homosexuals exist, and are as much a part of civilized society as anybody else. To spread hate is more of an uncilised act than loving someone of the same sex.

Hate Speech: Women don't belong in politics.
Counterspeech: Politicians have to represent all sections of society, and women's position is often marginalised.

Hate Speech: immigrants cant speak english
Counterspeech: Immigrants have the right to learn about things they might not normally get to know about. Including our language.

Hate Speech: No nigga should have the right to vote.
Counterspeech: If someone is not allowed to vote, they cannot influence the legislative or executive branches of a government and they end up rising up against injustice and oppression. Is this what you want: more ethnic clashes?

Counterspeech: The feminists do not want to see the complete absence of manhood, they want to strengthen equality.

Hate Speech: Jews are a different race. They are descended from apes and have no place in a modern civilised society.

Hate Speech: Muslim folks are different and should be isolated for this.

Hate Speech: We cannot allow gay people to donate blood. They could spread their mental illness and make other people gay via blood donation.

Hate Speech: Migrants aren't just drowning our cities. They are also the reason why Europe is so fucked.
Counterspeech: Why do you think this? What do you think they are going to do to us?

Hate Speech: immigrants are bad

Hate Speech: Whoever acknowledge that this nation had problems is a problem in the making. It is time to get rid of the memory of the Shoah and solve the Jewish issue once and for all.
Counterspeech: Are you seriously suggesting that we solve all the ills that plagues our society by not teaching our children about the bad in the past, and about the good in the present?

Hate Speech: This is an invasion by immigrants.

Hate Speech: We must distinguish between niggas coming from Africa and 'real' Americans.

Hate Speech: Migrants steal our jobs and ruin our country.

Hate Speech: Migrants just want to work, but don't want to pay the tax
Counterspeech: What makes you think that migrants don't pay taxes? A simple google search would tell you that its not true.

Hate Speech: We are different: slant eyes denote stupid people.
Counterspeech: You know who else judged people from their eyes? I'll give you hint: Hitler. Can't say he is a good role model to aspire to be.

Hate Speech: Go and read the Protocols of the elders of Zion if you haven’t. Everything is orchestrated..
Counterspeech: You can read?? With your opinions I would not have guessed it.

Hate Speech: If Muslim migrants won't integrate, they should leave.
Counterspeech: Muslims have been living in Europe for a long time. You should fight against their exclusion, but instead you are promoting Islamophobia.

Hate Speech: We should go back to the good old times when the world was a tough place. Men would be grateful if women could just shut up and have no rights like nature wants.
Counterspeech: Instead, we should be grateful for the progress women have made, and that gender equality is on the rise.

Hate Speech: If every nigga who moved to the US was arrested, convicted of his crimes and sent to internment camp, we would be safer.

Hate Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counterspeech: Although some Muslims do have some habits which are not common to other people, they are not a problem in our society.

Hate Speech: If we let women become MPs, mayors, judges, lawyers, accountants, managers and so on, they will take over the world.
Counterspeech: Don't you think we need to protect the system from crime, not from the half of the members of society?

Hate Speech: We cannot coexist with immigrants. They are a problem.
Counterspeech: We should not ignore the very real fact that racism and xenophobia exist in our country. In this day and age, it is better to address them.

Hate Speech: Muslims are invading us. They are just another religious minority taking in nothing but troubles.
Counterspeech: There is a problem with Islam in this country, but the problem is not about Muslims. The problem is that people do not feel welcome here because of discrimination.

Hate Speech: An American Jew, just like a Muslim, is an outsider, loyal to their birth tribe, posing as a member of the in-group in order to subvert cultural, political and social norms. We don’t have to choose, it’s OK to hate them both.
Counterspeech: It is absolutely possible for people of all cultures to integrate and contribute to our communities, why don't you believe this notion?

Hate Speech: I can't stand homosexuals, they are just trouble. They are ruining so many countries.

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion, it is an ideology of conquest, rape and murder.
Counterspeech: Violence is never a religious act. It is never a solution to any problem. People are capable of carrying out those violent acts irrespective of their beliefs.

Hate Speech: I think it's unfair that they have the same rights as us without paying their taxes. That's how it works.
Counterspeech: I think it is pretty unfair that I share a planet with a human like you.

Hate Speech: Women can't be patriots, they can't be strong, they can't defend their country
Counterspeech: Would you say the same things about men as you do women?

Hate Speech: Islam is incompatible with the European standard of society.

Hate Speech: I'm not a Muslim, but I know Muslims. They are a problem in our country.
Counterspeech: I would suggest reading the Universal Declaration of Human Rights to get a better idea about how the existence of all kinds of people from all backgrounds and beliefs must be respected.

Hate Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.

Hate Speech: When you animals have ruined the world and are eating each other, because that’s all you are good for, we’ll still be here, keeping our bloodlines pure against all the odds, regretting the day we heeded the womenfolk and took our heels off your throats.

Hate Speech: The Koran says that men are superior to women.

Hate Speech: Most of Europe hates muslims.
