Counterspeech: Untill you learn what the difference between a migrant, immigrant and refugee is, don't comment on any of it, thanks.

Hate Speech: Black folks don't know who their dads are.
Counterspeech: Diversity would help to develop our abilities to understand each other and perhaps to work out ways in which we can all benefit from one another's knowledge.

Hate Speech: Jews are Christ Killers.
Counterspeech: Placing responsibility on a modern-day person for something that happened 2,000 years ago is quite absurd. Don't you think? Besides, wasn't it the Romans?

Hate Speech: We don't want foreigners here. We should get rid of them!
Counterspeech: You cannot "get rid of" foreigners since they are legal residents as you are.

Hate Speech: Jews are a problem in many European countries because of their race and religion.
Counterspeech: There are thousands of Jews living in many European countries. I don't see how this is a problem.

Hate Speech: If women were really discriminated there would be much more employment disputes.
Counterspeech: Do you really think that after being oppressed, women would speak up about their issues at work?

Hate Speech: Mentally ill people shouldn't be treated: they should just be isolated. They are a failure of society. We should not accept them.
Counterspeech: The fact is that many of those diagnosed as having 'mental illness' are actually in need of mental healthcare. I can't see how you could say otherwise.

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion and shouldn't be allowed.
Counterspeech: This is fundamentally wrong. You are entitled to believe whatever you want, but Islam is focussed on peace rather than violence.

Hate Speech: We should put a stop to migrants and ban them.
Counterspeech: There is a problem with migrants' access to our country and we should help them, not ban them.

Hate Speech: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe. We don't want them to steal our jobs.
Counterspeech: From what I understand, the issue is not migrants but a flaw of financial institutions which are failing to meet the employment requirements of a growing population. It is unresonable to blame this on migrants. Rather, we should work on making more opportunities for everyone.

Hate Speech: Women are the cause of every problem in the world and should be oppressed.
Counterspeech: Well, of course women can cause problems, but so can men. It seems to me that you're confused.

Hate Speech: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy and reckless choices.
Counterspeech: Being shamed for something you have no control over can be irreversibly damaging to a person's mental health. For most people, obesity is not a choice, at all.

Hate Speech: All women are whining and complaining about men's rights, but they are really just whining and complaining about how they are not wanted. They only deserve it.
Counterspeech: All women are entitled to be happy and fulfilled, this doesn't need to be proven.

Hate Speech: We should deport them all back to where they came from.
Counterspeech: Immigrants come to this country legally, just as many European citizens do, don't they have aright to stay in this country, and to return home if they wish to?

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome are a problem: they slow the learning of the whole class. They should go to special school just for them.
Counterspeech: There is no evidence that Down Syndrome makes children worse at learning. Even if it did, this is not a good reason for discrimination.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are a burden to the UK and it is high time they left!
Counterspeech: Many migrants come here on humanitarian grounds. They do not harm us. The right time for discrimination is never o'clock.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. It is not healthy for a woman to think for themselves.
Counterspeech: They allow women to remain voiceless. They enable individuals to remain insulated from the real world. This is when all is lost. We cannot allow this to continue.

Hate Speech: If Islam is about peace, then why it has killed many peaceful people?
Counterspeech: The overwhelming majority of Muslims are not violent people. Who are you talking about then?

Hate Speech: We must stop Muslims from entering our country: those refugees are killing our children and raping our mothers.
Counterspeech: Why are you generalizing these heinous crimes on a religion?

Hate Speech: I wish we lived in a world in which only men could be doctors, lawyers, firemen, and teachers.
Counterspeech: There should be a desire to replace the harmful aspects of patriarchy with systems that empower, celebrate, and respect women, trans individuals, gender fluid and gender nonconforming people.

Hate Speech: Muslims are all morally bad people.
Counterspeech: There is no need for you to separate people into 'morally good' and 'morally bad'.

Hate Speech: The feminists are just whining bitches saying a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of women supremacy.
Counterspeech: It is clear from your comment that your words are coming from a place of hate and anger. There is no proof of what you say.

Hate Speech: People from the underdeveloped world who cometo this country are just too different from us. They are the true problem.
Counterspeech: All countries in the world have different cultures and different beliefs. We should try to understand the true situation of those people and accept them.

Hate Speech: Faggots are perverts and want to indoctrinate our children. Let's ban them from schools!
Counterspeech: A ban for gay men merely propagates homophobic stereotypes, and so are you with what you are suggesting.

Hate Speech: Jews are addicted to their religion and should be isolated.
Counterspeech: Even if Jews were addicted to their religion, there is nothing wrong in them joining a community of other people, regardless of the fact they're believers.

Hate Speech: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
Counterspeech: It is time for you to stop talking.

Hate Speech: The West has been attacked by immigrants. They are our enemies.
Counterspeech: Immigrants have become part of our culture. We must remember that they are European as well.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
Counterspeech: Muslims are welcome in any European country according to the law.

Hate Speech: The British people should use those houses, not immigrants.
Counterspeech: Who are you to command what houses should be occupied by whom? Who gave you this authority?

Hate Speech: These muslims are never going to have a place they can call home in civilized Europe.
Counterspeech: Do you think Muslims are worse than the criminals who commit crimes just because of their religion?

Hate Speech: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, the sooner we accept this, the better it will be for humanity.
Counterspeech: The sooner we accept that this guy needs to be baned, the better.

Hate Speech: Multiculturalism is the death of western societies and also a mortal threat to minorities that are not protected by universal laws.
Counterspeech: Ethnic minorities are much safer in societies where cultural pluralism is accepted, and this is a fact. Multiculturalism prevents ethnocentrism and racism.

Hate Speech: I think that all Muslims are just sick. They are not interested in Western society.
Counterspeech: There is no evidence that Muslim people have a negative impact on our society.

Hate Speech: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers. We shouldn't have them here.
Counterspeech: Do you know what this phrase "some kind of devil worshippers" means?

Hate Speech: migrants are not welcome here
Counterspeech: Migrants come here for a better life, not to disturb people.

Hate Speech: the Nazis were right: Jews were a race and were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
Counterspeech: Were the Nazis right?? Really??

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are subhuman.
Counterspeech: A person is a person regardless of their religious beliefs.

Hate Speech: Blacks are naturally evil. They cannot be moral. Their entire existence is defined by their hatred of whites.
Counterspeech: Do you have any proof on your claim about hate?

Hate Speech: mentally disabled folks are just dribbling mongoloids.
Counterspeech: When asked to choose one adjective to describe their experience of someone with intellectual or developmental disabilities, people usually say 'mentally impaired' or 'mentally challenged.' To say 'dribbling mongoloid' is simply unacceptable in an inclusive society.

Hate Speech: I can't stand these feminists women that are always complaining and doing nothing. They should just shut up and remain in their inferiority.
Counterspeech: Many feminists achieved something in their lives, and still believe in what is worth fighting for, and their work is of benefit to many.

Hate Speech: If you want to stop racism you have to start speaking about it, not writing off whites as the problem.
Counterspeech: If you want to fight racism, you should learn about it and address it. The problem is not about 'the whites', but about whoever spreads discrimination and hate.

Hate Speech: They are nomads. They are not entitled to have a house
Counterspeech: It is inconsiderate of you to say this. No matter what you feel about nomads, you should not feel as though they do not even deserve a roof over their head?

Hate Speech: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is a bitch.
Counterspeech: It is not exclusively a woman's role to be the homemaker.

Hate Speech: I'm tired of gay people telling other people what they are doing with their own bodies.
Counterspeech: I'm sure you're tired of hearing about other's bodies, but this is an individual's right to use their own body to their liking.

Hate Speech: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. They were good only as slaves.
Counterspeech: Do you really believe that all this oppression is fair for people whose only fault is having a different skin colour?

Hate Speech: Gay men should be called fags.
Counterspeech: Fag, or faggot, is not a code word for gay, it's a slur. If you wanted to call them by their original name, that would be a problem, because you will have to learn the first names of many people.

Hate Speech: blind people don't know what's going on
Counterspeech: I think the idea that people are blind because they were raised by communists or whatever is a figment of the far-right's imagination.

Hate Speech: Immigration is bad for Britain and the world.
Counterspeech: Some countries are importing a lot more people than others. Our country is wealthy, we are a thriving place to live. We should not blame immigrants.

Hate Speech: I don't care about numbers. Feminist statistics are bullshit. The real percentages prove that black women are welfare queens.
Counterspeech: Statistics are a tool to demystify falsehoods that have been used to silence women and to marginalise people of colour. Feminism is all about equality and rights, not a preference for one sex over the other.

Hate Speech: Immigration creates lack of jobs for natives in the long run.
Counterspeech: There is no evidence that immigration causes jobs loss, can you point me your reference?

Hate Speech: Muslims should not live here because it is impossible to assimilate them.
Counterspeech: Are you suggesting that we as a society are motivated by exclusion?

Hate Speech: Jews are violent and immoral.
Counterspeech: This is a myth propagated by anti-Semites, who make it out to be about Jewish conduct and morality.

Hate Speech: Children should learn about gender identity and sexual orientation from their families rather than in class from LGBT fundamentalist.
Counterspeech: You are not taking into account the children that might not have a beneficial, welcoming and nurturing family life.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
Counterspeech: Being soft or emotional is not a negative trait. Every human feels emotions, just that our environement teaches us to respond differently.

Hate Speech: women are only useful for sex.
Counterspeech: You are only useful for being shamed for your views online. Shameless.

Hate Speech: There should be laws to punish those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
Counterspeech: Homosexuals are often persecuted for who they love, which is their own right. This is why the laws and punishments that you suggest are unjust.

Hate Speech: I just can't stand Arabs. They are just a trouble, in fact Israel expelled them.
Counterspeech: This is wrong: Arabs make up around a fifth of Israel's population, and it is not a recent phenomenon. To suggest that they are a 'trouble maker' is just wrong.

Hate Speech: Women need to accept that they are weak.
Counterspeech: It is not right for us to judge someone else for their strength and weakness. Remember it takes strength to go out and work, but it takes equal strength to stay at home and raise kids.

Hate Speech: Gypsies like living in trailer parks.
Counterspeech: The trailer parks should really be a temporary and emergency solution, but then they become stable over time and are the only possibility of accommodation for them even if they would like to live, like all of us, in adequate housing.

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
Counterspeech: If you think that taking all of the people with DS out of industry will solve the problems in the workplace, then you are wrong. Tensions won't go away: stressed people will simply target other workers who are overweight; or of a different gender; or in a number of other ways for which they are considered to be not productive enough.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome here! They have nothing to contribute to our society!
Counterspeech: Why do you think they do not contribute to society?

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, murder and slavery.
Counterspeech: We should stop promoting these beliefs and work on reducing the number of people that are induced to believe to these xenophobic and false claims.

Hate Speech: The whole idea of marriage is to bond a man and a woman and raise children.
Counterspeech: Marriage is about love not sex. Not all marriages work out, and even less work out happily. It is more important to respect the wishes of both parties.

Hate Speech: What this nigga have to do with being a Westerner?
Counterspeech: What exactly is 'a Westerner'? Someone who is only a white European?

Hate Speech: Society has nothing to gain from Muslims.
Counterspeech: Haven't they contributed a lot to our society, especially in the areas of science, technology, engineering and mathematics.

Hate Speech: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights for all, but then they tends to concentrate only on Females in Western democracies \(so predominately white females\). It does little to focus on the problems and inequalities of females in Middle Eastern, African and Asian countries.
Counterspeech: If you look closely, the goal of a lot of feminists is having a movement to represent all females.

Hate Speech: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world.
Counterspeech: The Qur'an is a book that says to love your neighbour as yourself. It is also a tolerant religion and there is no evidence it is similar to a cancer, why do you think that?

Hate Speech: LGBTs are a drain on society.
Counterspeech: This is a comment made about any other so-called "different" group of people too. So imagine, even white Christians are different for some others.

Hate Speech: Jews do not want to assimilate.
Counterspeech: One of the great things about Jewish culture is their ability to assimilate. If I am honest, I don't see any other religion that does it more than them.

Hate Speech: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
Counterspeech: All countries have the right to determine their own immigration and asylum policies, but the respect of human rights must be guaranteed.

Hate Speech: We need to eradicate all those refugees coming to our land.
Counterspeech: Instead, we need to show compassion and sympathy to people fleeing persecution.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be rejected out of hand.
Counterspeech: This is not true. Islam is a way of life for many different people, and it can't be simply 'rejected' because you don't like it.

Hate Speech: The problem with Islam is that it promotes murder, sexual perversion, violence against women, and theft.
Counterspeech: A religion can be both violent and also be a peaceful one. Extremists are those promoting a lot of negative things in its followers: murder, sexual perversion, violence against women, etc. But extremists are a small part of Islam.

Hate Speech: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
Counterspeech: Many people claim that they are tolerant and not homophobic, but when I read such statements I don't see any evidence of that.

Hate Speech: I don't like how some people approves homosexuals. They are different to us in so many ways, and they should be blamed for their evil choices.
Counterspeech: People should be able to live openly their relationships. Homosexuality is not a 'choice', it's a form of love.

Hate Speech: Above all Islam is a religion of conquest.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion of peaceful coexistence, that has brought many good things to so many.

Hate Speech: Niggas in the ghetto: that's where they belong.
Counterspeech: If these people are still there it's because they are discriminated against. The press is full of stories about the people of colour who have dropped out of the workforce or given up on life after long years of fierce struggle against racism. They deserve our sympathy and respect.

Hate Speech: mentally ill people should be isolated from society because they are dangerous.
Counterspeech: The dangerous ones are the one who spread misinformation after knowing only half of the facts, like you

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, they need a man to take care of them.
Counterspeech: This is both demeaning and hurtful to women. Please consider the approprieteness of your thoughts before you speak them in public.

Hate Speech: Go and read the Protocols of the elders of Zion if you haven’t. Everything is orchestrated..
Counterspeech: The alleged conspiracy of the protocols is so plainly fictional that it is nothing but bad fiction. It lacks even the colors of what normal fantasy books needs to possess. How is it possible that a person with a modicum of education can swallow such drivel?

Hate Speech: All black people are rapists.
Counterspeech: We need to work together to address the main problems that challenge us today and in doing this we should not judge other people by the colour of their skin.

Hate Speech: Immigrants take our jobs
Counterspeech: Isn't it bettter to have people working hard and doing a good job, regardless of where they come from?

Hate Speech: Gay perverts are a danger to children because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
Counterspeech: Gays and lesbians are not committing acts of child abuse. To suggest otherwise is a lie perpetuated by the extreme right wing to stir up fear.

Hate Speech: Jewesses are a burden to society.
Counterspeech: Both antisemitic and sexist. How do you sleep at night knowing how many people you hate?

Hate Speech: All nigga are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
Counterspeech: This guy is going to lose it when he realises who he has descended from.

Hate Speech: We cannot coexist in a society with millions of strangers that disrespect our culture and other human beings.
Counterspeech: On the contrary: living in a multicultural society encourages mutual understanding and respect for humanity.

Hate Speech: Muslims are invading us. They are not welcome here.
Counterspeech: The EU and UK have laws against discrimination based on religion. Maybe you should check them out.

Hate Speech: Jews secretly control the world.
Counterspeech: Weird, considering they have been persecuted over the course of history. Your argument makes no sense.

Hate Speech: If Muslims do not accept our standards, we have a problem. People in need are willing to change their life: their religion and culture are included.
Counterspeech: I think this statement needs some further clarification. What does it mean to be 'in need' to you?

Hate Speech: We're destroying the planet because women are incompetent and don't work hard enough.
Counterspeech: This is on me, yesterday faked sick at work to binge watch Sherlock and BOOM!! Still collecting pieces of exploded Earth from Venus. At least completed Sherlock luckily. #sarcasm.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike.
Counterspeech: All personalities are different. The traits you are describing may be predominant in some, while some women might be completely opposite. What you need to do is learn to respect all women.

Hate Speech: In the West, women have legal equality, equal rights, and are protected from discrimination: they should stop busting our balls and whining.
Counterspeech: Just because there is less evidence of oppression does not mean there is none, and you can find many examples in the newspaper everyday.

Hate Speech: If women wanted to control their fertility they would be prostitutes.
Counterspeech: It a wrong to believe that women cannot be incharge of their fertility. This perpetutes misogynistic notions about women.

Hate Speech: Jews are cheap and only care about their comrades.
Counterspeech: On the other hand, I do not care about anything else apart from my dear dog.

Hate Speech: Gays should be banned from Europe and the US.
Counterspeech: The European Convention on Human Rights and the US Constitution guarantee equal rights to all, regardless of sexual orientation.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome here, they are only an obstacle to our success.
Counterspeech: Diversity is a strength, not a weakness. Don't you think so?

Hate Speech: They came to rape, pillage and destroy our country.
Counterspeech: It is easy to accuse someone of being a rapist without evidence. Not a huge difference with what you're doing right now, is it?

Hate Speech: Muslims are violent and should be banned.
Counterspeech: Many Muslims around the world are peaceful people who have helped create much of the wealth of our country. It is not a bad thing to have different beliefs and ways of life.

Hate Speech: What the hell are you talking about? Arabs are different, they don't even speak English.
Counterspeech: Although they may not share a language and a common history, we should respect their differences.

Hate Speech: Most criminals are Muslims. The question is why don't we ban them?
Counterspeech: But the real question is: where is the evidence?

Hate Speech: Islam is not about love, it is a death cult.
Counterspeech: In this case, the term 'death cult' is being used to label a religious movement, and is, in itself as an extremist tactic. The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and helpful people.

Hate Speech: Women don't belong in politics.
Counterspeech: Are you kidding? I think Minnie Mouse would make a great president.

Hate Speech: Faggots are perverts and want to indoctrinate our children. Let's ban them from schools!
Counterspeech: Limiting any healthy individual from donating is discriminatory, you should know that.

Hate Speech: mentally disabled people are anti-social
Counterspeech: You are promoting Ableism that creates a social sphere where people with visible disability may be ignored, infantilized, mistreated, or abused due to others’ ignorance or discomfort with disability.

Hate Speech: We must go back to when this country was only ours. We can't live in peace with all these Jews.
Counterspeech: Many cultures and religions have co-existed peacefully for hundreds if not thousands of years. What you are saying is simply not true.

Hate Speech: People with disabilities shouldn't be listened to.
Counterspeech: You might be judging others by their disabilities, but this is bad. There is value in listening to others, and understanding their points of view, regardless of their mental or physical condition.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in a modern Western country.
Counterspeech: In a democratic society, people can have different views and beliefs. It is an inherent part of a vibrant society to be allowed to express those beliefs, and beliefs can coexist peacefully.

Hate Speech: Women are, honestly, objects for men's sexual gratification.
Counterspeech: Of course, this makes me angry. We are conditioned from day one to conform to a certain norm of femininity.

Hate Speech: The muslims do not have a place in civilized Europe.
Counterspeech: I find it hard to see why a group of people is incompatible with the rest of the society.

Hate Speech: Islam is a degenerate, anti-human, anti-western ideology.
Counterspeech: It's not true that all Muslims are anti-western. Many Muslims are peaceful and understanding.

Hate Speech: It is okay to discriminate against Jews.
Counterspeech: Discrimination on the basis of race, gender, religion and sexuality are all not okay. You feelings are irrelavant in this topic.

Hate Speech: It is ok to be racist against blacks.
Counterspeech: Are you capable of giving an explanation as to why you think that it is okay to be racist against any ethnic group?

Hate Speech: Muslims demand locals to not walk their dogs in public because it's againt the Sharia and they feel it as disrespectful.
Counterspeech: This was a prank planned by non-muslims on 4chan. Muslim do not mind if you take your dogs out for a walk. This blog post shows the thread it came from;

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children's education.
Counterspeech: People with Down Syndrome should be taught in mainstream education, because diversity is an enrichment for all.

Hate Speech: Gays are all rapists, child molesters, and sexual perverts.
Counterspeech: Your claim about homosexuals is not supported by evidence, where are you getting the imformation that supports these nonsensical assertions.

Hate Speech: Women should not vote. Period.
Counterspeech: All people have the right to vote. Of course you also have the right to voice your opinion about the matter. But I also have the right to criticize your position.

Hate Speech: The only nation Jews don’t hate is their own and they are flooding Europe with Africans and Muslims.
Counterspeech: People bring such unbelievable ideas to hide their prejudice and hate behind them

Hate Speech: If a woman wants an abortion we will kill them.
Counterspeech: Should the decision not be solely a woman's? Why do you think you can control their actions?

Hate Speech: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome in the UK! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
Counterspeech: The Middle East and Africa are countries that have suffered from centuries of colonialism, racism and war. The state of refugees in the UK is the result of these people seeking a peaceful place to live.

Hate Speech: The Nazi regime killed six million Jews. The Nazi regime also persecuted political opponents, gays, women, and bisexuals. And they were right, the Nazi race is superior.
Counterspeech: What exactly are you talking about? What's the "Nazi" race? What is in your heart?

Hate Speech: If Muslims in Britain were only like other Europeans, we could be proud.
Counterspeech: We should be proud of diversity reagrdless of the face it comes with. Isn't tolerance one of the thinds we should be pround about as Europeans?

Hate Speech: Women should obey to their husbands.
Counterspeech: Women are obliged to obey the laws and rules of society, just as men are obliged to obey the laws and rules of society. Not to their partners'.

Hate Speech: Gays should never be allowed to donate blood: they are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers!
Counterspeech: I'm sure this guy, while bleeding out, would ask the doctors if the blood they are transfusing came from a straight or gay person.

Hate Speech: The Holocaust never happened.
Counterspeech: The holocaust happened. It's a sad chapter in human history. The Holocaust was a global catastrophe and a historic fact. To assign priority to one God or to a different God, is a personal choice. But attributing human rights to all, regardless of this, is the right thing to do.

Hate Speech: Women are weak and I don't care if they cannot stand up for themself.
Counterspeech: You can't blame the victim for being weak. Would it have been different for you if the victim was a man?

Hate Speech: Woman and feminist do not want equal rights and opportunity: they aretrying to take over society.
Counterspeech: This is wrong on so many levels, we are trying to explain to you that we do not want less rights for men, but the same level for women. What is so hard to understand here!

Hate Speech: Islam is a disease, it is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counterspeech: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, even if your own is quite unfounded, to put it mildly.

Hate Speech: Calling for equality is only promoted by insecure women like you.
Counterspeech: Discrimination against women is a huge problem in our society. We need to tackle it head on, rather than demonising groups or individuals.

Hate Speech: If a Muslim child were to behave in such a way towards another child it would be stereotyped as 'Jihadist', this is terrorism not a religion!
Counterspeech: Not all Muslims are terrorists, and I do not want to cause offence, but what you said is just not true.

Hate Speech: If a woman says she wants an abortion, she’s a cunt.
Counterspeech: There can be several life-threatening reasons as to why a woman would want an abortion, but nevertheless, it is a woman's and a woman's own opinion about what she can or cannot do with her body.

Hate Speech: Gays are perverts, they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers.
Counterspeech: Do you have a PhD in stereotyping? Because you are excelling

Hate Speech: We should start a witch hunt against those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
Counterspeech: Those are harmful words to use, don't you think? How would a witch hunt be acceptable in a democratic society?

Hate Speech: disabled: they should not be allowed to work.
Counterspeech: Do you not believe in equality at the workplace? How can you be bias free when you express ableist opinions like this?

Hate Speech: Those women are all the same: stupid and unreliable.
Counterspeech: If you can't trust someone because of the way they are born, what hope does the world have for everyone?

Hate Speech: Faggots: They are the problem. Luckily they are few.
Counterspeech: Homophobes: They are the problem. Unfortuntly, I seem to find a lot online.

Hate Speech: Black folks have ugly skin.
Counterspeech: The gall you have to say something as insensitive as that, damn. Try and be less racist.

Hate Speech: There is a war going on and it is perpetrated by the Muslim community. All Muslims are hostile.
Counterspeech: The media are helping to create the perception that all Muslims are hostile. If your prejudice is against Muslims, on the same ground you can also be against anyone else.

Hate Speech: Women have no place in a male-dominated society.
Counterspeech: If a desire to be respected exists for a man, don't you think it could for a woman as well?

Hate Speech: muslim folks don't deserve to be in america.
Counterspeech: Muslims have the full trust and confidence of the church. That's why they are represented in every role in our society. It is an honour to be able to work with people from different religions in a way that allows you to respect and understand their cultures.

Hate Speech: Black people are the real racists. They say they want equality, but they actually want to give preference to black people.
Counterspeech: That is the whole point, they don't want less for white people, they just want to be treated fairly and be given the same opportunities that others already get.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
Counterspeech: The characteristics you are referring to are a strength, not weakness. Spreading this kind of gender bias is exactly why the patriarchy needs to stop.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counterspeech: It is clear that you know nothing about how Muslims have loved here for centuries and are a part of our communty.

Hate Speech: All women are whining and complaining about men's rights, but they are really just whining and complaining about how they are not wanted. They only deserve it.
Counterspeech: What are you trying to say? That women don't want rights?

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and cannot be our friend.
Counterspeech: Muslims have different customs and beliefs but this doesn't make it impossible for them to be welcome.

Hate Speech: Gays are sick and perverts, they are an abomination of this planet.
Counterspeech: Is that why you feel that way about homosexuals? They are not sick, are they? And if you are gay you are not a pervert by default.

Hate Speech: LGBTs are sick. They should be isolated and medically cured.

Hate Speech: White race is superior. Niggas are just a bunch of criminals.

Hate Speech: Muslims are just sick. They are not interested in Western culture.

Hate Speech: Women should not be considered in the same way as men.

Hate Speech: Down syndrome is a problem for everybody, it is a disability that can't be cured. The sooner we get rid of it the better it will be for everybody.

Hate Speech: African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men.

Hate Speech: Muslims have nothing to do with our country. They have nothing to do with our history.

Counterspeech: Rape is always a crime, regardless of who the rapist is. It is not about nationality, it is about violence and disrespect for others. We must try to address the root causes of crime instead of demonising people for their origin.

Hate Speech: The UK was a better place when it welcomed only true British citizens, and not those filthy Muslims we accept in our country nowadays.
Counterspeech: The UK has always been a cosmopolitan society, in which people from a huge range of backgrounds and religions have lived side-by-side. So you are totally wrong.

Hate Speech: Calling for equality is only promoted by insecure women like you.
Counterspeech: I envy people who will never real this.

Hate Speech: We would be better off without Jews who want to rule the world like in the Bible.
Counterspeech: The world is better off without antisemitism, racism, sexism, ableism and intolerance. Don't you think so?

Hate Speech: Indians are cheap, materialistic and lazy, and they shouldn't be accepted in Europe.
Counterspeech: Yeah and you bet we are proud of being cheap. It's not a bad thing you idiot.

Hate Speech: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
Counterspeech: Just as much as the Bible would. Is your point that in today's society we are all more tolerant? After all, attitudes towards Christians, Jews and Muslims have all moved with the times.

Hate Speech: muslim folks don't deserve to live.
Counterspeech: Muslims deserve to live just as people of other faiths, and they deserve the same respect as you do.

Hate Speech: Faggots are ruining this country. They must go away!
Counterspeech: Do you think that's true? We are a country where people can live by the values set out in the US constitution, and not by fear.

Hate Speech: migrants steal our jobs
Counterspeech: Many migrants are treated like modern day slaves by those that exploit their vulnerability. In fact, they often accept jobs that we do not want to do anymore.

Hate Speech: It is one law for Muslims and another law for us.
Counterspeech: Evidence please?

Hate Speech: Black people have never been peaceful people, they are always seeking trouble.
Counterspeech: This is wrong on so many levels.

Hate Speech: Women need to accept that they are weak, they must be submissive to men.
Counterspeech: I want women to be strong and independent and able to take up any career they want. If women choose to be submissive to men then that is their choice, but you cannot suggest that being treated this way in spite of their choices is ok.

Hate Speech: The holocaust is just a minor event in WWII.
Counterspeech: Are you aware of how many Jews have been executed?

Hate Speech: Jews are just a bunch of criminals
Counterspeech: Perhaps the most offensive part of this allegation is that it is made to delegitimize all Jews. This accusation is aimed at stigmatizing a group that is generally not guilty of any crime. Another example would be "All Pakistani are potential terrorists".

Hate Speech: The ideology of National Socialism is nothing to be ashamed of.
Counterspeech: National Socialism is a parasitic, criminal and murderous ideology that killed millions of people.

Hate Speech: No one should be allowed to accept LGBT people.
Counterspeech: If you don't accept LGBT people, you won't easily find other ways to accept that society is made by diverse people all capable of love.

Hate Speech: Cultures have never been fair and this is a fact. Muslims for example are just a bunch of misogynist monkeys!
Counterspeech: we shouldn't point the finger at a religion/culture for some old commandment. Muslims have evolved and many of them respect women as much as you and me. Live and let live.

Hate Speech: Jews are ruling the World, there is plenty of evidence.
Counterspeech: Are you counting all the anti-Semitic things people say about Jews as 'plenty of evidence'?

Hate Speech: I do not want muslims in my country. They mustn't be part of society.
Counterspeech: What is important is that you respect people who hold different beliefs, as they do with your particular faith.

Hate Speech: Refugees are a burden and a danger to our country.
Counterspeech: Our immigration policy is geared for a modern, diverse, and integrated society. Refugees are welcome, regardless of their nationality, and it is good for us to have them in our country.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives.
Counterspeech: Maybe you should consider that not all women are childlike, and that some women are 'childlike' with children!

Hate Speech: I hate feminists. They are such a bunch of cry babies and unpleasant people.
Counterspeech: You have your ideas about feminism twisted, stop looking at it from your own perspective and start looking at it from women's perspective instead.

Hate Speech: Muslims: you are a menace. If you love our country, you should leave it.
Counterspeech: Many Muslims have helped building our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

Hate Speech: All gay are paedophiles.
Counterspeech: Do you consider this statement a true one? I wouldn't go as far as to say that all homophobes are in need of therapy, would you?

Hate Speech: Without migration, Britain’s housing problems would be solved
Counterspeech: Without you, Britain's racism problem would be solved.

Hate Speech: If we allowed women to drive we'd have car accidents all the time.
Counterspeech: Do you think it's more likely that you get injured by a woman in a car crash? Probably, it is more likely to get seriously hurt by any person not following the rules of the road.

Hate Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes rape, torture, murder and slavery.
Counterspeech: There is no evidence for the statements you made, and the Koran does not advocate any of those actions.

Hate Speech: Without migration, Britain’s housing problems would be solved
Counterspeech: Of course, migration adds to housing demand, but the problem is structural given a housing stock that is well short of what's required.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
Counterspeech: People who have never even met a Muslim can understand one.

Hate Speech: Jews are just a bunch of whining pussies
Counterspeech: They suffer more than anyone else, I would not define it as 'whining'.

Hate Speech: Jews do not belong to this planet.
Counterspeech: Could it be that all the Jews on this planet are descended from an extraterrestrial race? Maybe they came here riding a pink unicorn! Seems legit... don't you think?

Hate Speech: The Quran is not compatible with Western culture.
Counterspeech: The Quran contains verses that promote peace and harmony in the world, rather than hostility and conflict.

Hate Speech: Must be hard being gay. They have to do everything we do but also find the time to molest children.
Counterspeech: How would you feel about being accused of molesting children, just because of your sexual orientation?

Hate Speech: Fags, lesbians, trans are so few we better ignore them rather than waste time for their rights.
Counterspeech: Do you know how many LGBT people live in your own country? If not, look for information: there are many. Moreover, LGBT people are not only excluded from many societies, but are also harassed and attacked all over the world.

Hate Speech: A Muslim's only real allegiance is to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.)
Counterspeech: This is not true. Muslims can have a good relationship with Western societies if they are accepted as peers. Actually, not all Muslims are incompatible with Western societies. Many Muslims have lived in our societies for many years without any problem.

Hate Speech: Women are there to fulfill men desires. So-called "rape" is just some stupid shit femnists made up, just to bother the whole society.
Counterspeech: Let's look at the data: by 2020, over 40% of women in the US have encountered sexual violence. This is something to be scared of.

Hate Speech: Downies are just sick people who cannot integrate in society because of their disease.
Counterspeech: This is not true, people suffering from conditions like Down syndrome can still help and contribute to society

Hate Speech: Faggots: They are the problem. Luckily they are few.
Counterspeech: Perhaps it is time you take a look at some of the profiles on dating site such as okcupid. You can see that many of the profiles are of gay men. BTW: gays do not appear to be the real problem here.

Hate Speech: All homosexuals should be thrown in a gas chamber.
Counterspeech: Wouldn't it be better to use some of our common sense to try to accept who is different, instead of bringing back dark pages of Europe's history?

Hate Speech: Gays are just pathetic people who have low self-esteem.
Counterspeech: How would you feel if someone you just met had the audacity to say such a thing about you? Do you think that being gay would make you a pathetic person?

Hate Speech: Women are just objects for men. If they are ugly, they have no value.
Counterspeech: A woman's value is defined not by her anatomy, but by who she is as a person.

Hate Speech: I think jihad is a global problem and we should bomb it out of existence.
Counterspeech: We must understand and address the true causes behind terrorist attacks, so that we can prevent future ones.

Hate Speech: All I see when I walk into a bar is a bunch of horny, unintelligent, arrogant young gay men.
Counterspeech: You are probably walking into a bar whose customers do not interest you. And if you think hard, you will find out whether you are interested in the bar or in the people there. Also, not all gays are like you described them.

Hate Speech: Jews have no place here. They are not a part of our country.
Counterspeech: There is no reason to fear the Jews, as they are a very friendly people.

Hate Speech: Allowing Islamic immigration and refugees into the UK is a direct threat to the security of the whole Western Europe.
Counterspeech: How did you arrive to this conclusion? Can you really say that all Muslims, even the ones who have been living here for years, are dangerous?

Hate Speech: If our aim is to be a 'better' society, it is time to stop giving in to tribalism and Islam and stop treating people of different faiths with respect.
Counterspeech: Being respectful to people of other faiths can make us a better, more compassionate, tolerant and welcoming society.

Hate Speech: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
Counterspeech: Do you not think that all crimes are crimes, regardless of whether or not they are committed by members of different racial or ethnic backgrounds?

Hate Speech: Are you saying that we should put illegal immigrants in houses? You have to be kidding!
Counterspeech: Once they get a refugee status, they can choose where to live, but they have to pay for their rent or ask for government help – like any UK citizen.

Hate Speech: Islam is just a virus, it cannot coexist with modern science and technology. Muslims should be banned.
Counterspeech: We should not worry so much about a small minority of backwards-looking thinkers among Muslims. We usually try to deal with the issue on an individual basis, not banning a whole religious group.

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
Counterspeech: Since when is the religious belonging of the individual a matter for democratic leaders to decide where 'the place' is for someone?

Hate Speech: Muslims are spreading cancer all around the world.
Counterspeech: Muslims are not to blame, there is no relation between Islam and cancer.

Hate Speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counterspeech: The majority of Muslims worldwide are peaceful.

Hate Speech: We should stop gays from being part of our society, they are spreading their illness.
Counterspeech: Homosexuality is not a disease and every person in our society should be accepted equally, regardless of their sexual orientation.

Hate Speech: Gays are inherently evil. We cannot accept gays in our community. We cannot coexist with an infertile perversion that will put an end to our species.
Counterspeech: I find the idea that LGBT people are inherently bad people deeply offensive. I find it deeply troubling that someone would want to persecute someone on the basis of their sexual orientation.

Hate Speech: Black minorities vote to strip wealth, power and opportunity from White people.
Counterspeech: Minorities would never hope for such an impact on the rest of the society. Instead, they vote for the equal wealth, power, and opportunity for everyone.

Hate Speech: Immigrants invade countries.
Counterspeech: They come here to work, study, or visit their families. Also, they contribute to our society.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are only here to replace our talented people.
Counterspeech: The choice to leave one's home country is likley to be one made out of fear and despiration, rather than one based on some half-baked conspiracy about 'replacement'.

Hate Speech: Islam is not about peace. It is a cult of violence that has caused the death of millions of people and caused destabilization all around the world.
Counterspeech: There are extremist groups operating in the name of many faiths. This does not correspond to Islam religion as a whole. That is why we must deal with these groups head on.

Hate Speech: The Koran is not about peace. It is a violent book that should be banned from schools.
Counterspeech: The Koran is about belief and love, not war and bloodshed.

Hate Speech: The only ones in favour of Islam and Muslims are those ignorant about what it truly is.
Counterspeech: A person advocating against freedom of religion is the most ignorant person, however we see it.

Hate Speech: They are fine in the trailer parks.
Counterspeech: No parent of any ethnicity would be happy to raise their children in the trailer parks, where there is neither drinking water nor electricity!

Hate Speech: Western culture is failing in many ways, such as not seeing women as sex objects. They should be seen as they are: a piece of meat intended to satisfy men instincts.
Counterspeech: Are you sqaure root of -1? Because I can't believe you are real.

Hate Speech: We are ruled by mongrels, we are slaves and will be slaves forever. We are the victims of a conspiracy aiming at replacing us.
Counterspeech: There is no such thing as a "mongrelisation" of our country caused by immigrants. We should see foreigners as a part of our culture, and know that the majority of immigrants in this country are here for economic reasons.

Hate Speech: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior.
Counterspeech: Instead of you, I would prefer that medical experts take all decisions regarding this. So if they feel it's safe, it probably is.

Hate Speech: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay marriage.
Counterspeech: Marriage should be a choice for all, irrespective of the gender of partners..

Hate Speech: Jews are cruel and insensitive.
Counterspeech: It is not true that being Jewish makes you cruel. It just makes you a believer of a particular faith.

Hate Speech: Women are essentially childlike and don't have the potential to reach their full potential.
Counterspeech: It is not true. You should really look into stuff before you spread hate like this online.

Hate Speech: This country will not welcome Muslims.
Counterspeech: Why wouldn't Muslims be welcome in our country? Why do you say that?

Hate Speech: women should be submissive to men.
Counterspeech: Yes, how dare they be more qualified than men and take up positions of power!

Hate Speech: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.
Counterspeech: What do you mean by 'less educated'? Don't you think that they can contribute to society if accepted rather than being faced with prejudice?

Hate Speech: I don't want gays in my wedding. I don't want gays in the military. I don't want gays in my community.
Counterspeech: Participation in society should not be restricted, it should be open to anyone who wishes to participate, regardless of their sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion. The Universal Declaration of Human Rights opposes discrimination on the grounds of sexual orientation in Article 2.

Hate Speech: Blacks are an abomination in human form. They should be exterminated.
Counterspeech: I find it hard to understand why the extermination of a race would be a solution for our problems.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are entering the U.S. just to obtain welfare and other benefits.
Counterspeech: Most immigrants coming to our country work hard to take care of their families. Many studies have shown that immigrants tend to pay more in taxes than they receive in benefits. This means that the taxes they pay cover the cost of things like public education and healthcare of others.

Hate Speech: Black people are weak and I don't care about them.
Counterspeech: For centuries, African American people have been subjected to racism and discrimination in virtually every aspect of life. What you should do, is read and try to understand their difficulties.

Hate Speech: We need to stop migrants today. They are all terrorists!
Counterspeech: What about the terrorist attacks that have happened in the past despite the lack of migration?

Hate Speech: We must put a stop to migrants and ban them from EU.
Counterspeech: Migrants are fleeing from war and poverty. They are entitled to seek refuge in the EU. They should be protected, not banned.

Hate Speech: Blacks are born subhuman, incapable of feeling love.
Counterspeech: Humans, be it any gender, race, religion, are always wired to feel the same emotions, and are capable of feeling love, sympathy, kindness and friendship.

Hate Speech: Without migration, Britain’s housing problems would be solved
Counterspeech: Where are your statistics from? Can we see your calculations?

Hate Speech: Is it really ok to date someone of the same sex? I find it highly questionable.
Counterspeech: For someone who is dating to find love, for no reason at all would I find this to be questionable.

Hate Speech: women falsely accuse men of harrassment.
Counterspeech: You are disregarding the women who actually go through traumatic instances. This is not okay.

Hate Speech: Mentally disabled folks are criminals.
Counterspeech: There are a variety of intellectual and creative disabilities, and they are not crimes. How can you say otherwise?

Hate Speech: Islam has no place in a modern nation.
Counterspeech: Why do you claim so?

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in my country.
Counterspeech: Do you really want a country with people from a particular religion only?

Hate Speech: Blacks are just a bunch of animals that only exist to destroy good white people.
Counterspeech: Aren't those people raised as white supremacists much more harmful to a cohesive society?

Hate Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence.
Counterspeech: Do you know that in many countries in the world the majority of Muslims are in favour of the Constitution and in favour of democracy? Do you really think that a few extremists represent them all?

Hate Speech: Jews not only run Hollywood, they also control the world economy
Counterspeech: Jews have played an important part in the development of the movie industry and some find themselves in high-profile positions. But you only need to watch the Academy Awards to see that Jews do not dominate the movie industry. Likewise, Jews constitute a small minority of the heads of Fortune 500 companies.

Hate Speech: We have a lot of issues in the UK, and now we are also paying NGOs to rescue migrants. How many other financial scandals still have to be annouonced to the tax payers?
Counterspeech: So now you are against public welfare? How can you let this propaganda sway your opinions against humanity?

Hate Speech: Sexual deviancy: this is what they choose. LGBT are a scourge to society.
Counterspeech: First of all, it is called 'sexual orientation' and is not a matter of preference, rather of fact.

Hate Speech: Women can't possibly be rational. Their minds are too limited.
Counterspeech: All human beings are rational, some more than others regardless of their gender.

Hate Speech: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine dressed disguised as a religion so that it can spread across our tolerant Christian world. Enough IS ENOUGH!
Counterspeech: I only wish followers of all religions and none were more tolerant. For a tolerant Christian world there sure is a lot of discrimination and hate crime.

Hate Speech: Jews secretly control the world.
Counterspeech: if Jews really ran or controlled the world, how is it possible that they have been systematically persecuted over the last several thousand years? Weird notion of control...

Hate Speech: Muslims are a burden to society.
Counterspeech: The fact is that Islam preaches tolerance, interdepence and social justice. This faith does not promote violence and hostility like you suggest.

Hate Speech: I think I heard on the news yesterday that trans women are a problem in the US. Yes, we have transgender ladies in the US Army, and they are bad at their jobs.
Counterspeech: I am sure you typed this comment from your couch at home. So zero credibility.

Hate Speech: We should stop gays from marrying and have a ban on same sex relationships.
Counterspeech: People of different sexualities can live openly together, even if they do not get married. Same sex relationships are recognised in a number of countries, so why should we be any different?

Hate Speech: mentally disabled folks deserve to be abused
Counterspeech: This is not true, disabled people deserve to be protected from harm, they are people who face many issues already, let's not add emotional distress.

Hate Speech: Blacks do drugs, they're a menace to society, they're violent, they're stupid, and they should all be put in prison.
Counterspeech: Drugs are only harmful to people using them and if you are a violent person you should be put in prison. Doesn't matter what their skin colour is.

Hate Speech: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose out civilisation.
Counterspeech: Feminism is about equal rights between men and women, and challenges socially imposed burdens upon both men and women.

Hate Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that should be banned.
Counterspeech:
Islamism is a complex phenomenon with multiple dimensions and various
ramifications. It is not totalitarian.

Hate Speech: MIgrants are not running away from wars.
Counterspeech: If they did not escape from wars, do you think that they would try to cross the sea on makeshift boats putting their lives at stake?

Hate Speech: Downies are dumb
Counterspeech: quite frankly, there is no way for you to completely understand how it is to live as a disabled person until you become disabled yourself. Because seeing it is very, very different from living it

Hate Speech: foreigners and immigrants take our jobs
Counterspeech: Don't you think they are doing the jobs that we were not doing?

Hate Speech: All gays are just perverts, promiscuous and sex addicts.
Counterspeech: The idea that LGBT+ people are promiscuous is just false. Most of the time, they are just as attracted to other people as anyone else.

Hate Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
Counterspeech: Islam is not a religion of child molesters, and Muslims are not a 'bundle of child molesters'. Why do you say so?

Hate Speech: Oh my gosh this fucking Muslims are disgusting! Where did they learn to act like this? I really don't like these guys! I hate these disgusting twats!
Counterspeech: Strong language coming from someone with two braincells.

Hate Speech: Black Americans are criminals and drug addicts. They should go to jail.
Counterspeech: They just need respect, not a jail sentence for being people of color. You need to be considerate of all humans.

Hate Speech: I hate negros: they killed a cop!
Counterspeech: Sorry about your loss. I know your pain. The murderers will be charged, but remember that not all POC are killers.

Hate Speech: All women are inherently subhuman.
Counterspeech: Well, in this day and age, the notion that some women are subhuman is totally intolerable.

Hate Speech: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
Counterspeech: I believe that Jews just desire the same rights to practice their religion as anyone else.

Hate Speech: Jews have a lot in common with monkeys: They are good at sex.
Counterspeech: So many similarities between Jews and apes? What is wrong with them? Is it because of their religion?

Hate Speech: This is not the USA. We do not accept immigrants. And if they live here, they should have no rights since they are not true citizens.
Counterspeech: Migrants have full human rights, and are proud of their origin.

Hate Speech: Jews made the 9/11 attack.
Counterspeech: It is easier to blame one group for everything bad that happens rather than trying to understand the complex and multifaceted causes of problems.

Hate Speech: Islam has no place in civilised Europe
Counterspeech: Islam has always been a part of Europe, it's just the idea of inclusion that hasn't been part of our society.

Hate Speech: All foreigners are ruining our own land.
Counterspeech: How are they ruining this country? As far as I see they are a valuable addition to our land.

Hate Speech: Islam is irrational and incompatible with science.
Counterspeech: Ever heard of Al-Khawarizmi? You have him to thank for quite a lot of mathematics and astronomy!

Hate Speech: Blacks are genetically less rational than other races.
Counterspeech: Biologically, there is not a shred of evidence to back your statement up. All humans are genetically identical, and the only difference between you and a black person is the amount of melanin in your skin, which depends on evironmental factors.

Hate Speech: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
Counterspeech: Society has evolved: there are many people, regardless of gender, that consider women to be full members of society with full human rights.

Hate Speech: Muslims just want to impose Islam on their children. This is not what democracy is all about!
Counterspeech: The democratic right of people to express their beliefs and practice their religion is enshrined in the constitution.

Hate Speech: Women are basically childlike and are not interested in anything. The only thing they are interested in is their children.
Counterspeech: To claim that women are "childlike" is an unfortunate cultural stereotype that has negative effects on how women perceive themselves.

Hate Speech: Migrants are not running away from wars.
Counterspeech: It is true, they often run away from persecution, violence and hunger. If I were in the same situation, I would not think twice about escaping. Wouldn't you do the same?

Hate Speech: I am not a Muslim, I am an American citizen. I am not a member of any mosque or a religious group. I am offended by those muslisms religious symbols.
Counterspeech: You should not be offended by religious symbols, stop spreading hate.

Hate Speech: We must put an end to immigration. Islam is a disease that is destroying Europe.
Counterspeech: Actually, immigration has been a part of civilization for centuries, and all countries taking in refugees seem to have evolved quite well. So Europe should have no issue with this.

Hate Speech: We shouldn't welcome Muslim refugees. They are most likely to perpetrate terrorist attacks in Europe.
Counterspeech: Muslims have been and continue to be a part of Europe for centuries. They have given so much to our society and culture. They have enriched our lives and we should not be afraid of them.

Hate Speech: Islam is not about peace. It is a violent religion.
Counterspeech: The problems you are referring to are the result of the spread of violent ideologies. Extremists are responsible, not Islam.

Hate Speech: women are basically childlike, incapable of serious thought and emotion. They should have no equal rights.
Counterspeech: Any difference between men and women is a part of socialization and not genetic coding. We should not equate that with anything. Learn to love each other.

Hate Speech: We can't accept all Muslims in our country. They are not our brothers and sisters, they are terrorists.
Counterspeech: In fact many Muslims live in peaceful coexistence with their fellow citizens.

Hate Speech: Islam is just a misogynistic cult.
Counterspeech: Islam is a religion, and all religions are about love, not hate.

Hate Speech: Only the media are interested in the truth about refugees. I understand that you are trying to build bridges but to have so many immigrants is becoming increasingly toxic.
Counterspeech: The press have a responsibility to provide a more truthful and up-to-date story, especially in a country such as ours, in a way that the misinformation that you also seem to be a victim of, can be reduced.

Hate Speech: Women are essentially childlike, unable to understand the complexity of the world.
Counterspeech: We need to stop this ingrained mindset that women are inferior and start treating them like human beings.

Hate Speech: Women should accept their bodies as they are, weak and inferior, and live a healthy life according to this.
Counterspeech: Women are human beings, and deserve respect. Feminism is about equality, not dominance.

Hate Speech: Muslim folks are violent.
Counterspeech: Can't violence be predominant in other religions as well?

Hate Speech: Muslims can never be a part of the progressive Western Soceity.
Counterspeech: Western societies are compatible with all religions including Islam, so why would you say something like that about it? How many Muslims do you know? They are an important minority in a country that is used to a lot of different cultures and religions.

Hate Speech: Jews are different.
Counterspeech: Your statement shows that you are not familiar with the term 'different'. If you did know the definition, you would find this line of thinking very annoying.

Hate Speech: All negroes are inherently violent and unstable.
Counterspeech: The idea that every black person is violent or unstable is utterly false. And you have no data to back it up.

Hate Speech: We don't need immigrants! There are plenty of them just waiting to replace us.
Counterspeech: The challenge of integration is a noble one and we should pursue it.

Hate Speech: We are different: slant eyes denote stupid people.
Counterspeech: This sounds like xenophobia, whichever eyes people see it from.

Hate Speech: Jews are a disease, they have no place in civilised Europe.
Counterspeech: They have as much to contribute as anyone else.

Hate Speech: Women do not want to be ruled by men, and this is just unacceptable.
Counterspeech: A woman should not have to choose who to be ruled by. She should be respected.

Hate Speech: Migrants in the UK don't pay income tax, but they receive public services. They should have no say in our country.
Counterspeech: Over many generations they have contributed so much to our country that they should have a say.

Hate Speech: Only the 6% of Nobel Laureates are women! Now, that says a lot about their incompetence.
Counterspeech: This doesn't mean that only the 6% of all scientists are women. What I mean is that this figure does not include those who have gone unpublished or who never entered the scientific literature, let alone the problem of gender discrimination.

Hate Speech: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with £1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
Counterspeech: There are so many empty homes in our country that we could house every single homeless person, without the need to build a single apartment. It is the government that chooses not to. Homelessness is about wealth inequality not migration. If you genuinely care about poverty you need to question power structures and wealth distribution.

Hate Speech: Islam is a a perversion of the true meaning of Christianity.
Counterspeech: Do you think that Christianity is the only true faith?

Hate Speech: Blacks have always inhabited this planet before we evolved and still do. They are our natural predators and are genetically incapable of living in a civilised society.
Counterspeech: Do you even know the definition of predators? We are the same species, if you had even an ounce of consideration you would know that.

Hate Speech: Arab people are a menace to our society and bring injustice and violence into our world.
Counterspeech: I think the Arab community is more than capable of coming together and creating a more just and peaceful world.

Hate Speech: We can't accept all Muslims in our country. They are not our brothers and sisters, they are terrorists.
Counterspeech: Not all Muslims are involved in terrorist activities. In fact many Muslims live in peaceful coexistence with their fellow citizens.

Hate Speech: Islam is a cult. It has no place in 21st century societies.
Counterspeech: What do you mean by Islam is a cult? Do you have any proof for this statement?

Hate Speech: Islam is a cancer on European culture and people should stop worshipping its devil.
Counterspeech: Refrain from making such hateful comments against a religion you have a problem against.

Hate Speech: Immigrants have no right to live in our country.
