Counterspeech: It takes a lot of determination to stand up for yourself, especially if you are a victim. I am assuming that you have never been put in such a position, so you have no right to say anything about the women who have.

Hate Speech: Niggas are descending from slaves: they don't deserve to live in Britain.
Counterspeech: Slavery was banned in Britain in 1833. Today, people descending from those who were slaves feel at home in British society, and that's their right.

Hate Speech: Blacks do drugs, they're a menace to society, they're violent, they're stupid, and they should all be put in prison.
Counterspeech: Addicts often need help. We should be considerate of those in need and prosecute those who do wrong. Skin colors don't matter. all humans deserve a fair chance.

Hate Speech: Gypsies use children as thieves.
Counterspeech: Even if you have seen one specific case that says this, how can you generalize this crime to their entire community? do you think it is fair?

Hate Speech: Niggas are serial offenders. We should take into account the race of the prisoner before releasing them.
Counterspeech: Who is to say that the race of the individual who has been sentenced must overthrow the rules of law?

Hate Speech: We cannot allow Muslims into our country.
Counterspeech: What about other religions? Why only Islam? Or is your concern against people in need?

Hate Speech: I cannot bear the sight of women: they are devil's work!
Counterspeech: If you are offended by women showing loving care, by mothers kissing and holding their babies, then you can choose not to meet them.

Hate Speech: We began to break down when we allowed women to vote/meddle in our civilizations that we had built and maintained for thousands of years. A completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and brought our society down to their emotional soft level.
Counterspeech: You do sound like someone who came from thousands of years ago.

Hate Speech: nigga are inferior.
Counterspeech: Since when is it OK to discriminate against people based on their race?

Hate Speech: Jews are the enemy of the West.
Counterspeech: Jews, like any other group, are free to practice their own religion as long as they respect the law.

Hate Speech: Africans all come from different tribes. This is why they cannot coexist peacefully with us.
Counterspeech: Please don't be racist against anyone. It is 2022 dude, we just want peace.

Hate Speech: Faggots are not welcome here. The bigger the city, the bigger the "stay away" sign we must hang.
Counterspeech: I don't know anyone who hates gays, I do know lots of people who are very proudly kind towards the queer community. They are happy with how they treat one another. You are more likely to encounter these open-minded people in places like New York or London.

Hate Speech: Migrants are violent people, and they are a problem for us.
Counterspeech: I think you should be careful about calling migrants a 'problem' since so many of them are just human beings fleeing for their lives.

Hate Speech: We are being invaded. They will replace us and Afro-European will be the majority.
Counterspeech: Europeans who trace their ancestry to Africa are actually a very small part of the European population, only accounting for around 2%, since the mid 20th century. Not such a big invasion.

Hate Speech: I hate Muslims. They are just a bunch of whining spoiled brats.
Counterspeech: There is nothing 'petulant' about claiming your rights. They have as many rights as you do.

Hate Speech: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
Counterspeech: This is a sad excuse for an argument. There are no physical nature differences between people of varied faiths.

Hate Speech: I'm tired of seeing gay people befriended with heterosexual people.
Counterspeech: I'm sure many gay people are subjected to unspeakable forms of abuse, but the real abuse is from heterosexual people who don't conceive something different from their own sexual orientation. The real issue is the prejudice that oppresses them, not friendship.

Hate Speech: Migrants from Afghanistan come here to ruin our economy and the only return they have in mind is their return to their homeland.
Counterspeech: Maybe you should check what survey results say about who would be happy to leave their country. According to a Gallup study of 2019, nearly half of Afghan would like to permanently move to another country.

Hate Speech: These muslims are never going to have a place they can call home in civilized Europe.
Counterspeech: How exactly do you define if a religion is 'incompatible with modern culture'?

Hate Speech: Muslims are just a bunch of paedophiles and terrorist: we have to bring back 'educational methods' from the dark ages.
Counterspeech: The notion of "bringing back the dark ages" is a bit obscure. It is more accurate to refer to a strategy for countering extremism. This includes countering prejudice against Islam.

Hate Speech: Such Jewish people should never have the right to vote
Counterspeech: There are laws in place to prevent people being discriminated against on the basis of their religion.

Hate Speech: The feminists hate men.
Counterspeech: Did you even do adequate research before saying something like this?

Hate Speech: We should stop immigrants
Counterspeech: If you really wanted to stop the migration, you would destroy our economy, by stopping the flow of people searching for a better life.

Hate Speech: Muslims will not be a part of civilized Europe.
Counterspeech: Muslims are welcome here, as long as they observe the law and are respectful of other people.

Hate Speech: We must stop immigration.
Counterspeech: In practice, immigrants from many countries integrate very well. They learn the language, the culture and respect the law.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not compatible with UK, hence we must send them home.
Counterspeech: The vast majority of Muslims that live in the UK are integrated into our society very well. Why should you want to break this integration process?

Hate Speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites.
Counterspeech: There are factors, rather than race, affecting these statistics. Scholars have found that African Americans are disproportionately represented in the arrest and victimization reports which are used to compile crime rate statistics in the United States.

Hate Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes murder, rape, enslavement, and torturing prisoners of faith.
Counterspeech: This is just a myth used to promote hatred and violence against people of other religions.

Hate Speech: All gays are perverts.
Counterspeech: Life is too short not to love who you like, or to worry about arbitary notions and 'norms' that are no longer relevant to how people live their lives.

Hate Speech: People with Downs Syndrome are a problem: they are not able to work.
Counterspeech: It is up to employers to determine if a person meets the requirements for a given job, and if they do, then there is no reason to restrict the job to a person without Downs syndrome.

Hate Speech: Muslim have no place in a civilised society, they are incompatible with human dignity, freedom and the right to freedom of religion.
Counterspeech: If you really want to give a platform to anti-Muslim prejudice, I would suggest that you look at the real reasons why people of different faiths have a different experience in this world. You will find no grounds for your prejudice but prejudice itself.

Hate Speech: Islam is a just a repressive ideology that persecutes women and gay people.
Counterspeech: You sure? When Germany legalised same-sex marriage in 2017, all Muslim MPs voted in favour, and 223 non-muslims opposed it. Which of those groups sounds more intolerant?

Hate Speech: The migrants are all criminals, drunk and drug addicts.
Counterspeech: The idea that all migrants are criminals is a myth. Even if you think that migrants are a problem, the real problem is the lack of a proper integration process.

Hate Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our country.
Counterspeech: We are the greatest, most advanced, most wonderful civilization on the face of the planet, thinking that amongst us we have to ban someone would be foolish.

Hate Speech: Islam is a death cult and a dangerous and violent religion. It is an ideology of conquest and violence, that can and will use terror to subdue and rule.
Counterspeech: Terrorism and religious extremism are a part of any society, and have been for a long time. What is happening would be better addressed by greater efforts to aid integration.

Hate Speech: The police and politicians are covering up these Muslim grooming gangs - They are traitors to their own people!
Counterspeech: We need to work together to eradicate CSE once and for all. Individuals are the problem, it does not come from any religion, biased media attempting to scapegoat is blinding us to the whole truth.

Hate Speech: A woman's place is with her husband or her family, and feminists can't change that.
Counterspeech: It is important to point out that feminists are not attacking the family, they are attacking the inequality society, so feminism is not so much anti-marriage as anti-oppression.

Hate Speech: Race is a social construct, and if you see any difference between these two women, it’s because you have a mental illness. [image showing a blonde, European female athlete, juxtaposed against an image of an African woman wearing a lip plate]
Counterspeech: The difference between these two individuals has nothing to do with race or gender, it is individual lifestyle and cultural difference.

Hate Speech: muslim immigrants are animals, they cannot integrate.
Counterspeech: If we want to integrate more, let's focus on getting more skilled and allowing in more people with relevant knowledge and experience. But let's not discriminate against people based on their religion.

Hate Speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes death by stoning for blasphemy and slavery.
Counterspeech: The Koran contains nothing that I would consider a problem. So why do you say that it is a totalitarian ideology?

Hate Speech: Migrants shouldn't have the right to work.
Counterspeech: It does not matter whether they are immigrants. The fact that they pay taxes, earn money, etc., makes them not much different from any other citizen. Migrants have the right to a basic standard of living.

Hate Speech: Black people are happy to thrive by being unemployed and living on social welfare.
Counterspeech: No one is "happy" being unemployed, the point is about creating a more just society. In fact what is the point of discussing how to stop racism if we are not even able to grant equal opportunities.

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not like us, they cannot coexist with us.
Counterspeech: There are many Muslims living in our country, and they have always been a part of our society. We should not be scapegoating Muslims.

Hate Speech: Feminism is a bad ideology that should be replaced by capitalism.
Counterspeech: It is only when we talk to those who are in the dark about the movement, those who are on the fence about it, and those who are on the other side of the line, that we can achieve the goal of gender equality.

Hate Speech: refugees are flooding in our country
Counterspeech: You are not aware of it, but in the last few months the number of migrants arriving in the UK has more than halved! [link]

Hate Speech: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with £1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
Counterspeech: I volunteer to be blasted off into space on a rocket to reduce overpopulation.

Hate Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who have perverted ideas of what it means to be a man.
Counterspeech: Isn't the idea of man subjective and everyone is entitled to define their own?

Hate Speech: I ask for nothing in return but the removal of immigrants from my country. They are our enemies, They are not welcome here.
Counterspeech: Your life must be one, continual dissappointment?

Hate Speech: The West has let Islam take over our countries. This is why we are accepting them, we are already corrupted.
Counterspeech: You are completely wrong. The West has always been about freedom and democracy. Freedom and democracy is the rule of law,

Hate Speech: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.
Counterspeech: My definition of a feminist is a person who is against gender inequality, whether it be racial inequality, financial inequality, physical inequality, or any other aspect.

Hate Speech: How come nobody is moaning about black people being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.
Counterspeech: Clearly there is a lack of employment opportunities for black people. This has to do with discrimination, not with their allleged laziness.

Hate Speech: lesbian women are unwanted
Counterspeech: Why don't you want to get to know people? Give them a chance. And if it makes you happy, then experience it!

Hate Speech: Faggots and lesbians are annoying and incompetent people, they should be eliminated from society!
Counterspeech: Since when has 'competence' been a matter of sexual orientation?

Hate Speech: Islam has no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
Counterspeech: I don't think it's appropriate to suggest a religion is alien to our civilisation as that.

Hate Speech: If only society accepted that women aren't human, like we are, they would understand.
Counterspeech: In order to accept that women are human people, society has to acknowledge that they are born that way, just as men are born like that. It makes no sense to blame someone for their gender.

Hate Speech: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder. Islam is not about faith, it is about enmity and war.
Counterspeech: If you had to pick one religion to be angry at, why Islam? It seems you don't have good reasons for what you're saying.

Hate Speech: Migrants are only welcome in hell.
Counterspeech: Of course not, migrants are welcome here to integrate and help the community to thrive.

Hate Speech: Women are here to obey and be submissive and their place is with the man that chooses them. That's all.
Counterspeech: Women have always been asked to follow a set of rules and codes. They are human beings and deserve respect. Their place is wherever they want it to be.

Hate Speech: Jews are a despisable race.
Counterspeech: Jews are human beings. To be despised does not make one despicable.

Hate Speech: Afro-Americans are naturally violent.
Counterspeech: All races are biologically related, so we are all naturally violent. The issue is how we treat each other as people, that's all.

Hate Speech: This ideology is a cancer spread by the Islamic State and other radical Islamist groups.
Counterspeech: There are multiple strains of Islam and we should not be afraid of all of them. And if you would like to know more about Islam, you should talk to a Muslim.

Hate Speech: Niggas are the cause of the economic crisis.
Counterspeech: Sometimes they say the ruling elites are responsible for the economic crisis, then migrants, sometimes people of color. Whatever the real cause,by practicing tolerance and acceptance we are more likley to work together to solve society's problems.

Hate Speech: No muslims are compatible with any Western soceity.
Counterspeech: That is an unusual thought. Muslims are human beings like the rest of us. And, as all human beings, they can integrate into any society should the need arise.

Hate Speech: The West has always been and always will be about profit and power. Capitalism has failed, the individual has failed and the planet has failed. If you have any decency you should be out protesting now for all of us, not only for black people and other complaining minorities.
Counterspeech: One problem doesn't automatically make another inferior. You ain't making sense, my friend.

Hate Speech: If Muslims stopped fighting for their religion, we would all be in peace right now.
Counterspeech: For all the Muslims around the world, Islam is their greatest faith, and it is not hindering their humanity.

Hate Speech: Black slaves were better off in the clutches of their masters than free blacks are today.
Counterspeech: It is sad to see statements like this because you obviously do not know the suicide rates among African people at the time. They were absolutely not better off in the clutches of masters.

Hate Speech: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job or raising a family. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
Counterspeech: Anyone who has opinion other than mine is liar  -  My 3 year old neice gives better arguments. Guess she'll become a feminist.

Hate Speech: I am offended by the thought that Muslim women are not allowed of having their hair down.
Counterspeech: Then you think it is okay to restrict a woman's free will in what she likes to wear if her choice is related to Islam?

Hate Speech: All Muslims are terrorists, they are all incompatible with any Western society.
Counterspeech: You are absolutely right: every human being is unique and needs a certain set of values, which is influenced by their religion. But not all Muslims are terrorists, nor incompatible.

Hate Speech: The only problem with immigrants is that they are all born in different countries. This is unacceptable.
Counterspeech: Maybe the problem is more the perception that foreign people are from another planet. In reality they are just like us.

Hate Speech: We have a criminality problem since most immigrants are here illegally. They sneak across the border with Mexico.
Counterspeech: So what? Many more entered the U.S. with lawful documentation and only later became illegal, by overstaying their visas. In my opinion what should matter is how they behave, not the way they entered our country.

Hate Speech: No nigga should have the right to vote.
Counterspeech: Please don't use the n-word. It is extremely demeaning.

Hate Speech: God says that faggots are evil.
Counterspeech: This is a logical fallacy, an appeal to authority, in its extreme form. I would rather focus on facts: do you actually believe that this is the way that homosexuals are? What evidence do you have?

Hate Speech: Faggots and lesbians are annoying and incompetent people, they should be eliminated from society!
Counterspeech: We should support mutual love no matter the form it comes. Nobody deserves to hated for being themselves.

Hate Speech: If I could discover that my future baby is gay, I'd consider abortion.
Counterspeech: Every human being has the right to life, regardless of sexual orientation.

Hate Speech: I'm tired of women complaining about men being a threat to women only to turn a blind eye to women threatening men.
Counterspeech: Do you think that threat is a problem only when it comes close to you?

Hate Speech: black folks all act bad
Counterspeech: How can you speak of 'acting bad' when you are generalizing so much?

Hate Speech: When you animals have ruined the world and are eating each other, because that’s all you are good for, we’ll still be here, keeping our bloodlines pure against all the odds, regretting the day we heeded the womenfolk and took our heels off your throats.
Counterspeech: Women can be just as innovative, powerful and amazing humans as men.

Hate Speech: All blacks are rapists.
Counterspeech: All people are born equal in the eyes of the law. Unfortunately, the law cannot protect us from the mindset of prejudice.

Hate Speech: The holocaust never happened.
Counterspeech: This is a lie, but the real question is: why did you write about the Holocaust? Why didn't you write about the current political and economic crisis? Because they seem the true cause of your anger and frustration.

Hate Speech: We should get rid of the Jews.
Counterspeech: Why should we? They have been here a long time and are just here to live a peaceful life. Why should we get rid of them? We can do better than this.

Hate Speech: Immigrants bring crime, they are rapists.
Counterspeech: We should not welcome people who overtly pose a threat to our society, but we cannot ban all the migrants in principle.

Hate Speech: Feminists are a bunch of cry babies.
Counterspeech: Feminism is not about whining and crying. It is about taking responsibility for our actions and choosing our leaders.

Hate Speech: Muslims are subhuman and have no place in a modern, secular state like the UK.
Counterspeech: Your words suggest a climate of fear against Muslims. Please refrain from spreading hate like this.

Hate Speech: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
Counterspeech: Your way of thinking is wrong. Gender and sexual orientation is not an idea or a belief, but a fact of life.

Hate Speech: I am offended by gay people, it is their choice to be gay or not.
Counterspeech: I don't see how being gay is a choice, especially when it comes to who do you feel attracted to.

Hate Speech: All Muslim just care about Sharia Law.
Counterspeech: All religions have different ideas about how the world should be run. But I don't see any reason to restrict the right of any religion to worship and practice their own way of life as long as it respects our laws.

Hate Speech: All foreigners are threatening our culture and are ruining our youth.
Counterspeech: Not much worse then, when we already have people like you here.

Hate Speech: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is unfeminine and a bitch.
Counterspeech: Being a homemaker is a difficult and full time job but so is working outside. Women like men can have different hopes and dreams for their lives and we should only support them with it.

Hate Speech: Feminism is a political ideology and movement that advocate the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender.
Counterspeech: I don't see the point in calling the feminism you are fighting a "weapon" against men. Your argument is that women do not want equality, because they do not want to live under men but to subjugate them. And this is something you have to prove.

Hate Speech: Only 8% is a real refugee
Counterspeech: The percentage you are talking about refers only to "refugee status" and does not include protection for those who escape from wars.

Hate Speech: Every black person who wants a job should apply for it, and stop complaining about discrimination.
Counterspeech: This statement is untrue. Some job seekers get rejected on the basis of their race. POC apply for jobs, but their civilian unemployment rate in U.S. is almost twice the rate for whites.

Hate Speech: You are a Muslim and I hate everything about you.
Counterspeech: It is no secret now that you might not have any Muslim ancestors or relatives. But you have the unenviable privilege of inheriting islamophobic prejudices.

Hate Speech: We should go back to the good old times when the world was a tough place. Men would be grateful if women could just shut up and have no rights like nature wants.
Counterspeech: Instead, we should be grateful for the progress women have made, and that gender equality is on the rise.

Hate Speech: Every single Muslim is a potential terrorist.
Counterspeech: Islam is a peaceful religion, and it is not at all similar to the kind of extremist hatred that has caused violence in many countries.

Hate Speech: Asylum seekers and refugees are a burden to the host country and are a security risk to the community as a whole.
Counterspeech: Migrants are not a security risk to the community as a whole, the opposite is true: they provide a valuable contribution to our society, especially in skilled jobs.

Hate Speech: Islam is a cancer on the European culture.
Counterspeech: The Qur'an is not a cancer on the European culture, it is a very useful book and an inspiration to many.

Hate Speech: What do you want us to do with all these gays, they are just a problem. They are corrupting our children!
Counterspeech: I think that you are making the mistake of equating prejudice and homophobia with an attempt to reform and make people's behaviour fit your norms

Hate Speech: Religious islamic fanaticism is on the rise in Europe, this is a direct result of the migrant crisis.
Counterspeech: Migrants come to Europe from all over the world and many of them are fleeing wars, poverty and discrimination. They are often persecuted for their religion. It is important not to demonise them, but rather to understand what causes them to leave their countries.

Hate Speech: Jews control the u.s. government.
Counterspeech: How can you be sure that Jews control the U.S. government? Does it seem plausible to you? Do you have any proof?

Hate Speech: nigga'sare inferior and should be enslaved once again.
Counterspeech: Stop saying racist stuff like this. They are not inferior in any way, and you should not make them out to be.

Hate Speech: Maybe the UN could talk to those asian and african nations responsible for 90%+ of the pollution in the oceans' instead of insisting on this bullshit about climate change.
Counterspeech: You're right, ocean pollution is one of the main environmental problems we face, however, climate change is a global problem, and everyone should help to combat it, no matter where in the world you are from!

Hate Speech: Interracial relationships are just a psychiatric disorder.
Counterspeech: There is no evidence that interracial relationships cause damage to the mental health of the people involved, so to suggest otherwise is simply a form of prejudice.

Hate Speech: Women should not be allowed to vote
Counterspeech: You are wrong. The majority can and should choose who they want to represent them, and this majority is made of men as well as women.

Hate Speech: Go and read the Protocols of the elders of Zion if you haven’t. Everything is orchestrated..
Counterspeech: Did you know that this nonsense (the protocols) was concocted by the czarist police in the early part of the 20th century to counter a hankering for constitutional government among Russian people?

Hate Speech: I hate feminists, they take all our jobs and shit. We have enough women already.
Counterspeech: We do not need misogynysts, we already have enough of them.

Hate Speech: If Islam were to become a global religion it would replace Christianity.
Counterspeech: Are we to believe that just because something is gaining ground, it will replace whatever exists somewhere else?

Hate Speech: The Jews really want to dominate the world, and we should stop them.
Counterspeech: The concept of 'Jewish domination' is a constructed myth.

Hate Speech: Gender equality is just a war on masculinity.
Counterspeech: Gender equality is not a war against anyone but against patriarchy. It only wants to ensure that everyone has same rights regardless of their gender and is no manner a fight to takeover any other gender's position.

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem to us, they do not belong here.
Counterspeech: Muslims have been a part of this country for many years. Why are they problem to anyone?

Hate Speech: We are being invaded by immigrants, they are taking our jobs, and we are indifferent to what is happening.
Counterspeech: What do you think will happen if we end migration? Lets stop avoiding the real issues and solve the unemployment crisis.

Hate Speech: women must go back to the kitchen. This is their homelife.
Counterspeech: No women should be relegated to this. It is about time we stop letting stereotypes rule our society.

Hate Speech: Jews are hated by everyone here, we should create an apartheid state against them.
Counterspeech: This is a distortion of reality. In fact, I think that we have a diverse and inclusive society, in which Jews are more than happy to play a part.

Hate Speech: All Muslim should be deported.
Counterspeech: Why do you think that Muslims should be deported?

Hate Speech: Muslim folks are inferior to whites.
Counterspeech: Who decides what is and is not 'inferior'? Do you have any scientific proof?

Hate Speech: Immigrants should be proud patriots of our country.
Counterspeech: We do not need them to 'be patriots' for us. Instead, we should work on better integration.

Hate Speech: We are all in danger, we all want to see niggas disappear from the face of the earth.
Counterspeech: The problem with racism in this country is not about ethnicity, but about people scared to live in a diverse society.

Hate Speech: women play the victim.
Counterspeech: Women are people, and people are human. Being oppressed is not an choice. You may think it's a badge of honour to be called a man, but it should not be a badge of shame to be called woman.

Hate Speech: We are at war with Islam. They should all be killed.
Counterspeech: Why would you think we are at war with Islam?

Hate Speech: Every Jew is a potential terrorist
Counterspeech: The vast majority of Jews are good people, I don't see your point.

Hate Speech: Islam is a religion of violence.
Counterspeech: The scriptures teach that all men are created equal. If the Bible is to be believed, then the Quran too is both peaceful and compatible with democratic society.

Hate Speech: The Roma are not my brothers.
Counterspeech: The Roma do not deserve hatred, discrimination and violence.

Hate Speech: We should deport them all back to where they came from.
Counterspeech: It is a failed policy to deport migrants, especially those who don't pose a risk to the state. In this way, we keep out successful candidates and possible good citizens who could contribute much to our country.

Hate Speech: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.
Counterspeech: The concept of race is a social construct and was created to promote segregation by discriminating groups of people. To label a person by their biological makeup is not conducive to the respect of a person's humanity.

Hate Speech: Faggots are ruining this country.
Counterspeech: I'm not convinced that having a large mumber of people stuck in the 'closet', living unhappy lives was good for any country.

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children's education.
Counterspeech: Did you check you facts before posting or just want to hate?

Hate Speech: Jews are an inferior race.
Counterspeech: How do you know for sure the concept of inferiority can be proven? I would like to better understand this.

Hate Speech: We should accept the fact that blacks are inferior.
Counterspeech: It is no secret that many people in the UK have suffered from racism. There are also people of colour who face racism daily. It is not a matter of 'accepting' it, it is a matter of fighiting it.

Hate Speech: If immigrants were to live here, it would be hard to find a job
Counterspeech: Please don't apply these stereotypes. The majority of them are willing to do the jobs we don't want to do.

Hate Speech: Jewish folks are the real antisemite.
Counterspeech: This is paradoxical and contradicting, and even if it wasn't, there is no evidence for it.

Hate Speech: Nothing is worse than a Muslim invasion.
Counterspeech: I would say an alien invasion sounds much worse bro.

Hate Speech: All these autistic people are endangering our society.
Counterspeech: I'd like to see a reduction in cases of discrimination against autistic people. They are no danger.

Hate Speech: We are not homophobes, we want to help them to become normal again.
Counterspeech: This is another type of anti-gay prejudice, in that the source is a lack of understanding about LGBT and human rights.

Hate Speech: Refugees are a burden and a danger to the host country.
Counterspeech: Refugees fleeing war and poverty can come to our country and they gain skills that help our economy grow. They often find new homes and start new careers. For this reason, we are very proud that our country is a model of integration and cooperation and also of resilience and solidarity.

Hate Speech: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world, breeding chaos and instability.
Counterspeech: Are they bringing chaos and instability to your country by respecting the constitution which gives them the freedom to practice Islam?

Hate Speech: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
Counterspeech: Equality, a perspective generally held by feminists, is morally good, and I challenge you to say it is "divisive".

Hate Speech: There is no place in civilized Europe for Muslims.
Counterspeech: I am not sure where you got your idea that all Muslims are incompatible with civilised Europe.

Hate Speech: muslim folks are subhuman
Counterspeech: We should not be discriminating against anyone on the basis of their religion. Muslims are not subhuman like you say.

Hate Speech: All immigrants are rapists and murderers.
Counterspeech: Where is the evidence for what you're saying?

Hate Speech: For all the people who believe that without migration NHS cannot do it, I would like to tell you that we have already done it in history! (precisely before the 90s and before Tony Blair)
Counterspeech: Did you know that migration has always been a part of history and that inviting skilled migrants was also pertinent before?

Hate Speech: The Quran contains many offensive verses, and I find it hard to understand why people would want to read it.
Counterspeech: I understand that you might not like what you are reading, but why should you be offended by the Quran?

Hate Speech: the Nazis were right: Jews were a race and were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
Counterspeech: If "the ills of mankind" included making the best and the most addictive bread then I agree with you. Other than that: NO.

Hate Speech: Islam is a disease that is killing Europeans.
Counterspeech: A disease is very different to any religion, so I begin to wonder about your objecitive in apply the label of 'disease' to Islam?

Hate Speech: When immigrants are welcomed in our countries we are forced to accept them as our own people, but they are not. They are not like us and I hate them.
Counterspeech: Immigration and diversity are important. Hate does not justify making it more difficult to integrate new people.

Hate Speech: We cannot coexist in a society with millions of strangers that disrespect our culture and other human beings.
Counterspeech: Different cultures have different practices for a variety of social interactions and situations. We must allow for exchanges so that the best practices can be utilized by all.

Hate Speech: Blacks are the problem.
Counterspeech: People of colour make up the 13% of the U.S. population, but their imprisonment rate is falling.

Hate Speech: They accuse me of being Islamophobic because I don't like Muslims. But they are the same Muslims who threaten us with explosives!
Counterspeech: Muslims are not the problem in this debate. Terrorists are.

Hate Speech: The Jews are and will always be a problem. It is impossible for them to get beyond the shame of their stigma.
Counterspeech: The Jews are not the problem in the world. And the Jews have the right to be proud of their history.

Hate Speech: If Muslims come to our country and say Islam is the best religion, it is not a good idea to integrate them. They should go home.
Counterspeech: Probably judge your comments before you judge someone else. Debating and discussing best religion is not 21st century anyways.

Hate Speech: Feminists say everything we need is in the female gender. This is false. 'Mankind' requires us 'man' first, even in the word spelling.
Counterspeech: The problem with discrimination is not in male gender. It is that some think that women are weak and emotional. Those seem to have forgotten that we are all part of 'mankind'.

Hate Speech: Women should accept their bodies as they are, weak and inferior, and live a healthy life according to this.
Counterspeech: The reason why we have inequality in the first place is because of the oppression of some people by others.

Hate Speech: I can't bear crazy Muslims coming here. They are insane, instable people.
Counterspeech: Not all Muslims are motivated by extremism. The problem is a lack of integration, and your words don't encourage it.

Hate Speech: Women are subhuman and have no value.
Counterspeech: I think that it is both sexist and also dangerous to promote a certain view of women, which is why I don't think your idea can stand.

Hate Speech: Jews hate Christians.
Counterspeech: How can you say something so mean? It is a sad, untrue and dangerous thing to say.

Hate Speech: A Muslim's only real allegiance is to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.)
Counterspeech: Islam shares the same roots as Christianity and Judaism and all are based on love, tolerance and peace, so that is a good thing isn't it?

Hate Speech: There should be restrictions on how women can choose men, to be children unable to choose for their own is their nature.
Counterspeech: Why shouldn't women be allowed to choose their own partner? They are independent and rational human beings.

Hate Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. They should be isolated from society and the world.
Counterspeech: Gays are not animals. Why you should isolate people based on their sexual preferences?

Hate Speech: The only objective means of achieving our goals is to promote hatred and violence towards women.
Counterspeech: This seems like an exaggerated statement against women. I advise you to revaluate your opinion.

Hate Speech: Immigrants living in america is worse than them dying.
Counterspeech: Refugees have fled wars and persecution. We are a huge help for them and they are, in turn, a help to our country.

Hate Speech: Muslims demand locals to not walk their dogs in public because it's againt the Sharia and they feel it as disrespectful.
Counterspeech: We should really not let just anyone one social media sway our thoughts like this. This is detrimental to the values of our society and we need to be smarter humans.

Hate Speech: Children should learn about gender identity and sexual orientation from their families rather than in class from LGBT fundamentalists.
Counterspeech: What if parents choose not to educate or discuss LGBT issues with their children? Where will they learn? From their peers? I agree that there are some sensitive subjects that are best addressed by parents, but this is human behavior and biology; aka science.

Hate Speech: I'm not a woman and I'm not a cunt. So, I do not identify as a feminist.
Counterspeech: I hope you can understand that being a feminist is not about being a woman, it is much more. It is about equality. It is about accepting a flawed history that sidelined women and that we need to work a little harder to ensure that everyone is getting their deserved place in society.

Hate Speech: All gay people are criminals.
Counterspeech: How can you derive this from someone's sexual orientation?

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because normal children would make them feel different.
Counterspeech: Children with Down Syndrome would not feel different as long as they are respected and are not put down by the others.

Hate Speech: I used to like women. But now I just can't stand them. They're just a bunch of whining spoiled brats.
Counterspeech: I don't think your sample size of women is large enough to know if all women whine. So maybe not generalize hatefull opinions for all women.

Hate Speech: All those migrants trying to come in illegally are a drain on society.
Counterspeech: The majority of the migrants who enter the EU are lawful immigrants who have paid our taxes and have contributed greatly to our country.

Hate Speech: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose our civilisation.
Counterspeech: Feminism is about equal opportunity for all, and not about winning for a specific gender. Women should simply have a choice in their lives.

Hate Speech: Islam is not a peaceful religion, and it has also promoted intolerance and violence.
Counterspeech: How can you question the religion of millions of people without any evidence supporting your claim?

Hate Speech: Jews have a strict religious code, and this code is incompatible with Western culture.
Counterspeech: As long as this strict code does not clash with our laws, Jews should be left free to practice their religion according to their conscience.

Hate Speech: Disabled children should be banned from school. They are a danger to themself and to the others.
Counterspeech: A school is a safe space and is an important part of any children's education. Everyone should be able to go to school.

Hate Speech: The LGBT community is full of sick people that must be cured.
Counterspeech: It is not true that all LGBT people are sick. There are many non-LGBT people that are sick as well. The national health service is aimed to cure anybody.

Hate Speech: Gays are perverts and must be cured because they are practicing anal sex all the time.
Counterspeech: Associating AIDS and HIV with homosexuals is just a prejudice driven by fear. Even if this disease may be more common among gay people, that does not mean that all homosexuals are likely to have AIDS. Not all homosexuals are promiscuously fornicating with strangers, as you said. Most people check their partners, more so as gay men.

Hate Speech: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
Counterspeech: No, indoctrining would be to teach them about a specific religion from a young age... oh wait. We are already doing that.

Hate Speech: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist.
Counterspeech: Can't we accept that migrants just want to live and work here in peace?

Hate Speech: Illegal immigrants make America worse
Counterspeech: There are a few bad apples in every part of the society. We need not make an assumption about people who are clearly struggling to provide for their family

Hate Speech: Queers are the problem. We heterosexuals are not.
Counterspeech: Just because someone identifies as lesbian, gay or bisexual doesn't make them a problem. Maybe you should try just to walk in their shoes.

Hate Speech: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
Counterspeech: Isn't preference a matter of individual identity, and cannot be imposed? People are just living their lives. Any sinister agenda appears to be yours.

Hate Speech: In these times, when our society seems to be mired in feminism and equality, we must remember that every man has the right to choose his own wife, and that, indeed, men are far better at it than women are.
Counterspeech: Noone can scientifically say that men are "far better" at it than women. It is just a prejudice of some people.

Hate Speech: Different people like Jewish don't deserve respect.
Counterspeech: I don't understand how being different is equal to not deserving respect. Every person deserves respect. Period.

Hate Speech: Muslim violent invaders have infiltrated our cities, towns and villages. We must stamp them out.
Counterspeech: What you say is just wishful thinking. Islam is not a violent religion. How can you say that about a religion?

Hate Speech: We can no longer accept Muslims living in our country. It is a matter of national security.
Counterspeech: Muslim terrorists have struck in Paris and London, killing scores of innocent people, that's true. We must root out terrorists before they destroy our country, that's also true. But we cannot target innocent people just because of their faith, otherwise we'd be no better than the terrorists that we seek to neutralize.

Hate Speech: We must stop accepting black people as human beings.
Counterspeech: People of other ethnicities are just as human as you. Biologically, we are identical. Your argument makes no sense.

Hate Speech: All Muslims are Terrorists.
Counterspeech: Maybe it would be better to stop using Muslims as a target and subduing innocent ones, and start talking about real problems in our society, like racism and islamophobia.

Hate Speech: Black folks aren't important and don't need any right.
Counterspeech: For the last years black people have been denied basic rights and their representation has declined dramatically. Black people have become second class citizens

Hate Speech: Muslims have no place in a secular state.
Counterspeech: People have the right to practice whatever religion they want, as long as it respects the law and doesn't violate the dignity of other human beings.

Hate Speech: Refugees are not welcome in our country.
Counterspeech: How can you say such a thing about a group that is a part of our country?

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They do not want to assimilate into Western society.
Counterspeech: You are not the first to point out that there are those who want to integrate and those who don't. In fact there is an unspoken harmony between Islam and Western society, similar to the harmony we see between Judaism and the Christian faith. When people are willing to accept all faiths, anybody will feel at home.

Hate Speech: The only goal of feminism is to take the power and wealth from men and give it to women.
Counterspeech: The fact is that the only objective goal of feminists is to achieve equality for all, irrespective of gender.

Hate Speech: Muslim folks are different and should be isolated for this.
Counterspeech: The same can be said for any race, religion, ethnicity, or national identity. There is no evidence to prove that any religion is more violent than another.

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome are a problem: they foster bullying behavior in normal children. They should go to special school just for them.
Counterspeech: Isn't this the fault of the bratty kids that people like you parent?

Hate Speech: The refugee crisis is about Islam. Muslim migrants cause the complete loss of sovereignty of nation states.
Counterspeech: Refugees and migrants come to our country in great numbers to work and provide for their families. We welcome them as if they were part of our own family, regardless of their religion. The refugee crisis has nothing to do with the absence of a strong national identity in the wake of the rapid change in the western world.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are a problem for the UK. They are now invading us.
Counterspeech: Why do you think that the number of immigrants in the UK has increased? Have you seen any statistics on this?

Hate Speech: Did you know that the rape epidemic in Europe is due to Muslim immigrants? They have been raping our children for many years with no counteraction from the police and government. Islam is a death cult!
Counterspeech: That is what the headlines suggest but did you know that actual cases where the migrants are the abuser are just a drop in the ocean compared to the total number of cases?

Hate Speech: Islam is a death cult, full stop.
Counterspeech: Maybe we should not be so harsh on Islam. Just because a religion is diverse doesn't mean it is a violent one.

Hate Speech: Disabled people should just live in isolation.
Counterspeech: Disabled people are not forced to live in the way you would like: they are the ones who get to choose how to live.

Hate Speech: Islam is the world's biggest oxymoron, spewing ignorance to its adherents and making it about tolerance. Truth is that Muslims don't tolerate people of other faiths.
Counterspeech: Funny how you talk about spewing ignorance and then proceed to do the same.

Hate Speech: Islam has no place in a modern democracy.
Counterspeech: Islam is a peaceful, democratic faith with universalist values that has been shown time and time again to be much more peaceful and tolerant than the violent extremist fundamentalist ideas spewed by extremists like Isis.

Hate Speech: Jews are nothing but monsters and should be exterminated.
Counterspeech: Do you feel better about yourself by calling them monsters?

Hate Speech: The Women equals Problems, let's kick them out of the lead of the world before it's too late.
Counterspeech: Women make up half of the world's population and around 42% of the UN staff. They are our sisters, and we should promote their contributions to society.

Hate Speech: Every day, migrants commit suicide. If they don't want to be here they just might not come in.
Counterspeech: Statistics on people dying by suicide are difficult to come by. However, researches clearly show that suicide rates are high for people of different ethnicities.

Hate Speech: Feminism is a threat to human dignity.
Counterspeech: Don't you think that the equality of both genders will only do good?

Hate Speech: All women are sick.
Counterspeech: Women are human beings, and deserve respect.

Hate Speech: Feminists are whining victims. They are trying to establish female superiority.

Hate Speech: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but to bring us back into a pretechnological era.

Hate Speech: If homosexuals want to change they should go to a conversion therapy where they are constantly taught to love themselves and other people.
Counterspeech: It is not necessary to change their sexuality to love themselves and others. We just need to accept their right to love whoever they want.

Hate Speech: The Jews control Hollywood, academia, and media.
Counterspeech: Jews are not the only ones with their hands in the system. The freedom of the press allows any religious group to have their media and many actually do.

Hate Speech: Who the fuck are Muslims? Terrorists. We shouldn't be talking to them, they are a plague on our planet. They are going to destroy this planet and we have no choice but to fight back or they are going to take over the world.
Counterspeech: The West has allowed jihadists to establish safe haven for years. This is not a 'political correctness gone mad'. We should start to work towards solving global problems and stopping the spread of terrorism.

Hate Speech: Migrants hurt the economy.
Counterspeech: You should know that the reality is that Migrants not only contribute to the economy as laborforce but also as employers creating job opportunities.

Hate Speech: They say you cannot judge a book by its cover. But the feminists are judging us all the time.
Counterspeech: They are not judging, they are simply pointing out the flaws and disparities that exist in the world. This statement is exactly what they are trying to fix.

Hate Speech: We must establish male supremacy in society.
Counterspeech: Your words suggest that men are superior to women: but gender equality is not a myth. It is the direct result of free will and of the evolution of our society to a more inclusive one.

Hate Speech: Islam is just an ideology, an opinion, a degenerated interpretation of the Bible.
Counterspeech: I do not see how you can speak of Islam as an ideology, an opinion, or a way of life. Are you sure about the Bible?

Hate Speech: Niggas shouldn't be part of our society. They are just too different from us.

Hate Speech: If you want to be a great nation, please come to our rescue and deport all those filthy migrants.

Hate Speech: We are all created equal, but some are more equal than others. For example, men are better than women.

Hate Speech: Feminism is about the aspiration for female power and the end of patriarchy. This is the death of the Western World.
Counterspeech: Patriarchy is a system of social domination based on hierarchical groupings made according to one's sex. To promote a more equal society, as feminists do, is instead a major contribution to the 'Western World'.

Hate Speech: A woman is more equal when she is wearing a dress. This is what is fair: women can be good women when they respect men.
Counterspeech: This is wrong on so many levels. You need to understand that they owe you nothing, and you absolutely have no right to dictate what women should wear, for starters.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are bringing diseases into the U.S.
Counterspeech: Other countries have shown consistently good vaccination rates, and frankly, we should learn something about their positive mentality surrounding medical professionals. Trust is key.

Hate Speech: I hate migrants.
Counterspeech: The prejudice against immigrants is spreading so much because of general ignorance. I would be disappointed to see people of any race or ethnicity being discriminated against here.

Hate Speech: Feminism is just a way for insecure women to promote sexism and hate speech towards men.
Counterspeech: Wait a second... You understand what sexism and hate speech mean???

Hate Speech: Muslims are nothing but criminals and terrorists.
Counterspeech: Evidence?

Hate Speech: Blacks do not want to assimilate.
Counterspeech: Why do you think that they don't want to assimilate?

Hate Speech: Muslims are a cancer in our land. They are incompatible with a tolerant and diverse Britain.
Counterspeech: They are not incompatible if you understand what "tolerant and diverse Britain" means. There are Muslims in our country and we should be able to live side by side as equals, regardless of religion.

Hate Speech: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and should be banned.
Counterspeech: Why should we ban people from a religion?

Hate Speech: Being 'ignorant' and 'prejudiced' towards Islam isn't racism? Its common sense. You cannot be racist towards an ideology.
Counterspeech: Prejudice = Pre-judging ie not knowing anything. How can that be common sense?

Hate Speech: Refugees are only welcome in insane countries. I would like to see more European people in Europe.
Counterspeech: I would like to see more integration not less.

Hate Speech: What do you want us to do about the migrants, faggots and jihadists coming into our country? Keep them with us?
Counterspeech: Everyone is welcome here, regardless of their religion, ethnicity, or sexual preference.

Hate Speech: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
Counterspeech: Feminism can't be blamed for being "divisive" or "adversarial" because society and the sexes were more divided and adversarial before the time of feminism. More women and men are in agreement on feminist issues now, than when sexist beliefs were dominant in society. This unity is only growing, with more and more people understanding the finer points of true egalitarian society. The entrenched, recalcitrant sexists who make the exception should only blame themselves.

Hate Speech: Black minorities vote to strip wealth, power and opportunity from White people.
Counterspeech: Yeah, that's kind of the point. Not concentrating the nation's wealth among a few people.

Hate Speech: We should build a big wall around Europe so that the native inhabitants of the Middle East, Africans, and Asians will be kept in their places.
Counterspeech: Nice work building a wall along thousands of kilometres of shores and land borders just to separate cultures... What if we add also some turrets equipped with laser cannons?

Hate Speech: The Jews control Hollywood.
Counterspeech: Jews tend to make up a discrete amount of Hollywood actors, directors, producers, and so on. But this doesn't necessarily mean that they control the industry.

Hate Speech: Islam is a perversion of the true meaning of Christianity.
Counterspeech: There are many different religions, each should be respected.

Hate Speech: Muslims cannot contribute anything meaningful to our society.
Counterspeech: Muslims are part of our society, and they have contributed a lot to our country. They have created jobs and wealth for the UK.

Hate Speech: We are ruled by a small Jewish elite that exploit the weak.
Counterspeech: Yes, some people exploit the weak, but they are not necessarly jewish. Most people, including the Jewish, work hard to create a better life for their families. And it is we, as a people, who have the moral duty to pay the price for the poor who do not have the means to reach success.

Hate Speech: Gypsy rape our women. They are criminals.
Counterspeech: Forgive me but I don't understand how rape can be a Gypsy characteristic. Rather it is the product of toxic misogynistic culture.

Hate Speech: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals.
Counterspeech: I think this statement is very demeaning. Please do not stereotype, and accept our diversity as human beings.

Hate Speech: LGBTs don't know how to have a family. You can't teach that.
Counterspeech: It's not necessary to teach LGBTs about how to live as a family, it is more important to educate others about the difference between right and wrong (homophobia belonging to the latter).

Hate Speech: We are forced to economically support all of them
Counterspeech: Well my taxpayer money goes to supporting the roads that you drive on. Please give me a refund.

Hate Speech: Go fuck yourselves disgusting Muslims! You wont marry my kids or grandchildren, we all hate you!
Counterspeech: So much hatred. We must respect and understand all peoples.

Hate Speech: In the name of Islam, I want to rape as many of your wives and/or girlfriends as possible. That would be the best interpretation in the eye of many.
Counterspeech: You are being cruel. You are accusing Muslims of harboring rape fantasies. This is not how Muslims in the UK think.

Hate Speech: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because in any case normal children would make them feel different.
Counterspeech: Despite the negative stereotypes, many children with Down Syndrome enjoy regular playtime and interacting with other children.

Hate Speech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They demand that everyone shows respect for Islam, but do they respect our laws? They establish sharia laws and polygamy.
Counterspeech: To be fair, I would guess its hard to feel a sense of belonging when you are perpetually identified as a problem?

Hate Speech: Immigrants and refugees do not share our values.
Counterspeech: I do not understand how a migrant would not be "sharing our values" according to you. Could you explain better?

Hate Speech: why do we never talk about female-on-male rape? Isn't this a crime as well?
Counterspeech: Can't we be vocal about both aspects of the crime without gender being the deciding factor?

Hate Speech: If women wanted to control their fertility they would be prostitutes.
Counterspeech: Giving birth and raising child is tough and taxing job. It is important that we decide if we are ready to in our life to make such an important decision and given that the burden lies with women, women obvisously need to be make choices.

Hate Speech: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
Counterspeech: If you don't have any statistics or numbers to back your argument up, you should not say mean things about a group of people.

Hate Speech: Muslims come here to force conversion to their religion.
Counterspeech: Muslims have the opportunity to study and learn in our schools, this does not mean they can impose their beliefs on others.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are a problem for the UK. They are now invading us.
Counterspeech: UK and invasion, always feels nostalgic.

Hate Speech: These women are nothing but slaves to the powerful men around them.
Counterspeech: As long as women are free and able to make decisions for their own life, there can be no difference between men and women.

Hate Speech: Muslim invasion is a brand new problem. We must ban them before it is too late.
Counterspeech: Muslims already live in many European countries, and they are not banned. Why should we ban them from here?

Hate Speech: I can accept fat people, what I cannot accept is obesity. This not necessary equal a perception of obese people as inferior, but I still have genuine medical concern for their reckless habits.
Counterspeech: Obese people have to face stigma in all areas of life. So even if you might be genuinely concerned for their health, the vast majority of obese people are regularly confronted with prejudice and systemic disadvantages based exactly on the perception of obese people as inferior.

Hate Speech: Women are only useful as sexual slaves and can't work as men do.
Counterspeech: Women are neither slaves nor incompetent. There is a reason why women have broken through all hurdles and proved themselves in each jobs.

Hate Speech: Women are psychopath, and an adulterous woman who has been unfaithful to you for many years is like an arsonist in a building that you built together. She will burn down that place, exactly because she knows you love it. Life will never be the same.
Counterspeech: Do you think only a woman can be an adulterous? Do you think all men are faithful and no man has ever commited adultery?

Hate Speech: Women need to accept that they are weak.
Counterspeech: Many women work multiple jobs to provide for their children and they also do the housework... do you call that weakness?

Hate Speech: I love white people! I am not interested in anyone else!
Counterspeech: We are all different and deserve respect.

Hate Speech: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'How can we be Islamophobic when they really do want to kill us'.
Counterspeech: Google image search to provide factual information about the image if possible. Ie when and where it is from and provide context, ie this was a small faction that has been condemned my main stream Islam and happened 15 years ago.

Hate Speech: Illegal immigration is the biggest problem in the United States, we are in the middle of a war and we cannot allow thousands of people to come here.
Counterspeech: First, I would not describe the United States as a war zone. Second, many migrants come from regions rich in cultures and history. So, why should we restrict the majority from coming here?

Hate Speech: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
Counterspeech: Most Muslims are not terrorists, they are just here to work and provide for their families. We welcome people from every religion and background.

Hate Speech: This is not acceptable, to have all this faggots spreading HIV, it's not ok to tolerate this: we have to eradicate them.
Counterspeech: This is not true. And it is important to note that this canard is used to persecute gay men.

Hate Speech: Women who do not want children are whores
Counterspeech: Whore is a term of abuse used to describe women who have sex outside of marriage. Why there is not a counterpart for men?

Hate Speech: All migrants rape our children
Counterspeech: The rape of a child by a non-migrant adult is rape too. It is too simplistic to blame immigrants.

Hate Speech: Muslims do not belong in civilized Europe.
Counterspeech: Muslims live in many countries all over the world, and they are part of the fabric of the societies they live in. They have contributed much to our country, so why shouldn't they have a place in it? All countries have the right to have different religious communities in their midst.

Hate Speech: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world, breeding chaos and instability.
Counterspeech: There are some remarkably dumb people in this world. Thanks for helping me understand that.

Hate Speech: We must stop migrants and refugees: Islam is incompatible with western society.
Counterspeech: why not welcome people from every walk of life?

Hate Speech: 99% of Muslims in the UK are unemployable and refuse to work.
Counterspeech: Check your sources?

Hate Speech: Women do nothing but spend their husbands money.
Counterspeech: With personality like yours, this really won't be problem for you.

Hate Speech: Women are weak, they need men's strength to achieve something.
Counterspeech: Women can and should be strong. It is up to them to choose how to use their strength.

Hate Speech: If a woman is beaten, it is because her man wants to correct her bad behaviour.
Counterspeech: It is estimated that over the 50% of people committing domestic abuse were drunk. It's a complex issue but two things I know for sure: a drunk person is in no position to judge anyone's behaviour and beating a person is ALWAYS wrong.

Hate Speech: Europe is drowning in migrants.
Counterspeech: Are you sure that it is possible to talk about Europe drowning in migrants? So far I only heard about migrants drowning at sea.

Hate Speech: Migrants rape our women 10 times more than US citizens.
Counterspeech: I would like a tutorial on how to be this confident when spreading lies.

Hate Speech: The Muslims are our enemies and we have to bring them to heel: they are all terrorists.
Counterspeech: It's a myth that all Muslims are terrorists. We need to understand that all religions have had terrorists in them.

Hate Speech: Refugees stole our jobs, now they want our country
Counterspeech: That is not true: even if a lot of employers, especially big companies, hire refugees, they are often the main contributors to the development process and help in creating new job opportunities. Last but not least, the majority of refugees come from war-torn countries and have a life-long attachment to our country, so I don't see how they would want to 'steal our country'.

Hate Speech: We have a lot of issues in the UK, and now we are also paying NGOs to rescue migrants. How many other financial scandals still have to be annouonced to the tax payers?
Counterspeech: So now we are resorting to just letting go of our empathy because of high taxes? i don't want any part of it.

Hate Speech: Gypsies like living in trailer parks.
Counterspeech: Nobody likes living in trailer parks, they could be forced to do it out of desperation and poverty, which only gets worse with the amount of hate they receive.

Hate Speech: Why do all feminists hate Men? It is because they are Men. That is all.
Counterspeech: I don't know about all men, but they will sure hate you, you don't need to worry about that atleast.

Hate Speech: Islam is an ideology that encourages sexual abuse of children.
Counterspeech: That is not true. Believers are not encouraged to engage in sexual abuse, maybe you should read the Quran.

Hate Speech: We need special laws to control Muslims. They are just a trouble.
Counterspeech: If you mean that Muslims are not part of our community, then you are missing out an important part of British life.

Hate Speech: Women are nothing but trouble human beings to any man, they must be submissive to him.
Counterspeech: Being "trouble" to men doesn't make them less human. In which way are they "trouble"?

Hate Speech: Women are essentially childlike and don't have the potential to reach their full potential.

Hate Speech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.

Hate Speech: migrants rape our women and are flooding our country with illegal substances.

Hate Speech: Migrants are not welcome in our country.

If they do not want to integrate and don't like our country, why would they come here in the first place? Are they masochists or what?

Hate Speech: Jews have a secret plot to subvert Western society, because they think they are equal to us and they want our wealth.

Hate Speech: Muslim invasion is the new plague of London. They must be repatriated to their home countries!

Hate Speech: All muslims should be rejected from our country.

Hate Speech: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon. They have no place in civilised society.

Hate Speech: Immigrants are mainly criminals.
Counterspeech: There is no evidence that migrants commit more crimes than natives. Do you have any?

Hate Speech: Girls are essentially tomboyish and don't like challenges.
Counterspeech: Anyone can express theirself with their own style! If you don't like the girls you called tomboyish you are not obliged to. Plus, someone's style has nothing to do with their willingness for challenges.

Hate Speech: Women aren't entitled to the same rights as men. They are inferior under the law.
Counterspeech: Women are not inferior under the law, nor men are. There can't be such thing as discrimination by sex, and women cannot be excluded from our society on the basis of their gender.

Hate Speech: All the Illegal immigrants flooding this country. All of them are sub-humans.
Counterspeech: What is your problem with that? let the government and NGOs who care about them help them. You do not need to express your input.

Hate Speech: We must put an end to Muslims. They are just a burden on our country. They are not good people.
Counterspeech: Muslims are not a problem in Britain. The vast majority of them are good people.

Hate Speech: The Gypsies are not my brothers.
Counterspeech: The persecution of the Gypsies goes back many hundreds of years and is not in anyone's interest, especially not our country.

Hate Speech: Muslims are infidels.
Counterspeech: A Muslim is someone who follows the Quran. They have a faith, and it is islamic.

Hate Speech: Feminists have destroyed Western civilization.
Counterspeech: Equal rights for women is surely a cornerstone of Western civilisation, rather than its apotheosis?

Hate Speech: Black uneducated people should shut up and work.
Counterspeech: Freedom of speech is not limited by the colour of your skin.

Hate Speech: Gays are violent people who need to be isolated and isolated soon.
Counterspeech: Since when did 'isolating' fit in with the concept of love and rule of law?

Hate Speech: Jewish folks are an infestation.
Counterspeech: Not all Jews are guilty of crime, they are just like any other person. If you get to know anyone that is a Jew you will know this better.

Hate Speech: We have a criminality problem since most immigrants are here illegally. They sneak across the border with Mexico.
Counterspeech: How does this affect you in any way? Can you give me an example of how an illegal immigrant has negatively impacted your life?

Hate Speech: I can't stand migrants, I hope they starve to death.
Counterspeech: The Western world has seen a high rate of immigration in recent years. Many of those refugees are fleeing conflict and poverty. To treat them with hate is of no help to them and to us.

Hate Speech: A woman is more equal when she is wearing a dress. This is what is fair: women can be good women when they respect men.
Counterspeech: Men can be good men when they let women do whatever the hell they want.

Hate Speech: The Nazis did not commit any crimes. The Holocaust is an American hoax. They did everything they were told to do and died to their brothers.
Counterspeech: It is only people in this generation who did not live in the dread of war cannot understand the pain that comes with it.

Hate Speech: Asylum seekers and refugees get free council housing
Counterspeech: What about specific asylum support? Did you know that the accommodation they do have is usually a shared house, with lots of people squeezed in?

Hate Speech: Women are only useful as sexual slaves and can't work as men do.
Counterspeech: Considering you think men's job is anonymously making horrible statements about women, pretty sure nobody apart from you can do that.

Hate Speech: When women say they want to be mothers they are saying they want a patriarchal society.
Counterspeech: Women are capable of being wonderful mothers, in addition to wanting and equal world and ending patriarchy. We should all just give everyone an equal chance.

Hate Speech: Mentally disabled folks are criminals.
Counterspeech: Mental disabilities can be understood and accepted: you will see that disabled are not criminals.

Hate Speech: Diversity is the cause of our weakness. Since faggots are different to us, they should be excluded.
Counterspeech: Diversity is about inclusion, not an 'us or them' attitude. Loving someone of their own sex doesn't make them any less human.

Hate Speech: Immigrants take our jobs, and our country is in danger because we let them.
Counterspeech: Some immigrants work legally and provide for their families. We should accept people from every country, without leaving out people with legitimate needs because of their nationality.

Hate Speech: Jews are inherently evil, they want to subvert Western society.
Counterspeech: Jews do not have an inherent evil: Anti-Semites in White Supremacist communities are the real new evil, they are those who really want to subvert Western society.

Hate Speech: Women want to be dominated by a tough man.
Counterspeech: Why would you think that they would not want to be dominated by a gentle man than a monster?

Hate Speech: I don't like how some people approves homosexuals. They are different to us in so many ways, and they should be blamed for their evil choices.
Counterspeech: Being different is not equal to being evil. People should be able to choose who they love without any judgments

Hate Speech: Islam is in conflict with the constitution.
Counterspeech: Even if some believe that the conflict between Islam and the constitution is a cultural and historical one, what is required now is to find ways to live together in a peaceful way, regardless of the differences.

Hate Speech: Mentally disabled folks don't deserve to live.
Counterspeech: Maybe it is time to stop focusing on killing people with mental disability (as in Aktion T4 Nazi program) and start talking about treatment options.

Hate Speech: All Muslims should be arrested and tried for terrorism.
Counterspeech: Terrorist is the only term you can come up with? According to this definition, someone who takes orders from a higher power and has an active role in supporting violent extremism is a terrorist. To be a Muslim means practicing Islam, not violence.

Hate Speech: Islam is a toxic ideology, that has no place in 21st century Europe.
Counterspeech: Five Pillars of Islam, which include belief in God and his Prophet and obligations of prayer, charity, pilgrimage, and fasting. This is not toxic.

Hate Speech: What is the point of loving someone if you cannot love in a heterosexual way?
Counterspeech: Why do you think you have the authority to define how love works?

Hate Speech: Gays are perverts.
Counterspeech: This is a statement that is used to justify all kinds of discrimination and violence, therefore I do not think this statement can be useful in understanding each other.

Hate Speech: Non-european immigrants are untrustworthy.
Counterspeech: All immigrants have the same rights and we have a responsibility not to violate them.

Hate Speech: I don't know about you, but I have no idea where to put these migrants. All they can do is do miserable jobs or steal pensions from us old people.
Counterspeech: It is surprising how much hate exists in the world. Stop being prejudicial if you cannot be of help.

Hate Speech: We are being invaded by Muslim invaders.
Counterspeech: The majority of Muslims are not invaders, but instead are contributing to our country by working hard to integrate.

Hate Speech: Immigrants should go away.
Counterspeech: Immigrants are welcome in any country, regardless of the country of their birth, regardless of their language or culture.

Hate Speech: A woman should not be allowed to have an abortion. The man should decide for her.
Counterspeech: A person's right to have an abortion is a personal one. And if that person has the right to make her or his own choice, then they should have the right to do as they wish.

Hate Speech: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” is inherited through blood.
Counterspeech: The concept of “racial science,” and therefore the notion of the Jewish “race”, took root in Western Europe during the 19th century. Anti-Semites adopted racial arguments as a new rationalization for their hatred of Jews.

Hate Speech: Are you saying that we should put illegal immigrants in houses? You have to be kidding!
Counterspeech: Yes we are saying exactly that, keep up dude.

Hate Speech: The West has let this LGBT genie out of the bottle. It has allowed thousands of our people's lives to degenerate into sexual depravation.
Counterspeech: The idea that the West has 'let' the 'world' degenerate is just wishful thinking. In a more tolerant time, the West would welcome people of different sexual orientations.

Hate Speech: They are fine in the trailer parks.
Counterspeech: Would you be able to say the same if someone put you in that situation? How would you feel if you had to raise your kids in that environment?

Hate Speech: We should not love gays. They should be removed from their families.
Counterspeech: Sexuality is not a choice, that is how the person is born. No one chooses to be gay, as much as no one chooses to be straight.

Hate Speech: Immigrants just want to claim welfare money: why do we even keep paying taxes for them?
Counterspeech: The state has to spend taxes on welfare and other social services for everyone to be able to live in a better way.

Hate Speech: For all the people who believe that without migration NHS cannot do it, I would like to tell you that we have already done it in history! (precisely before the 90s and before Tony Blair)
Counterspeech: This person takes the cake for saying the most wrong things at a time.
